╧А╬╗╬┐╬║╬о ╬н╬╛╧Е╧А╬╜╬╖, ╬╣╬┤╬╣╬┐╧Ж╧Е╬о, ╧З╬┐╧Б╧Д╬м╧Д╬╖ ╬▒╧А╧М ╬║╬м╬╕╬╡ ╬м╧А╬┐╧И╬╖, ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬н╧Б╧З╬╡╧Д╬▒╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╬║╬▒╬╗╧Н╧И╬╡╬╣ ╬▒╧А╧М╬╗╧Е╧Д╬▒ ╧Д╬▒ ╧М╧А╬┐╬╣╬▒ ╬║╬╡╬╜╬м ╬╡╬п╧З╬▒╬╜ ╬╝╬╡╬п╬╜╬╡╬╣ ╧Г╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬▒╬╜╬▒╬│╬╜╧О╧Г╧Д╬╖, ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬▒╬╜╬▒╧Б╧Й╧Д╬╣╧М╧Д╬▒╬╜ ┬л╬╝╬╡╧Д╬м ╧Д╬╖╬╜ тАШ╬С╧Г╧Д╧Е╬╜╬┐╬╝╬п╬▒тАЩ ╧Д╬╣;┬╗╬Я╬╣ ╧Ж╬▒╬╜╬▒╧Д╬╣╬║╬┐╬п ╬▒╬╜╬▒╬│╬╜╧О╧Г╧Д╬╡╧В ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╬┐╧Е Nesbo, ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬│╬╡╬╜╬╣╬║╧М╧Д╬╡╧Б╬▒ ╧Д╬╖╧В ╧Г╬║╬▒╬╜╬┤╬╣╬╜╬▒╬▓╬╣╬║╬о╧В ╬▒╧Г╧Д╧Е╬╜╬┐╬╝╬╣╬║╬о╧В ╬╗╬┐╬│╬┐╧Д╬╡╧З╬╜╬п╬▒╧В, ╬▒╬╜╬н╬╝╬╡╬╜╬▒╬╜ ╬╝╬╡ ╧А╧Б╬┐╧Ж╬▒╬╜╬о ╬▒╬│╧Й╬╜╬п╬▒ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬▒╧Г╬п╬│╬▒╧Г╧Д╬╖тАж ╬┤╬п╧И╬▒ ╧Д╬┐ ╬╜╬н╬┐ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬┐, ╧Д╬╖ ╬╜╬н╬▒ ╧А╬╡╧Б╬╣╧А╬н╧Д╬╡╬╣╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬з╬м╧Б╬╣. ╬Ъ╬▒╬╜╬╡╬п╧В ╬▒╧А╧М ╬▒╧Е╧Д╬┐╧Н╧В ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╧А╬╡╧Б╬п╬╝╬╡╬╜╬╡ тАУ╧А╧Б╬┐╧Ж╬▒╬╜╧О╧ВтАУ ╬║╬м╧Д╬╣ ╬╗╬╣╬│╧М╧Д╬╡╧Б╬┐ ╬▒╧АтАЩ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╝╬▒╧В ╬н╧З╬╡╬╣ ╧Г╧Е╬╜╬╖╬╕╬п╧Г╬╡╬╣ ╬┐ ╧Г╧Е╬│╬│╧Б╬▒╧Ж╬н╬▒╧В. ╬Х╬╛╬м╬╗╬╗╬┐╧Е ╬┐ Nesbo ╬н╧З╬╡╬╣ ╬▒╧А╬┐╬┤╬╡╬п╬╛╬╡╬╣ ╧А╧Й╧В ╬╝╧А╬┐╧Б╬╡╬п ╬╜╬▒ ╬│╬п╬╜╬╡╬╣ ╬╝╬┐╬╜╬м╧З╬▒ ╬║╬▒╬╗╧Н╧Д╬╡╧Б╬┐╧В. ╬К╧Г╧Й╧В ╧М╬╝╧Й╧В ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╧А╬╡╧Б╬п╬╝╬╡╬╜╬▒╬╜ ╧М╬╗╬┐╬╣ ╬╝╬╣╬▒ ╬╣╧Г╧Д╬┐╧Б╬п╬▒ ╧Д╧М╧Г╬┐ ╬▒╧А╧М╬╗╧Е╧Д╬▒ ╧З╬┐╧Б╧Д╬▒╧Г╧Д╬╣╬║╬о, ╧Д╧М╧Г╬┐ ╬╣╬║╬▒╬╜╬┐╧А╬┐╬╣╬╖╧Д╬╣╬║╬м ╬│╬╡╬╝╬м╧Д╬╖ ╬┤╧Б╬м╧Г╬╖ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬│╬╗╬▒╧Ж╧Е╧Б╬н╧В ╧А╬╡╧Б╬╣╬│╧Б╬▒╧Ж╬н╧В, ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬н╧Д╬┐╬╣╬▒ ╧А╬╗╬╖╬╕╧О╧Б╬▒ ╧Г╧Е╬╜╬▒╬╣╧Г╬╕╬╖╬╝╬м╧Д╧Й╬╜ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬│╧Б╬о╬│╬┐╧Б╬╖ ╬╡╬╜╬▒╬╗╬╗╬▒╬│╬о ╧Г╬║╬╖╬╜╬╣╬║╧О╬╜ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬║╬▒╧Д╬▒╧Г╧Д╬м╧Г╬╡╧Й╬╜. ╬д╬┐ ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬┐ ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╬║╬м╬╜╬╡╬╣ ╬║╬▒╬╕╧М╬╗╬┐╧Е тАШ╬║╬┐╬╣╬╗╬╣╬мтАЩ, ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╧З╬м╬╜╬╡╬╣ ╧А╬┐╧Е╬╕╬╡╬╜╬м ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬╡╬╣╧Б╬╝╧М, ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╧Г╧Д╬▒╬╝╬▒╧Д╬м╬╡╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╧Д╧Б╬н╧Ж╬╡╬╣ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬▒╬╜╬▒╬│╬╜╧Й╧Г╧Д╬╣╬║╬о ╬▒╬│╧Й╬╜╬п╬▒ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╧А╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒ ╬│╬╣╬▒ ╧А╬╡╧Б╬╣╧Г╧Г╧М╧Д╬╡╧Б╬╡╧В ╬╡╬╛╬╡╬╗╬п╬╛╬╡╬╣╧В. ╬Ъ╬м╬╕╬╡ ╧А╬▒╧Б╬м╬│╧Б╬▒╧Ж╬┐╧В, ╬║╬м╬╕╬╡ ╧Г╬╡╬╗╬п╬┤╬▒ ╬н╧З╬╡╬╣ ╬┐╧Е╧Г╬╣╬▒╧Г╧Д╬╣╬║╧М ╬╗╧М╬│╬┐ ╧Н╧А╬▒╧Б╬╛╬╖╧В┬╖ ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╧Е╧А╬м╧Б╧З╬╡╬╣ ╧Д╬п╧А╬┐╧Д╬▒ ╧А╬╡╧Б╬╣╧Д╧Д╧М, ╧Д╬п╧А╬┐╧Д╬▒ ╬╡╬║╧Д╧М╧В ╧Д╧М╧А╬┐╧Е ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧З╧Б╧М╬╜╬┐╧Е ╬╝╬н╧Г╬▒ ╧Г╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╧А╬╗╬┐╬║╬о. ╬Я Nesbo, ╧А╧Б╬▒╬│╬╝╬▒╧Д╬╣╬║╧М╧В ╬╝╬▒╬н╧Г╧Д╧Б╬┐╧В ╧Г╧Д╬┐ ╬╜╬▒ ╬┤╬╣╬▒╧Д╬╖╧Б╬╡╬п ╬▒╬╝╬╡╬п╧Й╧Д╬╖ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬н╬╜╧Д╬▒╧Г╬╖ ╧Д╧Й╬╜ ╬╣╧Г╧Д╬┐╧Б╬╣╧О╬╜ ╧Д╬┐╧Е, ╧А╧Б╬▒╬│╬╝╬▒╧Д╬╣╬║╬м ╬╡╬┤╧О ╬╝╬╡╬│╬▒╬╗╬┐╧Н╧Б╬│╬╖╧Г╬╡. ╬Х╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬╗╬╡╧В ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Г╬║╬н╧Ж╧Д╬╖╬║╬╡ ╬▒╬║╧Б╬╣╬▓╧О╧В ╧М╬╗╬▒ ╧М╧Г╬▒ ╬╕╬▒ ╬о╬╕╬╡╬╗╬▒╬╜ ╬╜╬▒ ╬┤╬╣╬▒╬▓╬м╧Г╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╬┐╬╣ ╬▒╬╜╬▒╬│╬╜╧О╧Г╧Д╬╡╧В ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╬▒ ╧Г╧Е╬╝╧А╬╡╧Б╬╣╬н╬╗╬▒╬▓╬╡ ╧Г╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╧А╬╗╬┐╬║╬о ╧Д╬┐╧Е. ╬й╧Б╬╣╬╝╧М╧Д╬╡╧Б╬┐╧В ╬▒╧А╧М ╧А╬┐╧Д╬н ╧Г╧Е╬│╬│╧Б╬▒╧Ж╬╣╬║╬м, ╬╝╬┐╬╣╬м╬╢╬╡╬╣ ╬▒╧А╧М╬╗╧Е╧Д╬▒ ╬▒╧А╬┐╧Ж╬▒╧Г╬╣╧Г╬╝╬н╬╜╬┐╧В ╬╜╬▒ ╬╡╬║╧А╬╗╬о╬╛╬╡╬╣, ╬╜╬▒ ╧Д╬▒╧Б╬▒╬║╬┐╧Е╬╜╬о╧Г╬╡╬╣, ╬╜╬▒ ╬╛╬╡╬╕╬╡╬╝╬╡╬╗╬╣╧О╧Г╬╡╬╣ ╬║╬▒╬╕╬╡╧Д╬п ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╛╬н╧Б╬▒╬╝╬╡ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╕╬╡╧Й╧Б╬┐╧Н╧Г╬▒╬╝╬╡ ╬┤╬╡╬┤╬┐╬╝╬н╬╜╬┐ ╧Й╧В ╧Д╧О╧Б╬▒. ╬г╧Д╬┐ ╬г╧Н╬╝╧А╬▒╬╜ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬з╬м╧Б╬╣ ╬з╧М╬╗╬╡, ╬м╬╗╬╗╧Й╧Г╧Д╬╡, ╧Д╬п╧А╬┐╧Д╬▒ ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬┤╬╡╬┤╬┐╬╝╬н╬╜╬┐ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╬п╧А╬┐╧Д╬▒ ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╬║╧Б╬▒╧Д╬м╬╡╬╣ ╬│╬╣╬▒ ╧А╬м╬╜╧Д╬▒. ╬д╬┐ ╬╝╧М╬╜╬┐ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╝╧А╬┐╧Б╬╡╬п╧В ╬╜╬▒ ╬║╬м╬╜╬╡╬╣╧В ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╬╢╬╡╬╣╧В ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╬▒╧А╬┐╬╗╬▒╬╝╬▓╬м╬╜╬╡╬╣╧В ╧Д╬┐ ╧Д╧О╧Б╬▒, ╬▒╧Ж╬┐╧Н ╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М ╬╝╧А╬┐╧Б╬╡╬п ╬╜╬▒ ╬▒╬╗╬╗╬м╬╛╬╡╬╣ ╬╡╬╜╧Д╬╡╬╗╧О╧В ╬╛╬▒╧Ж╬╜╬╣╬║╬м ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬▒╬╝╬н╧Г╧Й╧В ╬╡╧А╧М╬╝╬╡╬╜╬╖ ╧Г╧Д╬╣╬│╬╝╬о. ╬Ъ╬▒╬╣ ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╧Е╧А╬м╧Б╧З╬╡╬╣ ╬║╬▒╬╗╧Н╧Д╬╡╧Б╬┐╧В ╧Г╧Н╬╜╧Д╧Б╬┐╧Ж╬┐╧В ╧ГтАЩ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М ╬▒╧А╧М ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬п╬┤╬╣╬┐ ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬з╬м╧Б╬╣┬╖ ╬╡╬╛╬п╧Г╬┐╧Е ╧О╧Б╬╣╬╝╬┐╧В ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬┤╬╖╬╝╬╣╬┐╧Е╧Б╬│╧М ╧Д╬┐╧Е, ╬н╧З╬╡╬╣ ╧Ж╧Д╬м╧Г╬╡╬╣ ╧А╬╗╬н╬┐╬╜ ╧Г╬╡ ╬н╬╜╬▒ ╬╝╬╡╧Д╬▒╬п╧З╬╝╬╣╬┐ ╧Д╬╖╧В ╬╢╧Й╬о╧В ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╧М╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╕╬▒ ╧А╧Б╬н╧А╬╡╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╬▒╬╜╬▒╬╕╬╡╧Й╧Б╬о╧Г╬╡╬╣ ╬│╬╣╬▒ ╬╝╬╣╬▒ ╬▒╬║╧М╬╝╬▒ ╧Ж╬┐╧Б╬м ╧Д╬▒ ╬║╬╡╬║╧Д╬╖╬╝╬н╬╜╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╧Е, ╬╜╬▒ ╬▒╬╜╬▒╬╢╬╖╧Д╬о╧Г╬╡╬╣ ╧Д╬▒ ╬║╬▒╬╗╬м ╬║╧Б╧Е╬╝╬╝╬н╬╜╬▒ ╧А╬м╬╕╬╖ ╬╝╬н╧Г╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╧А╧Б╬┐╧Г╧А╬▒╬╕╬о╧Г╬╡╬╣, ╬н╧Г╧Д╧Й, ╬╜╬▒ ╧Д╬▒ ╧З╬▒╬╗╬╣╬╜╬▒╬│╧Й╬│╬о╧Г╬╡╬╣ ╧А╧Б╬╣╬╜ ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬║╬▒╧Д╬▒╧А╬╣╬┐╧Н╬╜. ╬Я ╬з╬м╧Б╬╣ ╧Д╬╖╧В ┬л╬Ф╬п╧И╬▒╧В┬╗ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬п╧Г╧Й╧В ╬╖ ╬║╬▒╬╗╧Н╧Д╬╡╧Б╬╖ ╬╡╬║╬┤╬┐╧З╬о ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬╡╬▒╧Е╧Д╬┐╧Н ╧Д╬┐╧Е┬╖ ╧М╧З╬╣ ╬▒╧А╬╗╬м ╬│╬╣╬▒╧Д╬п ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬╡╧А╬╣╧Д╬н╬╗╬┐╧Е╧В ╬╡╧Е╧Д╧Е╧З╬╣╧Г╬╝╬н╬╜╬┐╧В тАУ╧М╧Г╬┐ ╬╡╧Е╧Д╧Е╧З╬╣╧Г╬╝╬н╬╜╬┐╧В ╬╝╧А╬┐╧Б╬╡╬п ╬╜╬▒ ╬╜╬╣╧О╧Г╬╡╬╣ ╬н╬╜╬▒╧В ╬╡╧Г╧Й╧Г╧Д╧Б╬╡╧Ж╬о╧В, ╬║╬▒╧З╧Н╧А╬┐╧А╧Д╬┐╧В ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬╖ ╬╢╧Й╬о ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╬╖ ╬Ь╬┐╬п╧Б╬▒ ╧Д╧Н╧А╬┐╧В ╧М╧А╧Й╧В ╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М╧ВтАУ ╬▒╬╗╬╗╬м ╬║╧Е╧Б╬п╧Й╧В ╬│╬╣╬▒╧Д╬п, ╬╝╬н╧Г╬▒ ╬▒╧А╧М ╬н╬╜╬▒╬╜ ╬║╧Е╬║╬╡╧О╬╜╬▒ ╬▒╬╝╧Ж╬╣╬▓╬┐╬╗╬╣╧О╬╜ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬▒╬╝╧Ж╬п╧Б╧Б╬┐╧А╧Й╬╜ ╬║╬▒╧Д╬▒╧Г╧Д╬м╧Г╬╡╧Й╬╜, ╬▒╧А╬┐╬┤╬╡╬╣╬║╬╜╧Н╬╡╧Д╬▒╬╣ ╧А╧Й╧В ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╧А╬╗╬н╬┐╬╜ ╬╣╬║╬▒╬╜╧М╧В ╬╜╬▒ ╬▒╬╜╧Д╬╣╬╝╬╡╧Д╧Й╧А╬п╧Г╬╡╬╣ ╬▒╬║╧М╬╝╬▒ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╬╣╧В ╬┤╧Е╧Г╬║╬┐╬╗╧М╧Д╬╡╧Б╬╡╧В ╬║╬▒╧Д╬▒╧Г╧Д╬м╧Г╬╡╬╣╧В, ╬│╬╣╬▒╧Д╬п ╬н╧З╬╡╬╣ ╧А╬╣╬▒ ╬║╬м╧Д╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╬╡╬╗╧А╬п╬╢╬╡╬╣ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬║╬м╧А╬┐╬╣╬┐╬╜ ╬╜╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╧А╬╡╧Б╬╣╬╝╬н╬╜╬╡╬╣ ╧М╧Д╬▒╬╜ ╬│╧Е╧Б╬п╬╢╬╡╬╣ ╧Г╧А╬п╧Д╬╣. ╬И╧З╬╡╬╣ ╬╝╬╣╬▒ ╬┐╬╣╬║╬┐╬│╬н╬╜╬╡╬╣╬▒, ╬н╬╜╬▒ ╬╝╬н╬╗╬╗╬┐╬╜. ╬а╬┐╧Е ╬╝╧А╬┐╧Б╬╡╬п ╬╜╬▒ ╬╝╬┐╬╣╬м╬╢╬╡╬╣ ╬▒╬▓╬н╬▓╬▒╬╣╬┐, ╬▒╬╗╬╗╬м ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬▒╧Е╧Д╬о ╧Д╬╖ ╧Ж╬┐╧Б╬м ╬н╧З╬╡╬╣ ╬╗╧М╬│╬┐╧Е╧В ╬╜╬▒ ╬╕╬н╬╗╬╡╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╧Д╬┐ ╬╢╬о╧Г╬╡╬╣. ╬У╬╣╬▒╧Д╬п ╬╝╧А╬┐╧Б╬╡╬п ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬│╬╣╬▒╧Д╬п ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬▒╬╛╬п╬╢╬╡╬╣. ╬Ч ┬л╬Ф╬п╧И╬▒┬╗ ╬╕╬▒ ╬║╬м╬╜╬╡╬╣ ╧Д╬┐╧Е╧В ╬▒╧А╬▒╬╜╧Д╬▒╧З╬┐╧Н тАШNesbomaniacsтАЩ ╬╜╬▒ ╬╜╬╣╧О╧Г╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╧А╧Й╧В ╬│╧Е╧Б╬п╬╢╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╧Г╧Д╬┐ ╧Г╧А╬п╧Д╬╣ ╧Д╬┐╧Е╧В ╬╝╬╡╧Д╬м ╬▒╧А╧М ╧А╬┐╬╗╧Н ╬║╬▒╬╣╧Б╧М, ╬┤╬╣╬▒╬▓╬м╬╢╬┐╬╜╧Д╬м╧В ╧Д╬╖. ╬а╧Б╧М╬║╬╡╬╣╧Д╬▒╬╣ ╬│╬╣╬▒ ╧Д╬┐ ╬▒╧Б╧Д╬╣╧М╧Д╬╡╧Б╬┐, ╧Д╬┐ ╧Й╧Б╬╣╬╝╧М╧Д╬╡╧Б╬┐, ╧Д╬┐ ╧А╬╣╬┐ ╬║╬▒╬╗╬┐╬│╧Б╬▒╬╝╬╝╬н╬╜╬┐ ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬з╧М╬╗╬╡ ╬│╬╣╬▒ ╬╜╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╧Е╧В ╬▓╬┐╬╖╬╕╬о╧Г╬╡╬╣ ╧Г╬╡ ╬╝╬╣╬▒ ╧Е╧А╧М╬╕╬╡╧Г╬╖ serial killer. (╬Ь╬╣╬▒ ╬н╬╜╧Г╧Д╬▒╧Г╬╖ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬н╧З╧Й ╧Г╬╡ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М ╧Д╬┐ ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬┐ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╧М╧Д╬╣ ╬╕╬╡╧Й╧Б╧О ╧А╧Й╧В ╬┐ ╧З╧Б╧М╬╜╬┐╧В ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬║╬м╬╗╬╡╧Г╬▒╬╜ ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬з╧М╬╗╬╡ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╧А╬м╧Б╬▒ ╧А╬┐╬╗╧Н ╬╜╧Й╧Б╬п╧В- ╬╝╧М╬╗╬╣╧В ╬╝╬╡╧Д╬м ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╧А╧Б╧О╧Д╬╖ ╬┤╬┐╬╗╬┐╧Ж╬┐╬╜╬п╬▒- ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╬▒ тАШтАЩ╬▒╬╜╧Д╬п╧А╬┐╬╣╬╜╬▒тАЩтАЩ ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬▒ ╬┐╧А╬┐╬п╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬▒╧А╬╡╬п╬╗╬╖╧Г╬▒╬╜ , ╬╡╬м╬╜ ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╧Г╧Е╬╜╬╡╧Б╬│╬▒╧Г╧Д╬╡╬п- ╬│╬╣╬▒╧Д╬п ╬╡╬╜ ╧Д╧Й ╬╝╬╡╧Д╬▒╬╛╧Н ╬┐ ╬м╬╜╬╕╧Б╧Й╧А╬┐╧В ╬╢╬╡╬╣ ╬╝╬╣╬▒ ╬╡╧Е╧Д╧Е╧З╬╣╧Г╬╝╬н╬╜╬╖ ╬┐╬╣╬║╬┐╬│╬╡╬╜╬╡╬╣╬▒╬║╬о ╬╢╧Й╬о- ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╬╝╬╡ ╬н╧А╬╡╬╣╧Г╬▒╬╜). ╬Я ╬з╧М╬╗╬╡ ╬╖╬│╬╡╬п╧Д╬▒╬╣ ╬╝╬п╬▒╧В ╬▒╬╜╬╡╬╛╬м╧Б╧Д╬╖╧Д╬╖╧В ╬┐╬╝╬м╬┤╬▒╧В ╬╖ ╬┐╧А╬┐╬п╬▒ ╬┤╬┐╧Е╬╗╬╡╧Н╬╡╬╣ ╧А╬▒╧Б╬м╬╗╬╗╬╖╬╗╬▒ ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬║╬▒╬╜╬┐╬╜╬╣╬║╬о ╬┐╬╝╬м╬┤╬▒ ╧Д╬╖╧В ╬▒╧Г╧Д╧Е╬╜╬┐╬╝╬п╬▒╧В. ╬Ъ╬▒╬╣ ╧Г╬╡ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М ╧Д╬┐ ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬┐ ╬н╧З╬┐╧Е╬╝╬╡ ╬▒╬╜╬▒╧Д╧Б╬┐╧А╬н╧В , ╬▒╧Ж╬о╬╜╬╡╬╣ ╧Е╧А╧М╬╜╬┐╬╣╬╡╧В ╬│╬╣╬▒ ╧А╬┐╬╗╬╗╬м ╧А╧Б╧М╧Г╧Й╧А╬▒ , ╧О╧Г╧Д╬╡ ╬┐╧Е╧Г╬╣╬▒╧Г╧Д╬╣╬║╬м ╬┐ ╬▒╬╜╬▒╬│╬╜╧О╧Г╧Д╬╖╧В ╬╜╬▒ ╬н╧З╬╡╬╣ ╧А╬┐╬╗╬╗╬┐╧Н╧В ╧Н╧А╬┐╧А╧Д╬┐╧Е╧В ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Г╧Д╬┐ ╧Д╬н╬╗╬┐╧В ╬╝╬╣╬▒ ╧Е╧А╧М╬╕╬╡╧Г╬╖ ╧А╬╣╬┐ ╧А╬┐╬╗╧Н╧А╬╗╬┐╬║╬╖ ╬▒╧А╧М ╧М╧Д╬╣ ╧Ж╬▒╬╣╬╜╧М╧Д╬▒╬╜. ╬И╧З╬┐╧Е╬╝╬╡ ╧А╧Б╧М╧Г╧Й╧А╬▒ ╬▒╧А╧М ╧Д╬▒ ╧А╧Б╬┐╬╖╬│╬┐╧Н╬╝╬╡╬╜╬▒ ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╧Е. ╬з╧Й╧Б╬п╧В ╬╜╬▒ ╬▒╧А╬┐╧Д╬╡╬╗╬╡╬п ╧Г╧Е╬╜╬н╧З╬╡╬╣╬▒ ╧Д╬╖╧В ╬С╧Г╧Д╧Е╬╜╬┐╬╝╬п╬▒╧В , ╬н╬╜╬▒ ╬▒╧А╧М ╧Д╬▒ ╬║╬╡╬╜╧Д╧Б╬╣╬║╬м ╧А╧Б╧М╧Г╧Й╧А╬▒ ╧Д╬╖╧В ╬Ф╬п╧И╬▒╧В, ╬╡╬п╧З╬╡ ╬▒╧Б╬║╬╡╧Д╬м ╧А╧Б╧Й╧Д╬▒╬│╧Й╬╜╬╣╧Г╧Д╬╣╬║╧М ╧Б╧М╬╗╬┐ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Г╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬С╧Г╧Д╧Е╬╜╬┐╬╝╬п╬▒, ╧Г╧Д╬┐ ╧Д╬н╬╗╬┐╧В ╧Д╬╖╧В ╬┐╧А╬┐╬п╬▒╧В, ╬┐╧Е╧Г╬╣╬▒╧Г╧Д╬╣╬║╬м ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Ж╬▒╬╣╬╜╧М╧Д╬▒╬╜ ╧М╧Д╬╣ ╬╕╬▒ ╬▒╬║╬┐╬╗╬┐╧Е╬╕╬о╧Г╬╡╬╣ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╡╧А╧М╬╝╬╡╬╜╬┐ ╬╝╧Е╬╕╬╣╧Г╧Д╧М╧Б╬╖╬╝╬▒. ╬Ь╬╡ ╧А╬╡╧Б╬п╧А╬┐╧Е ╧А╬▒╧Б╧М╬╝╬┐╬╣╬┐ ╧Д╧Б╧М╧А╬┐ ╧Д╬╡╬╗╬╡╬╣╧О╬╜╬╡╬╣ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╖ ╬Ф╬п╧И╬▒, ╬▒╧Ж╬о╬╜╬┐╬╜╧Д╬▒╧В ╬┐╧Б╬╕╬м╬╜╬┐╬╣╬║╧Д╬┐ ╧Д╬┐ ╬╡╬╜╬┤╬╡╧З╧М╬╝╬╡╬╜╬┐ ╬│╬╣╬▒ ╬╡╧А╧М╬╝╬╡╬╜╬┐ ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬┐. ╬г╬╡ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М ╧Д╬┐ ╧Г╬╖╬╝╬╡╬п╬┐ ╬╜╬▒ ╧А╧Й, ╬│╬╣╬▒ ╧М╧А╬┐╬╣╬┐╬╜ ╬▒╧А╬┐╧Ж╬▒╧Г╬п╧Г╬╡╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╬╛╬╡╬║╬╣╬╜╬о╧Г╬╡╬╣ ╧А╧Б╧О╧Д╬▒ ╬▒╧А╧М ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬С╧Г╧Д╧Е╬╜╬┐╬╝╬п╬▒ (╬│╬╣╬▒ ╬╜╬▒ ╧Ж╧Д╬м╧Г╬╡╬╣ ╧Г╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬Ф╬п╧И╬▒), ╧М╧Д╬╣ ╬╖ ╬С╧Г╧Д╧Е╬╜╬┐╬╝╬п╬▒ ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М╬╜╬┐╬╝╬┐ ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬┐, ╬▒╬╗╬╗╬м ╬┐╧Е╧Г╬╣╬▒╧Г╧Д╬╣╬║╬м ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╬┐ ╬┤╬╡╧Н╧Д╬╡╧Б╬┐ ╬╝╬н╧Б╬┐╧В ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬ж╬▒╬╜╧Д╬┐╬╝╬м. ╬Ч ╬Ф╬п╧И╬▒ ╬╝╬┐╧Е ╬м╧Ж╬╖╧Г╬╡ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬╡╬╜╧Д╧Н╧А╧Й╧Г╬╖ ╧М╧Д╬╣ ╬╝╧А╬┐╧Б╬╡╬п ╬╜╬▒ ╬┤╬╣╬▒╬▓╬▒╧Г╧Д╬╡╬п ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М╬╜╬┐╬╝╬▒, ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬╣╧В ╬╡╧А╬╡╬╛╬╖╬│╬о╧Г╬╡╬╣╧В ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬▒╬╜╬▒╧Ж╬н╧Б╬╡╬╣ ╧Д╬┐ ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬┐, ╬│╬╣╬▒ ╧Д╬▒ ╬│╬╡╬│╬┐╬╜╧М╧Д╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╧А╬▒╧Б╬╡╬╗╬╕╧М╬╜╧Д╬┐╧В. ╬д╬н╬╗╬┐╧В ╬╜╬▒ ╬▒╬╜╬▒╧Ж╬н╧Б╧Й ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╧Ж╬┐╬▓╬╡╧Б╬о ╧А╧Б╬┐╧О╬╕╬╖╧Г╬╖ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬н╬║╬▒╬╜╬▒╬╜ ╬┐╬╣ ╬╡╬║╬┤╧М╧Г╬╡╬╣╧В ╬Ь╬╡╧Д╬▒╬п╧З╬╝╬╣╬┐, ╬╡╬┤╧О ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╝╬о╬╜╬╡╧В ╧А╧Б╬╣╬╜ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬н╬║╬┤╬┐╧Г╬╖ ╧Д╬┐╧Е, ╧Д╬╣╧В ╬┤╬╣╬м╧Ж╬┐╧Б╬╡╧В ╧А╬▒╧Б╬┐╧Е╧Г╬╣╬м╧Г╬╡╬╣╧В ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╬▒ ╬▒╬╜╬▒╬╝╬╜╬╖╧Г╧Д╬╣╬║╬м ╬┤╧Й╧Б╬м╬║╬╣╬▒. ╬Ч ╬▒╬╗╬о╬╕╬╡╬╣╬▒ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╧М╧Д╬╣ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╡╬│╧О ╧Д╬┐ ╬▒╬│╧М╧Б╬▒╧Г╬▒ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╧А╧Б╧О╧Д╬╖ ╬╝╬н╧Б╬▒ ╧Д╬╖╧В ╬║╧Е╬║╬╗╬┐╧Ж╬┐╧Б╬п╬▒╧В ╧Д╬┐╧Е, ╬▒╬╗╬╗╬м ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧М╧Д╬╣ ╧М╬╗╬┐ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М ╧Д╬┐ ╬║╬╗╬п╬╝╬▒ ╬▒╬╜╬н╬▓╬▒╧Г╬╡ ╧Д╬╣╧В ╧А╧Б╬┐╧Г╬┤╬┐╬║╬п╬╡╧В, ╬▒╬╗╬╗╬м ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╬╣╧В ╬▒╧А╬▒╬╣╧Д╬о╧Г╬╡╬╣╧В ╬╝╬┐╧Е. ╬Ъ╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╬╡╬╗╬╣╬║╬м ╬║╬▒╧Д╬м╬╗╬▒╬▓╬▒ ╧М╧Д╬╣ ╧М╬╗╬┐ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╬о╧Д╬▒╬╜ ╧Д╬┐ ╬║╬▒╬╗╧Н╧Д╬╡╧Б╬┐ ╬│╬╣╬▒ ╧Д╬┐ ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬┐ (╬│╬╣╬▒ ╬╝╬н╬╜╬▒ ╧А╧Б╬┐╧Г╧Й╧А╬╣╬║╬м ╬╝╬╣╬╗╬м╧Й), ╬╝╬╣╬▒╧В ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧А╬╡╧Б╬п╬╝╬╡╬╜╬▒ ╬н╬╜╬▒ ╬╝╧Е╬╕╬╣╧Г╧Д╧М╧Б╬╖╬╝╬▒ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╕╬▒ ╧Е╧А╬╡╧Б╬║╬▒╬╗╧Н╧И╬╡╬╣ ╧Д╬▒ ╧А╧Б╬┐╬╖╬│╬┐╧Н╬╝╬╡╬╜╬▒, ╧А╧Б╬м╬│╬╝╬▒ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╬н╬│╬╣╬╜╬╡, ╬м╧Г╧З╬╡╧Д╬▒ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╧Д╬╡╬╗╬╣╬║╧О╧В ╧А╧Й╧В ╧А╬╗╬н╬┐╬╜ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬н╬╜╬▒╧В ╬╡╧Е╧Е╧А╧М╬╗╬╖╧А╧Д╬┐╧В ╬┐╬╣╬║╬┐╬│╬╡╬╜╬╡╬╣╬м╧Б╧З╬╖╧В (╬┐╬╣ ╬о╬┤╬╖ ╧Ж╬▒╬╜ ╬│╬╜╧Й╧Б╬п╬╢╬┐╧Е╬╝╬╡ ╧А╧Й╧В ╧А╬▒╬╜╧Д╧Б╬╡╧Н╧Д╬╖╬║╬╡ ╧Д╬╖ ╬б╬м╬║╬╡╬╗), ╬║╬╣ ╬н╬╜╬▒╧В ╬▒╧А╬╗╧М╧В ╬║╬▒╬╕╬╖╬│╬╖╧Д╬о╧В ╧Г╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬С╧Г╧Д╧Е╬╜╬┐╬╝╬╣╬║╬о ╬С╬║╬▒╬┤╬╖╬╝╬п╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬М╧Г╬╗╬┐. ╬М╬╝╧Й╧ВтАж ╬▒╬╜ ╬н╧З╬╡╬╣╧В ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╧А╬╡╧Д╧Б╬╣╬мтАж ╧М,╧Д╬╣ ╬║╬╣ ╬▒╬╜ ╬║╬м╬╜╬╡╬╣╧В, ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╧А╬╡╧Д╧Б╬╣╬м ╬╝╬н╬╜╬╡╬╣╧ВтАж╬Х╬╝╧Ж╬▒╬╜╬п╬╢╬╡╧Д╬▒╬╣ ╬н╬╜╬▒w ╬║╬▒╧Д╬м ╧Г╧Е╧Б╧Б╬┐╬о╬╜ ╬┤╬┐╬╗╬┐╧Ж╧М╬╜╬┐╧В ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Г╬║╬┐╧Д╧О╬╜╬╡╬╣ ╬│╧Е╬╜╬▒╬п╬║╬╡╧ВтАж ╬Ъ╬╣ ╧М╧З╬╣ ╬н╧Д╧Г╬╣ ╬▒╧А╬╗╬м ╧Д╬╖╧В ╧Г╬║╬┐╧Д╧О╬╜╬╡╬╣тАж ╧Д╬┐╧Е╧В ╧Б╬┐╧Е╧Ж╬м╬╡╬╣ ╧Д╬┐ ╬▒╬п╬╝╬▒тАж (╧М╧З╬╣ ╧М╧А╧Й╧В ╬╝╬▒╧В ╧Б╬┐╧Е╧Ж╬м╬╡╬╣ ╬╡╬╝╬м╧В ╧Д╬┐ ╬▒╬п╬╝╬▒ ╬╖ ╬╡╧Ж╬┐╧Б╬п╬▒, ╬▒╬╗╬╗╬м ╬║╬▒╬╜╬┐╬╜╬╣╬║╬м) ╬╝╬╡ ╬╝╬╣╬▒ ╧Г╬╣╬┤╬╡╧Б╬┐╬╝╬▒╧Г╬н╬╗╬▒ (╬╝╧А╧Б╧Б╧БтАж) ╬Ъ╬╣ ╬╡╬║╬╡╬п╬╜╬╡╧В ╧А╬╡╬╕╬▒╬п╬╜╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╬▒╧А╧М ╬▒╬║╬▒╧Д╬м╧Г╧З╬╡╧Д╬╖ ╬▒╬╣╬╝╬┐╧Б╧Б╬▒╬│╬п╬▒. ╬Ъ╬╣ ╬┐ ╬з╬м╧Б╬╣ ╬╡╧А╬▒╬╜╬н╧Б╧З╬╡╧Д╬▒╬╣ ╧Г╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬╡╬╜╬╡╧Б╬│╧М ╬┤╧Б╬м╧Г╬╖ ╬║╬╣ ╬▒╧В ╬╝╬╖╬╜ ╬╕╬н╬╗╬╡╬╣ (╬║╬▒╬╗╬м ╧Д╧Б╬▒╬▓╬м╧Д╬╡ ╬╝╬╡ ╬║╬╣ ╬▒╧В ╬║╬╗╬▒╬п╧ЙтАж)╬Ъ╬▒╬╣ ╧А╬▒╧Б╬н╬▒ ╬╝╬╡ ╧М╬╗╬┐╧Е╧В ╬▒╧Е╧Д╬┐╧Н╧В ╧Д╬┐╧Е╧В ╧Ж╧М╬╜╬┐╧Е╧В, ╬╜╬▒ ╧Д╧Б╬н╧З╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╬▒ ╧А╧Б╬┐╧Г╧Й╧А╬╣╬║╬м ╧Д╬┐╧Е. ╬Ч ╬б╬м╬║╬╡╬╗ ╧А╬н╧Ж╧Д╬╡╬╣ ╧Г╬╡ ╬║╧О╬╝╬▒ ╬║╬╣ ╬┐ ╬М╬╗╬╡╬│╬║ (╬┐ ╬│╬╣╬┐╧В ╧Д╬╖╧В ╬б╬м╬║╬╡╬╗) ╧Д╬▒ ╬▓╬м╬╢╬╡╬╣ ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬з╬м╧Б╬╣. ╬Ъ╬╣ ╬┐╬╣ ╧Г╬║╬┐╧Д╧Й╬╝╬┐╬п ╧Г╧Е╬╜╬╡╧З╬п╬╢╬┐╬╜╧Д╬▒╬╣тАж ╬║╬▒╬╣тАж ╬║╬▒╬╣тАж╬Я ╧Б╧Е╬╕╬╝╧М╧В ╬║╬▒╧Д╬▒╬╣╬│╬╣╧Г╧Д╬╣╬║╧М╧В, ╧М╧А╧Й╧В ╬╝╬▒╧В ╬н╧З╬╡╬╣ ╧Г╧Е╬╜╬╖╬╕╬п╧Г╬╡╬╣ ╬┐ Nesbo. ╬У╬╜╧О╧Б╬╣╬╝╬▒ ╧А╧Б╧М╧Г╧Й╧А╬▒ ╬▒╧А╧М ╧А╬▒╬╗╬╣╬м ╬┐ ╬д╧Б╬┐╧Е╬╗╧В, ╬┐ ╬Ь╬п╬║╬▒╬╡╬╗, ╬╖ ╬Я╧Н╬╗╬▒тАж ╬Э╬н╬▒ ╧А╧Б╧М╧Г╧Й╧А╬▒ ╧М╧А╧Й╧В ╬┐ ╬│╬╣╬▒╧Д╧Б╧М╧В ╬г╧Д╬н╧Ж╬╡╬╜╧В ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬┐ ╧И╧Е╧З╬┐╬╗╧М╬│╬┐╧В ╬г╬╝╬╣╧ДтАж ╬Ъ╬╣ ╬┐ ╬Э╬н╧Г╬╝╧А╬┐ ╧Г╧Е╬╜╬╡╧З╧О╧В ╧А╧Б╬┐╧Г╬╕╬н╧Д╬╡╬╣ ╧А╧Б╧М╧Г╧Й╧А╬▒ ╬║╬╣ ╬м╬╗╬╗╬▒ ╧А╧Б╧М╧Г╧Й╧А╬▒ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╧О╧Б╬╡╧В тАУ ╧О╧Б╬╡╧В ╧З╬м╬╜╬╡╬╣╧В ╧Д╬┐ ╬╗╬┐╬│╬▒╧Б╬╣╬▒╧Г╬╝╧М ╬║╬╣ ╬╡╬╜╧О ╧Г╬╡ ╬║╬м╧А╬┐╬╣╬┐╬╜ ╬м╬╗╬╗╬┐ ╧Г╧Е╬│╬│╧Б╬▒╧Ж╬н╬▒ ╬╝╧А╬┐╧Б╬╡╬п ╬╜╬▒ ╬н╬╗╬╡╬│╬╡╧В тАШ╬║╬┐╧Н╬╗╬▒╧Б╬╡ ╬╗╬╣╬│╬м╬║╬╣тАЩ, ╬╡╬┤╧О ok, itтАЩs just Nesbo. ╬С╧Е╧Д╧М ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╝╬┐╧Е ╬▒╧Б╬н╧Г╬╡╬╣ ╧Г╧Д╬┐ Nesbo ╧А╬н╧Б╬▒ ╬▒╧А╧М ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬│╧Б╬о╬│╬┐╧Б╬╖ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╡╬╜╬п╬┐╧Д╬╡ ╧З╬▒╬┐╧Д╬╣╬║╬о ╧А╬╗╬┐╬║╬о (╬║╬м╧А╧Й╧В ╬н╧Д╧Г╬╣ ╧Ж╬▒╬╜╧Д╬м╬╢╬┐╬╝╬▒╬╣ ╧А╧Б╬н╧А╬╡╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╬┐ ╬╝╧Е╬▒╬╗╧М ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬╡╬╜ ╬╗╧М╬│╧Й ╧Г╧Е╬│╬│╧Б╬▒╧Ж╬н╬▒), ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬╖ ╬║╧Б╬╣╧Д╬╣╬║╬о ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬║╬м╬╜╬╡╬╣ ╧Г╧Д╬╖ ╬╜╬┐╧Б╬▓╬╖╬│╬╣╬║╬о ╬║╬┐╬╣╬╜╧Й╬╜╬п╬▒, ╬╝╬╣╬▒ ╬║╧Б╬╣╧Д╬╣╬║╬о ╬▒╬╜╬╡╧А╬▒╬п╧Г╬╕╬╖╧Д╬╖ ╬▒╬╗╬╗╬м ╬║╬▒╬п╧Б╬╣╬▒ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬▓╬╗╬н╧А╬╡╬╣ ╧М╧А╬┐╬╣╬┐╧В ╬╕╬н╬╗╬╡╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬┤╬╡╬╣: ╬╝╬╣╬╗╬м╬╡╬╣ ╬│╬╣╬▒ ╧Д╬╖ ╬╜╬╡╬┐╬╗╬▒╬п╬▒, ╬│╬╣╬▒ ╧Д╬▒ ╬Ь╬Ь╬Х, ╬│╬╣╬▒ ╧Д╬╣╧В ╬╡╬╛╧Й╧Г╧Е╬╢╧Е╬│╬╣╬║╬н╧В ╧Г╧З╬н╧Г╬╡╬╣╧В, ╬│╬╣╬▒ ╧Д╬┐ ╬╡╬║╧А╬▒╬╣╬┤╬╡╧Е╧Д╬╣╬║╧М ╧Д╬╖╧В ╧Г╧Н╧Г╧Д╬╖╬╝╬▒, ╬│╬╣╬▒ ╧Д╬╖ ╬┤╬╣╬▒╧Ж╬╕╬┐╧Б╬мтАж╬Э╬▒ ╧А╧Б╬┐╧Г╬╕╬н╧Г╧Й ╧А╧Й╧В ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬н╬╜╬▒ ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬┐ ╬│╬╡╬╝╬м╧Д╬┐ ╬╝╬┐╧Е╧Г╬╣╬║╬отАж ╬а╬┐╬╗╧Н ╧Г╧Е╧З╬╜╬м ╬▒╬╜╬▒╧Ж╬н╧Б╬┐╬╜╧Д╬▒╬╣ ╬║╬┐╬╝╬╝╬м╧Д╬╣╬▒ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Г╧Е╬│╬║╧Б╬┐╧Д╬о╬╝╬▒╧Д╬▒, ╬╝╬┐╧Е╧Г╬╣╬║╬о ╧М╬╝╧Й╧В ╬м╬│╧Б╬╣╬▒, ╧А╬▒╬╜╬║, ╧З╬▒╧Б╬╜╧Д ╧Б╬┐╬║ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬┐╬╗╬п╬│╬┐╬╜ ╧Д╬╢╬▒╬╢, ╧Й╬╝╬о ╧М╧А╧Й╧В ╧Й╬╝╬н╧В ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬┐╬╣ ╧А╬╡╧Б╬╣╬│╧Б╬▒╧Ж╬н╧В ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬┐╧Е. ╬С╧А╬┐╧Д╬╡╬╗╬┐╧Н╬╜ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╧Д╬н╬╗╬╡╬╣╬▒ ╬╝╬┐╧Е╧Г╬╣╬║╬о ╧Е╧А╧М╬║╧Б╬┐╧Е╧Г╬╖ ╬║╬▒╬╕╧О╧В ╧Д╬┐ ╬┤╬╣╬▒╬▓╬м╬╢╬╡╧Д╬╡, ╬▒╬╗╬╗╬м ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╬╡╬│╬│╧Е╧О╬╝╬▒╬╣ ╬│╬╣╬▒ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╧И╧Е╧З╬┐╬╗╬┐╬│╬╣╬║╬о ╧Г╬▒╧В ╬╣╧Г╬┐╧Б╧Б╬┐╧А╬п╬▒ ╬╝╬╡╧Д╬м (╬╡╬│╧О ╧А╬м╬╜╧Д╧Й╧В ╬▒╬╣╧Г╬╕╬▒╬╜╧М╬╝╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╧А╧Й╧В ╬н╬╝╧А╬▒╬╣╬╜╬╡ ╬┐ ╬▓╬▒╬╝╧А╬╣╧Б╬╣╧Г╧Д╬о╧В ╬╝╬╡╧В ╧Г╧Д╬╖ ╧Ж╧Й╬╗╬╣╬м ╬╝╬┐╧Е ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Б╬┐╧Н╧Ж╬▒╬│╬╡ ╧Д╬┐ ╬▒╬п╬╝╬▒ ╬╝╬┐╧Е ╬╖╬╗╬╣╬║╬п╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╧Е╧ВтАж ╬Я ╬Э╬н╧Г╬╝╧А╬┐ ╬▒╬╜╬▒╧Ж╬н╧Б╬╡╬╣ ╬╜╬┐╧Г╧Д╬▒╬╗╬│╬╣╬║╬м ╧Д╬┐ ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬┐ ┬л╧Д╬┐ ╬╢╬╡╬╜ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╖ ╧Д╬н╧З╬╜╬╖ ╧Д╬╖╧В ╧Г╧Е╬╜╧Д╬о╧Б╬╖╧Г╬╖╧В ╧Д╬╖╧В ╬╝╬┐╧Д╬┐╧Г╧Е╬║╬╗╬н╧Д╬▒╧В┬╗ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬┐. ╬а╬╡╧Б╬╣╧Г╧Г╧М╧Д╬╡╧Б╬┐ ╬╝╧А╬▒╬п╬╜╧Й ╧Г╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬┤╬╣╬▒╬┤╬╣╬║╬▒╧Г╬п╬▒ ╬╜╬▒ ╬│╧Б╬м╧И╧Й ╬┤╧Е╬┐ ╬╗╧М╬│╬╣╬▒ ╬│╬╣╬▒╧Д╬п ╧Д╬┐ ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬┐ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╧М╧Г╬┐ ╬║╬▒╬╗╧М ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬▒╬╛╬п╬╢╬╡╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╧Д╬┐ ╬┤╬╣╬▒╬▓╬м╧Г╬╡╧Д╬╡ ╬┐╬╣ ╬╗╬м╧Д╧Б╬╡╬╣╧В ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬╡╬п╬┤╬┐╧Е╧В, ╬╡╧А╬╡╬╣╬┤╬о ╬╡╬│╧О ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╬▒╬╜╬о╬║╧Й ╧Г╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬╗╬╡╬│╧М╬╝╬╡╬╜╬╖ ╬║╬▒╧Д╬╖╬│╬┐╧Б╬п╬▒ ╧Д╧Й╬╜ ╬╜╬╡╧Г╬╝╧А╬┐╬╝╬м╬╜╬╣╬▒╬║╧В. ╬д╬┐╬╜ ╬┤╬╣╬▒╬▓╬▒╬╢╧Й, ╬╕╬▒╧Е╬╝╬м╬╢╧Й ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬╡╧Е╧Ж╧Е╬Р╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╧Е, ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╧Д╧Б╧М╧А╬┐ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬н╧Г╧Д╬╖╧Г╬╡ ╧Д╧М╧Г╬▒ ╧З╧Б╧М╬╜╬╣╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬║╬╡╬╜╧Д╧Б╬╣╬║╧М ╬о╧Б╧Й╬▒ ╧Д╧Й╬╜ ╧А╬╡╧Б╬╣╧А╬╡╧Д╬╡╬╣╧О╬╜ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬▒╬╗╬╗╬м ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╬н╧З╧Й ╬┤╬╣╬▒╬▓╬м╧Г╬╡╬╣ ╧М╬╗╬▒ ╧Д╬▒ ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬▒ ╧Д╬╖╧В ╧Г╬╡╬╣╧Б╬м╧В ╬╡╬п╬╝╬▒╬╣ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬▒╬╜╬м╧А╬┐╬┤╬╖ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╬▒ ╬┤╬╣╬▒╬▓╬м╬╢╧Й ╧М╧А╧Й╧В ╬╝╬┐╧Е ╧Б╬╕╬╡╬╣ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬┐╧Н╧Д╬╡ ╬╝╬┐╧Е ╬м╧Б╬╡╧Г╬▒╬╜ ╧М╬╗╬▒ ╧Д╬┐ ╬п╬┤╬╣╬┐ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬┐╧Н╧Д╬╡ ╬║╬▒╬п╬│╬┐╬╝╬▒╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╬н╧З╧Й ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╧Г╧Д╬╖ ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬╣╬┐╬╕╬о╬║╬╖ ╬╝╬┐╧Е ╧А╬▒╧Б╧М╬╗╬┐ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬┐ ╬з╬м╧Б╬╣ ╬з╧М╬╗╬╡ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬▒╧А╧М ╧Д╬┐╧Е╧В ╬▒╬│╬▒╧А╬╖╬╝╬н╬╜╬┐╧Е╧В ╬╝╬┐╧Е ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧А╬╣╬┐ ╬┐╬╗╬┐╬║╬╗╬╖╧Б╧Й╬╝╬н╬╜╬┐╧Е╧В ╬о╧Б╧Й╬╡╧В ╬▒╧Г╧Д╧Е╬╜╬┐╬╝╬╣╬║╬┐╧Н ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬┐ ╧М╧Г╬┐ ╬┐╬╛╧Н╬╝╧Й╧Б╬┐ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬▒╬╜ ╬▒╬║╬┐╧Н╬│╬╡╧Д╬▒╬╣ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М. ╬Ч ╬┤╬п╧И╬▒ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╬┐ ╬╝╬┐╬╜╬▒╬┤╬╣╬║╧М ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬┐ ╧Д╬┐ ╬┐╧А╬┐╬п╬┐ ╧А╧Б╬▒╬│╬╝╬▒╧Д╬╣╬║╬м ╬╡╬п╧З╬▒ ╧Д╧М╧Г╬╖ ╧А╬╡╧Б╬╣╬╡╧Б╬│╬╡╬╣╬▒ ╬╜╬▒ ╬┤╬╣╬▒╬▓╬м╧Г╧Й ╬▒╧А╧М ╧А╧Б╬╣╬╜ ╬║╧Е╬║╬╗╬┐╧Ж╬┐╧Б╬о╧Г╬╡╬╣ ╧Д╬┐ ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬┐. ╬Ь╬┐╧Е ╬н╬║╬▒╬╜╬╡ ╬║╬╗╬╣╬║ ╬│╬╣╬▒ ╬║╬м╧А╬┐╬╣╬┐ ╬╗╧М╬│╬┐ ╧М╧А╧Й╧В ╬╡╧А╬п╧Г╬╖╧В ╬╝╬╡ ╬╣╬╜╧Д╧Б╬п╬│╬║╬▒╧Б╬╡ ╧Д╬┐ ╬│╬╡╬│╬┐╬╜╧М╧В ╧А╬┐╬╣╬┐╬╜ ╧Д╧Б╧М╧А╬┐ ╬╕╬▒ ╬н╬▓╧Б╬╣╧Г╬║╬╡ ╬┐ ╧Г╧Е╬│╬│╧Б╬▒╧Ж╬н╬▒╧В ╬╜╬▒ ╬╡╧А╬▒╬╜╬▒╧Ж╬н╧Б╬╡╬╣ ╬╛╬▒╬╜╬м ╧Г╧Д╬┐ ╧А╧Б╬┐╧Г╬║╬о╬╜╬╣╬┐ ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬з╬м╧Б╬╣ ╬з╧М╬╗╬╡ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬▒╬╜ ╬╕╬▒ ╬м╬╛╬╣╬╢╬╡ ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬║╧М╧А╬┐ ╬о ╬о╧Д╬▒╬╜ ╬▒╧А╬╗╬м ╧А╧Б╬┐╧В ╧Д╬н╧Б╧И╬╖ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬▒╬╜╬▒╬│╬╜╧О╧Г╧Д╬╖ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╕╬▒ ╬╛╬▒╬╜╬▒╬┤╬╣╬м╬▓╬▒╬╢╬╡ ╬╝╬╣╬▒ ╬▒╬║╧М╬╝╬▒ ╧А╬╡╧Б╬╣╧А╬н╧Д╬╡╬╣╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬з╬м╧Б╬╣. ╬г╬▒╬╜ ╬╗╬┐╬╣╧А╧М╬╜ ╬╝╬╣╬▒ ╬▒╧В ╧Д╬┐ ╧А╬┐╧Н╬╝╬╡ ╬▒╬╜╧Д╬╣╬║╬╡╬╣╬╝╬╡╬╜╬╣╬║╬о ╬▒╬╜╬▒╬│╬╜╧О╧Г╧Д╧Б╬╣╬▒ ╬╕╬╡╧Й╧Б╧О ╧М╧Д╬╣ ╬┐ ╬з╬м╧Б╬╣ ╬з╧М╬╗╬╡ ╬╡╧А╬╣╧Г╧Д╧Б╬н╧Ж╬╡╬╣ ╬┤╧Е╬╜╬▒╧Д╧М╧В ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧А╬╣╬┐ ╬┐╬╗╬┐╬║╬╗╬╖╧Б╧Й╬╝╬н╬╜╬┐╧В ╬▒╧А╧М ╧А╬┐╧Д╬н. ╬Ф╬╡╬╜ ╬╛╬н╧Б╧Й ╬▒╬╜ ╬┐ ╬Э╬н╧Г╬╝╧А╬┐ ╬╛╬╡╧А╬н╧Б╬▒╧Г╬╡ ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬╡╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬┐ ╧Г╧Е╬│╬║╬╡╬║╧Б╬╣╬╝╬н╬╜╬┐ ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬┐ ╧Д╬┐ ╬╝╧М╬╜╬┐ ╧М╬╝╧Й╧В ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╝╧А╬┐╧Б╧О ╬╜╬▒ ╧А╧Й ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╧М╧Д╬╣ ╧Г╧Д╬▒ ╬┤╬╣╬║╬м ╬╝╬┐╧Е ╬╝╬м╧Д╬╣╬▒ ╬о╧Д╬▒╬╜ ╬п╧Г╧Й╧В ╧Д╬┐ ╧А╬╣╬┐ ╬╝╬╡╧Г╧Д╧М ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧О╧Б╬╣╬╝╬┐ ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬┐ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╧Г╬╡ ╬╡╧А╬п╧А╬╡╬┤╬┐ ╬│╧Б╬▒╧Ж╬о╧В ╬▒╧А╧М ╬▒╧Е╧Д╬м ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╡╬│╧О ╧Д╬┐╧Е╬╗╬м╧З╬╣╧Г╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬н╧З╧Й ╬╡╬│╧О ╬┤╬╣╬▒╬▓╬м╧Г╬╡╬╣. ╬Я ╬Э╬н╧Г╬╝╧А╬┐ ╧Й╧Б╬╣╬╝╬м╬╢╬╡╬╣ ╧Г╧Е╬│╬│╧Б╬▒╧Ж╬╣╬║╬м ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╝╬▒╬╢╬п ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬┐ ╬з╬м╧Б╬╣ ╬з╧М╬╗╬╡. ╬И╬╛╧Е╧А╬╜╬╖ ╧А╬╗╬┐╬║╬о, ╬н╬╜╧Д╬▒╧Г╬╖, ╬▒╬│╧Й╬╜╬п╬▒ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬з╬м╧Б╬╣ ╬з╧М╬╗╬╡. ╬Ш╬н╬╗╬╡╧Д╬╡ ╬║╬м╧Д╬╣ ╬м╬╗╬╗╬┐? ╬С ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬║╬м╧Д╬╣ ╧Д╬╡╬╗╬╡╧Е╧Д╬▒╬п╬┐ ╬▒╧А╧М ╧Д╬┐ ╬з╬м╧Б╬╣ ╬з╧М╬╗╬╡ ╬п╧Г╧Й╧В ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╧А╬╣╬┐ ╬▒╬╗╬╖╬╕╬╣╬╜╧М ╬о╧Б╧Й╬▒. ╬д╧Б╧Й╧Д╧М╧В, ╬╝╬╡ ╬▒╬┤╧Е╬╜╬▒╬╝╬п╬╡╧В ╬▒╬╗╬╗╬м ╧А╬м╬╜╧Д╬▒ ╧Г╬┐╧Ж╧М ╬Ч ╬╡╧Е╧Д╧Е╧З╬п╬▒ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╧Г╬▒╬╜ ╬╜╬▒ ╧А╬▒╧Д╬м╧В ╧Г╬╡ ╬╡╧Н╬╕╧Б╬▒╧Е╧Г╧Д╬┐ ╧А╬м╬│╬┐. ╬║╬▒╬╗╧Н╧Д╬╡╧Б╬▒ ╬╜╬▒ ╧А╬┐╧Е╬╜╧Д╬╣╬м╬╢╬╡╬╣╧В ╬║╬┐╬╗╧Е╬╝╧А╧О╬╜╧Д╬▒╧В ╧Г╧Д╬▒ ╧А╬▒╬│╧Й╬╝╬н╬╜╬▒ ╬╜╬╡╧Б╬м, ╧А╬▒╧Г╧З╬п╬╢╬┐╬╜╧Д╬▒╧В ╬╜╬▒ ╬▓╬│╬╡╬╣╧В ╬н╬╛╧Й, ╧А╬▒╧Б╬м ╬╜╬▒ ╧А╬╡╧Б╬╣╬╝╬н╬╜╬╡╬╣╧В ╬╜╬▒ ╧Г╧А╬м╧Г╬╡╬╣ ╬┐ ╧А╬м╬│╬┐╧В ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╧А╬н╧Г╬╡╬╣╧В ╬╝╬н╧Г╬▒.

-- Review in language other than English--
A dog's impossible journey through city and wilderness to reach its beloved owner. Bella is a good dog. After being rescued from a den, she grows inexplicably attached to Lucas. Having a dog isn't easy, and after teaching her to hide and not to bark, she nevertheless gets noticed in the apartments she's not allowed to live in. Barely escaping Animal Control and nearly put down because of her forbidden pit bull status in Denver, and after some other incidents too, Bella becomes lost. Finding herself separated from her beloved Lucas, nearly four hundred miles away, Bella begins a fantastic journey, through city and wilderness, to reach him. Making friends along the way, human and not, Bella is determined to find her way back to Lucas no matter what. A fairly enjoyable read. I specially enjoyed the bond between Bella and Big Kitten. For some reason I had this one on audio and the voices really didn't do it for me, so if you happen to want to read this I would suggest text. That doesn't mean I recommend it though, I loved the Purpose series books but I did not love this one. It's somewhat different, you get the Dogs POV like the others but not the multiple lives and Bailey is not in it. Bella is a wonderful doggie, she's a fantastic, but did not really grow on me like Bailey did. Still, a worthy read for the animal lover, heartwarming and moving at times. *** The movie is a decent adaptation of the book. Some things were omitted, as to be expected, but still all the main ingredients were there. The special effects were good, the acting not so much, pretty flat. Bella and Big Kitten were the best part, obviously. ----------------------------------------------- PERSONAL NOTE : [2017] [336p] [Dog Novel] [Beautiful] [Almost Recommendable] [Epic Journey] [Interspecies Friendship]-----------------------------------------------тШЕтШЕтШЕтШЕтШЖ 1. ╧М╧Г╬┐ ╬║╬╣ ╬▒╬╜ ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╧Ж╬▒╬╜╧Д╬м╬╢╬╡╬╣ ╬╣╬┤╬╣╬▒╬п╧Д╬╡╧Б╬▒ ╧А╧Б╧Й╧Д╧М╧Д╧Е╧А╬┐, ╬н╧З╬┐╬╜╧Д╬▒╧В ╬╝╬╣╬▒╧В ╧Г╧З╬╡╬┤╧М╬╜ ╬▒╧А╧М╬╗╧Е╧Д╬╖ ╬▓╬╡╬▓╬▒╬╣╧М╧Д╬╖╧Д╬▒ ╬│╬╣╬▒ ╧Д╬┐ ╧Д╬╣ ╧А╧Б╧М╬║╬╡╬╣╧Д╬▒╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╧Г╧Е╬╝╬▓╬╡╬п, ╬║╬м╬╕╬╡ ╧Д╬н╧Д╬┐╬╣╬▒╧В ╧Ж╧Н╧Г╬╖╧В ╧Г╬╡╬╜╬м╧Б╬╣╬┐ ╬╝╬м╧В ╧Г╧Е╬│╬║╬╣╬╜╬╡╬п ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬║╬▒╧Д╬▒╧Ж╬н╧Б╬╜╬╡╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╬▒╬│╬│╬п╬╛╬╡╬╣ ╧Д╬╣╧В ╧А╬╣╬┐ ╬╡╧Е╬▒╬п╧Г╬╕╬╖╧Д╬╡╧В ╧З╬┐╧Б╬┤╬н╧В ╬╝╬▒╧В. ╬Ъ╬м╧Д╬╣ ╧Д╬н╧Д╬┐╬╣╬┐ ╬╣╧Г╧З╧Н╬╡╬╣, ╧М╧А╧Й╧В ╬▒╧А╬┐╬┤╬╡╬╣╬║╬╜╧Н╬╡╧Д╬▒╬╣, ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧М╧Д╬▒╬╜ ╬┐╬╣ ╬╣╧Г╧Д╬┐╧Б╬п╬╡╧В ╬▒╧Е╧Д╬н╧В ╬▒╧А╬┐╧Д╧Е╧А╧О╬╜╬┐╬╜╧Д╬▒╬╣ ╧Г╧Д╬┐ ╧З╬▒╧Б╧Д╬п, ╧М╧А╧Й╧В ╧Г╧Д╬┐ "╬Я ╬┤╧Б╧М╬╝╬┐╧В ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬│╧Е╧Б╬╣╧Г╬╝╬┐╧Н", ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬╖ ╧Г╬╡╬╣╧Б╬м ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬н╬┤╧Й╧Г╬╡ ╧Д╧Б╬┐╧Ж╬о ╬│╬╣╬▒ ╧Д╬┐ ╧Г╬╡╬╜╬м╧Б╬╣╬┐ ╬╝╬╣╬▒╧В ╬╡╬║ ╧Д╧Й╬╜ ╧Д╬▒╬╣╬╜╬╣╧О╬╜ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬▒╬╜╬▒╧Ж╬н╧Б╬▒╬╝╬╡ ╧А╬▒╧Б╬▒╧А╬м╬╜╧Й. ╬Я ╬Ы╬┐╧Н╬║╬▒╧В ╬б╬н╬╣ ╬▓╧Б╬п╧Г╬║╬╡╬╣ ╬н╬╜╬▒ ╬║╬┐╧Е╧Д╬▒╬▓╬м╬║╬╣ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬▒╧А╬┐╧Ж╬▒╧Г╬п╬╢╬╡╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╧Д╬┐ ╧Г╧О╧Г╬╡╬╣. ╬д╬┐╧Е ╬┤╬п╬╜╬╡╬╣ ╧Д╬┐ ╧М╬╜╬┐╬╝╬▒ ╬Ь╧А╬н╬╗╬▒ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧З╧Й╧Б╬п╧В ╬╜╬▒ ╧Д╬┐ ╬│╬╜╧Й╧Б╬п╬╢╬╡╬╣, ╧Д╬┐ ╬╝╬╣╬║╧Б╧М ╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М ╧А╬╗╬м╧Г╬╝╬▒ ╬╕╬▒ ╬▒╬╗╬╗╬м╬╛╬╡╬╣ ╧Д╬╖ ╬╢╧Й╬о ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╧Б╧М╧А╬┐╧Е╧В ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╧Ж╬▒╬╜╧Д╬м╬╢╬╡╧Д╬▒╬╣. ╬Ф╧Е╧Г╧Д╧Е╧З╧О╧В, ╬┐ ╬Ы╬┐╧Н╬║╬▒╧В ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╬╝╧А╬┐╧Б╬╡╬п ╬╜╬▒ ╧Ж╬╣╬╗╬┐╬╛╬╡╬╜╬о╧Г╬╡╬╣ ╧Д╬╖ ╬Ь╧А╬н╬╗╬▒ ╧Г╧Д╬┐ ╬┤╬╣╬▒╬╝╬н╧Б╬╣╧Г╬╝╬м ╧Д╬┐╧Е, ╬▒╧Ж╬┐╧Н ╬║╬м╧Д╬╣ ╧Д╬н╧Д╬┐╬╣╬┐ ╬▒╧А╬▒╬│╬┐╧Б╬╡╧Н╬╡╧Д╬▒╬╣, ╬╡╬╜╧О ╬┐╬╣ ╬│╬╡╬п╧Д╬┐╬╜╬н╧В ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬▓╬н╬▓╬▒╬╣╬┐ ╧А╧Й╧В ╬╕╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╧А╬м╧Б╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╬╡╬п╬┤╬╖╧Г╬╖ ╬▒╧Ж╬┐╧Н ╧А╬▒╧Б╬▒╧Д╬╖╧Б╬┐╧Н╬╜ ╬║╬╣ ╬╡╬╗╬н╬│╧З╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╧Д╬▒ ╧А╬м╬╜╧Д╬▒. ╬Ъ╬м╧А╧Й╧В ╬н╧Д╧Г╬╣, ╧А╬▒╬п╧Б╬╜╬╡╬╣ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬▒╧А╧М╧Ж╬▒╧Г╬╖ ╬╜╬▒ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╧А╬м╧Б╬╡╬╣ ╬╝╬▒╬╢╬п ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╧Г╧Д╬┐ ╬╜╬┐╧Г╬┐╬║╬┐╬╝╬╡╬п╬┐ ╧М╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╡╧Б╬│╬м╬╢╬╡╧Д╬▒╬╣, ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬╖ ╬Ь╧А╬н╬╗╬▒ ╬╜╬▒ ╬╝╬╡╬│╬▒╬╗╧О╬╜╬╡╬╣ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧А╬▒╧Б╬м╬╗╬╗╬╖╬╗╬▒ ╬╜╬▒ ╧А╧Б╬┐╧Г╧Ж╬н╧Б╬╡╬╣ ╧Д╬╡╧Б╬м╧Г╧Д╬╣╬▒ ╧З╬▒╧Б╬м ╧Г╧Д╬┐╧Е╧В ╬▒╧Г╬╕╬╡╬╜╬╡╬п╧В, ╧А╬┐╧Е ╧Ж╬▒╬╜╧Д╬м╬╢╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╧Г╬╡ ╬║╬▒╬╗╧Н╧Д╬╡╧Б╬╖ ╬║╬▒╧Д╬м╧Г╧Д╬▒╧Г╬╖ ╬▒╧А' ╧М╧Д╬▒╬╜ ╬╡╬║╬╡╬п╬╜╬╖ ╬о╧Б╬╕╬╡ ╬║╬┐╬╜╧Д╬м ╧Д╬┐╧Е╧В. ╬М╬╝╧Й╧В ╬┐╬╣ ╬║╧Б╬▒╧Д╬╣╬║╬н╧В ╧Е╧А╬╖╧Б╬╡╧Г╬п╬╡╧В ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╧Г╧Н╬╝╧Ж╧Й╬╜╬╡╧В ╬╝╬╡ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М ╧А╬┐╧Е ╧Г╧Е╬╝╬▓╬▒╬п╬╜╬╡╬╣, ╬▒╧А╬┐╬╝╬▒╬║╧Б╧Н╬╜╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╧Д╬╖ ╬Ь╧А╬н╬╗╬▒ ╬▒╧А╧М ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬Ы╬┐╧Н╬║╬▒╧В ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╬┐ ╬╜╬┐╧Г╬┐╬║╬┐╬╝╬╡╬п╬┐ ╧З╧Й╧Б╬п╧В, ╧Й╧Г╧Д╧М╧Г╬┐, ╬╜╬▒ ╬│╬╜╧Й╧Б╬п╬╢╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╧А╧Й╧В ╬╖ ╬╝╬╣╬║╧Б╬о ╬╝╬▒╧В ╬╖╧Б╧Й╬п╬┤╬▒ ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╬н╧З╬╡╬╣ ╧А╬╡╬╣ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╧Д╬╡╬╗╬╡╧Е╧Д╬▒╬п╬▒ ╧Д╬╖╧В ╬╗╬н╬╛╬╖. ╬а╬╣╧Г╧Д╬о ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬▒╧Ж╬┐╧Г╬╣╧Й╬╝╬н╬╜╬╖ ╧Г╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬Ы╬┐╧Н╬║╬▒╧В ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Г╧Д╬┐╧Е╧В ╬▒╬╜╬╕╧Б╧О╧А╬┐╧Е╧В ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬╜╬┐╧Г╬┐╬║╬┐╬╝╬╡╬п╬┐╧Е, ╬╝╬╡ ╬╝╬╣╬▒ ╬▓╬▒╬╕╬╣╬м ╬▒╬│╬м╧А╬╖ ╬▒╧А╬н╬╜╬▒╬╜╧Д╬╣ ╧Г╬╡ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╬┐╧Н╧В, ╬╖ ╬Ь╧А╬н╬╗╬▒ ╬╛╬╡╬║╬╣╬╜╬м ╬н╬╜╬▒ ╬╝╬▒╬║╧Б╧Н ╧З╬╣╬╗╬╣╬┐╬╝╬╡╧Д╧Б╬╣╬║╧М ╧Д╬▒╬╛╬п╬┤╬╣ ╧А╧Б╬┐╬║╬╡╬╣╬╝╬н╬╜╬┐╧Е ╬╜╬▒ ╬▓╧Б╬╡╬╕╬╡╬п ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧А╬м╬╗╬╣ ╬║╬┐╬╜╧Д╬м ╧Д╬┐╧Е╧В, ╧М╧Г╬╡╧В ╬▒╬╜╧Д╬╣╬╛╬┐╧М╧Д╬╖╧Д╬╡╧В ╬║╬╣ ╬▒╬╜ ╧З╧Б╬╡╬╣╬▒╧Г╧Д╬╡╬п ╬╜' ╬▒╬╜╧Д╬╣╬╝╬╡╧Д╧Й╧А╬п╧Г╬╡╬╣. ╬М╧А╧Й╧В ╬▒╬╜╧Д╬╣╬╗╬▒╬╝╬▓╬м╬╜╬╡╧Г╧Д╬╡, ╧Д╬┐ ╧Д╬▒╬╛╬п╬┤╬╣ ╧Д╬╖╧В ╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬│╬╡╬╝╬м╧Д╬┐ ╬┤╧Е╧Г╬║╬┐╬╗╬п╬╡╧В, ╧А╬╡╧Б╬╣╧А╬н╧Д╬╡╬╣╬╡╧В, ╬╡╧А╬╣╬║╬п╬╜╬┤╧Е╬╜╬╡╧В ╬║╬▒╧Д╬▒╧Г╧Д╬м╧Г╬╡╬╣╧В, ╬╝╬▒ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧А╬╗╬╖╬╝╬╝╧Е╧Б╬╣╧Г╬╝╬н╬╜╬┐ ╬▒╧А╧М ╬╡╬╝╧А╬╡╬╣╧Б╬п╬╡╧В, ╬╡╬╣╬║╧М╬╜╬╡╧В ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Г╧Е╬╜╬▒╬╣╧Г╬╕╬о╬╝╬▒╧Д╬▒, ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╧М╧Г╬┐ ╬╝╬┐╬╜╬▒╬┤╬╣╬║╧М ╧Д╧Б╧М╧А╬┐ ╬▒╧А╬┐╧Д╧Е╧А╧О╬╜╬┐╬╜╧Д╬▒╬╣ ╧Г╧Д╬┐ ╧З╬▒╧Б╧Д╬п ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╝╬╡╧Д╬▒╧Ж╬н╧Б╬┐╬╜╧Д╬▒╬╣ ╧Г╬╡ ╬╡╬╝╬м╧В ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╧М╧Г╬┐ ╧Б╬╡╬▒╬╗╬╣╧Г╬╝╧М, ╬╢╧Й╬╜╧Д╬м╬╜╬╣╬▒, ╬▒╧Е╬╕╬╡╬╜╧Д╬╣╬║╧М╧Д╬╖╧Д╬▒ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧А╬▒╧Б╬▒╧Г╧Д╬▒╧Д╬╣╬║╧М╧Д╬╖╧Д╬▒, ╧Г╬▒╬╜ ╬╜╬▒ ╬╡╬п╬╝╬▒╧Г╧Д╬╡ ╬║╬╣ ╬╡╬╝╬╡╬п╧В ╧А╬╗╬м╬╣ ╧Г╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬Ь╧А╬н╬╗╬▒, ╧Г╬▒╬╜ ╬╜╬▒ ╧Г╧Е╬╝╧А╬┐╧Б╬╡╧Е╧М╬╝╬▒╧Г╧Д╬╡ ╬╝╬▒╬╢╬п ╧Д╬╖╧В ╬▓╬╣╧О╬╜╬┐╬╜╧Д╬▒╧В ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬▓╬╗╬н╧А╬┐╬╜╧Д╬▒╧В ╧М╧Г╬▒ ╬║╬╣ ╬╡╬║╬╡╬п╬╜╬╖, ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬┐ ╬║╬м╬╕╬╡ ╧Д╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ "╬╝╬╣╬╗╬м╬╡╬╣" ╧Г╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╧И╧Е╧З╬о ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Г╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬║╬▒╧Б╬┤╬╣╬м ╬╝╬▒╧В ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬┤╬╣╬║╧М ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╧Д╧Б╧М╧А╬┐. ╬С╧Е╧Д╧М ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬▓╧Б╬п╧Г╬║╧Й ╬╡╬╛╬▒╬╣╧Б╬╡╧Д╬╣╬║╬м ╬╡╬╜╬┤╬╣╬▒╧Ж╬н╧Б╬┐╬╜, ╬╝╬▒ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╡╬╛╬▒╬╣╧Б╬╡╧Д╬╣╬║╧М ╬┤╧Н╧Г╬║╬┐╬╗╬┐ ╧Й╧В ╧А╧Б╬┐╧В ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╧З╬╡╬╣╧Б╬╣╧Г╬╝╧М ╧Д╬╖╧В, ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬╖ ╬╡╧А╬╣╬╗╬┐╬│╬о ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╧Г╧Е╬│╬│╧Б╬▒╧Ж╬н╬▒ ╬╜╬▒ ╬▒╧Ж╬╖╬│╬╖╬╕╬╡╬п ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬╣╧Г╧Д╬┐╧Б╬п╬▒ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╬о ╧М╧З╬╣ ╬▒╧А╬╗╬м ╬╝╬н╧Г╬▒ ╬▒╧А╧М ╧Д╬▒ ╬╝╬м╧Д╬╣╬▒ ╧Д╬╖╧В ╬Ь╧А╬н╬╗╬▒, ╬▒╬╗╬╗╬м ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬╖ ╬┤╬╣╬║╬╣╬м ╧Д╬╖╧В ╧Ж╧Й╬╜╬о. ╬Х╬║╬╡╬п╬╜╬╖ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╡╬╛╬╣╧Г╧Д╬┐╧Б╬╡╬п ╧Д╬╣╧В ╧А╬╡╧Б╬╣╧А╬н╧Д╬╡╬╣╬н╧В ╧Д╬╖╧В, ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╡╬╛╬┐╬╝╬┐╬╗╬┐╬│╬╡╬п╧Д╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╬╣╧В ╧Г╬║╬н╧И╬╡╬╣╧В ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╬▒ ╧Г╧Е╬╜╬▒╬╣╧Г╬╕╬о╬╝╬▒╧Д╬м ╧Д╬╖╧В, ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╬┐ ╬╜╬▒ ╬║╬▒╧Д╬▒╧Ж╬н╧Б╬╡╬╣╧В ╬╜╬▒ ╧Г╧Д╬о╧Г╬╡╬╣╧В ╬╝╬╣╬▒ ╧Д╬н╧Д╬┐╬╣╬▒ ╬▒╧Ж╬о╬│╬╖╧Г╬╖ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╜╬▒ ╬╝╬╖╬╜ ╧Ж╬▒╬╜╧Д╬м╬╢╬╡╬╣ ╬▒╧Г╧Д╬╡╬п╬▒ ╬╝╬▒ ╧Г╧Д╬┐ ╬╡╬╜╧Д╬╡╬╗╧О╧В ╬▒╬╜╧Д╬п╬╕╬╡╧Д╬┐ ╬м╬║╧Б╬┐, ╬▒╧А╧М╬╗╧Е╧Д╬▒ ╬▒╬╗╬╖╬╕╬╣╬╜╬о ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╡╬╛╬┐╬╝╬┐╬╗╬┐╬│╬╖╧Д╬╣╬║╬о, ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬м╬╕╬╗╬┐╧В, ╧Д╬┐╧Е╬╗╬м╧З╬╣╧Г╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╧Г╧Д╬▒ ╬┤╬╣╬║╬м ╬╝╬┐╧Е ╧Д╬▒ ╬╝╬м╧Д╬╣╬▒. ╬М╬╗╬┐╬╣ ╬│╬╜╧Й╧Б╬п╬╢╬┐╧Е╬╝╬╡ ╧А╧Й╧В ╧Д╬▒ ╬╢╧О╬▒ ╬╜╬╣╧О╬╕╬┐╧Е╬╜, ╬▒╬╣╧Г╬╕╬м╬╜╬┐╬╜╧Д╬▒╬╣, ╬╡╬║╧Ж╧Б╬м╬╢╬┐╬╜╧Д╬▒╬╣, ╬▒╬╗╬╗╬м ╧Д╬┐ ╬╜╬▒ ╬╝╧А╬▒╬п╬╜╬╡╬╣╧В ╬║╧Е╧Б╬╣╬┐╬╗╬╡╬║╧Д╬╣╬║╬м ╧Г╧Д╬┐ ╬╝╧Е╬▒╬╗╧М ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Г╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬║╬▒╧Б╬┤╬╣╬м ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╬┤╬п╬╜╬╡╬╣╧В ╧Ж╧Й╬╜╬о ╧Г╬╡ ╧М╬╗╬▒ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╬м, ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬┤╧Н╬┐ ╬╡╬╜╧Д╬╡╬╗╧О╧В ╬┤╬╣╬▒╧Ж╬┐╧Б╬╡╧Д╬╣╬║╬м ╧А╧Б╬м╬│╬╝╬▒╧Д╬▒, ╧Д╬▒ ╬┐╧А╬┐╬п╬▒ ╬┐ Cameron ╬н╧З╬╡╬╣ ╬╣╧Г╬┐╧Б╧Б╬┐╧А╬о╧Г╬╡╬╣ ╬╝╬╡ ╬╝╬╡╬│╬м╬╗╬╖ ╬╝╬▒╬╡╧Г╧Д╧Б╬п╬▒. ╬е╧А╬м╧Б╧З╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╧А╬┐╬╗╬╗╬н╧В ╬╝╬╣╬║╧Б╬н╧В ╧А╬╣╬╜╬╡╬╗╬╣╬н╧В ╧Г╧Д╬┐ ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬┐ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╧А╬╡╧Б╬╜╬м╬╜╬╡ ╬▒╧А╬▒╧Б╬▒╧Д╬о╧Б╬╖╧Д╬╡╧В, ╬▒╬╗╬╗╬м ╬▒╬╜╧Д╬п╬╕╬╡╧Д╬▒ ╬▒╬╜╧Д╬╣╬╗╬▒╬╝╬▓╬▒╬╜╧М╬╝╬▒╧Г╧Д╬╡ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬▓╬▒╧Б╧Н╧Д╬╖╧Д╬м ╧Д╬┐╧Е╧В, ╧З╧Й╧Б╬п╧В, ╧Й╧Г╧Д╧М╧Г╬┐, ╬▒╧Е╧Д╬н╧В ╬╜╬▒ "╧Ж╧Й╬╜╬м╬╢╬┐╧Е╬╜" ╧А╧Б╬┐╬║╬╡╬╣╬╝╬н╬╜╬┐╧Е ╬╜' ╬▒╬║╬┐╧Е╧Г╧Д╬┐╧Н╬╜. ╬Ю╬╡╧З╧Й╧Б╬п╬╢╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╬▒╧А╧М ╬╝╧М╬╜╬╡╧В ╧Д╬┐╧Е╧В, ╬┤╬╣╬▒╬║╧Б╬╣╧Д╬╣╬║╬м ╬╝╬╡╬╜, ╬┐╧Е╧Г╬╣╬▒╧Г╧Д╬╣╬║╬м ╬┤╬╡. ╬Ч ╬Ь╧А╬н╬╗╬▒ ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╧Г╬║╧Е╬╗╬п ╧Б╬м╧Д╧Г╬▒╧В, ╬▒╬╗╬╗╬м ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╧З╧Б╬╡╬╣╬м╬╢╬╡╧Д╬▒╬╣ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣, ╬│╬╣╬▒╧Д╬п ╬▒╬║╧М╬╝╬▒ ╬║╬╣ ╬н╧Д╧Г╬╣ ╬н╧З╬╡╬╣ ╧Д╬╖ ╬┤╬╣╬║╬о ╧Д╬╖╧В ╬╛╬╡╧З╧Й╧Б╬╣╧Г╧Д╬о ╧Д╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М╧Д╬╖╧Д╬▒ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╝╬┐╬╜╬▒╬┤╬╣╬║╧М╧Д╬╖╧Д╬▒. ╬Ч ╬│╬╡╬╜╬╜╬▒╬╣╧М╧Д╬╖╧Д╬▒ ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬║╬м╧Д╬╣ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬║╬▒╧Д╬▒╬║╧Д╬м╬╝╬╡, ╬▒╬╗╬╗╬м ╬║╬м╧Д╬╣ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╧Е╧А╬м╧Б╧З╬╡╬╣ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╢╬╡╬╣ ╬╝╬н╧Г╬▒ ╬╝╬▒╧В, ╧М╧А╧Й╧В ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╖ ╬▒╬│╬м╧А╬╖, ╧А╬┐╧Е ╧М╧Д╬▒╬╜ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬▓╬▒╬╕╬╣╬м ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬▒╬╗╬╖╬╕╬╣╬╜╬о, ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬╣╬║╬▒╬╜╬о ╬╜╬▒ ╬╛╬╡╧А╬╡╧Б╬м╧Г╬╡╬╣ ╧М╬╗╬▒ ╧Д╬▒ ╬╡╬╝╧А╧М╬┤╬╣╬▒, ╧М╬╗╬┐╧Е╧В ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╧Г╬║╬┐╧А╬н╬╗╬┐╧Е╧В ╧Д╬╖╧В ╬╢╧Й╬о╧В, ╧Ж╧Д╬м╬╜╬┐╬╜╧Д╬▒╧В ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬║╬┐╧Б╧Н╧Ж╧Й╧Г╬о ╧Д╬╖╧В ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╧Б╧М╧А╬┐╧Е╧В ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬▒╬│╬│╬п╬╢╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╧И╧Е╧З╬о ╬╝╬▒╧В, ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╝╬▒╧В ╧Г╧Е╬│╬║╬╣╬╜╬┐╧Н╬╜.

тАЬ╬а╧М╧Д╬╡ ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╧Г╧Е╬╜╬╖╬╕╬п╬╢╬╡╬╣ ╬║╬▒╬╜╬╡╬п╧В ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╧А╧М╬╜╬┐, ╧М╧Д╬╣ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╬╗╬н╬╡╬╣. тАЭ ╬Ъ╬▒╬╣ ╬┐╬╣ ╬о╧Б╧Й╬╡╧В ╧Д╬╖╧В Strout ╧А╬┐╬╜╬м╬╜╬╡, ╧А╬┐╬╜╬м╬╜╬╡ ╬▒╬╗╬╖╬╕╬╣╬╜╬м ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬▒╬╜╬╕╧Б╧О╧А╬╣╬╜╬▒. ╬Ъ╬▒╬╣ ╬╝╬▒╬╢╬п ╧Д╬┐╧Е╧В ╧А╬┐╬╜╬м╬╝╬╡ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╡╬╝╬╡╬п╧В ╬┐╬╣ ╬▒╬╜╬▒╬│╬╜╧О╧Г╧Д╬╡╧В, ╬│╬╣╬▒╧Д╬п ╧Д╬┐╧Е╧В ╬║╬▒╧Д╬▒╬╗╬▒╬▓╬▒╬п╬╜╬┐╧Е╬╝╬╡. ╬з╬▒╧Б╬▒╬║╧Д╬о╧Б╬╡╧В ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬║╬▒╬╗╬┐╧Н╬╜╧Д╬▒╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╧А╧Б╬┐╧З╧Й╧Б╬о╧Г╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╧Д╬╖ ╬╢╧Й╬о ╧Д╬┐╧Е╧В ╧Ж╬н╧Б╬┐╬╜╧Д╬▒╧В ╧Д╬┐ ╬▓╬▒╧Б╧Н ╧Ж╬┐╧Б╧Д╬п╬┐ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╧А╬▒╧Б╬╡╬╗╬╕╧М╬╜╧Д╬┐╧В. ╬з╬▒╧Б╬▒╬║╧Д╬о╧Б╬╡╧В ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬│╬п╬╜╬┐╬╜╧Д╬▒╬╣ ╬┤╬н╧Г╬╝╬╣╬┐╬╣ ╬▒╧Б╧Б╧Й╧Г╧Д╬╖╬╝╬н╬╜╧Й╬╜ ╧Г╧З╬н╧Г╬╡╧Й╬╜ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧А╬м╧Б╬▒ ╧Д╬┐ ╬│╬╡╬│╬┐╬╜╧М╧В ╧М╧Д╬╣ ╧А╬┐╬╜╬м╬╜╬╡ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧А╬╗╬╖╬│╧О╬╜╬┐╬╜╧Д╬▒╬╣ ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╬н╧З╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬┤╧Н╬╜╬▒╬╝╬╖ ╬╜╬▒ ╬▒╧А╬┐╧Д╬╣╬╜╬м╬╛╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╬м ╧Д╬▒ ╬┤╬╡╧Г╬╝╬м. ╬з╬▒╧Б╬▒╬║╧Д╬о╧Б╬╡╧В ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬▒╬┤╧Е╬╜╬▒╧Д╬┐╧Н╬╜ ╬╜╬▒ ╧А╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╜╬╣╧О╬╕╬┐╧Е╬╜, ╬│╬╣╬▒╧Д╬п ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╬╕╬н╬╗╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╬╜╬▒ ╧А╬╗╬╖╬│╧О╧Г╬┐╧Е╬╜, ╬│╬╣╬▒╧Д╬п ╧Ж╬┐╬▓╬┐╧Н╬╜╧Д╬▒╬╣, ╬│╬╣╬▒╧Д╬п ╧Д╬┐ ╧Д╬╣ ╬╕╬▒ ╧А╬╡╬╣ ╬╖ ╬║╬┐╬╣╬╜╧Й╬╜╬п╬▒ ╬н╧З╬╡╬╣ ╬╝╬╡╬│╬▒╬╗╧Н╧Д╬╡╧Б╬╖ ╧Г╬╖╬╝╬▒╧Г╬п╬▒ ╬▒╧А╧М ╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬┐╬╣ ╬п╬┤╬╣╬┐╬╣ ╬▒╬╣╧Г╬╕╬м╬╜╬┐╬╜╧Д╬▒╬╣. ╬з╬▒╧Б╬▒╬║╧Д╬о╧Б╬╡╧В ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╝╬▒╧В ╬╝╬┐╬╣╬м╬╢╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╬о ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╝╬┐╬╣╬м╬╢╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╧Г╬╡ ╬┐╬╣╬║╬╡╬п╬▒ ╬╝╬▒╧В ╧А╧Б╧М╧Г╧Й╧А╬▒. ╬Ъ╬▒╬╣ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╬о ╬╖ ╬┐╬╝╬┐╬╣╧М╧Д╬╖╧Д╬▒, ╬╝╬▒╧В ╬║╬м╬╜╬╡╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╧Д╬▒╧Е╧Д╬╣╬╢╧М╬╝╬▒╧Г╧Д╬╡ ╧А╬╡╧Б╬╣╧Г╧Г╧М╧Д╬╡╧Б╬┐ ╬╝╬▒╬╢╬п ╧Д╬┐╧Е╧В, ╬╜╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╧Е╧В ╬╜╬┐╬╣╬▒╬╢╧М╬╝╬▒╧Г╧Д╬╡, ╬╜╬▒ ╧Г╧Е╬╝╧А╬м╧Г╧З╬┐╧Е╬╝╬╡. ╬Ъ╬м╬╕╬╡ ╬╣╧Г╧Д╬┐╧Б╬п╬▒ ╧Д╬╖╧В Strout ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬▓╬▒╬╕╬╣╬м ╬▒╬╜╬╕╧Б╧О╧А╬╣╬╜╬╖, ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬╝╬╣╬▒ ╬║╬▒╧Д╬м╬╕╬╡╧Г╬╖ ╧И╧Е╧З╬о╧В ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Г╧Е╬╜╬▒╬╣╧Г╬╕╬╖╬╝╬м╧Д╧Й╬╜. ╬Ь╬╡╧Д╬м ╬▒╧А╧М ╬║╬м╬╕╬╡ ╬║╬╡╧Ж╬м╬╗╬▒╬╣╬┐, ╬▒╧Г╧Е╬╜╬▒╬п╧Г╬╕╬╖╧Д╬▒ ╬н╬▓╬│╬▒╬╣╬╜╬╡ ╬н╬╜╬▒╧В ╬▒╬╜╬▒╧Г╧Д╬╡╬╜╬▒╬│╬╝╧М╧В, ╬н╬╜╬▒ тАЬ╬▒╧ЗтАЭ, ╬│╬╣╬▒ ╧М╬╗╬▒ ╬║╬▒╧Д╬м╧Б╧Б╬╣╧И╬╖ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬м╬╗╬╗╬┐╬╕╬╣ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬│╬╣╬▒ ╧Д╬┐ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬о╧Д╬▒╬╜ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╧О╧Б╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╧Ж╬┐╬╜╬╣╬║╬┐╧Н ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬н╧Г╧Д╬╡╬╣╬╗╬╡ ╧Г╧Д╬╖ ╧Ж╧Е╬╗╬▒╬║╬о ╧Ж╬н╧Б╬╜╬┐╬╜╧Д╬▒╧В ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬▒╬╜╧Д╬╣╬╝╬н╧Д╧Й╧А╬┐ ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬╖ ╬╕╬▒╬╜╬▒╧Д╬╣╬║╬о ╧А╬┐╬╣╬╜╬о. ╬Ъ╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╧О╧Б╬▒, ╬╡╬п╬║╬┐╧Г╬╣ ╧З╧Б╧М╬╜╬╣╬▒ ╬╝╬╡╧Д╬м, ╬╖ ╬╡╬║╧Д╬н╬╗╬╡╧Г╬╖ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬Ь╬н╬╗╬▓╬╣╬╜ ╬Ь╬▒╧Б╧В ╬╝╬▒╧Д╬▒╬╣╧О╬╜╬╡╧Д╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╧Д╬╡╬╗╬╡╧Е╧Д╬▒╬п╬▒ ╧Г╧Д╬╣╬│╬╝╬о ╬║╬▒╬╕╧О╧В ╬║╬м╧А╬┐╬╣╬┐╧В ╬м╬╗╬╗╬┐╧В ╬┐╬╝╬┐╬╗╬┐╬│╬╡╬п ╧М╧Д╬╣ ╬н╧З╬╡╬╣ ╬┤╬╣╬▒╧А╧Б╬м╬╛╬╡╬╣ ╧Д╬┐╧Е╧В ╧Ж╧М╬╜╬┐╧Е╧В. ╬Х╬║╬╡╬п╬╜╬╖ ╬▒╬║╧Б╬╣╬▓╧О╧В ╧Д╬╖ ╧З╧Б╬┐╬╜╬╣╬║╬о ╧Г╧Д╬╣╬│╬╝╬о ╬┐ ╬Э╧Д╬н╬║╬╡╧Б ╬▒╧А╬┐╧Ж╬▒╧Г╬п╬╢╬╡╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╬▒╧Г╧З╬┐╬╗╬╖╬╕╬╡╬п ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╧Е╧А╧М╬╕╬╡╧Г╬╖ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬Ь╬▒╧Б╧В. ╬д╬┐ ╧М╬╜╬┐╬╝╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╧А╧Б╧О╬╖╬╜ ╧А╬▒╬п╬║╧Д╬╖ ╧А╬┐╬┤╬┐╧Г╧Ж╬▒╬п╧Б╬┐╧Е ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬│╧Е╧Б╬п╬╢╬╡╬╣ ╧А╬┐╬╗╬╗╬м ╧З╧Б╧М╬╜╬╣╬▒ ╧А╬п╧Г╧Й ╬╕╧Е╬╝╬п╬╢╬┐╬╜╧Д╬▒╧В ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬п╬┤╬╣╬┐ ╧Й╧В ╬▒╬╜╧Д╬п╧А╬▒╬╗╬┐ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬Ь╬н╬╗╬▓╬╣╬╜ ╬Ь╬▒╧Б╧В ╧Г╬╡ ╬н╬╜╬▒╬╜ ╬╣╧Г╧Д╬┐╧Б╬╣╬║╧М ╬▒╬│╧О╬╜╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╧А╬▒╧Б╬╡╬╗╬╕╧М╬╜╧Д╬┐╧В. ╬Я ╬╝╬╡╬│╬▒╬╗╧М╧Г╧Й╬╝╬┐╧В ╧А╧Б╧О╬╖╬╜ ╬▒╧Г╧Д╧Е╬╜╬┐╬╝╬╣╬║╧М╧В ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬▒╧А╬┐╧Ж╬▒╧Г╬╣╧Г╬╝╬н╬╜╬┐╧В ╬╜╬▒ ╬║╧Б╬▒╧Д╬о╧Г╬╡╬╣ ╬╡╬║╧Д╧М╧В ╧Ж╧Е╬╗╬▒╬║╬о╧В ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬Ь╬▒╧Б╧В ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╝╬н╧Г╬▒ ╬▒╧А╧М ╧Д╬╣╧В ╬н╧Б╬╡╧Е╬╜╬╡╧В ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╕╬▒ ╬┤╬╣╬╡╬╛╬▒╬│╬м╬│╬╡╬╣ ╬╕╬▒ ╬▒╬╜╬▒╬║╬▒╬╗╧Н╧И╬╡╬╣ ╧М╧Д╬╣ ╧Е╧А╬м╧Б╧З╬╡╬╣ ╬║╬м╧А╬┐╬╣╬┐╧В ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬║╧Б╧Н╬▓╬╡╧Д╬▒╬╣ ╧Г╧Д╬╣╧В ╧Г╬║╬╣╬н╧В ╬╝╬╡ ╬н╬╜╬▒ ╧А╬┐╬╗╧Н ╧Г╬╖╬╝╬▒╬╜╧Д╬╣╬║╧М ╬╝╧Е╧Г╧Д╬╣╬║╧М ╧Г╧Д╬▒ ╧З╬н╧Б╬╣╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╧Е. ╬Ъ╬м╧Д╬╣ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╧М╬╗╬┐╬╣ ╧А╧Б╬┐╧Г╧А╬▒╬╕╬┐╧Н╬╜ ╬╜╬▒ ╬▒╬╜╬▒╬║╬▒╬╗╧Н╧И╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╧М╧Г╬┐ ╧А╬╣╬┐ ╧А╬┐╬╗╧Н ╧А╬╗╬╖╧Г╬╣╬м╬╢╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╧Д╧М╧Г╬┐ ╬н╧Б╧З╬┐╬╜╧Д╬▒╬╣ ╧Г╧Д╬┐ ╧Ж╧Й╧В ╧И╬н╬╝╬▒╧Д╬▒ ╬▒╬╗╬╗╬м ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╝╬╣╬▒ ╬▒╧А╬м╧Д╬╖ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╧А╬╖╬│╬м╬╢╬╡╬╣ ╬▒╧А╧М ╬╝╬╣╬▒ ╧Г╬║╬┐╧Д╬╡╬╣╬╜╬о ╧А╬╡╧Б╬п╬┐╬┤╬┐ ╧Д╬╖╧В ╬С╬╝╬╡╧Б╬╣╬║╬▒╬╜╬╣╬║╬о╧В ╬╣╧Г╧Д╬┐╧Б╬п╬▒╧В ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬м╬╗╬╗╬┐╬╣ ╧А╧Б╬┐╧Г╧А╬▒╬╕╬┐╧Н╬╜ ╬╜╬▒ ╬╛╬╡╧З╬м╧Г╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╬╡╬╜╧О ╬м╬╗╬╗╬┐╬╣ ╬╕╬н╬╗╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╬╜╬▒ ╧Д╬╖ ╬╕╧Е╬╝╬╖╬╕╬┐╧Н╬╜. ╬Я David Baldacci ╧Г╧Д╬┐ ╧А╧Б╧М╧Г╧Й╧А╬┐ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬И╬╣╬╝╬┐╧В ╬Э╧Д╬н╬║╬╡╧Б ╬┤╬╖╬╝╬╣╬┐╧Е╧Б╬│╬╡╬п ╬п╧Г╧Й╧В ╬н╬╜╬▒╬╜ ╬▒╧А╧М ╧Д╬┐╧Е╧В ╧А╬╣╬┐ ╧А╧Б╧Й╧Д╧М╧Д╧Е╧А╬┐╧Е╧В ╬о╧Б╧Й╬╡╧В ╧Д╬╖╧В ╬▒╧Г╧Д╧Е╬╜╬┐╬╝╬╣╬║╬о╧В ╬╗╬┐╬│╬┐╧Д╬╡╧З╬╜╬п╬▒╧В. ╬Ъ╬▒╬╣ ╬│╬╣╬▒╧Д╬п ╧Д╬┐ ╬╗╬н╧Й ╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М; ╬Я ╬Э╧Д╬н╬║╬╡╧Б ╬╝╬╡╧Д╬м ╬▒╧А╧М ╬н╬╜╬▒ ╧З╧Д╧Н╧А╬╖╬╝╬▒ ╧Г╧Д╬┐ ╬║╬╡╧Ж╬м╬╗╬╣ ╧М╧Г╬┐ ╬о╧Д╬▒╬╜ ╧А╬▒╬п╬║╧Д╬╖╧В ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╧А╬┐╬┤╬┐╧Г╧Ж╬▒╬п╧Б╬┐╧Е ╬м╧Б╧З╬╣╧Г╬╡ ╬╜╬▒ ╬н╧З╬╡╬╣ ╧Е╧А╬╡╧Б╬╕╧Е╬╝╬╖╧Г╬п╬▒. ╬Ш╬▒ ╬╝╬┐╧Е ╧А╬╡╬п╧Д╬╡ ╧Д╬╣ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╕╬▒ ╬н╧З╬╡╧Д╬╡ ╬┤╬п╬║╬╣╬┐. ╬д╬┐ ╬м╧Д╬┐╬╝╬┐ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╧А╬м╧Г╧З╬╡╬╣ ╬▒╧А╧М ╬▒╧Е╧Д╬о ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬╡╬╛╬▒╬╣╧Б╬╡╧Д╬╣╬║╬м ╧Г╧А╬м╬╜╬╣╬▒ ╬╜╬╡╧Е╧Б╬┐╧И╧Е╧З╬╣╬║╬о ╬║╬▒╧Д╬м╧Г╧Д╬▒╧Г╬╖ ╧З╬▒╧Б╬▒╬║╧Д╬╖╧Б╬п╬╢╬╡╧Д╬▒╬╣ ╬▒╧А╧М ╬▒╬║╧Б╬▒╬п╬▒ ╬╝╬╜╬о╬╝╬╖ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╧Г╬╖╬╝╬▒╬п╬╜╬╡╬╣ ╧М╧Д╬╣ ╬┤╬╣╬▒╬╕╬н╧Д╬╡╬╣ ╬╡╬╛╬▒╬╣╧Б╬╡╧Д╬╣╬║╬о ╬▒╬╜╬м╬║╬╗╬╖╧Г╬╖ ╧Д╬╖╧В ╧А╧Б╬┐╧Г╧Й╧А╬╣╬║╬о╧В ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬╝╬╜╬о╬╝╬╖╧В. ╬Ф╬╖╬╗╬▒╬┤╬о ╬н╧З╬╡╬╣ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╬┐╬▓╬╣╬┐╬│╧Б╬▒╧Ж╬╣╬║╬о ╬╝╬╜╬о╬╝╬╖ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬н╬╜╬▒ ╬м╧Д╬┐╬╝╬┐ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╧А╬м╧Г╧З╬╡╬╣ ╬▒╧А╧М ╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М ╧Д╬┐ ╧Г╧Н╬╜╬┤╧Б╬┐╬╝╬┐ ╬н╧З╬╡╬╣ ╬╝╬╡╬│╬м╬╗╬╖ ╬┤╧Е╧Г╬║╬┐╬╗╬п╬▒ ╬╜╬▒ ╧Г╧Д╬▒╬╝╬▒╧Д╬о╧Г╬╡╬╣ ╧Д╬╖ ╧Б╬┐╬о ╧Д╧Й╬╜ ╬▒╬╜╬▒╬╝╬╜╬о╧Г╬╡╧Й╬╜ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬╝╬╡╧Д╬▒╧Д╧Б╬н╧А╬┐╬╜╧Д╬▒╧В ╧Д╬┐ ╧З╬м╧Б╬╣╧Г╬╝╬▒ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М ╬▒╧А╧М ╬┤╧О╧Б╬┐ ╧Г╬╡ ┬л╬║╬▒╧Д╬м╧Б╬▒┬╗ ╧Г╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬┐╧Е╧Г╬п╬▒. ╬И╧Д╧Г╬╣ ╬┐ Baldacci ╬║╬▒╧Д╬▒╧Ж╬н╧Б╬╜╬╡╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╬│╬╜╧Й╧Б╬п╧Г╬╡╬╣ ╧Г╧Д╬┐╧Е╧В ╬▒╬╜╬▒╬│╬╜╧О╧Г╧Д╬╡╧В ╧М╧З╬╣ ╬╝╧М╬╜╬┐ ╬н╬╜╬▒╬╜ ╬╣╬┤╬╣╬▒╬п╧Д╬╡╧Б╬┐ ╬о╧Б╧Й╬▒ ╬▒╬╗╬╗╬м ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╝╬╣╬▒ ╧Г╧Е╬╜╬▒╧Б╧А╬▒╧Г╧Д╬╣╬║╬о ╧А╧Б╬┐╧Г╧Й╧А╬╣╬║╧М╧Д╬╖╧Д╬▒ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬╝╬╡╬╜ ╬н╧З╬╡╬╣ ╧Д╬▒ ╬╕╬╡╬╝╬▒╧Д╬м╬║╬╣╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╧Е, ╬н╬╜╬▒ ╬╕╬╗╬╣╬▓╬╡╧Б╧М ╧А╬▒╧Б╬╡╬╗╬╕╧М╬╜ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬▓╬▒╧Г╬▒╬╜╬п╬╢╬╡╬╣ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╧И╧Е╧З╬о, ╬н╧З╬╡╬╣ ╬н╬╗╬╗╬╡╬╣╧И╬╖ ╧Д╬▒╬║╧Д ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╬╡╬║╧Ж╧Б╬м╬╢╬╡╬╣ ╬╡╧Н╬║╬┐╬╗╬▒ ╧Д╬▒ ╧Г╧Е╬╜╬▒╬╣╧Г╬╕╬о╬╝╬▒╧Д╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬▒╬╗╬╗╬м ╬│╬п╬╜╬╡╧Д╬▒╬╣ ╬╣╬┤╬╣╬▒╬п╧Д╬╡╧Б╬▒ ╧Г╧Е╬╝╧А╬▒╬╕╬о╧В ╧Г╧Д╬▒ ╬╝╬м╧Д╬╣╬▒ ╬╝╬▒╧В. ╬Ъ╬▒╬╣ ╬┐╧Е╧Г╬╣╬▒╧Г╧Д╬╣╬║╬м ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬║╬▒╧Д╧М╧Б╬╕╧Й╬╝╬▒ ╬╜╬▒ ╬╝╧А╬┐╧Б╬╡╬п ╬н╬╜╬▒╧В ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╝╬┐╬╜╬▒╬┤╬╣╬║╧М╧В ╬о╧Б╧Й╬▒╧В ╬╜╬▒ ╬║╧Б╬▒╧Д╬о╧Г╬╡╬╣ ╧Д╬▒ ╬╖╬╜╬п╬▒ ╧Г╬╡ ╬н╬╜╬▒ ╬╝╧Е╬╕╬╣╧Г╧Д╧М╧Б╬╖╬╝╬▒ ╧Д╧М╧Г╧Й╬╜ ╧Г╬╡╬╗╬п╬┤╧Й╬╜. ╬У╬╣╬▒╧Д╬п ╬┐ ╬Э╧Д╬н╬║╬╡╧Б ╧Е╧А╬╡╧Б╬╣╧Г╧З╧Н╬╡╬╣ ╧М╬╗╧Й╬╜ ╧Д╧Й╬╜ ╬м╬╗╬╗╧Й╬╜ ╧З╬▒╧Б╬▒╬║╧Д╬о╧Б╧Й╬╜ ╧З╧Й╧Б╬п╧В ╧М╬╝╧Й╧В ╬╜╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╧Е╧В ╬▒╧Ж╬о╬╜╬╡╬╣ ╧Г╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬▒╧Ж╬м╬╜╬╡╬╣╬▒ ╬▒╬╗╬╗╬м ╬║╬▒╬║╬м ╧Д╬▒ ╧И╬н╬╝╬▒╧Д╬▒тАж ╧Д╬▒ ╬▓╬╗╬н╬╝╬╝╬▒╧Д╬▒ ╧М╬╗╧Й╬╜ ╧А╬▒╧Б╬▒╬║╬┐╬╗╬┐╧Е╬╕╬┐╧Н╬╜ ╬╝╬╡ ╧А╧Б╬┐╧Г╬о╬╗╧Й╧Г╬╖ ╧Д╬╣╧В ╬║╬╣╬╜╬о╧Г╬╡╬╣╧В ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╬╣╧В ╧Г╬║╬н╧И╬╡╬╣╧В ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╧А╧Б╧Й╧Д╬▒╬│╧Й╬╜╬╣╧Г╧Д╬о ╧Д╬╖╧В El hijo idiota de Gone Girl. Una decepci├│n enorme. El libro empezaba bien, con personajes bien desarrollados y una trama que promet├нa mucho. Adem├бs, con unos personajes que me han gustado mucho, con los que me he re├нdo y me he emocionado. Y obviamente, me ha tenido con la intriga hasta el final del libro. Haciendo conjeturas, teor├нas, cambi├бndolas a cada p├бgina, a cada hecho o descubrimiento, teniendo al lector en tensi├│n y disfrutando de una preciosa historia de amor.

╨з╨╡╤Б╤В╨╜╨╛ ╨│╨╛╨▓╨╛╤А╤П, ╤П ╨░╨▓╤В╨╛╤А╨░ ╨╜╨╡ ╨╛╤З╨╡╨╜╤М ╨╗╤О╨▒╨╗╤О. ╨в╨╛╤З╨╜╨╡╨╡, ╨╡╨╡ ╨┐╤А╨╛╨╕╨╖╨▓╨╡╨┤╨╡╨╜╨╕╤П ╨╜╤А╨░╨▓╤П╤В╤Б╤П ╨╝╨╜╨╡ ╨┤╨░╨╢╨╡ ╨╜╨╡ ╤З╨╡╤А╨╡╨╖ ╤А╨░╨╖, ╨░ ╤З╨╡╤А╨╡╨╖ ╨┤╨▓╨░-╤В╤А╨╕. ╨Э╨╛ ╤В╤Г╤В ╨╛╤Б╤В╨░╨╗╨░╤Б╤М ╨▒╨╡╨╖ ╨║╨╛╨╝╨┐╨░ ╨╕ ╨┐╤А╨╛╤З╨╕╤Е ╨┐╤А╨╕╨▒╨╗╤Г╨┤, ╨░ ╨┐╨╛╨┤ ╤А╤Г╨║╨╛╨╣ ╨╛╨║╨░╨╖╨░╨╗╨░╤Б╤М ╨░╨┐╤А╨╡╨╗╤М╤Б╨║╨░╤П ╨╜╨╛╨▓╨╕╨╜╨║╨░ ╨а╨╛╨▒╨╡╤А╤В╤Б. ╨Х╤Й╨╡ ╨╕ ╤В╨╡╨╝╨░ ╨╛╨┤╨╜╨░ ╨╕╨╖ ╨╗╤О╨▒╨╕╨╝╤Л╤Е - ╨╝╨░╨╜╤М╤П╨║╨╕. ╨Э╨╡ ╤Г╨┤╨╡╤А╨╢╨░╨╗╨░╤Б╤М. ╨Т ╨┐╤А╨╕╨╜╤Ж╨╕╨┐╨╡, ╨╜╨╡ ╨╢╨░╨╗╨╡╤О, ╤Е╨╛╤В╤П ╤Б ╨╛╨│╨╛╨▓╨╛╤А╨║╨░╨╝╨╕. ╨Ш╤В╨░╨║, ╨░╨╜╨╜╨╛╤В╨░╤Ж╨╕╤П ╨╛╨▒╨╡╤Й╨░╨╡╤В ╨╜╨░╨╝ ╨╕╤Б╤В╨╛╤А╨╕╤О ╨┤╨╛╤З╨╡╤А╨╕ ╤Б╨╡╤А╨╕╨╣╨╜╨╛╨│╨╛ ╤Г╨▒╨╕╨╣╤Ж╤Л. ╨Ъ╨░╨║-╤В╨╛ ╨╜╨╛╤З╤М╤О ╨╛╨┤╨╕╨╜╨╜╨░╨┤╤Ж╨░╤В╨╕╨╗╨╡╤В╨╜╤П╤П ╨Э╨░╨╛╨╝╨╕ ╤Б╨╗╨╡╨┤╨╕╤В ╨╖╨░ ╨╛╤В╤Ж╨╛╨╝ ╨╕ ╨╜╨░╤Е╨╛╨┤╨╕╤В ╤Б╤В╤А╨░╤И╨╜╨╛╨╡ - ╤Б╨┐╤А╤П╤В╨░╨╜╨╜╤Л╨╣ ╨▓ ╨╗╨╡╤Б╤Г ╨┐╨╛╨┤╨▓╨░╨╗ ╤Б╨╛ ╤Б╨▓╤П╨╖╨░╨╜╨╜╨╛╨╣ ╨╕ ╨╕╨╖╨╝╤Г╤З╨╡╨╜╨╜╨╛╨╣ ╨┤╨╡╨▓╤Г╤И╨║╨╛╨╣. ╨Э╨░╨╛╨╝╨╕ ╨╜╨╡ ╤А╨░╨╖╨┤╤Г╨╝╤Л╨▓╨░╤П ╨╡╨╡ ╤Б╨┐╨░╤Б╨░╨╡╤В ╨╕ ╨▓╤Л╨▓╨╛╨┤╨╕╤В ╨║ ╨╛╤Д╨╕╤Б╤Г ╤И╨╡╤А╨╕╤Д╨░, ╨│╨┤╨╡ ╤А╨░╤Б╤Б╨║╨░╨╖╤Л╨▓╨░╨╡╤В ╨▓╤Б╨╡ ╨║╨░╨║ ╨╡╤Б╤В╤М. ╨Ю╤В╤Ж╨░-╨╝╨░╨╜╤М╤П╨║╨░ ╨░╤А╨╡╤Б╤В╨╛╨▓╤Л╨▓╨░╤О╤В, ╨▓╤Л╤П╤Б╨╜╤П╨╡╤В╤Б╤П, ╤З╤В╨╛ ╨╛╨╜ ╨╕╨╖╨╜╨░╤Б╨╕╨╗╨╛╨▓╨░╨╗ ╨╕ ╨╖╨░╨╝╤Г╤З╨╕╨╗ ╨┤╨╛ ╤Б╨╝╨╡╤А╤В╨╕ 26 ╨┤╨╡╨▓╤Г╤И╨╡╨║, ╨╛ ╤З╨╡╨╝ ╨╜╨╡ ╨┐╨╡╤А╨╡╤Б╤В╨░╨▓╨░╤П ╨▒╨░╤Е╨▓╨░╨╗╨╕╤В╤Б╤П. ╨Р ╨▓╨╛╤В ╨╡╨│╨╛ ╤Б╨╡╨╝╤М╨╡ - ╨╢╨╡╨╜╨╡ ╨╕ ╨┤╨▓╤Г╨╝ ╨┤╨╡╤В╤П╨╝ - ╤В╨╡╨┐╨╡╤А╤М ╨┐╤А╨╡╨┤╤Б╤В╨╛╨╕╤В ╤Б╨╛╨▒╨╕╤А╨░╤В╤М ╤Б╨▓╨╛╤О ╨╢╨╕╨╖╨╜╨╕ ╨┐╨╛ ╨║╤Г╤Б╨╛╤З╨║╨░╨╝. ╨Э╨░╨╛╨╝╨╕ ╤А╨░╤Б╤В╨╡╤В, ╤Б╤В╨░╨╜╨╛╨▓╨╕╤В╤Б╤П ╤Г╤Б╨┐╨╡╤И╨╜╤Л╨╝ ╤Д╨╛╤В╨╛╨│╤А╨░╤Д╨╛╨╝, ╨╝╨╜╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨┐╤Г╤В╨╡╤И╨╡╤Б╤В╨▓╤Г╨╡╤В ╨╕ ╨▓ ╨║╨╛╨╜╤Ж╨╡ ╨║╨╛╨╜╤Ж╨╛╨▓ ╤А╨╡╤И╨░╨╡╤В ╨╛╤Б╨╡╤Б╤В╤М ╨▓ ╨╛╨┤╨╜╨╛╨╝ ╨╜╨╡╨▒╨╛╨╗╤М╤И╨╛╨╝ ╨│╨╛╤А╨╛╨┤╨║╨╡, ╨┤╨░╨╢╨╡ ╤А╨╛╨╝╨░╨╜ ╨╖╨░╨▓╨╛╨┤╨╕╤В ╤Б ╨╝╨╡╤Б╤В╨╜╤Л╨╝. ╨Ш ╤Б ╨╡╨╡ ╨┐╨╛╤П╨▓╨╗╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╡╨╝ ╤В╨░╨╝ ╨╜╨░╤З╨╕╨╜╨░╤О╤В ╨┐╤А╨╛╨╕╤Б╤Е╨╛╨┤╨╕╤В╤М ╤Г╨▒╨╕╨╣╤Б╤В╨▓╨░. ╨Т╨╛╨╛╨▒╤Й╨╡, ╨┤╤Г╨╝╨░╨╗╨░, ╤З╤В╨╛ ╨┐╤А╨╛╤И╨╗╨╛╨╡ - ╨┐╨╛╨┤╨▓╨░╨╗, ╨░╤А╨╡╤Б╤В ╨╛╤В╤Ж╨░ ╨╕ ╨▓╤Б╨╡ ╤В╨░╨║╨╛╨╡ - ╨░╨▓╤В╨╛╤А ╤Г╨╝╨╡╤Б╤В╨╕╤В ╨╡╤Б╨╗╨╕ ╨╜╨╡ ╨▓ ╨┐╤А╨╛╨╗╨╛╨│, ╤В╨╛ ╨▓ ╨╛╨┤╨╜╤Г ╨│╨╗╨░╨▓╤Г. ╨Э╤Г, ╨╖╨╜╨░╨╡╤В╨╡, ╨║╨░╨║ ╨┤╨╡╨╗╨░╤О╤В ╨▓╤Б╨╡. ╨Ъ╤А╨░╤В╨║╨╛ ╨┐╨╛╨║╨░╨╖╤Л╨▓╨░╤О╤В ╨║╨╗╤О╤З╨╡╨▓╨╛╨╡ ╤Б╨╛╨▒╤Л╤В╨╕╨╡, ╨░ ╨┐╨╛╤В╨╛╨╝ "╨┤╨▓╨░╨┤╤Ж╨░╤В╤М ╨╗╨╡╤В ╤Б╨┐╤Г╤Б╤В╤П" ╤Б ╤А╨╡╨┤╨║╨╕╨╝╨╕ ╤Д╨╗╨╡╤И╨▒╨╡╨║╨░╨╝╨╕. ╨Э╨╛ ╤Н╤В╨╛ ╨╢╨╡ ╨а╨╛╨▒╨╡╤А╤В╤Б. ╨в╤Г╤В ╨▓╤Б╨╡ ╨║╨░╨║ ╨▓ "╨Ь╨╛╨╡╨╣ ╨╗╤О╨▒╨╕╨╝╨╛╨╣ ╨╛╤И╨╕╨▒╨║╨╡". ╨б╨╛╨▒╤Л╤В╨╕╤П╨╝ ╨┐╤А╨╛╤И╨╗╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨╛╤В╨▓╨╡╨┤╨╡╨╜╨╛ ╨╜╨╡╤Б╨║╨╛╨╗╤М╨║╨╛ ╨│╨╗╨░╨▓, ╨┐╨╛╤В╨╛╨╝ ╨╝╤Л ╨╜╨╡╨╝╨╜╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨╜╨░╨▒╨╗╤О╨┤╨░╨╡╨╝ ╨╖╨░ ╨Э╨░╨╛╨╝╨╕-╨┐╨╛╨┤╤А╨╛╤Б╤В╨║╨╛╨╝, ╨╕ ╤В╨╛╨╗╤М╨║╨╛ ╨┐╨╛╤Б╨╗╨╡ ╤Н╤В╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨╜╨░╤Б╤В╤Г╨┐╨░╨╡╤В ╨┤╨╛╨╗╨│╨╛╨╢╨┤╨░╨╜╨╜╨╛╨╡ "╤Б╨┐╤Г╤Б╤В╤П". ╨Ю╤З╨╡╨╜╤М ╨┤╨╗╨╕╨╜╨╜╨╛╨╡ "╤Б╨┐╤Г╤Б╤В╤П". ╨Р╨▓╤В╨╛╤А ╨╛╤З╨╡╨╜╤М ╨┐╨╛╨┤╤А╨╛╨▒╨╜╨╛ ╤А╨░╤Б╨┐╨╕╤Б╤Л╨▓╨░╨╡╤В ╨▓╨╛╤Б╤Б╤В╨░╨╜╨╛╨▓╨╗╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╡ ╤Б╤В╨░╤А╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨┤╨╛╨╝╨░, ╨║╨╛╤В╨╛╤А╤Л╨╣ ╨║╤Г╨┐╨╕╨╗╨░ ╨Э╨░╨╛╨╝╨╕, ╨╕ ╨╡╨╡ ╤А╨░╨▒╨╛╤В╤Г ╤Д╨╛╤В╨╛╨│╤А╨░╤Д╨░. ╨Ъ╨░╨║ ╨╛╨╜╨░ ╨▓╤Л╨▒╨╕╤А╨░╨╡╤В ╨╕ ╨┐╨╛╨║╤Г╨┐╨░╨╡╤В ╨╝╨╡╨▒╨╡╨╗╤М. ╨Ъ╨░╨║ ╨║╨░╨╢╨┤╨╛╨╡ ╤Г╤В╤А╨╛ ╤Д╨╛╤В╨╛╨│╤А╨░╤Д╨╕╤А╤Г╨╡╤В ╤А╨░╤Б╤Б╨▓╨╡╤В. ╨Т╤Б╨╡ ╨╡╨╡ ╨▓╤Б╤В╤А╨╡╤З╨╕ ╤Б ╨╜╨╛╨▓╤Л╨╝╨╕ ╨╗╤О╨┤╤М╨╝╨╕ ╨▓ ╨╝╨╜╨╛╨│╨╛╤Б╤В╤А╨░╨╜╨╕╤З╨╜╤Л╤Е ╨┤╨╕╨░╨╗╨╛╨│╨░╤Е, ╤В╨╛, ╨║╨░╨║ ╨╛╨╜╨░ ╨╜╨░╨║╨╛╨╜╨╡╤Ж ╨╖╨░╨▓╨╛╨┤╨╕╤В ╨┤╤А╤Г╨╖╨╡╨╣ ╨╕ ╨╗╤О╨▒╨╛╨▓╨╜╤Л╨╡ ╨╛╤В╨╜╨╛╤И╨╡╨╜╨╕╤П - ╤А╨░╨╜╤М╤И╨╡-╤В╨╛ ╨╕╨╖-╨╖╨░ ╨│╨╡╨╜╨╛╨▓ ╤Г╨▒╨╕╨╣╤Ж╤Л ╤Б╤З╨╕╤В╨░╨╗╨░ ╤Б╨╡╨▒╤П ╨╜╨╡╨┤╨╛╤Б╤В╨╛╨╣╨╜╨╛╨╣. ╨з╨╡╤Б╤В╨╜╨╛, ╨┐╨╛╨╗╨╛╨▓╨╕╨╜╤Г ╨╕╨╖ ╤Б╨╡╤А╨╡╨┤╨╕╨╜╤Л ╨╝╨╛╨╢╨╜╨╛ ╤Б╨╝╨╡╨╗╨╛ ╨▓╤Л╨║╨╕╨╜╤Г╤В╤М, ╨╕╨▒╨╛ ╤Г╤В╨╛╨╝╨╕╤В╨╡╨╗╤М╨╜╨╛ ╨╕ ╨╝╨╜╨╛╨│╨╛╤Б╨╗╨╛╨▓╨╜╨╛ ╨╕ ╨╜╨╕╨║╨░╨║╨╛╨╣ ╨╛╤Б╨╛╨▒╨╛╨╣ ╤Б╨╝╤Л╤Б╨╗╨╛╨▓╨╛╨╣ ╨╜╨░╨│╤А╤Г╨╖╨║╨╕ ╨╜╨╡ ╨╜╨╡╤Б╨╡╤В. ╨Ш ╤В╨╛╨╗╤М╨║╨╛ ╨▓ ╨┐╨╛╤Б╨╗╨╡╨┤╨╜╨╡╨╣ ╤З╨╡╤В╨▓╨╡╤А╤В╨╕ ╨║╨╜╨╕╨│╨╕ ╨╜╨░╤З╨╕╨╜╨░╨╡╤В╤Б╤П ╨╛╤Б╤В╤А╨╛╤Б╤О╨╢╨╡╤В╨╜╨░╤П ╤З╨░╤Б╤В╤М - ╪и╪▒╪о┘И╪▒╪п ┘Е█МтАМ┌й┘Ж┘Ж╪п ┘И ╪и╪з╪▒╪з┘Ж ╪┤╪▒┘И╪╣ ╪и┘З ╪и╪з╪▒█М╪п┘Ж ┘Е█МтАМ┌й┘Ж╪п. ╪╡┘Б╪н╪з╪к █▒█▓█╕-█▒█▓█╣ ┌й╪к╪з╪иThe padlock is a brand-new single-latch Burguet; with his tools he picks it easily. Inside are oats and water buckets and horseflies flying sleepy loops but no horses. He opens a stall and helps Marie-Laure into the corner and pulls off her shoes. тАЬVoil├а,тАЭ he says. тАЬOne of the guests has just brought his horses into the lobby, so it may smell for a moment. But now the porters are hurrying him out. See, there he goes. Goodbye, horse! Go sleep in the stables, please! тАЭHer expression is faraway. Lost. A vegetable garden waits behind the house. In the dimness he can make out roses, leeks, lettuces. Strawberries, most still green. Tender white carrots with black earth clotted in their fibers. Nothing stirs: no farmer materializes in a window with a rifle. The locksmith brings back a shirtful of vegetables and fills a tin bucket at a spigot and eases shut the barn door and feeds his daughter in the dark. Then he folds his coat, lays her head on it, and wipes her face with his shirt. Two cigarettes left. Inhale, exhale. Walk the paths of logic. Every outcome has its cause, and every predicament has its solution. Every lock its key. You can go back to Paris or you can stay here or you can go on. From outside comes the soft hooting of owls. Distant grumbling of thunder or ordnance or both. He says, тАЬThis hotel is very cheap, ma ch├йrie. The innkeeper behind the desk said our room was forty francs a night but only twenty francs if we made our own bed. тАЭ He listens to her breathe. тАЬSo I said, тАШOh, we can make our own bed. тАЩ And he said, тАШRight, IтАЩll get you some nails and wood. тАЩ тАЭMarie-Laure still does not smile. тАЬNow we go find Uncle Etienne?тАЭтАЬYes, Marie. тАЭтАЬWho is seventy-six percent crazy?тАЭтАЬHe was with your grandfatherтАФhis brotherтАФwhen he died. In the war. тАШGot a bit of gas in the headтАЩ is how they used to say it. Afterward he saw things. тАЭтАЬWhat kind of things?тАЭCreaking rumble of thunder closer now. The barn quakes lightly. тАЬThings that were not there. тАЭSpiders draw their webs between rafters. Moths flap against the windows. ╪и┘Ж█М┘ЗтАМ╪з╪┤ ╪з┌й╪к┘Б╪з ┌й╪▒╪п. ┘Е╪з┘Ж╪п╪М ┘Е█МтАМ┌п┘И█М╪п: ┬л┘И┘В╪к█М ╪з╪╡┘Д╪з╪н ╪з╪│╪к. ┬╗ ╪╡┘Б╪н╪з╪к █│█╖█▒-█│█╖█▓ ┌й╪к╪з╪иWhite CityIn April 1944 the Opel rattles into a white city full of empty windows. тАЬVienna,тАЭ says Volkheimer, and Neumann Two fulminates about Hapsburg palaces and Wiener schnitzel and girls whose vulvas taste like apple strudel. They sleep in a once stately Old World suite with the furniture shored up against the walls and chicken feathers clogging the marble sinks and newspapers tacked clumsily across the windows. Down below, a switching yard presents a wilderness of train tracks. Werner thinks of Dr. Hauptmann with his curls and fur-lined gloves, whose Viennese youth Werner imagined spent in vibrant caf├йs where scientists-to-be discussed Bohr and Schopenhauer, where mar-ble statues stared down from ledges like kindly godparents. Hauptmann, who, presumably, is still in Berlin. Or at the front, like everyone else. The city commander has no time for them. A subordinate tells Volkheimer there are reports of resistance broadcasts washing out of the Leopoldstadt. Round and round the district they drive. Cold fog hangs in the budding trees, and Werner sits in the back of the truck and shivers. The place smells to him of carnage. For five days he hears nothing on his transceiver but anthems and recorded propaganda and broadcasts from beleaguered colonels requesting supplies, gasoline, men. It is all unraveling, Werner can feel it; the fabric of the war tearing apart. тАЬThatтАЩs the Staatsoper,тАЭ says Neumann Two one night. The facade of a grand building rises gracefully, pilastered and crenelated. Stately wings soar on either side, somehow both heavy and light. It strikes Werner just then as wondrously futile to build splendid buildings, to make music, to sing songs, to print huge books full of colorful birds in the face of the seismic, engulfing indifference of the worldтАФwhat pretensions humans have! Why bother to make music when the silence and wind are so much larger Why light lamps when the darkness will inevitably snuff them? When Russian prisoners are chained by threes and fours to fences while German privates tuck live grenades in their pockets and run?Opera houses! Cities on the moon Ridiculous. They would all do better to put their faces on the curbs and wait for the boys who come through the city dragging sledges stacked with corpses. At midmorning Volkheimer orders them to park in the Augarten. The sun burns away the fog and reveals the first blooms on the trees. Werner can feel the fever flickering inside him, a stove with its door latched. Neumann One, who, if he were not scheduled to die ten weeks from now in the Allied invasion of Normandy, might have become a barber later in life, who would have smelled of talc and whiskey and put his index finger into menтАЩs ears to position their heads, whose pants and shirts always would have been covered with clipped hairs, who, in his shop, would have taped postcards of the Alps around the circumference of a big cheap wavery mirror, who would have been faithful to his stout wife for the rest of his life Neumann One says,тАЬTime for haircuts. тАЭ pp. 364-365╪и╪▒┘Д█М┘Ж╪п╪▒ ╪п╪о╪к╪▒┘З╪з ┘З╪▒ ╪з╪▓ ┌п╪з┘З█М ╪п╪▒ ┘Е╪│█М╪▒ ┌й╪з╪▒╪о╪з┘Ж┘З ╪м╪│╪п ╪з┘Б╪▒╪з╪п█М ╪▒╪з ┌й┘З ╪│┘И╪о╪к┘ЗтАМ╪з┘Ж╪п╪М ╪и┘З ┌Ж╪┤┘Е ┘Е█МтАМ╪и█М┘Ж┘Ж╪п. ╪з█М┘Ж ┌Ж█М╪▓┘З╪з █М┘И╪к╪з ╪▒╪з ╪и┘З ┘И╪н╪┤╪к ┘Е█МтАМ╪з┘Ж╪п╪з╪▓╪п. █М┘И╪к╪з ╪│┘З ╪и┌Ж┘З ┘Е█МтАМ╪и█М┘Ж╪п ┌й┘З ╪и╪з ┌й█М┘БтАМ┘З╪з█М╪┤╪з┘Ж ╪и┘З ┘╛╪┤╪к ╪▒┘И█М ╪▓┘Е█М┘Ж ╪з┘Б╪к╪з╪п┘ЗтАМ╪з┘Ж╪п. █М┘И╪к╪з ╪и╪з ╪о┘И╪п╪┤ ┘Б┌й╪▒ ┘Е█МтАМ┌й┘Ж╪п╪М ╪и┘Д┘Ж╪п ╪┤┘И█М╪п ┘И ╪и┘З ┘Е╪п╪▒╪│┘З ╪к╪з┘Ж ╪и╪▒┘И█М╪п. ╪╡┘Б╪н╪з╪к █┤█╕█╢-█┤█╕█╖ ┌й╪к╪з╪иBerlinIn January 1945, Frau Elena and the last four girls living at ChildrenтАЩs HouseтАФthe twins, Hannah and Susanne Gerlitz, Claudia F├╢rster, and fifteen-year-old Jutta PfennigтАФare transported from Essen to Berlin to work in a machine parts factory. For ten hours a day, six days a week, they disassemble massive forging presses and stack the usable metal in crates to be loaded onto train cars. Unscrewing, sawing, hauling. Most days Frau Elena works close by, wearing a torn ski jacket she has found, mumbling to herself in French or singing songs from childhood. They live above a printing company abandoned a month before. Hundreds of crates of misprinted dictionaries are stacked in the halls, and the girls burn them page by page in the potbelly stove. Yesterday Dankeswort, Dankesworte, Dankgebet, Dankopfer. Today Frauenverband, Frauenverein, Frauenvorsteher, Frauenwahlrecht. For meals they have cabbage and barley in the factory canteen at noon, endless ration lines in the evening. Butter is cut into tiny portions: three times a week, they each get a square half the size of asugar cube. Water comes from a spigot two blocks away. Mothers with infants have no baby clothes, no buggies, and very little cowтАЩs milk. Some tear apart bedsheets for diapers; a few find newspapers and fold those into triangles and pin them between their babiesтАЩ legs. At least half of the girls working in the factory cannot read or write, so Jutta reads them the letters that come from boyfriends or brothers or fathers at the front. Sometimes she writes responses for them: And do you remember when we ate pistachios, when we ate those lemon ices shaped like flowers? When you said . . . All spring the bombers come, every single night, their only goal seemingly to burn the city to its roots. Most nights the girls hurry to the end of the block and climb into a cramped shelter and are kept awake by the crashing of stonework. Once in a while, on the walk to the factory, they see bodies, mummies turned to ash, people scorched beyond recognition. Other times, the corpses bear no apparent injuries, and it is these that fill Jutta with dread: people who look like they are a moment away from rising up and slogging back to work with the rest of them. But they do not wake. Once she sees a row of three children facedown, backpacks on their backs. Her first thought is: Wake up. Go to school. Then she thinks: There could be food in those packs. pp. 487-489тАЛ

╤Ц ╤З╨╕╤В╨░╤З╨░, ╤Ц ╨│╨╛╨╗╨╛╨▓╨╜╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨│╨╡╤А╨╛╤П, ╨▒╨╛ ╨╜╨╡ ╨┐╤А╨╕╨╖╨▓╨╛╨┤╨╕╤В╤М ╨╜╤Ц ╨┤╨╛ ╤З╨╛╨│╨╛ ╤Ц ╨╖╨░╨╗╨╕╤И╨░╤Ф ╨╣╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨┐╨░╤Б╨╕╨▓╨╜╨╕╨╝ ╨│╨╗╤П╨┤╨░╤З╨╡╨╝. ╨ж╨╡ ╤Б╤Г╨╝╨╜╨╛, ╨▒╨╛ ╨Ф╨╢╨╡╤Д╤Д╤А╤Ц ╨╖╨┤╨░╤В╨╡╨╜ ╨╜╨░ ╨▒╤Ц╨╗╤М╤И╨╡. ╨Щ╨╛╨╝╤Г ╨▓╨╕╨┐╨░╨┤╨░╤Ф ╤Г╨╜╤Ц╨║╨░╨╗╤М╨╜╨░ ╨╜╨░╨│╨╛╨┤╨░ ╤Б╨┐╨╛╤Б╤В╨╡╤А╤Ц╨│╨░╤В╨╕ ╨╖╨░ ╨╡╨║╤Б╨┐╨╡╤А╨╕╨╝╨╡╨╜╤В╨╛╨╝, ╤П╨║╨╕╨╣ ╨▓╤Ц╨┤╨▒╤Г╨▓╨░╤Ф╤В╤М╤Б╤П ╤Г ╤Б╨┐╨╛╤А╤Г╨┤╤Ц "╨Ъ╨╛╨╜╨▓╨╡╤А╨│╨╡╨╜╤Ж╤Ц╤П" - ╤В╨░╤Ф╨╝╨╜╨╛╨╝╤Г ╨╝╤Ц╤Б╤Ж╤Ц, ╨┤╨╡ ╨┐╨╛╨╝╨╕╤А╨░╤О╤З╤Ц ╨╝╨╛╨╢╤Г╤В╤М ╨╖╨▒╨╡╤А╨╡╨│╤В╨╕ ╤В╤Ц╨╗╨╛ ╨┤╨╛ ╨┐╨╡╤А╨╡╤А╨╛╨┤╨╢╨╡╨╜╨╜╤П. ╨Ф╨╢╨╡╤Д╤Д╤А╤Ц ╨┤╨╕╨▓╨╕╤В╤М╤Б╤П, ╤П╨║ ╨┐╨╛╨╝╨╕╤А╨░╤Ф ╨▓╤Ц╨┤ ╨╛╨╜╨║╨╛╨╗╨╛╨│╤Ц╤Ч ╨╝╨░╤З╤Г╤Е╨░ ╨Р╤А╤В╨╕╤Б ╤Ц ╨▓╨╕╤П╨▓╨╗╤П╤Ф, ╤Й╨╛ ╤А╨░╨╖╨╛╨╝ ╨╖ ╨╜╨╡╤О ╤Е╨╛╤З╨╡ ╨┐╤Ц╤В╨╕ ╨╖ ╨╢╨╕╤В╤В╤П ╨▒╨░╤В╤М╨║╨╛. ╨Ь╤Ц╨╗╤М╤П╤А╨┤╨╡╤А ╨а╨╛╤Б╤Б ╨Ы╨╛╨║╨│╨░╤А╤В ╤Ф ╤Ц╨╜╨▓╨╡╤Б╤В╨╛╤А╨╛╨╝ ╤Ж╤М╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨┤╨╕╨▓╨╜╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨╝╤Ц╤Б╤Ж╤П ╤Ц ╨▓╤Ц╨╜ ╨╛╤З╤Ц╨║╤Г╤Ф ╨╜╨░ "╨Ч╨╡╤А╨╛ ╨Ъ", ╨┐╤А╨╛╤Ж╨╡╨┤╤Г╤А╤Г, ╨╜╨░╨╖╨▓╨░ ╤П╨║╨╛╤Ч - -- Review in language other than English--
Angosciante, soffocante, opprimente, ed altro. Cos├м definisco molto personalmente lтАЩultimo libro di DeLillo, in base alle sensazioni che ho provato. Il tema della morte non ├и mai gradevole, anzi, a volte solo il parlarne ├и destabilizzante. Ma qui non si tratta solo della morte, fatto del resto ineluttabile e naturale per ogni individuo della specie umana, se non della specie stessa. Criogenesi e eutanasia, conservazione dei corpi in vista di una futura rivitalizzazione quando la scienza sar├а evoluta a livelli inimmaginabili, ringiovanimento, attivit├а cerebrale e coscienza larvale dellтАЩIo staccata dal corpoтАж Sconfitta della morte e vita indefinita futuribile. Sembra una virata fantascientifica ma non lo ├и pi├╣ di tanto. Sono andato a leggiucchiare sul web e ho trovato che ci sono tre aziende private che conservano ibernati 337 corpi e pi├╣ di 2000 тАЬpazientiтАЭ sono in lista dтАЩattesa: lтАЩAlcor, in Arizona, il Cryonics Institute vicino a Detroit e la KryoRus, nata nel 2006 in Russia. La letteratura, la buona letteratura, spesso descrive la societ├а, la sua cultura, i suoi valori, aspettative, paure molto meglio di unтАЩinchiesta giornalistica, una ricerca sociologica o di marketing. DeLillo non inventa nulla, ma legge gli aspetti culturali di una societ├а e li interpreta, li descrive in maniera pregnante, potente, e direi sconvolgente. тАЬDio ├и mortoтАЭ, ├и lтАЩannuncio di Zarathustra, e con esso la speranza dтАЩimmortalit├а individuale. O in maniera pi├╣ soft тАЬDio cтАЩ├и ma non esisteтАЭ. Parafrasando allora Paolo nella prima lettera ai Corinzi, se Dio ├и morto e non ├и risorto, noi siamo perduti e siamo da compiangere pi├╣ di tutti. E allora? Niente paura, cтАЩ├и la scienza. E la fantascienza. Ma soprattutto il mercato e il profitto: promessa di immortalit├а, a chi ha un sacco di soldi! Ma non ├и tutto. Quello che addirittura sembra angosciare di pi├╣ non ├и la morte (Sorella Morte corporale), quanto lтАЩaridit├а di una cultura (la nostra?) che si ├и appiattita sul mero orizzonte тАЬmaterialeтАЭ, consumistico, con le derive di individualismo, incapacit├а di relazione e comunicazione (siamo in celle criogeniche gi├а da vivi perch├й incapaci e disinteressati allтАЩaltro, allтАЩempatia, alla simpatia, alla compassione, alla misericordia?). Questo ho letto anche in Zero K. Alla fine, dopo i paesaggi desertici e disseccati, la land art della struttura criogenica che ├и un orrido peana alla morte e al cadaverico, apocalissi sbandierate e sviscerate, apocalissi personali invocate e bramate, alla fine, un tramonto a Manhattan. Uno spettacolo impressionante, un palla infuocata, il disco solare i cui raggi si allineano perfettamente al reticolo delle strade. In autobus, con una mamma e il suo bambino, macrocefaloтАж тАЬNon sapevo come si chiamasse questo fenomeno, ma lo stavo osservando in quel momento e lo vedeva anche il bambino, le cui urla insistenti erano adatte alla circostanza. Il bambino, dal corpo massiccio e la testa enorme, era completamente risucchiato da quella visioneтАж Aveva le mani chiuse sul petto, serrate quasi a pugno, morbide e tremanti. Sua madre era seduta in silenzio, guardava insieme a luiтАж LтАЩintero disco solare, che inondava di luce le vie e illuminava le torri alla nostra destra e alla nostra sinistra; mi son detto che quello che il bambino vedeva non era il cielo che ci crollava addosso: lui sperimentava il pi├╣ puro senso di stupore allтАЩintimo contatto tra la terra e il sole. Sono tornato al mio posto, guardando dritto davanti a me. Non avevo bisogno della luce del paradiso. Mi bastavano le grida di meraviglia di quel bambinoтАЭ.

╨┐╤А╨╡╨║╤А╨░╤Б╨╡╨╜ ╨╡╨╖╨╕╨║ ╨╕ ╤Б╤К╨╛╤В╨▓╨╡╤В╤Б╤В╨▓╨░╤Й ╨╜╨░ ╨╜╨╡╨│╨╛ ╤З╤Г╨┤╨╡╤Б╨╡╨╜ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨▓╨╛╨┤ ╨╜╨░ ╨Т╨╗╨░╨┤╨╕╨╝╨╕╤А ╨Ь╨╛╨╗╨╡╨▓. ╨Ь╨╜╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨╝╨╕ ╤Е╨░╤А╨╡╤Б╨░ ╨┐╨╛╤З╤В╨╕ ╨╜╨╡╨┐╤А╨╡╨║╤К╤Б╨╜╨░╤В╨╛╤В╨╛ ╤Г╨┐╨╛╨▓╨░╨▓╨░╨╜╨╡ ╨╜╨░ ╨╡╨╖╨╕╨║╨░, ╨╜╨░ ╨┤╤Г╨╝╨╕╤В╨╡. ╨Ф╤Г╨╝╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨║╨░╤В╨╛ ╤Б╨┐╨░╤Б╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╡, ╨║╨░╤В╨╛ ╨┐╤А╨╕╤Б╤В╨░╨╜, ╨║╨░╤В╨╛ ╨┐╤А╨╕╨╖╨╜╨░╨║ ╨╜╨░ ╨╜╨╛╤А╨╝╨░╨╗╨╜╨╛╤Б╤В╤В╨░ ╨╕ ╨┐╤А╨╡╤Е╨╛╨┤╨╜╨╛╤Б╤В╤В╨░. ╨Ф╤Г╨╝╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨║╨░╤В╨╛ ╨╕╨╖╨│╤А╨░╨╢╨┤╨░╤Й╨╕ ╨╕╨┤╨╡╨╜╤В╨╕╤З╨╜╨╛╤Б╤В╤В╨░, ╨║╨░╤В╨╛ ╤Б╨▓╨╕╨┤╨╡╤В╨╡╨╗╨╕ ╨╖╨░ ╤Б╤К╤Й╨╡╤Б╤В╨▓╤Г╨▓╨░╨╜╨╡╤В╨╛ ╤Э. ╨Э╨░╨┐╨╛╤Б╨╗╨╡╨┤╤К╨║ ╤В╨╛╤З╨╜╨╛ ╤В╨░╨║╨╕╨▓╨░ ╤В╨╡╨╝╨╕ ╨╝╨╡ ╨▓╤К╨╗╨╜╤Г╨▓╨░╤В - ╨╖╨░ ╨▒╤К╨┤╨╡╤Й╨╡╤В╨╛ ╨╜╨░ ╤З╨╛╨▓╨╡╤И╨║╨╕╤П ╨▓╨╕╨┤, ╨╖╨░ ╨║╤А╨╡╤Е╨║╨╛╤Б╤В╤В╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╤З╨╛╨▓╨╡╨║╨░ ╨╕ ╨╢╨╕╨▓╨╛╤В╨░ ╨║╨░╤В╨╛ ╨╝╨╕╨│, ╨╖╨░ ╨┐╤А╨╡╤Е╨╛╨┤╨╜╨╛╤Б╤В╤В╨░ ╨╕ ╨┐╤К╨╗╨╜╨╛╤Ж╨╡╨╜╨╜╨╛╤В╨╛ ╨╕╨╖╨╢╨╕╨▓╤П╨▓╨░╨╜╨╡ ╨╜╨░ ╨╝╨╛╨╝╨╡╨╜╤В╨░. ╨в╨░╨╖╨╕ ╨║╨╜╨╕╨│╨░ ╨╡ ╨▒╨░╨▓╨╜╨░ ╨║╨╜╨╕╨│╨░, ╨▓╤К╨┐╤А╨╡╨║╨╕ ╤З╨╡ ╨╜╨╡ ╨╡ ╨╛╨▒╨╡╨╝╨╜╨░ ╨╕ ╨╜╨░ ╨┐╤А╤К╨▓ ╨┐╨╛╨│╨╗╨╡╨┤ ╨╜╨╡ ╨║╤А╨╕╨╡ ╨╜╨╕╨║╨░╨║╨▓╨╕ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨┐╤К╨╜╨╕-╨║╨░╨╝╤К╨╜╨╕. ╨Я╤К╤А╨▓╨╛╨╜╨░╤З╨░╨╗╨╜╨╛ ╨║╨░╤В╨╛ ╤З╨╡ ╨╗╨╕ ╨╝╨╕ ╤Б╨╡ ╨╕╤Б╨║╨░╤И╨╡ ╨╕╤Б╤В╨╛╤А╨╕╤П╤В╨░ ╨┤╨░ ╨╡ ╤А╨░╨╖╨▓╨╕╤В╨░ ╨┐╨╛-╨┤╨╕╨╜╨░╨╝╨╕╤З╨╜╨╛. ╨Я╤К╤А╨▓╨░╤В╨░ ╤З╨░╤Б╤В ╨╛╨▒╨╡╤Й╨░╨▓╨░╤И╨╡ ╤Б╤П╨║╨░╤И ╨┤╤А╤Г╨│ ╤А╨░╨╖╨▓╨╛╨╣, ╨┐╨╛-╨╜╨░╤Б╨╕╤В╨╡╨╜ ╤Б╤К╤Б ╤Б╤К╨▒╨╕╤В╨╕╤П. ╨Т╨┐╨╛╤Б╨╗╨╡╨┤╤Б╤В╨▓╨╕╨╡ ╨╛╨▒╨░╤З╨╡ ╨┐╨╛╤З╤Г╨▓╤Б╤В╨▓╨░╤Е, ╤З╨╡ ╨╕╨┤╨╡╤П╤В╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╨Ф╨╡╨Ы╨╕╨╗╨╛ ╨╡ ╨▒╨╕╨╗╨░ ╨╕╨╝╨╡╨╜╨╜╨╛ ╤В╨░╨║╨░╨▓╨░ - ╨┤╨░ ╨┐╤А╨╛╨▓╨╛╨║╨╕╤А╨░ ╨║╤К╨╝ ╤А╨░╨╖╨╝╨╕╤Б╤К╨╗, ╨║╤К╨╝ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨╛╤Ж╨╡╨╜╨║╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╤Б╨╛╨▒╤Б╤В╨▓╨╡╨╜╨╕╤П ╨╢╨╕╨▓╨╛╤В, ╨╜╨░ ╨╗╨╕╤З╨╜╨╕╤П ╤Б╨╝╨╕╤Б╤К╨╗. ╨Ш ╨║╤А╨░╤П╤В ╨╜╨░ ╤А╨╛╨╝╨░╨╜╨░ ╨│╨╛╨▓╨╛╤А╨╕ ╨╕╨╝╨╡╨╜╨╜╨╛ ╨╖╨░ ╤В╨╛╨▓╨░.

2. 5/5*╬Ч ╬║╧Б╧Е╬┐╬│╬┐╬╜╬╣╬║╬о ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬н╬╜╬▒╧В ╬▒╬╝╧Ж╬╣╬╗╬╡╬│╧М╬╝╬╡╬╜╬┐╧В ╬╡╧А╬╣╧Г╧Д╬╖╬╝╬┐╬╜╬╣╬║╧М╧В ╧Д╬┐╬╝╬н╬▒╧В ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬▒╬╗╬╗╬м╬╢╬╡╬╣ ╧Б╬╣╬╢╬╣╬║╬м ╧Д╬┐ ╬╜╧М╬╖╬╝╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬╡╧Б╧Й╧Д╬о╬╝╬▒╧Д╬┐╧В ┬л╧Е╧А╬м╧Б╧З╬╡╬╣ ╬╢╧Й╬о ╬╝╬╡╧Д╬м ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬╕╬м╬╜╬▒╧Д╬┐;┬╗ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬│╬╣╬▒ ╬м╬╗╬╗╬┐╧Е╧В ╧А╧Б╬┐╧Г╧А╬▒╬╕╬╡╬п ╬╜╬▒ ╬╛╬╡╬│╬╡╬╗╬м╧Г╬╡╬╣ ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬Ш╬╡╧М ╧А╬▒╧Б╬н╧З╬┐╬╜╧Д╬▒╧В ╬н╬╜╬▒ ╬╡╬п╬┤╬┐╧В ╬▒╬╕╬▒╬╜╬▒╧Г╬п╬▒╧В. ╬Ъ╬▒╬╣ ╬╝╧М╬╜╬╖ ╬╖ ╬┤╬╣╬▒╬┤╬╣╬║╬▒╧Г╬п╬▒ ╬▒╧А╧М╧Д╬┐╬╝╬╖╧В ╬║╬▒╧Д╬м╧И╧Е╬╛╬╖╧В ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╧Г╧О╬╝╬▒╧Д╬┐╧В ╧Г╬╡ ╬▒╧А╬п╧Г╧Д╬╡╧Е╧Д╬▒ ╧З╬▒╬╝╬╖╬╗╬н╧В ╬╕╬╡╧Б╬╝╬┐╬║╧Б╬▒╧Г╬п╬╡╧В, ╧Г╬╡ ╬║╬м╧А╬┐╬╣╬╡╧В ╬╝╧Е╧Г╧Д╬╣╬║╬н╧В ultra hi-tech ╬╡╬│╬║╬▒╧Д╬▒╧Г╧Д╬м╧Г╬╡╬╣╧В ╧Г╧Д╬╖ ╬╝╬н╧Г╬╖ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╧А╬┐╧Е╬╕╬╡╬╜╬м, ╬╝╬╡ ╧Г╬║╬┐╧А╧М ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬╡╧А╬▒╬╜╬▒╧Ж╬┐╧Б╬м ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬┐╧Б╬│╬▒╬╜╬╣╧Г╬╝╬┐╧Н ╧М╧Д╬▒╬╜ ╬╖ ╬╡╧А╬╣╧Г╧Д╬о╬╝╬╖ ╬╕╬▒ ╬н╧З╬╡╬╣ ╧А╧Б╬┐╬┐╬┤╬╡╧Н╧Г╬╡╬╣, ╬▒╧А╬┐╧Д╬╡╬╗╬┐╧Н╬╜ ╧Е╬╗╬╣╬║╧М ╬│╬╣╬▒ ╧А╧Б╧О╧Д╬╖╧В ╧Д╬м╬╛╬╡╧Й╧В ╬╝╧Е╬╕╬╣╧Г╧Д╧М╧Б╬╖╬╝╬▒ ╬╡╧А╬╣╧Г╧Д╬╖╬╝╬┐╬╜╬╣╬║╬о╧В ╧Ж╬▒╬╜╧Д╬▒╧Г╬п╬▒╧В. ╬Х╬┤╧О ╧М╬╝╧Й╧В ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╬н╧З╬┐╧Е╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬┐╬╜ Philip Dick, ╬н╧З╬┐╧Е╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬┐╬╜ De Lillo. ╬И╧З╬┐╧Е╬╝╬╡ ╬╝╬╡╧Д╬▒╬╝╬┐╬╜╧Д╬н╧Б╬╜╬▒ ╬│╧Б╬▒╧Ж╬о, ╬║╬┐╧Ж╧Д╧М, ╬┤╧Й╧Б╬╣╬║╧М ╬╗╧М╬│╬┐ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Г╧Д╬о╧Г╬╣╬╝╬┐ ╬╝╬╣╬▒╧В ╬╣╬┤╬╣╬м╬╢╬┐╧Е╧Г╬▒╧В ╧Г╧З╬н╧Г╬╖╧В ╧А╬▒╧Д╬н╧Б╬▒-╬│╬╣╬┐╧Н, ╬│╧Н╧Б╧Й ╬▒╧А╧М ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬║╬╡╬╜╧Д╧Б╬╣╬║╬о ╬╣╬┤╬н╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬╡╬╕╬╡╬╗╬┐╧Н╧Г╬╣╬┐╧Е ╬╕╬▒╬╜╬м╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬║╬▒╧Д╬м╧И╧Е╬╛╬╖╧В ╧Д╬╖╧В ╧Г╧Е╬╢╧Н╬│╬┐╧Е. ╬Ъ╬▒╬╣ ╧Ж╧Е╧Г╬╣╬║╬м, ╧З╬▒╬╗╬▒╧Б╬о ╬┤╬┐╬╝╬о ╬╝╬╡ ╬╝╬╡╬│╬м╬╗╬▒ ╬╜╬┐╬о╬╝╬▒╧Д╬▒ ╬▒╬╗╬╗╬м ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╜╬┐╬╖╬╝╬▒╧Д╬╣╬║╬м ╬м╬╗╬╝╬▒╧Д╬▒ ╧Г╬╡ ╬│╬╗╧Й╧Г╧Г╬┐╬╗╬┐╬│╬п╬▒, ╬╕╧Б╬╖╧Г╬║╬╡╬п╬▒, ╧Д╧Б╬┐╬╝╬┐╬║╧Б╬▒╧Д╬п╬▒, ╬║╬▒╧А╬╣╧Д╬▒╬╗╬╣╧Г╬╝╧М, ╬▓╬╣╬┐╬╖╬╕╬╣╬║╬о ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧А╬┐╬╗╬╗╬м ╬▒╬║╧М╬╝╬╖. ╬Я ╧А╬▒╬║╧Д╧Й╬╗╧М╧В ╧Г╧Е╬╝╬▓╬┐╬╗╬╣╧Г╬╝╧О╬╜ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬┤╬╣╬▒╬║╬╡╬╣╬╝╬╡╬╜╬╣╬║╧О╬╜ ╬▒╬╜╬▒╧Ж╬┐╧Б╧О╬╜ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬╕╬╡╬╗╬║╧Д╬╣╬║╧М╧В ╬│╬╣╬▒ ╬╝╧Е╬╖╬╝╬н╬╜╬┐╧Е╧В ╬▒╬╜╬▒╬│╬╜╧О╧Г╧Д╬╡╧В, ╧Г╬╡ ╬║╬м╬╜╬╡╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╬║╧Б╧Е╧Ж╬┐╬│╬╡╬╗╬м╧В ╧М╧Д╬▒╬╜ ╧Д╬┐╧Е╧В ╬▒╬╜╬▒╬║╬▒╬╗╧Н╧А╧Д╬╡╬╣╧В, ╬╡╬╜╧О ╧Д╬┐ ╬п╬┤╬╣╬┐ ╧А╬╡╧Д╧Е╧З╬▒╬п╬╜╬╡╬╣ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╖ ╧Д╬м╧Г╬╖ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╬┐╧Г╬▒╧Б╬║╬▒╧Г╬╝╬┐╧Н ╬▒╧А╬┐╧Г╧Д╬▒╧Г╬╣╬┐╧А╬┐╬╣╬╖╬╝╬н╬╜╬▒ ╬│╧Б╬▒╧Ж╬о ╧А╬┐╧Е ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╧З╬▒╧Б╬▒╬║╧Д╬╖╧Б╬п╬╢╬╡╬╣ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╧Г╧З╬╡╬┤╧М╬╜ ╬║╬╗╬▒╧Г╬╣╬║╬о ╧А╬╣╬▒тАУ ╬▒╬╗╬╗╬м ╬▒╧Г╧З╬┐╬╗╬╡╬п╧Д╬▒╬╣ ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬┐ ╬╕╬н╬╝╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬┤╬╣╬╡╬╛╬┐╬┤╬╣╬║╬м. ╬И╬╜╬▒╧В ╬м╬╜╧Д╧Б╬▒╧В, ╬┐ ╬д╬╢╬╡╧Ж, ╧А╬╖╬│╬▒╬п╬╜╬╡╬╣ ╧Г╬╡ ╬н╬╜╬▒ ╧А╬╡╧Б╬п╬╡╧Б╬│╬┐ ╬║╬н╬╜╧Д╧Б╬┐ ╬╝╬н╧Г╬▒ ╧Г╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬н╧Б╬╖╬╝╬┐, ╧Г╧З╬╡╬┤╧М╬╜ ╧М╬╗╬┐ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╧Е╧А╧М╬│╬╡╬╣╬┐ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬┐╬╣ ╬╡╬│╬║╬▒╧Д╬▒╧Г╧Д╬м╧Г╬╡╬╣╧В ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬╡╬╜╧Д╧Е╧А╧Й╧Г╬╣╬▒╬║╬н╧В. ╬Х╬║╬╡╬п ╬┐ ╧А╬▒╧Д╬н╧Б╬▒╧В ╧Д╬┐╧Е, ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬╖ ╬╜╧Е╬╜ ╧Г╧Н╬╜╧Д╧Б╬┐╧Ж╧М ╧Д╬┐╧Е, ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬Ж╧Б╧Д╬╣╧В, ╧Г╧З╬╡╬┤╬╣╬м╬╢╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬╕╬м╬╜╬▒╧Д╧М ╧Д╬╖╧В. ╬Ч ╬Ж╧Б╧Д╬╣╧В ╧А╬м╧Г╧З╬╡╬╣ ╬▒╧А╧М ╬╝╬╣╬▒ ╬╡╬║╧Ж╧Е╬╗╬╣╧Г╧Д╬╣╬║╬о ╬▒╧Г╬╕╬н╬╜╬╡╬╣╬▒, ╬┐╧А╧М╧Д╬╡ ╬╡╧А╬╣╬╗╬н╬│╬╡╬╣ ╧Д╬╖ ╧Г╧Д╬╣╬│╬╝╬о ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╕╬▒ ╧А╬╡╬╕╬м╬╜╬╡╬╣ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╕╬н╬╗╬╡╬╣ ╧Д╬┐ ╧Г╧О╬╝╬▒ ╧Д╬╖╧В ╬╜╬▒ ╬┤╬╣╬▒╧Д╬╖╧Б╬╖╬╕╬╡╬п ╬╝╬╡ ╬║╧Б╧Е╬┐╬│╬┐╬╜╬╣╬║╬о, ╬│╬╣╬▒ ╬╜╬▒ ╬▒╬╜╬▒╬│╬╡╬╜╬╜╬╖╬╕╬╡╬п ╧М╧Д╬▒╬╜ ╧Е╧А╬м╧Б╧З╬╡╬╣ ╬╕╬╡╧Б╬▒╧А╬╡╬п╬▒. ╬Я ╧А╬▒╧Д╬н╧Б╬▒╧В ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬д╬╢╬╡╧Ж ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╧Е╬│╬╣╬о╧В, ╧М╬╝╧Й╧В ╬║╬╣ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М╧В ╬╝╧А╬▒╬п╬╜╬╡╬╣ ╧Г╧Д╬┐ ╧А╬╡╬╣╧Б╬▒╧Г╬╝╧М ╬╜╬▒ ╬║╬м╬╜╬╡╬╣ ╧Д╬╖ ╬┤╬╣╬▒╬┤╬╣╬║╬▒╧Г╬п╬▒ ╬╝╬▒╬╢╬п ╧Д╬╖╧В. ╬Х╬╛╬м╬╗╬╗╬┐╧Е ╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М╧В ╧З╧Б╬╖╬╝╬▒╧Д╬┐╬┤╬┐╧Д╬╡╬п ╧Д╬┐ ╬║╬н╬╜╧Д╧Б╬┐ ╬╝╬н╧Г╬▒ ╧Г╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬н╧Б╬╖╬╝╬┐, ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╧А╬м╬╝╧А╬╗╬┐╧Е╧Д╬┐╧В, ╬▒╧Е╧Д╬┐╬┤╬╖╬╝╬╣╬┐╧Н╧Б╬│╬╖╧Д╬┐╧В ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧А╬▒╬╜╧Д╬┐╬┤╧Н╬╜╬▒╬╝╬┐╧В. ╬а╬┐╬╗╧Н ╧Г╧Н╬╜╧Д╬┐╬╝╬▒ ╧Ж╬▒╬п╬╜╬╡╧Д╬▒╬╣ ╧А╧Й╧В ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╬║╬м╬╗╬╡╧Г╬╡ ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬д╬╢╬╡╧Ж ╬╡╬║╬╡╬п ╬╝╧М╬╜╬┐ ╬│╬╣╬▒ ╬╜╬▒ ╧А╬╡╬╣ ╬▒╬╜╧Д╬п╬┐ ╧Г╧Д╬╖ ╬╝╬╖╧Д╧Б╬╣╬м ╧Д╬┐╧Е. ╬Ш╬н╬╗╬╡╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╬▒╬╜╬▒╬╗╬м╬▓╬╡╬╣ ╧Д╬╣╧В ╬╡╧А╬╣╧З╬╡╬╣╧Б╬о╧Г╬╡╬╣╧В ╧Д╬┐╧Е, ╬о ╬п╧Г╧Й╧В ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╧А╬м╬╡╬╣ ╬╝╬▒╬╢╬п ╧Д╬┐╧Е╧В. ╬Ь╧М╬╜╬┐ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬│╬╣╬┐ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬н╧З╬╡╬╣ ╬╡╬│╬║╬▒╧Д╬▒╬╗╬╡╬п╧И╬╡╬╣ ╧Г╧Д╬▒ 14 ╧Д╬┐╧Е, ╬║╬╣ ╬┐ ╬д╬╢╬╡╧Ж ╧Д╧О╧Б╬▒ ╧Г╧Д╬▒ 34 ╧Д╬┐╧Е, ╬▓╧Б╬п╧Г╬║╬╡╬╣ ╧М╬╗╬┐ ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬╡╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М ╧Д╬┐╧Е, ╬╜╬▒ ╬▒╬╜╬▒╧А╬┐╬╗╬╡╬п ╧Д╬╖ ╧Г╧Д╬╣╬│╬╝╬о ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬╕╬▒╬╜╬м╧Д╬┐╧Е ╧Д╬╖╧В ╬╝╬╖╧Д╬н╧Б╬▒╧В ╧Д╬┐╧Е. ╬Ш╬▒ ╬╝╧А╬┐╧Б╬┐╧Н╧Г╬╡ ╬╜╬▒ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬▒╧А╬╗╧О╧В ╬▒╬│╬м╧А╬╖; ╬М╬╗╬╡╧В ╬▒╧Е╧Д╬н╧В ╬┐╬╣ ╬▒╧А╧М╬╗╧Е╧Д╬╡╧В ╬╗╬н╬╛╬╡╬╣╧В. ╬д╬╣╧В ╬м╬╛╬╣╬╢╬╡ ╬м╧Б╬▒╬│╬╡ ╬┐ ╬м╬╜╧Д╧Б╬▒╧В ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬┐ ╧И╬╡╧Н╧Д╬╣╬║╬┐ ╧М╬╜╬┐╬╝╬▒, ╬┐ ╬▒╬╜╬╡╧А╬▒╧Б╬║╬о╧В ╧Г╧Н╬╢╧Е╬│╬┐╧В, ╬┐ ╬▒╧А╧О╬╜ ╧А╬▒╧Д╬н╧Б╬▒╧В; ╬Ъ╧М╧И╬╡ ╧Д╬┐ ╧А╬▒╧Б╬▒╬╗╬о╧Б╬╖╬╝╬▒, ╧Д╬┐ ╧А╬▒╧Б╬м╧А╬┐╬╜╬┐ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╧Ж╬┐╧Е╬╜╧Д╧О╬╜╬╡╬╣ ╬╝╬н╧Г╬▒ ╧Г╬┐╧Е, ╬╡╬п╧А╬▒ ╧Г╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬╡╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М ╬╝╬┐╧Е. ╬И╬╜╬▒╧В ╬м╬╜╬╕╧Б╧Й╧А╬┐╧В ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬▒ ╬┤╬╣╬║╬м ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬╝╬н╧Г╬▒ ╬╡╧А╬╣╬╗╬н╬│╬╡╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╬│╬п╬╜╬╡╬╣ ╬║╬▒╧Д╬╡╧И╧Е╬│╬╝╬н╬╜╬┐ ╬┤╬╡╬п╬│╬╝╬▒ ╬╝╬н╧Г╬▒ ╧Г╬╡ ╬╝╬╣╬▒ ╬║╬м╧И╬┐╧Е╬╗╬▒ ╧Г╬╡ ╬║╬м╧А╬┐╬╣╬╡╧В ╬▒╧А╬┐╬╕╬╖╬║╬╡╧Е╧Д╬╣╬║╬о╧В ╬╡╬│╬║╬▒╧Д╬▒╧Г╧Д╬м╧Г╬╡╬╣╧В, ╬╡╬п╬║╬┐╧Г╬╣ ╧З╧Б╧М╬╜╬╣╬▒ ╧А╧Б╬╣╬╜ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╧О╧Б╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╧Е. ╬Ч ╧Г╬║╬╖╬╜╬о ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬┐ ╬д╬╢╬╡╧Ж ╧Ж╧Д╬м╬╜╬╡╬╣ ╧Г╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬н╧Б╬╖╬╝╬┐ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬╡╬╜╧Д╬╡╬╗╧О╧В ╬╜╧Д╬╡╬╗╬╣╬╗╬╣╬║╬о. ╬Ъ╬м╧А╬┐╬╣╬┐╧В ╬▓╧Б╬п╧Г╬║╬╡╧Д╬▒╬╣ ╧Г╬╡ ╬н╬╜╬▒ ╬м╬│╬╜╧Й╧Г╧Д╬┐ ╬╝╬н╧Б╬┐╧В, ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╝╬┐╬╣╬м╬╢╬╡╬╣ ╧Ж╬┐╬▓╬╡╧Б╬м ╧Д╧Б╬┐╬╝╬▒╬║╧Д╬╣╬║╧М, ╬╝╬╡ ╬║╬╗╬╡╬╣╧Г╧Д╬н╧В ╧А╧М╧Б╧Д╬╡╧В. ╬С╬╗╬╗╬м ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬┐ ╧Д╧Б╧М╧А╬┐╧В ╧А╬┐╧Е ╧З╬╡╬╣╧Б╬п╬╢╬╡╧Д╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╬╖ ╬╕╬╜╬╖╧Д╧М╧Д╬╖╧Д╬▒ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╬┐ ╬╕╬м╬╜╬▒╧Д╬┐ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬╡╬╜╬┤╬╣╬▒╧Ж╬н╧Б╧Й╬╜. ╬Я ╧А╬▒╧Д╬н╧Б╬▒╧В ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬д╬╢╬╡╧Ж ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╧Г╬п╬│╬┐╧Е╧Б╬┐ ╧А╧Й╧В ╬╕╬н╬╗╬╡╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╬▒╬║╬┐╬╗╬┐╧Е╬╕╬о╧Г╬╡╬╣ ╧Д╬╖ ╬╝╬╖╧Д╧Б╬╣╬м ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬╝╧М╬╜╬┐ ╬▒╧А╧М ╬▒╬│╬м╧А╬╖, ╬н╧З╬╡╬╣ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╝╬╣╬▒ ╬┤╬╣╬╡╧Г╧Д╧Б╬▒╬╝╬╝╬н╬╜╬╖ ╬╡╬╗╧А╬п╬┤╬▒ ╬▒╬╕╬▒╬╜╬▒╧Г╬п╬▒╧В, ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬▒╬п╧Г╬╕╬╖╧Г╬╖ ╧А╧Й╧В ╬╖ ╧А╬▒╬╜╧Д╬┐╬┤╧Е╬╜╬▒╬╝╬п╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬╝╧А╬┐╧Б╬╡╬п ╬╜╬▒ ╬╡╧А╬╡╬║╧Д╬▒╬╕╬╡╬п ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Г╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬╕╬м╬╜╬▒╧Д╬┐. ╬Ь╬╡╧Д╬м ╧Е╧А╬▒╬╜╬▒╧З╧Й╧Б╬╡╬п. ╬Ч ╬╢╧Й╬о ╬╝╬╡╧Д╬м ╧Д╬┐ ╬╕╬м╬╜╬▒╧Д╬┐, ╬о ╬┐ ╬╕╬м╬╜╬▒╧Д╬┐╧В ╬│╬╣╬▒ ╧Д╬╖ ╬╢╧Й╬о ╬о ╧Д╬╡╬╗╬╣╬║╬м ╬╖ ╬п╬┤╬╣╬▒ ╬╖ ╬╢╧Й╬о ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╝╬┐╬╣╬м╬╢╬╡╬╣ ╬▒╬▓╬п╧Й╧Д╬╖ ╧З╧Й╧Б╬п╧В ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬╡╬╗╧А╬п╬┤╬▒. ╬Я ╬╕╬╡╧М╧В ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╝╧А╬┐╧Б╬╡╬п ╬╜╬▒ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬╖ ╬╡╧А╬╣╧Г╧Д╬о╬╝╬╖, ╬║╬╣ ╬▒╬╜ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╧И╬╡╧Е╬┤╬┐╬╡╧А╬╣╧Г╧Д╬о╬╝╬╖. ╬Ъ╬╣ ╬╖ ╬╢╧Й╬о ╧Г╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬║╬▒╬╕╬╖╬╝╬╡╧Б╬╣╬╜╧М╧Д╬╖╧Д╬м ╧Д╬╖╧В, ╬╝╬╡ ╬╕╬н╬╝╬▒╧Д╬▒ ╧А╬╣╬┐ ╬▒╧А╬╗╬м, ╬│╬┐╬╜╬╡╧К╬║╧О╬╜ ╧Г╧З╬н╧Г╬╡╧Й╬╜ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╡╧А╬╣╬║╬┐╬╣╬╜╧Й╬╜╬п╬▒╧В. ╬Я ╬Э╧Д╬╡╬╗╬п╬╗╬╗╬┐ ╧З╬╡╬╣╧Б╬п╬╢╬╡╧Д╬▒╬╣ ╧М╬╗╬▒ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╬м ╧Д╬▒ ╬╢╬╖╧Д╬о╬╝╬▒╧Д╬▒ ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬┤╬╣╬║╧М ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬╝╬╡╧Д╬м-╬╝╬╡╧Д╬м╬╝╬┐╬╜╧Д╬н╧Б╬╜╬┐ ╧Д╧Б╧М╧А╬┐, ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬╖ ╬╗╬╣╧Д╧М╧Д╬╖╧Д╬▒ ╧Д╬╖╧В ╬│╬╗╧О╧Г╧Г╬▒╧В ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╬┐ ╧Г╬о╬╝╬▒ ╬║╬▒╬▒╧Д╬╡╬╕╬н╬╜ ╧Д╬┐╧Е, ╬║╬╣ ╬н╧З╬╡╬╣ ╬║╬╣ ╬╡╬┤╧О ╬║╬┐╬╝╬╝╬м╧Д╬╣╬▒ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╝╬н╬╜╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╧Г╧Д╬╖ ╬╝╬╜╬о╬╝╬╖ ╬│╬╣╬▒ ╧А╬м╬╜╧Д╬▒. ╬д╬┐ Zero K ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╧Г╬╡ -- Review in language other than English--
Lo so, lo so che tutti stanno celebrando questa nuova opera di DeLillo, e l'avrei celebrata anch'io, se non fosse per un particolare minuscolo, di cui parler├▓ poi. Il romanzo si compone di due parti principali, entrambe molto interessanti, che propongono una serie di scontri: genitore/figlio, lo scontro classico, generazionale,senza il superamento del quale nessuno di noi diventa un individuo; una versione per interposta persona del complesso di Edipo, anche questo fondamentale per la crescita; la sublimazione dell'intelligenza e, soprattutto, l'addestramento a sopportare la realt├а, addestramento indispensabile per non chiudersi nel mondo algido di Zero K. C'├и poi un intermezzo, non particolarmente ben riuscito secondo me, ma talmente breve da non rovinare l'impressione dell'opera, relativo ai pensieri tra consci e inconsci di Artis, rinchiusa nel suo guscio di ghiaccio e sottoposta a una sorta di deificazione. La conclusione del romanzo ├и tutto sommato incoraggiante: il figlio supera lo scontro col padre, ed ├и capace di affrontare la realt├а pi├╣ tragica, rappresentata dalla morte in diretta del figlio di una sua amante diventato terrorista, ma, proprio l├м, alla fine, succede qualcosa che non avrebbe dovuto succedere. Una caduta di stile inspiegabile: un bambino guarda, con meraviglia, in preda a una estasi assoluta, il raro fenomeno del sole che si allinea con il reticolo di strade di New York, creando uno spettacolo unico. Immagine splendida, se non che DeLillo ci informa che quel bimbo non ├и perfettamente normale. Ecco, questa sorta di vergogna nell'attribuire alla normalit├а, a un bambino normale, la capacit├а di meraviglia, mi ha fatto chiudere il libro con l'amaro in bocca. I know, I know that everyone is celebrating this new DeLillo's work, and I will have celebrated it, too, except for one tiny detail, which I will discuss later. The novel consists of two main parts, both very interesting, offering a series of clashes: parent/child, classic clash of generations, without the excess of which none of us becomes an individual; a vicariously version of the Oedipus complex, even this fundamental for growth; the sublimation of intelligence and, above all, the training to endure reality, training essential to not close ourslf in the chilly Zero K's world. Then there is also an interlude, not particularly successful for me, but so short as not to spoil the impression of the work, about the Artis's thoughts between conscious and unconscious, when she is locked up in her ice shell and subjected to a sort of deification. The end of the novel is quite encouraging: the son exceeds the clash with his father, and is able to face the more tragic realities, represented by the death of the son of his lover, turned in terrorist, but, right there at the end, something that would not have happened happens. An unexplained fall of style: a child watch, with wonder, in the grip of a blissful, the rare phenomenon of the Sun aligns with the New York's grid of streets, creating a unique spectacle. Beautiful image, except that DeLillo tells us that that child is not normal. Rhat's what I mean, this sort of shame in attributing to normality, to a normal child, the ability to wonder, made me close the book with a bad taste in my mouth.

╨Ю╤В ╨▓╤А╨╡╨╝╨╡ ╨╜╨░ ╨▓╤А╨╡╨╝╨╡ ╨╛╤В╨▓╨░╤А╤П╨╝ ╨║╨╜╨╕╨│╨░╤В╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╨┐╤А╨╛╨╕╨╖╨▓╨╛╨╗╨╜╨╛ ╨╝╤П╤Б╤В╨╛ ╨╕ ╤Б╨╡ ╨╖╨░╤З╨╕╤В╨░╨╝, ╨▓╨╕╨╜╨░╨│╨╕ ╨╕╨╝╨░ ╨╜╨╡╤Й╨╛, ╨║╨╛╨╡╤В╨╛ ╨┤╨╛╨┐╤К╨╗╨▓╨░, ╨┐╤А╨╡╨┐╤А╨░╤Й╨░, ╨┐╨╛╨┤╤Б╨╡╤Й╨░. ╨д╨░╨╜╤В╨░╤Б╤В╨╕╨║╨░. ╨Э╨░╨┐╨╛╨╝╨╜╤П ╨╖╨░ ╨б╨╛╨╗╨░╤А╨╕╤Б, ╤А╨░╨╖╨▒╨╕╤А╨░ ╤Б╨╡ ╨╕ Ex Machina. "╨б╨╝╤К╤А╤В╤В╨░ ╨╡ ╨║╤Г╨╗╤В╤Г╤А╨╡╨╜ ╨░╤А╤В╨╡╤Д╨░╨║╤В, ╨╜╨╡ ╨╡ ╤Б╤В╤А╨╛╨│╨░ ╨┐╤А╨╕╤Б╤К╨┤╨░ ╨╖╨░ ╨╜╨╡╨╕╨╖╨▒╨╡╨╢╨╜╨╛╤В╨╛ ╨╖╨░ ╤З╨╛╨▓╨╡╨║╨░. ""- ╨б╨╗╨╡╨┤ ╨║╨░╤В╨╛ ╤Б╨╝╤К╤А╤В╤В╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╨╛╤В╨┤╨╡╨╗╨╜╨╕╤П ╤З╨╛╨▓╨╡╨║ ╨▓╨╡╤З╨╡ ╨╜╤П╨╝╨░ ╨┤╨░ ╨╡ ╨╜╨╡╨╕╨╖╨▒╨╡╨╢╨╜╨░, ╨║╨░╨║╨▓╨╛ ╤Й╨╡ ╤Б╤В╨░╨╜╨╡ ╤Б ╨▓╤Б╨╡ ╨╛╤Й╨╡ ╨╜╨╡╨┐╨╛╨│╤А╨╡╨▒╨░╨╜╨░╤В╨░ ╨╛╨║╨╛╨╜╤З╨░╤В╨╡╨╗╨╜╨╛ ╨╕╨┤╨╡╤П ╨╖╨░ ╤П╨┤╤А╨╡╨╜╨╛ ╤Г╨╜╨╕╤Й╨╛╨╢╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╡?""- ╨Ъ╨░╨║╨▓╨╛ ╨╛╨╖╨╜╨░╤З╨░╨▓╨░ ╨┤╨░ ╤Г╨╝╤А╨╡╤И?- ╨Ъ╨╛╨│╨░ ╨┐╤А╨╡╤Б╤В╨░╨▓╨░╤И ╨┤╨░ ╤Б╨╕ ╤В╨╛╨╖╨╕, ╨║╨╛╨╣╤В╨╛ ╤Б╨╕?""- ╨Ф╨░╨╗╨╕ ╤В╨╛╨▓╨░ ╤А╨░╨╖╨▓╨╕╤В╨╕╨╡ ╤Й╨╡ ╨┤╨╛╨▓╨╡╨┤╨╡ ╨┤╨╛ ╨║╤А╨░╨╣ ╨╜╨░ ╨▓╨╛╨╣╨╜╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╕╨╗╨╕ ╨┤╨╛ ╨╜╨╛╨▓╨╕ ╨│╨╗╨╛╨▒╨░╨╗╨╜╨╕ ╤Б╨▒╨╗╤К╤Б╤К╤Ж╨╕?""- ╨в╨╡╤Е╨╜╨╛╨╗╨╛╨│╨╕╤П╤В╨░ ╤Б╨╡ ╨╡ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨▓╤К╤А╨╜╨░╨╗╨░ ╨▓ ╤Б╤В╨╕╤Е╨╕╤П. ╨Э╨╡ ╨╝╨╛╨╢╨╡╨╝ ╨┤╨░ ╤П ╨╛╨▓╨╗╨░╨┤╨╡╨╡╨╝. ╨в╤П ╨┐╨╛╨╝╨╕╤В╨░ ╨┐╨╗╨░╨╜╨╡╤В╨░╤В╨░ ╨╕ ╨╜╤П╨╝╨░ ╨║╤К╨┤╨╡ ╨┤╨░ ╤Б╨╡ ╤Б╨║╤А╨╕╨╡╨╝ ╨╛╤В ╨╜╨╡╤П. ╨Ю╤Б╨▓╨╡╨╜ ╤В╤Г╨║, ╤А╨░╨╖╨▒╨╕╤А╨░ ╤Б╨╡, ╨▓ ╤В╨╛╨╖╨╕ ╤А╨░╨╖╨▓╨╕╨▓╨░╤Й ╤Б╨╡ ╨░╨╜╨║╨╗╨░╨▓, ╨║╤К╨┤╨╡╤В╨╛ ╨▓╤К╨╖╨┤╤Г╤Е╤К╤В ╨╡ ╨▒╨╡╨╖╨╛╨┐╨░╤Б╨╡╨╜ ╨╖╨░ ╨┤╨╕╤И╨░╨╜╨╡ ╨╕ ╨╢╨╕╨▓╨╡╨╡╨╝ ╨╛╤В╨▓╤К╨┤ ╨╛╨▒╤Е╨▓╨░╤В╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╨▓╨╛╨╣╤Б╤В╨▓╨╡╨╜╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╕╨╜╤Б╤В╨╕╨╜╨║╤В╨╕, ╨╛╤В╤З╨░╤П╨╜╨╕╨╡╤В╨╛ ╨╕ ╨▒╨╡╨╖╤А╨░╨╖╤Б╤К╨┤╤Б╤В╨▓╨╛╤В╨╛, ╨┐╤А╨╛╤П╨▓╤П╨▓╨░╤Й╨╕ ╤Б╨╡ ╨╜╨░╨┐╨╛╤Б╨╗╨╡╨┤╤К╨║ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨┤ ╨╜╨░╤Б ╨╜╨░ ╤В╨╛╨╗╨║╨╛╨▓╨░ ╨╝╨╜╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨╜╨╕╨▓╨░. ЁЯТН ╨Ь╨╡╤А╨╕: ╨Ф╤К╤Й╨╡╤А╤П ╨╜╨░ ╨┐╨╛╨╗╨╕╤В╨╕╨║ ╤Б ╨╗╨╕╨▒╨╡╤А╨░╨╗╨╜╨╕ ╨▓╤К╨╖╨│╨╗╨╡╨┤╨╕. ЁЯСТ ╨е╨╕╨╗╨┤╨░: ╨Э╨░╨╣-╨┤╨╛╨▒╤А╨░╤В╨░ ╨╕ ╨┐╤А╨╕╤П╤В╨╡╨╗╨║╨░, ╤Г╤Б╤В╤А╨╡╨╝╨╡╨╜╨░ ╨║╤К╨╝ ╨┐╨╛╤А╨╡╨┤╨╜╨╛╤В╨╛ ╨┐╨╕╤В╨╕╨╡ ╨╕ ╨║╨░╨▓╨░╨╗╨╡╤А. тЬПя╕П ╨в╨╛╨╝: ╨г╤З╨╕╤В╨╡╨╗ ╤Б ╤В╨▓╤К╤А╨┤╨╡ ╨╝╨╜╨╛╨│╨╛ ╤Б╤К╨╝╨╜╨╡╨╜╨╕╤П. ЁЯЦ╝ ╨Р╨╗╨╕╤Б╤В╤К╤А: ╨а╨╡╤Б╤В╨░╨▓╤А╨░╤В╨╛╤А, ╨╛╨╖╨╛╨▓╨░╨╗ ╤Б╨╡ ╤Б ╨║╨░╨┐╨╕╤В╨░╨╜╤Б╨║╨╕ ╨╜╨░╤И╨╕╨▓╨║╨╕ ╨╜╨░╤Б╤А╨╡╨┤ ╨╛╨▒╤Б╨░╨┤╨╡╨╜╨░ ╨Ь╨░╨╗╤В╨░. ЁЯМН ╨Ч╨░╨║╨░╤А╨╕: ╨Э╨╡╨│╤К╤А╤З╨╡, ╨╛╤Б╤В╨░╨▓╨╡╨╜╨╛ ╨┤╨░ ╨╛╤Ж╨╡╨╗╤П╨▓╨░ ╨▓ ╨╝╨░╨╖╨╡ ╨╜╨░ ╨║╨░╨▒╨░╤А╨╡. ╨Т╤Б╨╕╤З╨║╨╕ ╤В╨╡ ╨╕╤Б╨║╨░╤В ╨┐╤А╨╛╤Б╤В╨╛ ╤Б╨╗╨╡╨┤╨╛╨▒╨╡╨┤╨╜╨╕╤П╤В ╤З╨░╨╣ ╨┤╨░ ╨╡ ╨╜╨░╨▓╤А╨╡╨╝╨╡, ╤А╨░╨╖╨│╨╛╨▓╨╛╤А╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╖╨░ ╨▓╤А╨╡╨╝╨╡╤В╨╛ ╨┤╨░ ╨╜╨╡ ╤Б╨╡╨║╨▓╨░╤В, ╨╜╨╛╤Б╨╡╨╣╨║╨╕ ╨▓╤Б╨╡ ╤В╨░╨║╨░ ╨║╤Г╨┐ ╤Б╨║╤А╨╕╤В╨╕ ╨╖╨╜╨░╤З╨╡╨╜╨╕╤П, ╨╕ ╨┤╨╛╨▒╤А╨░╤В╨░ ╤Б╤В╨░╤А╨░ ╨Р╨╜╨│╨╗╨╕╤П ╨┤╨░ ╨┐╨╗╤Г╨▓╨░ ╨│╨╛╤А╨┤╨╛ ╨╛╤В╨▓╤К╨┤ ╨Ы╨░╨╝╨░╨╜╤И╨░ (╨╡, ╨▒╨╡╨╖ ╨┤╨╡╤В╨╡╤В╨╛ - ╤В╨╛ ╨┐╤А╨╛╤Б╤В╨╛ ╨╜╨╡ ╨╕╤Б╨║╨░ ╨┤╨░ ╨│╨╛ ╨╖╨░╨╝╨╡╤А╤П╤В ╤Б ╨║╨░╨╝╤К╨╜╨╕). ╨Т╨╛╨╣╨╜╨░╤В╨░ ╨┤╤А╨░╨╖╨╜╨╡╤Й╨╛ ╨╜╨░╤А╤Г╤И╨░╨▓╨░ ╤А╤Г╤В╨╕╨╜╨░╤В╨░ ╨╕ ╤Г╤З╤В╨╕╨▓╨╛╤Б╤В╤В╨░ ╨╕╨╖╨╕╤Б╨║╨▓╨░ ╨▓╤Б╨╡╨║╨╕ ╨╛╤В ╤В╤П╤Е ╨┤╨░ ╨┤╨░╨┤╨╡ ╤Б╨▓╨╛╤П ╨┤╤П╨╗ ╨▓ ╨▒╨╛╤А╨▒╨░╤В╨░ ╨╢╨╕╨▓╨╛╤В╤К╤В ╨┤╨░ ╨┐╤А╨╛╨┤╤К╨╗╨╢╨╕. ╨Э╨░╨╣-╨╝╨╜╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨╝╨╕ ╤Е╨░╤А╨╡╤Б╨░ ╨░╨╜╨│╨╗╨╕╨╣╤Б╨║╨╕╤П╤В ╤Б╨░╤А╨║╨░╨╖╤К╨╝ (╨╜╨░╤А╨╕╤З╨░╨╜ ╨╛╤Й╨╡ ╨╛╤Б╤В╤А╨╛╤Г╨╝╨╕╨╡). ╨Т╤Б╤П╨║╨░ ╨╡╨┤╨╜╨░ ╤А╨╡╨┐╨╗╨╕╨║╨░ ╨╕ ╨╝╨╕╤Б╤К╨╗ ╨╜╨░ ╨│╨╡╤А╨╛╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╡ ╨┐╤А╨╛╨┐╨╕╤В╨░ ╤Б ╨╜╨╡╨│╨╛, ╨╕ ╤Б╨░╨╝╨╛ ╨╡╨┤╨╕╨╜ ╨┐╤А╨╛╤З╨╕╤В ╨╜╨╡ ╨╡ ╨┤╨╛╤Б╤В╨░╤В╤К╤З╨╡╨╜. ╨Ш╨╖╨┐╤К╨╗╨╜╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╡╤В╨╛ ╨╡ ╨║╨░╨╗╨╕╨│╤А╨░╤Д╤Б╨║╨╛, ╨╛╨▒╤Е╨▓╨░╨╜╨░╤В╨╕ ╤Б╨░ ╨▓╤Б╨╡╨▓╤К╨╖╨╝╨╛╨╢╨╜╨╕ ╤В╨╡╨╝╨╕. ╨в╨╛╨▓╨░ ╨╡ ╨╛╨╜╨░╨╖╨╕ ╨╢╨╕╨╗╨░╨▓╨░ ╨╜╨╕╤И╨║╨░, ╨║╨╛╤П╤В╨╛ ╨╜╨╕╨║╨░╨║╨▓╨╕ ╨▒╨╡╨┤╤Б╤В╨▓╨╕╤П ╨╜╨╡ ╨╝╨╛╨│╨░╤В ╨┤╨░ ╤Б╨║╤К╤Б╨░╤В. ╨Ь╨░╨╗╤К╨║ ╨┐╤А╨╕╨╝╨╡╤А ╤Б ╤А╨░╨╖╨│╨╛╨▓╨╛╤А ╨╝╨╡╨╢╨┤╤Г ╤Б╨┐╨░╤Б╨╡╨╜ ╨╛╤В ╨╝╨╛╤А╨╡╤В╨╛ ╨┐╨╕╨╗╨╛╤В ╨╕ ╨╜╨░╨┐╤Г╤Б╨║╨░╤Й ╨Ф╤О╨╜╨║╨╡╤А╨║ ╨░╤А╤В╨╕╨╗╨╡╤А╨╕╤Б╤В:тАЭ- ╨Ъ╨░╨║ ╨▒╨╡╤И╨╡ ╨▓╨╛╨┤╨░╤В╨░? - ╨┐╨╛╨┐╨╕╤В╨░ ╨Р╨╗╨╕╤Б╤В╤К╤А ╤Б╨╗╨╡╨┤ ╨╝╨░╨╗╨║╨╛. - ╨Ю╤Б╨▓╨╡╨╢╨╕╤В╨╡╨╗╨╜╨░ - ╨╛╤В╨│╨╛╨▓╨╛╤А╨╕ ╨┐╨╕╨╗╨╛╤В╤К╤В. - ╨Ъ╨░╨║ ╨▒╨╡╤И╨╡ ╨д╤А╨░╨╜╤Ж╨╕╤П? - ╨Я╤А╨╡╤В╤К╨┐╨║╨░╨╜╨░. тАЭ╨Ч╨░ ╨╛╨▒╤Б╨░╨┤╨░╤В╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╨Ь╨░╨╗╤В╨░ ╨╜╨╡ ╨╖╨╜╨░╨╡╤Е ╨╜╨╕╤Й╨╛, ╨▒╨╕╨╗╨░ ╨╡ ╤В╨╡╨╢╨║╨╛ ╨╕ ╨╜╨░╨╣-╨▓╨╡╤З╨╡ ╨│╨╗╨░╨┤╨╜╨╛ ╨▓╤А╨╡╨╝╨╡. ╨Ю╤В╨╗╨╕╤З╨╜╨╛ ╨╡ ╨╛╨┐╨╕╤Б╨░╨╜╨╛ ╤В╨╕╨┐╨╕╤З╨╜╨╛╤В╨╛ ╨░╨╜╨│╨╗╨╕╨╣╤Б╨║╨╛ ╨▓╨╕╤Б╨╛╨║╨╛╨╝╨╡╤А╨╕╨╡ ╨║╤К╨╝ ╨╝╨╡╤Б╤В╨╜╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨┤╨╕╨▓╨░╤Ж╨╕ - ╨╝╨░╨╗╤В╨╕╨╣╤Ж╨╕╤В╨╡. ╨б╨░╨╝╨╛╤В╨╛ ╨┤╨╡╨╣╤Б╤В╨▓╨╕╨╡ ╨╛╨▒╨░╤З╨╡ ╨╝╨╡ ╨╛╤Б╤В╨░╨▓╨╕ ╨▒╨╡╨╖╤А╨░╨╖╨╗╨╕╤З╨╜╨░. ╨б╨│╨╗╨╛╨▒╨║╨░╤В╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╨╛╤В╨┤╨╡╨╗╨╜╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╡╨╗╨╡╨╝╨╡╨╜╤В╨╕ ╤В╨╛╨║╤Г ╨╝╨╕ ╤Б╨╡ ╤А╨░╨╖╨╝╨╡╤Б╤В╨▓╨░╤И╨╡ ╨╕ ╨╕╨╗╨╕ ╨┐╤А╨╛╤З╨╕╤В╨░╤Е ╨╜╤П╨║╨╛╨╕ ╨│╤А╨░╨▒╨▓╨░╤Й╨╕ ╨┐╨░╤Б╨░╨╢╨╕ (╨╜╨░╨╣-╨▓╨╡╤З╨╡ ╨▓ ╨┤╨╕╨░╨╗╨╛╨│╨░) ╨┐╨╛ ╨┤╨▓╨░ ╨┐╤К╤В╨╕, ╨╕╨╗╨╕ ╨┐╤А╨╡╤Б╨║╨░╤З╨░╤Е ╨┐╨╛ ╤Ж╤П╨╗╨░ ╤Б╤В╤А╨░╨╜╨╕╤Ж╨░, ╨║╨╛╤П╤В╨╛ ╤Г╨┐╨╛╤А╨╕╤В╨╛ ╤Б╨╡ ╤Б╤К╨┐╤А╨╛╤В╨╕╨▓╨╗╤П╨▓╨░╤И╨╡ ╨┤╨░ ╨▒╤К╨┤╨╡ ╨┐╤А╨╛╤З╨╡╤В╨╡╨╜╨░ ╨┐╨╛╤А╨░╨┤╨╕ ╨╖╨░╨╗╨╕╨▓╨░╤Й╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╝╨╡ ╨┐╤А╨╛╨╖╤П╨▓╨║╨╕. ╨Х╨┤╨╕╨╜╨╕╤П╤В ╨╛╤В ╨│╨╡╤А╨╛╨╕╤В╨╡ - ╨в╨╛╨╝ - ╨┐╤К╨║ ╨╝╨╕ ╨▒╨╡╤И╨╡ ╤В╨╛╨╗╨║╨╛╨▓╨░ ╤Б╨║╤Г╤З╨╡╨╜, ╤З╨╡ ╨┐╤А╨╛╨┐╤Г╤Б╨║╨░╤Е ╨╜╨╡╨│╨╛╨▓╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨░╨▒╨╖╨░╤Ж╨╕. ╨Т ╨║╤А╨░╨╣╨╜╨░ ╤Б╨╝╨╡╤В╨║╨░, ╨╝╨╕╤Б╨╗╤П ╤З╨╡ ╤Б╤В╤А╨░╨╜╨╕╤Ж╨╕╤В╨╡ ╤Б╨░ ╤В╨▓╤К╤А╨┤╨╡ ╨╝╨╜╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨╖╨░ ╤В╨╛╨╖╨╕ ╨║╨╛╨╜╨║╤А╨╡╤В╨╡╨╜ ╤Б╤О╨╢╨╡╤В. ╨Ъ╨╗╨╕╨╣╨▓ ╨╡ ╨╝╨░╨╣╤Б╤В╨╛╤А ╨╜╨░ ╨┤╤Г╨╝╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨┐╨╛╨╛╤В╨┤╨╡╨╗╨╜╨╛, ╨╜╨╛ ╤Б╨▓╤К╤А╨╖╨▓╨░╨╜╨╡╤В╨╛ ╨╕╨╝ ╨▓ ╤Е╨╛╨╝╨╛╨│╨╡╨╜╨╜╨░ ╨╕╤Б╤В╨╛╤А╨╕╤П ╨╜╨╡ ╨╡ ╤Б╤А╨░╨▒╨╛╤В╨╕╨╗╨╛ ╨╜╨░╨┐╤К╨╗╨╜╨╛. ╨Я╤А╨╛╤З╨╕╤В╤К╤В ╤Б╨╕ ╨╖╨░╤Б╨╗╤Г╨╢╨░╨▓╨░. ╨Я╤А╨╡╨║╤А╨░╤Б╨╡╨╜ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨▓╨╛╨┤ ╨╕ ╨╛╤Д╨╛╤А╨╝╨╗╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╡! ***ЁЯЗмЁЯЗз тАЬ╨Э╨╛ ╨╝╨╛╨╢╨╡ ╨▒╨╕, ╨║╨░╤В╨╛ ╤Б╨╡ ╨╖╨░╨╝╨╕╤Б╨╗╨╕ ╤З╨╛╨▓╨╡╨║, ╨╗╤О╨▒╨╛╨▓╤В╨░ ╨╡ ╤В╨╛╤З╨╜╨╛ ╤В╨╛╨▓╨░: ╨┤╨░ ╨╛╤Б╤К╨╖╨╜╨░╨╡╤И ╨║╨░╨║╨▓╨╛ ╨╡ ╨╜╤Г╨╢╨╜╨╛ ╨┤╨░ ╨╜╨░╨┐╤А╨░╨▓╨╕ ╨┤╤А╤Г╨│╨╕╤П╤В ╤В╨░╨╝, ╨║╤К╨┤╨╡╤В╨╛ ╤Б╨╡ ╨╜╨░╨╝╨╕╤А╨░, ╨╕ ╨┤╨░ ╨│╨╛ ╨┐╤А╨╕╨╡╨╝╨╡╤И. тАЭЁЯЗмЁЯЗз тАЬтАж╨▓ ╨║╤А╨░╨╣╨╜╨░ ╤Б╨╝╨╡╤В╨║╨░ ╤Б╤К╤А╤Ж╨╡╤В╨╛ ╨╜╨╡ ╨╡ ╨▓ ╨╛╤Б╨╜╨╛╨▓╨░╤В╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╨┤╨╛╨▒╤А╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╛╨▒╨╜╨╛╤Б╨║╨╕ ╨╕ ╨╜╨╡ ╨▒╨╕╨▓╨░ ╨┤╨░ ╨│╨╕ ╤Г╤А╨╛╨╜╨▓╨░, ╨║╨╛╨│╨░╤В╨╛ ╨╡ ╤А╨░╨╖╨▒╨╕╤В╨╛. тАЭЁЯЗмЁЯЗз тАЬ╨Х╤В╨╛ ╤В╨░╨║╨░ ╤Б╨░ ╨╜╨░╨┐╤А╨░╨▓╨╡╨╜╨╕ ╨╖╨▓╨╡╨╖╨┤╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨▓ ╨║╤А╨░╨╣╨╜╨░ ╤Б╨╝╨╡╤В╨║╨░: ╨▓╤Б╤П╨║╨░ ╨╖╨▓╨╡╨╖╨┤╨░ ╨╡ ╤Д╨╕╨╜╨░╨╗ ╨╜╨░ ╨╜╨╡╨┤╨╛╨▓╤К╤А╤И╨╡╨╜╨░ ╨╝╨╕╤Б╤К╨╗, ╨▓╤Б╤П╨║╨░ ╨╡ ╨╛╤В╨│╨╛╨▓╨╛╤А, ╨║╨╛╨╣╤В╨╛ ╨╜╤П╨║╨╛╨╣ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨╖ ╤Ж╤П╨╗╨╛╤В╨╛ ╨▓╤А╨╡╨╝╨╡ ╨╡ ╨╖╨╜╨░╨╡╨╗. тАЭЁЯЗмЁЯЗз тАЬ╨Ф╨▓╨░ ╤З╨░╤Б╨░ ╨╕ ╨╜╨╡ ╨║╤К╨╗╨▓╨╡ ╨│╤А╨░╨╝. ╨а╨╕╨▒╨╕╤В╨╡ ╤Б╨░ ╨╜╨░╤Ж╨╕╤Б╤В╨╕. тАЭЁЯЗмЁЯЗз тАЬ╨з╨╛╨▓╨╡╨║╤К╤В ╨╕ ╨┤╨╛╨▒╤А╨░╤В╨░ ╨║╨░╤А╤В╨╕╨╜╨░ ╤Б╨╡ ╨╛╤В╨╗╨╕╤З╨░╨▓╨░╤В ╤Б╤К╤Б ╤Б╨┐╨╛╤Б╨╛╨▒╨╜╨╛╤Б╤В ╨┤╨░ ╨╕╨╖╨╗╨╕╨╖╨░╤В ╨╕╨╖╨▓╤К╨╜ ╤А╨░╨╝╨║╨░╤В╨░. тАЭЁЯЗмЁЯЗз тАЬ╨Ю╨║╨░╨╖╨▓╨░╤И╨╡ ╤Б╨╡, ╤З╨╡ ╨╡╨┤╨╕╨╜╤Б╤В╨▓╨╡╨╜╨░╤В╨░ ╤А╨░╨╖╨╗╨╕╨║╨░ ╨╝╨╡╨╢╨┤╤Г ╨┤╨╡╤Ж╨░╤В╨░ ╨╕ ╨▓╤К╨╖╤А╨░╤Б╤В╨╜╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╡, ╤З╨╡ ╨┤╨╡╤Ж╨░╤В╨░ ╤Б╨░ ╨│╨╛╤В╨╛╨▓╨╕ ╨┤╨░ ╤Б╨╡ ╨┐╨╛╤Б╤В╨░╤А╨░╤П╤В ╨┤╨▓╨╛╨╣╨╜╨╛ ╨┐╨╛╨▓╨╡╤З╨╡, ╨╖╨░ ╨┤╨░ ╨╕╨╖╨▒╨╡╨│╨╜╨░╤В ╤В╤К╨│╨░╤В╨░. тАЭ

"╨Т╤Б╨╡ ╨┐╨░╨║ ╨▓╨╛╨╣╨╜╨░╤В╨░ ╨┐╤А╨╛╨╕╨╖╨▓╨╡╨╢╨┤╨░ ╤Б╨░╨╝╨╛╤В╨░ тАУ ╨╛╤В╨╜╨╡╤В ╨╗╤О╨▒╨╕╨╝, ╨┐╤А╨╡╨║╤К╤Б╨╜╨░╤В ╤А╨░╨╖╨│╨╛╨▓╨╛╤АтАж "╨г╤Б╤В╨░╨╜╨╛╨▓╨╕╨╗╨░ ╤Б╤К╨╝, ╤З╨╡ ╨╖╨░ ╨║╨╜╨╕╨│╨╕╤В╨╡, ╨║╨╛╨╕╤В╨╛ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨╢╨╕╨▓╤П╨▓╨░╨╝ ╨╜╨░╨╣-╨╗╨╕╤З╨╜╨╛, ╨┐╨╕╤И╨░ ╨╜╨░╨╣-╤В╤А╤Г╨┤╨╜╨╛. ╨Т╤В╨╛╤А╨╕ ╨┤╨╡╨╜ ╤Б╨╡ ╨▓╨╖╨╕╤А╨░╨╝ ╨▓ ╨┐╤А╨░╨╖╨╜╨╕╤П ╨╡╨║╤А╨░╨╜ ╨╕тАж ╨╜╨╕╤Й╨╛. ╨Я╤А╨╕╨║╨╗╤О╤З╨╕╤Е ╨┐╤А╨╡╨▓╨╛╨┤╨░ ╨╜╨░ тАЮ╨Э╨░ ╤Б╨╝╨╡╨╗╨╕╤В╨╡ ╤Б╨╡ ╨┐╤А╨╛╤Й╨░╨▓╨░тАЬ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨┤╨╕ ╨╛╨║╨╛╨╗╨╛ ╤Б╨╡╨┤╨╝╨╕╤Ж╨░ ╨╕ ╨╛╤В╤В╨╛╨│╨░╨▓╨░ ╤Б╤К╨╝ ╨▓ ╨┐╤А╨╛╤Б╤В╤А╨░╨╜╤Б╤В╨▓╨╛ ╨▒╨╡╨╖ ╨▓╤К╨╖╨┤╤Г╤Е, ╨╖╨▓╤Г╨║ ╨╕ ╤Ж╨▓╤П╤В. ╨Э╨╡ ╨╝╨╛╨│╨░ ╨┤╨░ ╨┐╤А╨╛╨┤╤К╨╗╨╢╨░ ╤Б ╨┤╤А╤Г╨│╨╛, ╨╜╨╡ ╨╝╨╛╨│╨░ ╨╕ ╨┤╨░ ╤Б╨╡ ╨▓╤К╤А╨╜╨░ ╨╜╨░╨╖╨░╨┤ тАУ limbo time and space. ╨г╤Б╤В╤А╨╡╨╝╨╜╨╛ ╨┐╤А╨╛╨┐╨░╨┤╨░╨╜╨╡ ╨▓ ╨╝╨╡╨╗╨░╨╜╤Е╨╛╨╗╨╕╤П╤В╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╨▒╨╡╨╖╨┤╨╜╨░, ╨┐╨╛╨▒╤А╨░╨╗╨░ ╨╡╨┤╨╕╨╜ ╤Б╨▓╤П╤В, ╨║╨╛╨╣╤В╨╛ ╨╜╨╕╨║╨╛╨│╨░ ╨┐╨╛╨▓╨╡╤З╨╡ ╨╜╤П╨╝╨░ ╨┤╨░ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨╢╨╕╨▓╨╡╤П ╨┐╨╛ ╤Б╤К╤Й╨╕╤П ╨╜╨░╤З╨╕╨╜ тАУ ╨║╨░╤В╨╛ ╨▓╨╕╨▒╤А╨░╤Ж╨╕╤П ╨╛╤В ╨╝╨╕╤Б╨╗╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╜╨░ ╨│╨╡╤А╨╛╨╕╤В╨╡, ╨║╨░╤В╨╛ ╤В╨╡╤Е╨╡╨╜ ╨│╨╗╨░╤Б; ╨╜╤П╨╝╨░ ╨┤╨░ ╤Б╨╡ ╨▒╤Г╨┤╤П ╨╜╨╛╤Й╨╡╨╝ ╤Б ╤Ж╤П╨╗╨╛ ╨╕╨╖╤А╨╡╤З╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╡ ╨▓ ╨│╨╗╨░╨▓╨░╤В╨░, ╤Б ╨╝╤Г╨╖╨╕╨║╨░╤В╨░, ╨║╨╛╤П╤В╨╛ ╤Б╨╗╤Г╤И╨░╤В, ╤Б ╨│╤А╨╛╤Е╨╛╤В╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╨╝╨╡╤Б╨╡╤А╤И╨╝╨╕╤В╨╕╤В╨╡тАж ╨╜╤П╨╝╨░ ╨┤╨░ ╨╖╨░╨┤╨░╨▓╨░╨╝ ╨▓╤К╨┐╤А╨╛╤Б╨╕ ╨╜╨░ ╨Ъ╤А╨╕╤Б, ╨╜╨░ ╨║╨╛╨╕╤В╨╛ ╤В╨╛╨╣ ╨┤╨░ ╨╝╨╕ ╨╛╤В╨│╨╛╨▓╨░╤А╤П ╤Б ╤Ж╤П╨╗╨░╤В╨░ ╤Й╨╡╨┤╤А╨╛╤Б╤В ╨╜╨░ ╤В╨░╨╗╨░╨╜╤В╨░ ╤Б╨╕. ╨Т ╨╡╨┤╨╕╨╜ ╨╛╤В ╨╕╨╝╨╡╨╣╨╗╨╕╤В╨╡ ╤Б╨╕ ╨╝╨╕ ╨▒╨╡╤И╨╡ ╨╜╨░╨┐╨╕╤Б╨░╨╗, ╤З╨╡ ╨▓╤Б╨╡╨║╨╕ ╨╛╤В ╤З╨╡╤В╨╕╤А╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╝╤Г ╤А╨╛╨╝╨░╨╜╨░ ╨╡ ╨╛╨┐╨╕╤В ╨┤╨░ ╤Б╤К╨╖╨┤╨░╨┤╨╡ ╨╝╨╕╨║╤А╨╛╨▓╤Б╨╡╨╗╨╡╨╜╨░, ╤Б ╨║╨╛╤П╤В╨╛ ╨┤╨░ ╤Б╨╡ ╨│╨╛╤А╨┤╨╡╨╡. ╨Т╤Б╨╡ ╨╛╤Й╨╡ ╨▒╨╕╨╗ ╨┤╨░╨╗╨╡╤З, ╤В╨▓╤К╤А╨┤╨╡╤И╨╡, ╨╜╨╛ ╤Б тАЮ╨Э╨░ ╤Б╨╝╨╡╨╗╨╕╤В╨╡ ╤Б╨╡ ╨┐╤А╨╛╤Й╨░╨▓╨░тАЬ ╨╕╨╝╨░╨╗ ╤З╤Г╨▓╤Б╤В╨▓╨╛╤В╨╛, ╤З╨╡ ╤Ж╨╡╨╗╤В╨░ ╤Б╤П╨║╨░╤И ╨╡ ╨╡╨┤╨╜╨░ ╨╕╨┤╨╡╤П ╨┐╨╛-╨▓╨╕╨┤╨╕╨╝╨░ тАУ ╨║╨░╤В╨╛ ╤З╨╡ ╨▓ ╤В╨╛╨╖╨╕ ╤А╨╛╨╝╨░╨╜ ╤А╨░╨╖╤Б╤В╨╛╤П╨╜╨╕╨╡╤В╨╛ ╨╝╨╡╨╢╨┤╤Г ╨╝╨╡╤З╤В╨░╨╜╨░╤В╨░ ╨║╨╜╨╕╨│╨░ ╨╕ ╨║╨╜╨╕╨│╨░╤В╨░, ╨║╨╛╤П╤В╨╛ ╨▓ ╨╝╨╛╨╝╨╡╨╜╤В╨░ ╨╡ ╨┐╨╛ ╤Б╨╕╨╗╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╝╤Г ╨┤╨░ ╨╜╨░╨┐╨╕╤И╨╡, ╨▒╨╕╨╗╨╛ ╨╜╨░╨╣-╨┐╤А╨╡╨╛╨┤╨╛╨╗╨╕╨╝╨╛, ╤Б╨║╤К╤Б╨╡╨╜╨╛. ╨б╤К╨│╨╗╨░╤Б╤П╨▓╨░╨╝ ╤Б╨╡. ╨Ш ╤Б╨╡ ╨╛╨┐╨╕╤В╨▓╨░╨╝ ╨┤╨░ ╤А╨░╨╖╨│╨░╨┤╨░╤П ╤В╨░╨╣╨╜╨░╤В╨░ ╤Б╤К╤Б╤В╨░╨▓╨║╨░, ╨║╨╛╤П╤В╨╛ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨▓╤А╤К╤Й╨░ тАЮ╨Э╨░ ╤Б╨╝╨╡╨╗╨╕╤В╨╡ ╤Б╨╡ ╨┐╤А╨╛╤Й╨░╨▓╨░тАЬ ╨▓ ╨╛╨╜╨░╨╖╨╕ ╨┐╨╛-╤Б╨┐╨╡╤Ж╨╕╨░╨╗╨╜╨░ ╨╗╨╕╤В╨╡╤А╨░╤В╤Г╤А╨░. ╨б╤К╤Б╤В╨░╨▓╨║╨░╤В╨░, ╨║╨╛╤П╤В╨╛ ╨╡╨▓╨╡╨╜╤В╤Г╨░╨╗╨╜╨╛ ╨╜╨╡ ╨┤╨╛╤Б╤В╨╕╨│╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨┤╨╕╤И╨╜╨╕╤В╨╡ тАУ ╤Б╨░╨╝╨╕ ╨┐╨╛ ╤Б╨╡╨▒╨╡ ╤Б╨╕ ╤З╤Г╨┤╨╡╤Б╨╜╨╕ тАУ ╨║╨╜╨╕╨│╨╕ ╨╜╨░ ╨Ъ╨╗╨╕╨╣╨▓. (╨Ю╤Б╨╛╨▒╨╡╨╜╨╛ ╨╖╨░ тАЮ╨Ф╤А╤Г╨│╨░╤В╨░ ╤А╤К╨║╨░тАЬ ╨╝╨╕ ╨╡ ╤В╤А╤Г╨┤╨╜╨╛ ╨┤╨░ ╨╜╨░╨┐╨╕╤И╨░ тАЮ╨╜╨╡ ╨┤╨╛╤Б╤В╨╕╨│╨░тАЬ, ╨╖╨░╤Й╨╛╤В╨╛ ╤Г╨╢╨░╤Б╨╜╨╛ ╤П ╤Е╨░╤А╨╡╤Б╨▓╨░╨╝ тАУ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨╛╤Б╨╝╨╕╤Б╨╗╤П╨╜╨╡╤В╨╛ ╨╜╨░ ╤Б╤В╨╡╤А╨╡╨╛╤В╨╕╨┐╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╖╨░ ╤Б╨╗╨░╨▒ ╨╕ ╤Б╨╕╨╗╨╡╨╜, ╨╖╨░ ╤Б╨┐╨░╤Б╨╡╨╜ ╨╕ ╤Б╨┐╨░╤Б╨╕╤В╨╡╨╗, ╨┐╤А╨╡╨║╤А╨░╤З╨▓╨░╨╜╨╡╤В╨╛ ╨╜╨░ ╨│╤А╨░╨╜╨╕╤Ж╨╕╤В╨╡. ) ╨Ш╨╗╨╕ ╨╝╨░╨╣ ╨┐╨╛-╨▓╨╡╤А╨╛╤П╤В╨╜╨╛ ╨╡ ╤Б╤К╤Б╤В╨░╨▓╨║╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨┤╨░ ╤Б╨░ ╨╜╤П╨║╨╛╨╗╨║╨╛, ╤А╨░╨╖╨▒╤К╤А╨║╨░╨╜╨╕ ╨╝╨╡╨╢╨┤╤Г ╨┐╤К╤А╨▓╨╛╤В╨╛ ╨╕ ╨┐╨╛╤Б╨╗╨╡╨┤╨╜╨╛╤В╨╛ ╨╕╨╖╤А╨╡╤З╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╡ ╨╜╨░ ╤А╨╛╨╝╨░╨╜╨░. ╨Ь╨╡╨╢╨┤╤Г "╨Т╨╛╨╣╨╜╨░╤В╨░ ╨▒╨╡╤И╨╡ ╨╛╨▒╤П╨▓╨╡╨╜╨░ ╨▓ ╨╡╨┤╨╕╨╜╨░╨╣╤Б╨╡╤В ╨╕ ╨┐╨╡╤В╨╜╨░╨╣╤Б╨╡╤В ╨┐╤А╨╡╨┤╨╕ ╨╛╨▒╤П╨┤" ╨╕ "╨Т╤К╨╖╨┤╤Г╤Е, ╨║╨╛╨╣╤В╨╛ ╨▓╤Б╨╡ ╨╛╤Й╨╡ ╤Б╤В╨░╨▓╨░ ╨╖╨░ ╨┤╨╕╤И╨░╨╜╨╡, ╨░╨║╨╛ ╨▓╤Б╨╡╨║╨╕, ╨║╨╛╨╝╤Г╤В╨╛ ╤Б╨╕ ╨┐╤А╨╛╤Б╤В╨╕╨╗, ╨╡ ╨▒╨╕╨╗ ╤Б╨╝╨╡╨╗" ╤Б╨╡ ╤Б╨╗╤Г╤З╨▓╨░ ╨╡╨┤╨╜╨╛ ╨┤╨╕╨╜╨░╨╝╨╕╤З╨╜╨╛ ╨┐╤К╤В╤Г╨▓╨░╨╜╨╡ ╨╛╤В ╨╜╨╡╨▓╨╕╨╜╨╜╨╛╤Б╤В╤В╨░ ╨║╤К╨╝ ╨┐╤А╨╛╤И╨║╨░╤В╨░. ╨Я╤К╤В╤П╤В ╨╝╨╕╨╜╨░╨▓╨░ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨╖ ╨▓╤К╤В╤А╨╡╤И╨╜╨╕╤В╨╡ ╤В╤А╨░╨╜╤Б╤Д╨╛╤А╨╝╨░╤Ж╨╕╨╕ ╨╜╨░ ╨│╨╡╤А╨╛╨╕╤В╨╡, ╨┐╤А╨╡╨╖ ╤В╨╡╨╢╨╡╤Б╤В╤В╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╤А╨╡╤И╨╡╨╜╨╕╤П╤В╨░, ╨║╨╛╨╕╤В╨╛ ╨▓╨╖╨╕╨╝╨░╤В, ╨┐╤А╨╡╨╖ ╤Б╤А╨╕╨▓╨╛╨▓╨╡╤В╨╡ ╨╕ ╨▓╤К╨╖╨▓╨╕╤Б╤П╨▓╨░╨╜╨╕╤П╤В╨░, ╨┐╤А╨╡╨╖ ╨╛╨┐╨╕╨░╤В╨╕╤В╨╡ (╨┐╨╛╨┤ ╤Д╨╛╤А╨╝╨░╤В╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╤Б╤Г╨▒╤Б╤В╨░╨╜╤Ж╨╕╨╕, ╨╜╨╛ ╨╕ ╨╜╨░ ╤Г╨┐╨╛╨╣╨▓╨░╤Й╨╕ ╨╕╨┤╨╡╨╕, ╨║╤А╨╡╤Е╨║╨╕ ╨╜╨░╨┤╨╡╨╢╨┤╨╕ ╨╖╨░ ╤Б╨╝╨╕╤Б╤К╨╗), ╨┐╤А╨╡╨╖ ╨░╨╗╤В╤А╤Г╨╕╨╖╨╝╨░ ╨╕ ╨╝╨╕╨╖╨░╨╜╤В╤А╨╛╨┐╨╕╤П╤В╨░, ╨┐╤А╨╡╨╖ ╤А╨░╤Б╨╛╨▓╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨┤╤А╨░╨╖╤Б╤К╨┤╤К╤Ж╨╕ ╨╕ ╨┐╤А╨╛╨┐╨░╨┤╨░╨╜╨╕╤П╤В╨░ ╨▓ ╨▓╨╜╨╡╨╖╨░╨┐╨╜╨╕╤В╨╡ ╤Е╨╕╨░╤В╤Г╤Б╨╕ ╨╜╨░ ╨╢╨╕╨▓╨╛╤В╨░тАж ╨║╨░╤В╨╛ ╨╡╨▓╨░╨║╤Г╨░╤Ж╨╕╤П╤В╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╨╗╨╛╨╜╨┤╨╛╨╜╤Б╨║╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨┤╨╡╤Ж╨░ ╨▓ ╨┐╤А╨╛╨▓╨╕╨╜╤Ж╨╕╤П╤В╨░ ╨╜╨░╨┐╤А╨╕╨╝╨╡╤А. ╨Т ╤Б╨▓╨╡╤В╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╤З╨╡╤В╨╕╤А╨╕╨╝╨░╤В╨░ ╨│╨╗╨░╨▓╨╜╨╕ ╨│╨╡╤А╨╛╨╕ тАУ ╨Ь╨╡╤А╨╕, ╨Р╨╗╨╕╤Б╤В╤К╤А, ╨в╨╛╨╝ ╨╕ ╨е╨╕╨╗╨┤╨░ тАУ ╨╜╤П╨╝╨░ ╨║╨░╤В╨╡╨│╨╛╤А╨╕╤З╨╜╨╕ ╨╕ ╨╡╨┤╨╜╨╛╨╖╨╜╨░╤З╨╜╨╛ ╨┐╤А╨░╨▓╨╕╨╗╨╜╨╕ ╨╛╤В╨│╨╛╨▓╨╛╤А╨╕. ╨Ъ╨╗╨╕╨╣╨▓ ╨│╨╛ ╨╜╨░╤А╨╕╤З╨░ тАЮ╤Г╤Б╨╡╤Й╨░╨╜╨╡ ╨╖╨░ ╨┤╨▓╤Г╤Б╨╝╨╕╤Б╨╗╨╕╨╡ ╨╕ ╨╜╨╡╤Б╨╕╨│╤Г╤А╨╜╨╛╤Б╤ВтАЬ, ╤Е╨░╤А╨░╨║╤В╨╡╤А╨╜╨╛ ╨╖╨░ ╨▓╨╛╨╡╨╜╨╜╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨│╨╛╨┤╨╕╨╜╨╕ тАУ ╨▓╤А╨╡╨╝╨╡╨╜╨░, ╨▓ ╨║╨╛╨╕╤В╨╛ тАЮ╨▓╤Б╤П╨║╨░ ╨░╨╝╨▒╨╕╤Ж╨╕╤П ╨╡ ╤А╨░╨╖╨╝╨╕╤В╨░, ╨▓╤Б╤П╨║╨░ ╨▓╤А╤К╨╖╨║╨░ тАУ ╨╛╨┐╨╛╤А╨╛╤З╨╡╨╜╨░, ╨╜╨╕╨║╨╛╨╣ ╨╖╨░╨▓╤К╤А╤И╨╡╨║ ╨╜╨╡ ╨╡ ╨╛╨║╨╛╨╜╤З╨░╤В╨╡╨╗╨╡╨╜тАЬ. ╨Ш ╨╜╤П╨╝╨░ ╨║╨░╨║ ╨┤╨░ ╨╡ ╨╕╨╜╨░╤З╨╡, ╨┐╤А╨╕ ╨┐╨╛╨╗╨╛╨╢╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╡ ╤З╨╡ ╤Е╨╛╤А╨░╤В╨░ ╨╛╨║╨╛╨╗╨╛ ╤В╨╡╨▒ ╤Б╨░ ╤В╨╕ ╨╛╤В╨╜╨╡╤В╨╕ ╨╜╨╡ ╤Б╨░╨╝╨╛ ╤Д╨╕╨╖╨╕╤З╨╡╤Б╨║╨╕, ╨╜╨╛ ╨╕ ╨╡╨╝╨╛╤Ж╨╕╨╛╨╜╨░╨╗╨╜╨╛. ╨С╨╗╨╕╨╖╨╛╤Б╤В╤В╨░ ╨╡ ╨┐╨╛╨┤╨╗╨╛╨╢╨╡╨╜╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╨╕╨╖╨┐╨╕╤В╨░╨╜╨╕╨╡, ╨╖╨░╤Й╨╛╤В╨╛ ╤Г╨╢╨░╤Б╤К╤В ╨╕╨╖╤В╤А╤К╨│╨▓╨░ ╨╛╤В ╨║╨╛╤А╨╡╨╜ ╨▓╤Б╤П╨║╨╛ ╨╜╨╛╤А╨╝╨░╨╗╨╜╨╛ ╤З╨╛╨▓╨╡╤И╨║╨╛ ╨▓╤К╨╖╨┐╤А╨╕╤П╤В╨╕╨╡ ╨╖╨░ ╤Б╨▓╨╡╤В╨░. ╨Ш ╤В╨╛╤З╨╜╨╛ ╤В╤Г╨║ ╨╡ ╨╝╤П╤Б╤В╨╛╤В╨╛ ╨╜╨░ ╤В╨░╨╣╨╜╨░╤В╨░ ╤Б╤К╤Б╤В╨░╨▓╨║╨░. ╨Э╨╡ ╨▓ ╤Б╨░╨╝╨╕╤П ╤Б╤О╨╢╨╡╤В, ╨╜╨╡ ╨▓ ╤Г╨╝╨╡╨╗╨╛ ╨╕╨╖╨│╤А╨░╨┤╨╡╨╜╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨│╨╡╤А╨╛╨╕ ╨╕ ╨▓ ╨┤╨╡╤В╨░╨╣╨╗╨╜╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╛╨┐╨╕╤Б╨░╨╜╨╕╤П ╨╜╨░ ╨╛╨┐╤Г╤Б╤В╨╛╤И╨╡╨╜╨░╤В╨░ ╨╛╤В ╨▓╨╛╨╣╨╜╨░╤В╨░ ╨╜╨░╨┐╤А╨░╨▓╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╨╢╨╕╨▓╨╛╤В╨░. ╨Р ╨▓ ╤Б╨░╨╝╨╕╤П ╨╡╨╖╨╕╨║. ╨Ъ╤А╨╕╤Б ╨Ъ╨╗╨╕╨╣╨▓ ╨╕╨╝╨░ ╨╜╨╛╨▓ ╨╡╨╖╨╕╨║ ╨╖╨░ ╨▓╤Б╨╕╤З╨║╨╛ ╤В╨╛╨▓╨░. ╨Ф╤Г╨╝╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╝╤Г ╤Б╨░ ╨▓╨╕╨▒╤А╨╕╤А╨░╤Й╨╕ ╤Б╤К╨╖╨┤╨░╨╜╨╕╤П, ╨║╨╛╨╕╤В╨╛ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨▓╨║╨╗╤О╤З╨▓╨░╤В ╨╛╤В ╨▓╨╕╨┤╨╕╨╝╨╕╤П ╤Б╨▓╤П╤В ╨╜╨░ ╨│╨╡╤А╨╛╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨▓ ╨┐╨░╤А╨░╨╗╨╡╨╗╨╜╨░╤В╨░ ╨▓╤Б╨╡╨╗╨╡╨╜╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╤В╤П╤Е╨╜╨░╤В╨░ ╨▒╨╛╨╗╨║╨░ тАУ ╨▒╨╡╨╖ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨┤╤Г╨┐╤А╨╡╨╢╨┤╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╡, ╨┤╨╛╨▓╨╡╤А╤П╨▓╨░╨╣╨║╨╕ ╤Б╨╡ ╤Б╨╝╨╡╨╗╨╛ ╨╜╨░ ╤Б╨╡╤В╨╕╨▓╨░╤В╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╤З╨╕╤В╨░╤В╨╡╨╗╤П. ╨Ь╤А╨░╤З╨╜╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨┐╨╛╨│╨╗╨╡╨┤╨╕, ╤Б ╨║╨╛╨╕╤В╨╛ ╨╝╨╛╨╝╤З╨╡╤В╨░╤В╨░ ╨┐╨╛╤Б╤А╨╡╤Й╨░╤В ╨╝╤К╨│╨╗╤П╨▓╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╛╤В╨│╨╛╨▓╨╛╤А╨╕. ╨Я╤А╨╛╤Д╤Г╤З╨░╤Е╨░ ╨│╨╛╨┤╨╕╨╜╨╕. ╨Я╨╛╤З╤В╨╕ ╨╜╨░╨┐╤К╨┐╨╕╤Е╨░ ╤З╤Г╨▓╤Б╤В╨▓╨░. ╨Т╨╛╨╣╨╜╨░╤В╨░ ╤Б╨▓╤К╤А╤И╨╕ ╨╕ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨╖ ╤А╨░╨╖╨▓╨░╨╗╨╕╨╜╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╕╨╖╨▒╨╕╤Е╨░ ╤Д╨╕╨┤╨░╨╜╨║╨╕. ╨Ь╨╡╤А╨╕ ╨┐╤А╨╕╨╝╨╕╨│╨╜╨░. ╨Ь╨╛╤А╤Д╨╕╨╜╤К╤В ╨╕╨╖╨┐╤А╨░╤Й╨░╤И╨╡ ╨▓╤А╨╡╨╝╨╡╤В╨╛ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨╖ ╨╝╨╡╨░╨╜╨┤╤А╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╜╨░ ╨╜╤П╨║╨░╨║╨▓╨╕ ╤А╨╡╨║╨╕, ╨╛╨│╨╛╨╗╨▓╨░╤И╨╡ ╨┐╨╛╤А╨╡╨┤╨╜╨╕╤П ╨╖╨░╨▓╨╛╨╣ ╨▒╨╡╨╖ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨┤╤Г╨┐╤А╨╡╨╢╨┤╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╡ ╨╕ ╨│╨╛ ╨╛╤В╨║╤К╤Б╨▓╨░╤И╨╡ тАУ ╨╝╨░╨╗╤К╨║ ╤П╤А╨╡╨╝ ╨╜╨░ ╨┐╨░╨╝╨╡╤В╤В╨░, ╨▒╨╡╨╖ ╤П╤Б╨╜╨░ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨┤╤Б╤В╨░╨▓╨░ ╨║╨░╨║ ╤Б╨╡ ╨╡ ╨╛╨╖╨╛╨▓╨░╨╗ ╤В╨░╨╝. ╨Т╨╕╨┤╤П ╨╛╨╜╨╖╨╕ ╨┐╨╛╨│╨╗╨╡╨┤, ╤Б ╨║╨╛╨╣╤В╨╛ ╨Ч╨░╨║╨░╤А╨╕ ╤П ╨╛╤В╨┐╤А╨░╤В╨╕ ╤В╨╛╨│╨░╨▓╨░, ╨▓ ╨┤╨╡╨╜╤П ╨╜╨░ ╨╡╨▓╨░╨║╤Г╨░╤Ж╨╕╤П╤В╨░. ╨Т╤К╤А╤Е╤Г ╨╗╨╕╤Ж╨╡╤В╨╛ ╨╝╤Г, ╨┤╨╛╨║╨░╤В╨╛ ╨╛╤В╨╗╨╡╨┐╤П╤И╨╡ ╨╛╤В ╤Г╤Б╤В╨╜╨╕╤В╨╡ ╤Б╨╕ ╨▓╤К╨╛╨▒╤А╨░╨╢╨░╨╡╨╝╨░╤В╨░ ╤Ж╨╕╨│╨░╤А╨░, ╤Б╨╡ ╨┤╨╛╨╗╨░╨▓╤П╤И╨╡ ╤Б╤К╤Й╨╕╤П╤В ╨╜╨░╨╝╨╡╨║ ╨╖╨░ ╤В╤К╨│╨░ ╨╛╤В╨▓╤К╨┤ ╨▓╤Б╤П╨║╨╛ ╤Г╤В╨╡╤И╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╡. ╨б╤П╨║╨░╤И ╨╖╨╗╨╛╤З╨╡╤Б╤В╨╕╨╜╨░╤В╨░, ╤А╨░╨╖╨┐╨╡╤А╨╕╨╗╨░ ╨║╤А╨╕╨╗╨╡ ╨╜╨░╨┤ ╨╝╨╛╤А╤Б╨║╨░╤В╨░ ╤И╨╕╤А, ╨▒╨╡ ╨╕╨╖╨╛╤Б╤В╨░╨▓╨╕╨╗╨░ ╨▒╨╗╨╡╨┤╨╕╤П ╨▒╤А╤П╨│, ╤З╨╕╤П╤В╨╛ ╤Г╨╜╨╕╨╗╨░ ╤В╨▓╤К╤А╨┤ ╨╜╨╡ ╨╝╨╛╨╢╨╡╤И╨╡ ╨┤╨░ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨┤╨╗╨╛╨╢╨╕ ╤А╨░╨╖╤В╤Г╤Е╨░. ╨Х╨╖╨╕╨║╤К╤В ╨╝╤Г, ╨╜╨░╤А╨╡╨┤ ╤Б ╨┤╤А╤Г╨│╨╛╤В╨╛, ╨╡ ╨╕ ╨╕╤Б╤В╨╛╤А╨╕╤З╨╡╤Б╨║╨╕ ╨┤╨╛╤Б╤В╨╛╨▓╨╡╤А╨╡╨╜, ╨╛╤Б╨╝╨╕╤Б╨╗╨╡╨╜ ╨▓ ╤Б╨▓╨╛╤П ╨║╨╛╨╜╤В╨╡╨║╤Б╤В. ╨Ы╨╡╨║╤Б╨╕╨║╨░╤В╨░, ╨║╨░╨╗╨░╨╝╨▒╤Г╤А╨╕╤В╨╡, ╨┤╨╕╨░╨╗╨╛╨│╤К╤В ╨║╨░╤В╨╛ ╤Г╨▒╨╡╨╢╨╕╤Й╨╡ ╨╕ ╨╖╨░╨▒╨░╨▓╨╗╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╡, ╨╡╨╖╨╕╨║╨╛╨▓╨╕╤В╨╡ ╤А╨╡╨│╨╕╤Б╤В╤А╨╕, ╨┐╨╛╤В╤К╨▓╨░╨╜╨╡╤В╨╛ ╨▓ ╨┐╤А╨╕╤Б╤К╤Й╨╕ ╨╜╨░ ╨▓╤А╨╡╨╝╨╡╤В╨╛ ╤Б╤В╤А╤Г╨║╤В╤Г╤А╨╕ ╨╜╨░ ╨╛╨▒╤Й╤Г╨▓╨░╨╜╨╡ ╨╕ ╨╕╨╖╤А╨░╨╖╤П╨▓╨░╨╜╨╡ тАУ ╨▓╤Б╨╕╤З╨║╨╛ ╤В╨╛╨▓╨░ ╨┐╤А╨░╨▓╨╕ ╤А╨╛╨╝╨░╨╜╨░ ╨┐╤Г╨╗╤Б╨╕╤А╨░╤Й╨╛ ╨╢╨╕╨▓╨╛ ╤В╤П╨╗╨╛. ╨Э╨╡╤Б╨╗╤Г╤З╨░╨╣╨╜╨╛ ╨╜╨░╨╣-╨║╤А╨╡╤Е╨║╨╕╤П╤В ╨╛╤В ╨│╨╡╤А╨╛╨╕╤В╨╡, ╤З╨╡╤А╨╜╨╛╨║╨╛╨╢╨╕╤П╤В ╨┤╨╡╤Б╨╡╤В╨│╨╛╨┤╨╕╤И╨╡╨╜ ╨Ч╨░╨║╨░╤А╨╕, ╤Б╤В╤А╨░╨┤╨░ ╨╛╤В тАЮ╤Б╨╗╨╛╨▓╨╡╤Б╨╜╨░ ╤Б╨╗╨╡╨┐╨╛╤В╨░тАЬ. ╨Э╨╡╤Б╨┐╨╛╤Б╨╛╨▒╨╜╨╛╤Б╤В╤В╨░ ╨┤╨░ ╨┐╤А╨╛╨╕╨╖╨▓╨╡╨┤╨╡╤И ╨╡╨╖╨╕╨║ ╨▓ ╤В╨╛╨╖╨╕ ╤Б╨▓╤П╤В, ╨╡ ╤А╨░╨▓╨╜╨╛╤Б╨╕╨╗╨╜╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╨╖╨░╨╗╨╕╤З╨░╨▓╨░╨╜╨╡ ╨╜╨░ ╤Д╨╕╨╖╨╕╤З╨╡╤Б╨║╨╛╤В╨╛ ╨┐╤А╨╕╤Б╤К╤Б╤В╨▓╨╕╨╡. ╨Ш ╨╛╨▒╤А╨░╤В╨╜╨╛╤В╨╛ тАУ ╨╗╨╕╨┐╤Б╨░╤В╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╤Е╨╛╤А╨░ ╤Г╨▒╨╕╨▓╨░ ╨╡╨╖╨╕╨║╨░. "╨Я╤А╨╛╨╖╨╛╤А╨╡╤Ж╤К╤В ╨▒╨╡╤И╨╡ ╨╖╨░╨╗╨╡╨┐╨╡╨╜ ╤Б ╤В╨╕╨║╤Б╨╛ ╨╜╨░ ╨║╤А╤К╤Б╤В, ╨░ ╨╖╨░╨┤ ╨╜╨╡╨│╨╛ ╨╝╨░╤И╨╕╨╜╨░╤В╨░ ╨╖╨░ ╤А╤П╨╖╨░╨╜╨╡ ╨╜╨░ ╨▒╨╡╨║╨╛╨╜, ╤В╨╡╨╗╤В╨░ ╨╖╨░ ╤Б╨╕╤А╨╡╨╜╨╡ ╨╕ ╤З╨╡╤А╨╜╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╝╨╡╤В╨░╨╗╨╜╨╕ ╨▓╨╡╨╖╨╜╨╕ ╤Б╤В╨╛╤П╤Е╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╨┐╤А╨░╨╖╨╜╨╕╤В╨╡ ╤А╨░╤Д╤В╨╛╨▓╨╡ тАУ ╤А╨╡╤З╨╜╨╕╨║╤К╤В ╨╜╨░ ╨╡╨┤╨╕╨╜ ╨╡╨╖╨╕╨║, ╨╜╨╛ ╨▒╨╡╨╖ ╨┤╨░ ╤Б╨░ ╨╛╤Б╤В╨░╨╜╨░╨╗╨╕ ╤Е╨╛╤А╨░, ╨║╨╛╨╕╤В╨╛ ╨┤╨░ ╨│╨╛ ╨│╨╛╨▓╨╛╤А╤П╤В. "╨Ю╤Б╨▓╨╡╨╜ ╨╡╨╖╨╕╨║╨╛╨▓╨╛ ╨╕╨╖╤П╤Й╨╡╨╜, тАЮ╨Э╨░ ╤Б╨╝╨╡╨╗╨╕╤В╨╡ ╤Б╨╡ ╨┐╤А╨╛╤Й╨░╨▓╨░тАЬ ╨╡ ╨╕ ╨┤╤К╨╗╨▒╨╛╨║╨╛ ╨┐╤Б╨╕╤Е╨╛╨╗╨╛╨│╨╕╤З╨╡╤Б╨║╨╕ ╤А╨╛╨╝╨░╨╜ тАУ ╨▓╤В╨╛╤А╨░ ╤В╨░╨╣╨╜╨░ ╤Б╤К╤Б╤В╨░╨▓╨║╨░. ╨Ш ╨╜╤П╨╝╨░╨╝ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨┤╨▓╨╕╨┤ ╤Б╨░╨╝╨╛ ╨┐╨╛ ╨╛╤В╨╜╨╛╤И╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╡ ╨╖╨░╨┤╤К╨╗╨▒╨░╨▓╨░╨╜╨╡ ╨▓ ╨┐╤Б╨╕╤Е╨╛╨╗╨╛╨│╨╕╤П╤В╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╨│╨╡╤А╨╛╨╕╤В╨╡ ╤Б ╤Ж╤П╨╗╨░╤В╨░ ╨╕╨╝ ╨║╤А╨╡╤Е╨║╨╛╤Б╤В, ╨╜╨╡╨┤╨╛╤Б╤В╨░╤В╤К╤Ж╨╕ ╨╕ ╨│╤А╨╡╤И╨╜╨╕ ╤Е╨╛╨┤╨╛╨▓╨╡. ╨Я╤Б╨╕╤Е╨╛╨╗╨╛╨│╨╕╨╖╨╝╤К╤В ╨╜╨░ ╨Ъ╨╗╨╕╨╣╨▓ ╨╡ ╨╛╤Й╨╡ ╨┐╨╛-╤Ж╨╡╨╜╨╡╨╜ ╨▓ ╨┐╨╛╤Б╨╛╨║╨░ ╨╕╨╖╨│╤А╨░╨╢╨┤╨░╨╜╨╡ ╨╜╨░ ╤Б╨▓╨╛╨╡╨╛╨▒╤А╨░╨╖╨╡╨╜ ╨┐╨╛╤А╤В╤А╨╡╤В ╨╜╨░ ╨▒╤А╨╕╤В╨░╨╜╤Б╨║╨╕╤П ╨╜╨░╤Ж╨╕╨╛╨╜╨░╨╗╨╡╨╜ ╤Е╨░╤А╨░╨║╤В╨╡╤А, ╨╛╤Д╨╛╤А╨╝╨╕╨╗ ╤Б╨╡ ╨▓ ╨│╨╛╨┤╨╕╨╜╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╜╨░ ╨▓╨╛╨╣╨╜╨░╤В╨░. ╨Р╨║╨╛ ╤Б╨╡ ╨▓╨│╨╗╨╡╨┤╨░╨╝╨╡ ╨▓╨╜╨╕╨╝╨░╤В╨╡╨╗╨╜╨╛ ╨▓ ╤В╨╛╨╖╨╕ ╨┐╨╛╤А╤В╤А╨╡╤В, ╨▒╨╕╤Е╨╝╨╡ ╨╝╨╛╨│╨╗╨╕ ╨┤╨░ ╨╛╤В╤Б╨╡╨╡╨╝ ╤З╨╡╤А╤В╨╕, ╨╡╨║╤Б╨┐╨╗╨╛╨░╤В╨╕╤А╨░╨╜╨╕ ╨╛╤В ╨┤╨╜╨╡╤И╨╜╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨┐╨╛╨╗╨╕╤В╨╕╤З╨╡╤Б╨║╨╕ ╨╕ ╨╛╨▒╤Й╨╡╤Б╤В╨▓╨╡╨╜╨╕ ╤Д╨╕╨│╤Г╤А╨╕ ╤Б ╨╡╨┤╨╜╨░ ╨╕╨╗╨╕ ╨┤╤А╤Г╨│╨░ ╤Ж╨╡╨╗. ╨Я╤Б╨╕╤Е╨╛╨╗╨╛╨│╨╕╤З╨╡╤Б╨║╨╕ ╨┐╨╛╨┤╨┐╨╗╨░╤В╨╡╨╜ ╨╡ ╨╕ ╨╕╨╖╨▒╨╛╤А╤К╤В ╨╜╨░ ╨░╨▓╤В╨╛╤А╨░ ╨┤╨░ ╨╛╤В╨║╨╗╨╛╨╜╨╕ ╨▓╨╜╨╕╨╝╨░╨╜╨╕╨╡╤В╨╛ ╤Б╨╕ ╨╛╤В ╨╡╨╝╨▒╨╗╨╡╨╝╨░╤В╨╕╤З╨╜╨╕ ╨╖╨░ ╨Т╤В╨╛╤А╨░╤В╨░ ╤Б╨▓╨╡╤В╨╛╨▓╨╜╨░ ╨▓╨╛╨╣╨╜╨░ ╤Д╤А╨╛╨╜╤В╨╛╨▓╨╡, ╨│╨╡╤А╨╛╨╕ ╨╕ ╨▒╨╕╤В╨║╨╕ ╨╕ ╨┤╨░ ╤Б╨╡ ╨▓╨│╨╗╨╡╨┤╨░ ╨▓╤К╨▓ ╨▓╤Б╨╡╨║╨╕╨┤╨╜╨╡╨▓╨╜╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╢╨╡╤Б╤В╨╛╨▓╨╡, ╨▓╤К╨▓ ╨▓╤В╨╛╤А╨╛╤Б╤В╨╡╨┐╨╡╨╜╨╜╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨┐╨╡╤А╤Б╨╛╨╜╨░╨╢╨╕ тАУ ╨┤╨╛╨▒╤А╨╛╨▓╨╛╨╗╨║╨░, ╨║╨╛╤П╤В╨╛ ╨╜╨░╨╖╨╜╨░╤З╨░╨▓╨░╤В ╨╖╨░ ╤Г╤З╨╕╤В╨╡╨╗╨║╨░, ╨▓╤К╨┐╤А╨╡╨║╨╕ ╤З╨╡ ╨╝╨╡╤З╤В╨░╨╡ ╨┤╨░ ╨╡ ╤И╨┐╨╕╨╛╨╜╨║╨░; ╨╛╤Д╨╕╤Ж╨╡╤А, ╨╖╨░╨▒╨╕╤В ╨┤╨░ ╤Б╨╗╤Г╨╢╨╕ ╨▓ ╨Ь╨░╨╗╤В╨░, ╨║╤К╨┤╨╡╤В╨╛ ╨╖╨░ ╨╝╨░╨╗╨║╨╛ ╨┤╨░ ╨╖╨░╨│╤Г╨▒╨╕ ╨╢╨╕╨▓╨╛╤В╨░ ╤Б╨╕, ╨╖╨░╤Й╨╛╤В╨╛тАж ╨╡ ╤Г╤Е╨░╨┐╨░╨╜ ╨╛╤В ╨║╨░╤В╨░╤Б╤В╤А╨╛╤Д╨╕╤А╨░╨╗ ╨▓╤А╨░╨╢╨╡╤Б╨║╨╕ ╨┐╨╕╨╗╨╛╤В; ╨║╨╛╨║╨╡╤В╨║╨░, ╨║╨╛╤П╤В╨╛ ╨╜╨╡ ╨╕╤Б╨║╨░ ╨┤╨░ ╤Г╤З╨░╤Б╤В╨▓╨░ ╨┐╤А╤П╨║╨╛ ╨▓╤К╨▓ ╨▓╨╛╨╣╨╜╨░╤В╨░, ╨╜╨╛ ╨╡ ╨╕╨╖╨║╤Г╤И╨╡╨╜╨░ ╨╛╤В ╤Б╨┐╤А╨╡╤В╨╜╨░╤В╨╕╤П ╨▓╤К╨╜╤И╨╡╨╜ ╨▓╨╕╨┤ ╨╜╨░ ╨╝╤К╨╢╨╡╤В╨╡ ╨▓ ╤Г╨╜╨╕╤Д╨╛╤А╨╝╨░тАж ╨╕ ╨▓ ╨║╤А╨░╨╣╨╜╨░ ╤Б╨╝╨╡╤В╨║╨░ ╤Б╤В╨░╨▓╨░ ╤Б╨░╨╜╨╕╤В╨░╤А╨║╨░ ╨╕ ╨▒╨╕╨▓╨░ ╨╛╨▒╨╡╨╖╨╛╨▒╤А╨░╨╖╨╡╨╜╨░. ╨Т╤Б╨╕╤З╨║╨╕ ╤В╨╡, ╤А╨╡╨┤╨╛╨▓╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╗╨╛╨╜╨┤╨╛╨╜╤З╨░╨╜╨╕, ╤Б╨░ ╨┐╤А╨╕╨╖╨╛╨▓╨░╨▓╨░╨╜╨╕ ╨╜╨╡╨┐╤А╨╡╤Б╤В╨░╨╜╨╜╨╛ ╨┤╨░ ╨▒╤К╨┤╨░╤В ╤Е╤А╨░╨▒╤А╨╕ ╨╕ ╨╛╤А╨│╨░╨╜╨╕╨╖╨╕╤А╨░╨╜╨╕. ╨Ш ╤В╨╛╨╖╨╕ ╨┐╨░╤А╨░╨┤╨╡╨╜ ╨┐╨░╤В╨╛╤Б ╨┐╨╛╨╗╤Г╤З╨░╨▓╨░ ╨╡╤Б╤В╨╡╤Б╤В╨▓╨╡╨╜╨░ ╤А╨╡╨░╨║╤Ж╨╕╤П ╨▓ ╨╛╨▒╤А╤К╤Й╨░╨╜╨╡╤В╨╛ ╨║╤К╨╝ ╨╝╨░╨╗╨║╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╜╨╡╤Й╨░, ╨▓╤К╤А╤Е╤Г ╨║╨╛╨╕╤В╨╛ ╤Б╨╡ ╨║╤А╨╡╨┐╨╕ ╤Ж╨╡╨╗╨╛╤Б╤В╤В╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╨▒╨╕╤В╨╕╨╡╤В╨╛: ╤З╤Г╨▓╤Б╤В╨▓╨╛ ╨╖╨░ ╤Е╤Г╨╝╨╛╤А, ╤Б╨┐╨╛╨╝╨╡╨╜ ╨╖╨░ ╨┐╤А╨╕╤П╤В╨╡╨╗╤Б╤В╨▓╨╛, ╨╢╨╡╤Б╤В ╨╜╨░ ╨┐╨╛╨┤╨║╤А╨╡╨┐╨░, ╨╡╨┤╨╜╨╛ ╨┐╨╕╤Б╨╝╨╛, ╨┐╤А╨╛╨▒╨╕╨╗╨╛ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨╖ ╨╛╨▒╤А╤К╤З╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╨▒╨╗╨╛╨║╨░╨┤╨░╤В╨░, ╨▒╤Г╤А╨║╨░╨╜╤З╨╡ ╤Б╨╗╨░╨┤╨║╨╛ ╨╛╤В ╨║╤К╨┐╨╕╨╜╨╕: ╤В╨╛╨▓╨░ ╤Б╨░ ╤Б╨┐╨░╤Б╨╕╤В╨╡╨╗╨╜╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨║╤Г╨║╨╕╤З╨║╨╕, ╨║╨╛╨╕╤В╨╛ ╤Г╨┤╤К╤А╨╢╨░╤В ╨┤╨╜╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╕ ╨▓╨╜╨░╤Б╤П╤В ╤Б╨╝╨╕╤Б╤К╨╗. ╨Ф╨╛╨┐╤К╨╗╨╜╨╕╤В╨╡╨╗╨╜╨╕╤П╤В ╨╜╤О╨░╨╜╤Б ╨╜╨░ ╨░╨▓╤В╨╡╨╜╤В╨╕╤З╨╜╨╛╤Б╤В ╨╕ ╨╛╤Й╨╡ ╨┐╨╛-╨┐╨╗╤К╤В╨╜╨╛ ╨┐╤Б╨╕╤Е╨╛╨╗╨╛╨│╨╕╤З╨╡╤Б╨║╨╛ ╨╖╨▓╤Г╤З╨╡╨╜╨╡ ╨╕╨┤╨▓╨░ ╨╕ ╨╛╤В ╤В╨╛╨▓╨░, ╤З╨╡ ╤А╨╛╨╝╨░╨╜╤К╤В ╤Б╤В╤К╨┐╨▓╨░ ╨▓╤К╤А╤Е╤Г ╨╗╨╕╤З╨╜╨░ ╨╕╤Б╤В╨╛╤А╨╕╤П. ╨Т╨┤╤К╤Е╨╜╨╛╨▓╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╡╤В╨╛ ╨╖╨░ ╨╜╨╡╤П ╨╕╨┤╨▓╨░ ╨╛╤В ╨▒╨░╨▒╨░╤В╨░ ╨╕ ╨┤╤П╨┤╨╛╤В╨╛ ╨╜╨░ ╨Ъ╨╗╨╕╨╣╨▓. ╨Ь╨╡╤А╨╕ ╨г╨╡╤Б╤В ╨╕ ╨Ф╨╡╨╣╨▓╨╕╨┤ ╨е╨╕╨╗ (╨┐╤А╨╡╨▓╤К╤А╨╜╨░╨╗╨╕ ╤Б╨╡ ╨▓ ╨╗╨╕╤В╨╡╤А╨░╤В╤Г╤А╨╜╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨│╨╡╤А╨╛╨╕ ╨Ь╨╡╤А╨╕ ╨Э╨╛╤А╤В ╨╕ ╨Р╨╗╨╕╤Б╤В╤К╤А ╨е╨╕╨╣╤В) ╤Б╨╡ ╨▓╨╕╨╢╨┤╨░╤В ╨╡╨┤╨▓╨░ ╨┤╨╡╨▓╨╡╤В ╨┐╤К╤В╨╕, ╨┐╤А╨╡╨┤╨╕ ╤Б╨╕╤В╤Г╨░╤Ж╨╕╤П╤В╨░ ╨▓ ╨Х╨▓╤А╨╛╨┐╨░ ╨┤╨░ ╨│╨╕ ╤А╨░╨╖╨┤╨╡╨╗╨╕. ╨Ъ╨╛╨│╨░╤В╨╛ ╤Б╨╡ ╨╢╨╡╨╜╤П╤В, ╨┐╤А╤К╤Б╤В╨╡╨╜╤К╤В ╨╜╨░ ╨▒╤Г╨╗╨║╨░╤В╨░ ╨╡ ╤Б ╨┤╨╡╨▓╨╡╤В ╨║╨░╨╝╤К╨║╨░ тАУ ╨┐╨╛ ╨╡╨┤╨╕╨╜ ╨╖╨░ ╨▓╤Б╤П╨║╨░ ╨╛╤В ╤Б╤А╨╡╤Й╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╕╨╝. ╨б╨▓╨╡╤В╤К╤В, ╤Б╨╗╤Г╤З╨╕╨╗ ╤Б╨╡ ╨╝╨╡╨╢╨┤╤Г ╨┤╨▓╨░╨╝╨░╤В╨░ ╨╖╨░ ╤В╨╡╨╖╨╕ ╤В╤А╨╕ ╨│╨╛╨┤╨╕╨╜╨╕, ╨╡ ╤Б╨░╨╝ ╨┐╨╛ ╤Б╨╡╨▒╨╡ ╤Б╨╕ ╤Е╤Г╨┤╨╛╨╢╨╡╤Б╤В╨▓╨╡╨╜╨╛ ╨┐╤А╨╛╨╕╨╖╨▓╨╡╨┤╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╡, ╨┐╨░╤А╨░╨╗╨╡╨╗╨╜╨░ ╤Б╨┐╨░╤Б╨╕╤В╨╡╨╗╨╜╨░ ╨▓╤Б╨╡╨╗╨╡╨╜╨░тАж ╨▓ ╨┐╨╕╤Б╨╝╨░. ╨Я╨╕╤Б╨╝╨░╤В╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╨Ф╨╡╨╣╨▓╨╕╨┤ ╨╛╤Ж╨╡╨╗╤П╨▓╨░╤В, ╨╖╨░╤Й╨╛╤В╨╛ ╤Б╨░ ╨┐╤А╨╕╨╗╨╡╨╢╨╜╨╛ ╤Б╤К╤Е╤А╨░╨╜╨╡╨╜╨╕ ╨╛╤В ╨Ь╨╡╤А╨╕. ╨Э╨╡╨╣╨╜╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╛╨▒╨░╤З╨╡ ╨┐╨╛╤В╤К╨▓╨░╤В ╨╜╨░ ╨╝╨╛╤А╤Б╨║╨╛╤В╨╛ ╨┤╤К╨╜╨╛ ╨╖╨░╨╡╨┤╨╜╨╛ ╤Б ╤В╤А╨░╨╜╤Б╨┐╨╛╤А╤В╨╜╨╕╤П ╨║╨╛╤А╨░╨▒, ╨║╨╛╨╣╤В╨╛ ╨│╨╕ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨▓╨╛╨╖╨▓╨░ ╨╛╨▒╤А╨░╤В╨╜╨╛ ╨╛╤В ╨Ь╨░╨╗╤В╨░ ╨║╤К╨╝ ╨Т╨╡╨╗╨╕╨║╨╛╨▒╤А╨╕╤В╨░╨╜╨╕╤П ╤Б╨╗╨╡╨┤ ╨║╤А╨░╤П ╨╜╨░ ╨▓╨╛╨╣╨╜╨░╤В╨░. "╨Ъ╨╛╨│╨░╤В╨╛ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨┐╤А╨╛╤З╨╕╤В╨░╨╝ ╤А╨╛╨╝╨░╨╜╨░ ╤Б╨╡╨│╨░ ╨╕ ╨▓╨╕╨╢╨┤╨░╨╝ ╨║╨░╨║ ╨│╨╡╤А╨╛╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╕╨╖╨┐╨╛╨╗╨╖╨▓╨░╤В ╤З╤Г╨▓╤Б╤В╨▓╨╛ ╨╖╨░ ╤Е╤Г╨╝╨╛╤А, ╨░╨▒╤Б╤Г╤А╨┤╨╕ ╨╕ ╨╛╨┐╨╕╨░╤В╨╕, ╨╖╨░ ╨┤╨░ ╨╕╨╖╨▒╨╡╨│╨╜╨░╤В ╨┤╨╕╤А╨╡╨║╤В╨╜╨╕╤П ╨┐╨╛╨│╨╗╨╡╨┤ ╨▓ ╨▒╨╡╨╖╨┤╨╜╨░╤В╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╨▓╨╛╨╣╨╜╨░╤В╨░ тАУ ╨┐╨╕╤И╨╡ ╨Ъ╨╗╨╕╨╣╨▓ ╨▓ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨┤╨│╨╛╨▓╨╛╤А╨░ ╨║╤К╨╝ ╨▒╤К╨╗╨│╨░╤А╤Б╨║╨╛╤В╨╛ ╨╕╨╖╨┤╨░╨╜╨╕╨╡ ╨╜╨░ ╤А╨╛╨╝╨░╨╜╨░ тАУ ╤Б╨╡ ╤З╤Г╨┤╤П ╨┤╨░╨╗╨╕ ╨┐╤К╨║ ╨╜╨╡ ╨╜╨░╨▒╨╗╤О╨┤╨░╨▓╨░╨╝ ╨▓ ╨╝╨╕╨╜╨╕╨░╤В╤О╤А╨░ ╤Б╨╛╨▒╤Б╤В╨▓╨╡╨╜╨░╤В╨░ ╤Б╨╕ ╨╜╨╡╨╛╤Е╨╛╤В╨░ ╨┤╨░ ╨╕╨╖╨▓╨╕╨║╨▓╨░╨╝ ╨▓ ╤Б╤К╨╖╨╜╨░╨╜╨╕╨╡╤В╨╛ ╤Б╨╕ ╨╜╨░╨╣-╨╝╤А╨░╤З╨╜╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╛╨▒╤А╨░╨╖╨╕ ╨╜╨░ ╨╖╨╗╨╛╤В╨╛. ╨Э╨░╨▓╤П╤А╨╜╨╛ ╤В╨╛╨▓╨░ ╨╡ ╨╖╨░╨╗╨╛╨╢╨╡╨╜╨╛ ╨▓ ╨┐╤А╨╕╤А╨╛╨┤╨░╤В╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╨▓╨╛╨╣╨╜╨░╤В╨░: ╨┤╨░ ╨╜╨╕ ╨╜╨░╨▒╨╗╤О╨┤╨░╨▓╨░ ╤Б ╤В╨╛╨╗╨║╨╛╨▓╨░ ╨╜╨╡╤В╤А╨╡╨┐╨▓╨░╤Й ╨╕ ╨╕╨╖╨┐╤К╨╗╨╜╨╡╨╜ ╤Б ╤Г╨╢╨░╤Б ╨┐╨╛╨│╨╗╨╡╨┤, ╤З╨╡ ╨┤╨░ ╨╜╨╡ ╤Б╨╝╨╡╨╡╨╝ ╨┤╨░ ╤П ╨┐╨╛╨│╨╗╨╡╨┤╨╜╨╡╨╝ ╨▓ ╨╛╤З╨╕╤В╨╡. ╨Ш╨╗╨╕ ╨╜╨░╨▓╤П╤А╨╜╨╛, ╨▓╤К╨┐╤А╨╡╨║╨╕ ╨╖╨░╨│╨╗╨░╨▓╨╕╨╡╤В╨╛ ╨╜╨░ ╨║╨╜╨╕╨│╨░╤В╨░, ╨┐╤А╨╛╤Б╤В╨╛ ╨╝╨╕ ╨╗╨╕╨┐╤Б╨▓╨░ ╤Б╨╝╨╡╨╗╨╛╤Б╤В. "╨Х╨┤╨▓╨░ ╨╗╨╕, ╨Ъ╤А╨╕╤Б. ╨Р ╨┤╨░╨╜╨╛ ╨╕ ╨╜╨░ ╤Е╨╛╤А╨░╤В╨░, ╨║╨╛╨╕╤В╨╛ ╤Й╨╡ ╨┐╨╛╨╢╨╡╨╗╨░╤П╤В ╨┤╨░ ╨┐╤А╨╛╤З╨╡╤В╨░╤В ╤В╨░╨╖╨╕ ╨║╨╜╨╕╨│╨░, ╨┤╨░ ╨╜╨╡ ╨╕╨╝ ╨╗╨╕╨┐╤Б╨▓╨░ ╤Б╨╝╨╡╨╗╨╛╤Б╤В. ╨Т╤К╨┐╤А╨╡╨║╨╕ ╤З╨╡ "╨▓╨╛╨╣╨╜╨░╤В╨░ ╨┐╤А╨╛╨╕╨╖╨▓╨╡╨╢╨┤╨░ ╤Б╨░╨╝╨╛╤В╨░"тАж
