"╨Т╤В╨╛╤А╨░╤В╨░ ╤Б╨▓╨╡╤В╨╛╨▓╨╜╨░ ╨▓╨╛╨╣╨╜╨░ ╨╡ ╨║╨╛╨╗╨╡╨║╤В╨╕╨▓╨╡╨╜ ╨┐╤А╨╛╨▓╨░╨╗ ╨╖╨░ ╤З╨╛╨▓╨╡╤З╨╡╤Б╤В╨▓╨╛╤В╨╛. "╨Ф╤Г╨╝╨╕╤В╨╡ ╤Б╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╨▒╤А╨╕╤В╨░╨╜╤Б╨║╨╕╤П ╨┐╨╕╤Б╨░╤В╨╡╨╗ ╨Ъ╤А╨╕╤Б ╨Ъ╨╗╨╕╨╣╨▓, ╨░ ╨╝╤П╤Б╤В╨╛╤В╨╛, ╨║╤К╨┤╨╡╤В╨╛ ╤Й╨╡ ╨│╨╕ ╨╜╨░╨╝╨╡╤А╨╕╤В╨╡, ╨╡ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨┤╨│╨╛╨▓╨╛╤А╤К╤В ╨╜╨░ ╤А╨╛╨╝╨░╨╜╨░ тАЮ╨Э╨░ ╤Б╨╝╨╡╨╗╨╕╤В╨╡ ╤Б╨╡ ╨┐╤А╨╛╤Й╨░╨▓╨░тАЬ (╨╕╨╖╨┤. тАЮICUтАЬ). ╨Ы╨╕╤З╨╜╨╛ ╨╖╨░ ╨╝╨╡╨╜ ╤В╨╛╨▓╨░ ╨┐╨╡╤А╤Д╨╡╨║╤В╨╜╨╛ ╤Д╨╛╤А╨╝╤Г╨╗╨╕╤А╨░╨╜╨╛ ╨┐╨╛╤Б╨╗╨░╨╜╨╕╨╡ ╨╡ ╨┐╨╛╨░╨╜╤В╨░╤В╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╨▓╤Б╤П╨║╨░ ╨║╨╜╨╕╨│╨░, ╨▓ ╤З╨╕╤П╤В╨╛ ╨╛╤Б╨╜╨╛╨▓╨░ ╤Б╤В╨╛╨╕ ╤В╨╡╨╝╨░╤В╨░ ╨╖╨░ ╨Т╤В╨╛╤А╨░╤В╨░ ╤Б╨▓╨╡╤В╨╛╨▓╨╜╨░ ╨▓╨╛╨╣╨╜╨░ (╨░ ╨╕ ╨▓╨╛╨╣╨╜╨░╤В╨░ ╨╕╨╖╨╛╨▒╤Й╨╛). ╨в╤А╨╡╤В╨╕╤П╤В ╤А╨╛╨╝╨░╨╜ ╨╜╨░ ╨Ъ╨╗╨╕╨╣╨▓, ╨╕╨╖╨┤╨░╨┤╨╡╨╜ ╨╜╨░ ╨▒╤К╨╗╨│╨░╤А╤Б╨║╨╕ (╤Б╨╗╨╡╨┤ тАЮ╨Ф╤А╤Г╨│╨░╤В╨░ ╤А╤К╨║╨░тАЬ ╨╕ тАЮ╨Т╤К╨╖╨┐╨╗╨░╨╝╨╡╨╜╤П╨▓╨░╨╜╨╡тАЬ), ╤Б╨╡ ╨╜╨░╤А╨╡╨╢╨┤╨░ ╤Б╤А╨╡╨┤ ╨╜╨░╨╣-╨╡╨╝╨╛╤Ж╨╕╨╛╨╜╨░╨╗╨╜╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╕ ╨╡╨╖╨╕╨║╨╛╨▓╨╛ ╨╕╨╖╤П╤Й╨╜╨╕ ╨┐╤А╨╛╨╕╨╖╨▓╨╡╨┤╨╡╨╜╨╕╤П, ╨┤╨╛ ╨║╨╛╨╕╤В╨╛ ╤Б╤К╨╝ ╨╕╨╝╨░╨╗╨░ ╤Й╨░╤Б╤В╨╕╨╡╤В╨╛ ╨┤╨░ ╤Б╨╡ ╨┤╨╛╨║╨╛╤Б╨╜╨░ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨╖ 2020 ╨│╨╛╨┤╨╕╨╜╨░. ╨Ф╤К╨╗╨▒╨╛╨║╨╛ ╨│╨╛ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨┐╨╛╤А╤К╤З╨▓╨░╨╝, ╨╜╨╛ ╨╝╨░╨║╨░╤А ╨┤╨░ ╨║╨╛╨┐╨╜╨╡╨╡╤Е ╨┤╨░ ╨▓╨╕ ╤Б╨┐╨╛╨┤╨╡╨╗╤П ╨╖╨░╤Й╨╛, ╨╛╤В╨╗╨░╨│╨░╤Е ╨┐╨╕╤Б╨░╨╜╨╡╤В╨╛ ╨╜╨░ ╤В╨╛╨▓╨░ ╤А╨╡╨▓╤О. ╨б╤В╤А╤Г╨▓╨░╤И╨╡ ╨╝╨╕ ╤Б╨╡ ╨╜╨╡╨┐╨╛╨╜╤П╤В╨╜╨╛ ╨┤╨░ ╤Б╤К╨▒╨╡╤А╨░ ╨╝╨╕╤Б╨╗╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╕ ╤З╤Г╨▓╤Б╤В╨▓╨░╤В╨░ ╤Б╨╕ ╨▓ ╤В╨╡╨║╤Б╤В, ╨║╨╛╨╣╤В╨╛ ╨┤╨░ ╨╜╨╡ ╨╜╨░╨┤╤Е╨▓╤К╤А╨╗╤П ╨┐╨╛ ╨╛╨▒╨╡╨╝ ╤Б╨░╨╝╨░╤В╨░ ╨║╨╜╨╕╨│╨░тАж ╨а╨╡╤И╨╕╤Е ╨▓╤Б╨╡ ╨┐╨░╨║ ╨┤╨░ ╨╛╨┐╨╕╤В╨░╨╝. ╨Ф╨╡╨╣╤Б╤В╨▓╨╕╨╡╤В╨╛ ╨▓ тАЮ╨Э╨░ ╤Б╨╝╨╡╨╗╨╕╤В╨╡ ╤Б╨╡ ╨┐╤А╨╛╤Й╨░╨▓╨░тАЬ ╤Б╨╡ ╤А╨░╨╖╨▓╨╕╨▓╨░ ╨▓ ╨┐╨╡╤А╨╕╨╛╨┤╨░ 1939 тАУ 1942 ╨│╨╛╨┤╨╕╨╜╨░, ╨▓ ╨▒╨╛╨╝╨▒╨░╤А╨┤╨╕╤А╨░╨╜╨╕╤П ╨Ы╨╛╨╜╨┤╨╛╨╜ ╨╕ ╨╛╨▒╤Б╨░╨┤╨╡╨╜╨░╤В╨░ ╨Ь╨░╨╗╤В╨░ ╨┐╨╛ ╨▓╤А╨╡╨╝╨╡ ╨╜╨░ ╨Т╤В╨╛╤А╨░╤В╨░ ╤Б╨▓╨╡╤В╨╛╨▓╨╜╨░ ╨▓╨╛╨╣╨╜╨░. ╨У╨╗╨░╨▓╨╜╨╕ ╨│╨╡╤А╨╛╨╕ ╤Б╨░ ╤З╨╡╤В╨╕╤А╨╕╨╝╨░╤В╨░ ╨┐╤А╨╕╤П╤В╨╡╨╗╨╕ ╨Ь╨╡╤А╨╕, ╨в╨╛╨╝, ╨Р╨╗╨╕╤Б╤В╤К╤А ╨╕ ╨е╨╕╨╗╨┤╨░, ╨░ ╨▓╤А╤К╨╖╨║╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨┐╨╛╨╝╨╡╨╢╨┤╤Г ╨╕╨╝ ╤Б╨╡ ╤А╨░╨╖╨▓╨╕╨▓╨░╤В тАУ ╨║╤К╨┤╨╡ ╨╛╤З╨░╨║╨▓╨░╨╜╨╛, ╨║╤К╨┤╨╡ ╨╜╨╡ тАУ ╨┤╨╛ ╨║╤А╨░╤П ╨╜╨░ ╤А╨╛╨╝╨░╨╜╨░. ╨Ь╨╡╤А╨╕ ╨Э╨╛╤А╤В ╨╡ ╤З╨░╤Б╤В ╨╛╤В ╨▒╨╛╨│╨░╤В╨░ ╤Д╨░╨╝╨╕╨╗╨╕╤П, ╨▒╨░╤Й╨░ ╤Э ╨╡ ╨┐╨╛╨╗╨╕╤В╨╕╨║, ╨░ ╨╝╨░╨╣╨║╨░ ╤Э ╨╡ ╨╛╨┐╨╕╤Б╨░╨╜╨░ ╨║╨░╤В╨╛ ╤Е╨╗╨░╨┤╨╡╨╜ ╨╕ ╤А╨░╨▓╨╜╨╛╨┤╤Г╤И╨╡╨╜ ╨║╤К╨╝ ╤Г╨╢╨░╤Б╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╜╨░ ╨▓╨╛╨╣╨╜╨░╤В╨░ ╨╕ ╨┐╤А╨╛╨▒╨╗╨╡╨╝╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╜╨░ ╤Б╨╛╨▒╤Б╤В╨▓╨╡╨╜╨░╤В╨░ ╤Б╨╕ ╨┤╤К╤Й╨╡╤А╤П ╤З╨╛╨▓╨╡╨║, ╤З╨╕╨╣╤В╨╛ ╨╛╤Б╨╜╨╛╨▓╨╡╨╜ ╤Б╤В╤А╨╡╨╝╨╡╨╢ ╨╡ ╨┤╨░ ╨┐╨╛╨┤╨┐╨╛╨╝╨░╨│╨░ ╨░╨╝╨▒╨╕╤Ж╨╕╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╜╨░ ╤Б╤К╨┐╤А╤Г╨│╨░ ╤Б╨╕. ╨Ь╨╡╤А╨╕ ╨╛╨▒╨░╤З╨╡ ╨╡ ╤З╤Г╨▓╤Б╤В╨▓╨╕╤В╨╡╨╗╨╜╨░ ╨╕ ╨╕╤Б╨║╨░ ╨┤╨░ ╨┐╨╛╤Б╤В╨╕╨│╨╜╨╡ ╨┐╨╛╨▓╨╡╤З╨╡ ╨╛╤В ╤В╨╛╨▓╨░ ╨┤╨░ ╤Б╨╡ ╨╛╨╝╤К╨╢╨╕ ╨╖╨░ ╨┐╨╛╨┤╤Е╨╛╨┤╤П╤Й╨╕╤П ╨╖╨░ ╨╜╨╡╤П (╤Б╨┐╤А╤П╨╝╨╛ ╨╛╨▒╤Й╨╡╤Б╤В╨▓╨╡╨╜╨╕╤В╨╡ ╤А╨░╨╖╨▒╨╕╤А╨░╨╜╨╕╤П) ╨║╨░╨╜╨┤╨╕╨┤╨░╤В. ╨Т╨╡╨┤╨╜╨░╨│╨░ ╤Б╨╗╨╡╨┤ ╨▓╨╛╨╣╨╜╨░╤В╨░ ╤В╤П ╤Б╨╡ ╨╖╨░╨┐╨╕╤Б╨▓╨░ ╨║╨░╤В╨╛ ╨┤╨╛╨▒╤А╨╛╨▓╨╛╨╗╨║╨░ ╨╕ ╨╖╨░╨┐╨╛╤З╨▓╨░ ╨┤╨░ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨┐╨╛╨┤╨░╨▓╨░ ╨▓ ╤Г╤З╨╕╨╗╨╕╤Й╨╡. ╨в╨░╨║╨░ ╤Б╨╡ ╨╖╨░╨┐╨╛╨╖╨╜╨░╨▓╨░ ╤Б ╨в╨╛╨╝, ╨▒╨╡╨┤╨╡╨╜ ╤Г╤З╨╕╤В╨╡╨╗ ╤Б ╨╜╨╡╨╛╤Б╨╛╨▒╨╡╨╜╨╛ ╨▓╨╕╤Б╨╛╨║╨╛ ╤Б╨░╨╝╨╛╤З╤Г╨▓╤Б╤В╨▓╨╕╨╡, ╨░ ╨┐╨╛-╨║╤К╤Б╨╜╨╛ ╨╕ ╤Б ╨╜╨╡╨│╨╛╨▓╨╕╤П ╨┐╤А╨╕╤П╤В╨╡╨╗ ╨Р╨╗╨╕╤Б╤В╤К╤А, ╤А╨╡╤Б╤В╨░╨▓╤А╨░╤В╨╛╤А ╨╜╨░ ╨║╨░╤А╤В╨╕╨╜╨╕. ╨е╨╕╨╗╨┤╨░ ╨┐╤К╨║ ╨╡ ╨╜╨░╨╣-╨▒╨╗╨╕╨╖╨║╨░╤В╨░ ╨┐╤А╨╕╤П╤В╨╡╨╗╨║╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╨Ь╨╡╤А╨╕, ╨╝╨░╨║╨░╤А ╨╕ ╨┤╨░╨╗╨╡╤З ╨┐╨╛-╤А╨░╨╖╨│╨╗╨╡╨╖╨╡╨╜╨░ ╨╕ ╨┐╨╛╨▓╤К╤А╤Е╨╜╨╛╤Б╤В╨╜╨░ ╨┐╨╛ ╤Е╨░╤А╨░╨║╤В╨╡╤А. ╨Т╨╛╨╣╨╜╨░╤В╨░ ╨┐╨╛╨│╨╗╤К╤Й╨░ ╨╕ ╤З╨╡╤В╨╕╤А╨╕╨╝╨░╤В╨░, ╨╜╨╡╨╖╨░╨▓╨╕╤Б╨╕╨╝╨╛ ╨┤╨░╨╗╨╕ ╨╕╨╖╨┐╨╕╤В╨▓╨░╤В ╨╜╨╡╨╛╨▒╤Е╨╛╨┤╨╕╨╝╨╛╤Б╤В ╨╕ ╨╛╤В╨│╨╛╨▓╨╛╤А╨╜╨╛╤Б╤В (╨║╨░╤В╨╛ ╨Ь╨╡╤А╨╕ ╨╕ ╨Р╨╗╨╕╤Б╤В╤К╤А) ╨┤╨░ ╤Б╨╡ ╨▓╨║╨╗╤О╤З╨░╤В ╨░╨║╤В╨╕╨▓╨╜╨╛. ╨Ф╨░ ╤Б╨╕ ╤З╨░╤Б╤В ╨╛╤В ╤В╤А╨░╨│╨╡╨┤╨╕╤П╤В╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╤Б╨▓╨╛╨╡╤В╨╛ ╨▓╤А╨╡╨╝╨╡ ╨╜╨╡ ╨╡ ╨▓╤К╨┐╤А╨╛╤Б ╨╜╨░ ╨╗╨╕╤З╨╡╨╜ ╨╕╨╖╨▒╨╛╤А. ╨ж╨╡╨╜╨╜╨╛╤Б╤В╤В╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╤Б╨▓╨╛╨▒╨╛╨┤╨╜╨░╤В╨░ ╨▓╨╛╨╗╤П ╤Б╨╡ ╨╛╨▒╨╡╨╖╤Б╨╝╨╕╤Б╨╗╤П, ╨░ ╨╡╨┤╨╕╨╜╤Б╤В╨▓╨╡╨╜╨╛╤В╨╛, ╨╜╨░ ╨║╨╛╨╡╤В╨╛ ╨╛╨▒╨╕╨║╨╜╨╛╨▓╨╡╨╜╨╕╤П╤В ╤З╨╛╨▓╨╡╨║ ╨╝╨╛╨╢╨╡ ╨┤╨░ ╨┐╨╛╨▓╨╗╨╕╤П╨╡, ╤Б╤П╨║╨░╤И ╨╡ ╤Б╨▓╨╡╨┤╨╡╨╜╨╛ ╨┤╨╛ ╨╝╨╕╨╜╨╕╨╝╤Г╨╝ ╨╜╨░ ╤Д╨╛╨╜╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╨╝╨░╤Й╨░╨▒╨╜╨░╤В╨░ ╨╢╨╡╤Б╤В╨╛╨║╨╛╤Б╤В. ╨Ш ╨▓╤К╨┐╤А╨╡╨║╨╕ ╤В╨╛╨▓╨░ ╨Ъ╨╗╨╕╨╣╨▓ ╨╕╨╖╨▒╨╕╤А╨░ ╨┤╨░ ╤Б╨╡ ╤Д╨╛╨║╤Г╤Б╨╕╤А╨░ ╤В╤К╨║╨╝╨╛ ╨▓╤К╤А╤Е╤Г ╨╕╨╖╨▒╨╛╤А╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╜╨░ ╨╛╨▒╨╕╨║╨╜╨╛╨▓╨╡╨╜╨╕╤П ╤З╨╛╨▓╨╡╨║, ╨▓╤К╤А╤Е╤Г ╨╜╨╡╨│╨╛╨▓╨░╤В╨░ ╨╗╨╕╤З╨╜╨░ ╤В╤А╨░╨╜╤Б╤Д╨╛╤А╨╝╨░╤Ж╨╕╤П ╨▓╤Б╨╗╨╡╨┤╤Б╤В╨▓╨╕╨╡ ╨╜╨░ ╨▓╤К╨┐╤А╨╛╤Б╨╜╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╕╨╖╨▒╨╛╤А╨╕ ╨╕ ╨▓ ╨╜╨╡╨╕╨╖╨▒╨╡╨╢╨╜╨╕╤П ╨║╨╛╨╜╤В╨╡╨║╤Б╤В ╨╜╨░ ╨▓╨╛╨╣╨╜╨░╤В╨░. тАЮ╨б╤В╤А╤Г╨▓╨░ ╨╝╨╕ ╤Б╨╡, ╤З╨╡ ╨║╨░╤В╨╛ ╨╕╨╖╨▒╤А╨░╤Е ╨┤╨░ ╨╖╨░╨╛╨▒╨╕╨║╨╛╨╗╤П ╨╜╤П╨║╨╛╨╕ ╨╛╤В ╨╜╨░╨╣-╨│╨╛╨╗╨╡╨╝╨╕╤В╨╡ ╤Г╨╢╨░╤Б╨╕ ╨╜╨░ ╨╡╨▓╤А╨╛╨┐╨╡╨╣╤Б╨║╨░╤В╨░ ╨▓╨╛╨╣╨╜╨░ тАУ ╨е╨╛╨╗╨╛╨║╨╛╤Б╤В╨░, ╨Ы╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╜╨│╤А╨░╨┤, ╨Ф╤А╨╡╨╖╨┤╨╡╨╜, тАУ ╨╖╨░ ╨┤╨░ ╨╕╨╖╤Б╨╗╨╡╨┤╨▓╨░╨╝ ╨╜╤О╨░╨╜╤Б╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨▓ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨╢╨╕╨▓╤П╨▓╨░╨╜╨╕╤П╤В╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╨╜╨╡╨╖╨╜╨░╤З╨╕╤В╨╡╨╗╨╜╨╕ ╨│╨╡╤А╨╛╨╕ ╨╜╨░ ╨▓╤В╨╛╤А╨╛╤Б╤В╨╡╨┐╨╡╨╜╨╜╨╕ ╤Д╤А╨╛╨╜╤В╨╛╨▓╨╡, ╤А╨╛╨╝╨░╨╜╤К╤В ╨│╤Г╨▒╨╕ ╨╝╨░╤Й╨░╨▒╨╜╨╛╤Б╤В, ╨╜╨╛ ╨┐╤К╨║ ╨┐╨╡╤З╨╡╨╗╨╕ ╨▓╨│╨╗╨╡╨╢╨┤╨░╨╜╨╡ ╨▓ ╨┤╨╡╤В╨░╨╣╨╗╨░тАЬ, ╨┐╨╕╤И╨╡ ╨Ъ╨╗╨╕╨╣╨▓ ╨╖╨░ ╨▒╤К╨╗╨│╨░╤А╤Б╨║╨╕╤П ╨┐╤А╨╡╨┤╨│╨╛╨▓╨╛╤А ╨╜╨░ ╤А╨╛╨╝╨░╨╜╨░. ╨б╨╕╨╗╨░╤В╨░ ╨╜╨░ тАЮ╨Э╨░ ╤Б╨╝╨╡╨╗╨╕╤В╨╡ ╤Б╨╡ ╨┐╤А╨╛╤Й╨░╨▓╨░тАЬ ╨╡ ╨╕╨╝╨╡╨╜╨╜╨╛ ╨▓ ╤В╨░╨╖╨╕ ╨╝╨╜╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨▓╨╜╨╕╨╝╨░╤В╨╡╨╗╨╜╨╛ ╨╕╨╖╨▓╨░╤П╨╜╨░ ╨┤╨╡╤В╨░╨╣╨╗╨╜╨╛╤Б╤В. ╨Ъ╨░╤В╨╛ ╨╕╤Б╤В╨╕╨╜╤Б╨║╨╕ ╨┐╤Б╨╕╤Е╨╛╨╗╨╛╨│ (╨║╨░╨║╤К╨▓╤В╨╛ ╨░╨▓╤В╨╛╤А╤К╤В ╨╡ ╨╕ ╨▓ ╨┤╨╡╨╣╤Б╤В╨▓╨╕╤В╨╡╨╗╨╜╨╛╤Б╤В) ╨Ъ╨╗╨╕╨╣╨▓ ╤А╨░╨╖╨║╤А╨╕╨▓╨░ ╨┐╨╗╨░╤Б╤В ╨┐╨╛ ╨┐╨╗╨░╤Б╤В ╨╜╨░╤Б╨╗╨╛╨╡╨╜╨░╤В╨░ ╨▒╨╛╨╗╨║╨░, ╤Б╤В╤А╨░╤Е╨╛╨▓╨╡╤В╨╡, ╨╗╨╕╨┐╤Б╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╕ ╤В╨╡╤А╨╖╨░╨╜╨╕╤П╤В╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╨│╨╡╤А╨╛╨╕╤В╨╡. ╨Ф╨╕╨░╨╗╨╛╨╖╨╕╤В╨╡ ╤Б╨░ ╤Б╤К╨▓╤К╤А╤И╨╡╨╜╨╕. ╨в╨╡ ╨╜╨╡ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨┤╨░╨▓╨░╤В ╤Б╨░╨╝╨╛ ╨╕╨╜╤Д╨╛╤А╨╝╨░╤Ж╨╕╤П ╨╖╨░ ╨╛╨▒╤Й╤Г╨▓╨░╨╜╨╡╤В╨╛, ╨░ ╨╛╨▒╨╛╨│╨░╤В╤П╨▓╨░╤В ╤П╤А╨║╨╛ ╨┐╤Б╨╕╤Е╨╛╨╗╨╛╨│╨╕╤П╤В╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╨┐╨╡╤А╤Б╨╛╨╜╨░╨╢╨╕╤В╨╡. ╨Ъ╨░╤А╨░╤В ╨╜╨╕ ╨┤╨░ ╤Г╤Б╨╡╤В╨╕╨╝ ╨╜╨╡╨┐╨╛╤Б╨╕╨╗╨╜╨╛╤В╨╛ ╨▒╤А╨╡╨╝╨╡, ╨║╨╛╨╡╤В╨╛ ╤В╨╡ ╤В╤А╤П╨▒╨▓╨░ ╨┤╨░ ╨┐╨╛╨╜╨╡╤Б╨░╤В тАУ ╨▓╤Б╨╡╨║╨╕ ╤Б╨┐╤А╤П╨╝╨╛ ╨▓╤К╤В╤А╨╡╤И╨╜╨╕╤В╨╡ ╤А╨╡╤Б╤Г╤А╤Б╨╕, ╤Б ╨║╨╛╨╕╤В╨╛ ╤А╨░╨╖╨┐╨╛╨╗╨░╨│╨░. ╨а╨╛╨╝╨░╨╜╤К╤В ╨╡ ╨╕╨╖╨║╨╗╤О╤З╨╕╤В╨╡╨╗╨╜╨╛ ╤Г╨▓╨╗╨╡╨║╨░╤В╨╡╨╗╨╡╨╜ ╨╕ ╤Б╨╡ ╤З╨╡╤В╨╡ ╨┤╨╛╤Б╤В╨░ ╨▒╤К╤А╨╖╨╛. ╨Ш ╨▓╤К╨┐╤А╨╡╨║╨╕ ╤В╨╛╨▓╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╨╝╨╜╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨╝╨╡╤Б╤В╨░ ╨╜╨░╨║╤К╤Б╨▓╨░╤Е ╤З╨╡╤В╨╡╨╜╨╡╤В╨╛ ╤Б╨╕, ╨╖╨░ ╨┤╨░ ╤Б╨╡ ╨▓╤К╤А╨╜╨░ ╨║╤К╨╝ ╨┤╨░╨┤╨╡╨╜ ╨╡╨╖╨╕╨║╨╛╨▓ ╤И╨╡╨┤╤М╨╛╨▓╤К╤А ╨╜╨░ ╨Ъ╤А╨╕╤Б ╨Ъ╨╗╨╕╨╣╨▓, ╨║╤К╨╝ ╤В╤К╨╜╨║╨╕╤П ╨╝╤Г ╨▒╤А╨╕╤В╨░╨╜╤Б╨║╨╕ ╤З╨╡╤А╨╡╨╜ ╤Е╤Г╨╝╨╛╤А ╨╕ ╨║╨░╨╗╨░╨╝╨▒╤Г╤А╨╕╤В╨╡, ╨║╨╛╨╕╤В╨╛ ╨┐╤А╨╕╨┤╨░╨▓╨░╤В ╨╜╨╛╨▓ ╤Б╨╝╨╕╤Б╤К╨╗ ╨╜╨░ ╨╜╨░╨│╨╗╨╡╨┤ ╨╛╨▒╨╕╨║╨╜╨╛╨▓╨╡╨╜╨░ ╨║╨╛╨╜╤Б╤В╤А╤Г╨║╤Ж╨╕╤П. ╨в╤Г╨║ ╨╜╨╡ ╨╝╨╛╨│╨░ ╨┤╨░ ╨╜╨╡ ╨╛╤В╨╗╨╕╤З╨░ ╨╕ ╨▓╨╡╨╗╨╕╨║╨╛╨╗╨╡╨┐╨╜╨╕╤П ╨┐╤А╨╡╨▓╨╛╨┤ ╨╜╨░ ╨Э╨╡╨▓╨╡╨╜╨░ ╨Ф╨╕╤И╨╗╨╕╨╡╨▓╨░-╨Ъ╤А╤К╤Б╤В╨╡╨▓╨░, ╨║╨╛╤П╤В╨╛ ╨╡ ╨┤╨╛╤Б╤В╨╕╨│╨╜╨░╨╗╨░ ╨╛╤Б╨╡╨╖╨░╨╡╨╝╨░ ╨╖╨░ ╤З╨╕╤В╨░╤В╨╡╨╗╤П ╨▓╨╕╤Б╨╛╤В╨░ ╨▓ ╤А╨░╨▒╨╛╤В╨░╤В╨░ ╤Б╨╕ ╨┐╨╛ ╤В╨░╨╖╨╕ ╨║╨╜╨╕╨│╨░. ╨Ч╨░ ╨╝╨╡╨╜ ╤З╨╡╤В╨╡╨╜╨╡╤В╨╛ ╨▒╨╡╤И╨╡ ╨╜╨╡ ╤Б╨░╨╝╨╛ ╤Г╨╝╤Б╤В╨▓╨╡╨╜╨╛, ╨░ ╨╕ ╤З╨╕╤Б╤В╨╛ ╨╡╤Б╤В╨╡╤В╨╕╤З╨╡╤Б╨║╨╛ ╤Г╨┤╨╛╨▓╨╛╨╗╤Б╤В╨▓╨╕╨╡. ╨Т╤К╨▓ ╨▓╨╕╨╖╤Г╨░╨╗╨╡╨╜ ╨░╤Б╨┐╨╡╨║╤В ╨┐╤К╨║ ╨╖╨░ ╨╜╨╡╨│╨╛ ╨┤╨╛╨┐╤А╨╕╨╜╨░╤Б╤П ╤Б╤В╤А╨░╤Е╨╛╤В╨╜╨░╤В╨░ ╨║╨╛╤А╨╕╤Ж╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╨Ц╨╕╨▓╨║╨╛ ╨Я╨╡╤В╤А╨╛╨▓. ╨Ь╨╛╨╢╨╡ ╨┤╨░ ╤Б╨╡ ╨║╨░╨╢╨╡, ╤З╨╡ тАЮ╨Э╨░ ╤Б╨╝╨╡╨╗╨╕╤В╨╡ ╤Б╨╡ ╨┐╤А╨╛╤Й╨░╨▓╨░тАЬ ╨╡ ╨╕ ╤А╨╛╨╝╨░╨╜ ╨╖╨░ ╨╗╤О╨▒╨╛╨▓╤В╨░. ╨Э╨░╨╣-╨╝╨░╨╗╨║╨╛╤В╨╛ ╨┐╨╛╤А╨░╨┤╨╕ ╤Д╨░╨║╤В╨░, ╤З╨╡ ╨▓╨┤╤К╤Е╨╜╨╛╨▓╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╡ ╨╖╨░ ENGLISH REVIEW Harlan Coben is an author that really is the king when it comes to writing a suspenseful thriller. I especially love his Myron Bolitar series. In Fool Me Once has Coben once again written an interesting story where nothing is at it seems. I instantly liked Maya and it was interesting to read about her trying to deal with being a single mother, an ex-soldier and to add to that a mystery, an impossible mystery. Her husband died, or did he? She must find out the truth and that means confronting her own past; her dismissal from the army, her sister's murder not long before her husband was murdered, and her husband's brothers death a couple of years ago. Could they be connected, or is everything just a coincidence? And, who can she trust, it seems that a lot of people around her have secrets. . . I read the book in a day. I thought I would just read one more chapter and then go back to sleep, and I ended up finishing the book. The twists in this book were not that astonishing as they have been in some of Coben's previous books, but it's still a page-turner. What I like about Coben's books are that I always like the main character and the mysteries are always intriguing. Fool Me Once is a very good book, and I particularly loved the last part of the book when everything started to come together. True, I was not astonished, but I did find the twists in the book well-done and satisfying. I recommend reading Harlan Coben's books if you like page-turning thrillers with lots of twist and turns. -- Review in language other than English--
O carte buna a lui John Grisham pe care am citit-o cu placere, bucurandu-ma de imensa experienta a autorului in practica judiciara din America. Sebastian Rudd este un avocat iesit din tipare, un adevarat excentric ce preia cazuri pe care alti avocati nu le-ar lua niciodata. Cu un simt al dreptatii iesit din comun, este gata sa joace atat corect, cat si murdar atunci cand e nevoie, pentru ca dreptatea sa fie infaptuita. Desi multa lume considera ca este un roman mai slab al lui Grisham, catalogandu-l uneori ca o serie de short stories, eu cred ca este doar diferit prin multitudinea de cazuri prezentate si prin solutionarea lor mai rapida, fata de romanele in care ne este infatisat un singur caz ce abunda in detalii si rasturnari de situatie. De foarte multe ori am rezonat cu amaraciunea avocatului fata de nedreptatile comise de sistemul judiciar si de catre politie si chiar sunt convinsa ca, pentru anumite cazuri, autorul s-a inspirat din realitate.

Eerder heb ik al twee boeken van deze auteur gelezen, maar deze viel me zo tegen dat ik dus niet verder dan 150 blz ben gekomen. Ik snap dat je als auteur je personages helemaal uitdenkt met een uitgebreid verleden en alles. Maar ik hoef die hele dossiers niet als infodump over me uitgestort te krijgen. En al helemaal niet aan het begin van het boek, als ik nog geen emotionele band met de personages heb. Want die krijg ik hier ook niet van. Daarnaast vind ik de gesprekken gemaakt diepgaand, echt heel geschreven. Ik zie het nog niet zo snel zo gebeuren. Zou natuurlijk kunnen, maar in combinatie met de enorme hoeveelheid achtergrondinformatie vind ik er gewoon niet doorheen te komen. Het is vast een mooi plot. Maar het duurt me te lang om het zo te lezen, ik wacht wel op een film ;)

-- Review in language other than English--
With collections of short stories, the impression is rarely uniform, even if the author is Stephen King, who is "our everything" in your table of ranks. Talking about the collection, it is more correct to briefly describe each item in its composition. "Mile 81". The topic of the septic tank, which is significant for King, is half a spontaneous landfill, half an abandoned place where some unpleasant life continues to swirl. A teenager goes to one of these, performing an initiation ceremony accepted by local youth: to get to where the elders are hanging out, to take out some thing as proof of his presence. A monster from another dimension materializes there, disguised as a monstrously dirty minibus. They will meet, but many terrible events will happen first. Harmony Premium. A married couple, childless, not old yet, but both have already had enough of each other, and money is not that good. Here is a house, it recently turned out, they cannot afford, they will have to sell, move to some cramped apartment, in which it is not at all clear how they will have to get along: he's with his cigarettes (for the sake of economy, he orders through a friend in a neighboring state, it's cheaper there). She is addicted to sweets (which made her fat and ugly). And even this Bizniz, a Jack Russell terrier, which he gave her and now the dog is dearer to her than anything else. They go to Vollmart for lawn grass - to give a corrupt look to the house, and they habitually dog, not knowing how everything will change for them in half an hour. "Batman and Robin get into an altercation. " The story is about Robin, who has grown up and managed to grow old, who still carries in his soul love for his completely decrepit and crazy, but alive Batman. And about how unexpectedly the background of the parental act that struck you to the heart with enthusiastic admiration is revealed to you. It turns out that you were the tenth case in all of this. It's unexpectedly painful, despite the decades that have separated. But love does not cancel, it is a part of you. And the desire to look worthy of his friendship in his father's eyes. Yes, he really is your Batman. A dirty old man's diaper and admiration for a real man. ╨б╤В╨╕╨▓╨╡╨╜ ╨Ъ╨╕╨╜╨│ ╤Б╤В╤А╨╡╨╗╤П╨╡╤В ╨╛╤В ╨▒╨╡╨┤╤А╨░ ╨╕ ╨▓╨╗╨░╨┤╨╡╨╡╤В ╤Б╨╛╨▒╨╛╨╣╨Ш╤Б╤В╨╛╤А╨╕╨╕ ╨╜╨░ ╤Г╨┤╨╕╨▓╨╗╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╡ ╨┐╨╛╤Е╨╛╨╢╨╕ ╨╜╨░ ╤Б╨╜╤Л. ╨п ╨╕╨╜╨╛╨│╨┤╨░ ╨┤╤Г╨╝╨░╤О, ╤З╤В╨╛ ╤Б╨▒╨╛╤А╨╜╨╕╨║ ╤А╨░╤Б╤Б╨║╨░╨╖╨╛╨▓ тАУ ╨╜╨╡╨║╨╛╨╡ ╨┐╨╛╨┤╨╛╨▒╨╕╨╡ ╨┤╨╜╨╡╨▓╨╜╨╕╨║╨░ ╤Б╨╜╨╛╨▓ ╨╕ ╨╕╤Е ╤В╨╛╨╗╨║╨╛╨▓╨░╨╜╨╕╨╣, ╨┐╨╛╨┐╤Л╤В╨║╨░ ╨┐╨╛╨╣╨╝╨░╤В╤М ╨┐╨╛╨┤╤Б╨╛╨╖╨╜╨░╤В╨╡╨╗╤М╨╜╤Л╨╡ ╨╛╨▒╤А╨░╨╖╤Л, ╨┐╤А╨╡╨╢╨┤╨╡ ╤З╨╡╨╝ ╨╛╨╜╨╕ ╨╛╨║╨╛╨╜╤З╨░╤В╨╡╨╗╤М╨╜╨╛ ╤А╨░╤Б╤В╨░╤О╤В╨б╨╛ ╤Б╨▒╨╛╤А╨╜╨╕╨║╨░╨╝╨╕ ╤А╨░╤Б╤Б╨║╨░╨╖╨╛╨▓ ╨▓╨┐╨╡╤З╨░╤В╨╗╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╡ ╤А╨╡╨┤╨║╨╛ ╨▒╤Л╨▓╨░╨╡╤В ╨╛╨┤╨╜╨╛╤А╨╛╨┤╨╜╤Л╨╝, ╨┤╨░╨╢╨╡ ╨▓ ╤Б╨╗╤Г╤З╨░╨╡, ╨╡╤Б╨╗╨╕ ╨░╨▓╤В╨╛╤А╨╛╨╝ ╨▓╤Л╤Б╤В╤Г╨┐╨░╨╡╤В ╨б╤В╨╕╨▓╨╡╨╜ ╨Ъ╨╕╨╜╨│, ╨║╨╛╤В╨╛╤А╤Л╨╣ ╨▓ ╤В╨▓╨╛╨╡╨╣ ╤В╨░╨▒╨╡╨╗╨╕ ╨╛ ╤А╨░╨╜╨│╨░╤Е "╨╜╨░╤И╨╡ ╨▓╤Б╨╡". ╨а╨░╤Б╤Б╨║╨░╨╖╤Л╨▓╨░╤П ╨╛ ╤Б╨▒╨╛╤А╨╜╨╕╨║╨╡, ╨┐╤А╨░╨▓╨╕╨╗╤М╨╜╨╡╨╡ ╨║╨╛╤А╨╛╤В╨║╨╛ ╨╛╤Е╨░╤А╨░╨║╤В╨╡╤А╨╕╨╖╨╛╨▓╨░╤В╤М ╨║╨░╨╢╨┤╤Г╤О ╨▓╨╡╤Й╤М ╨▓ ╨╡╨│╨╛ ╤Б╨╛╤Б╤В╨░╨▓╨╡. "╨Ь╨╕╨╗╤П 81". ╨Ч╨╜╨░╤З╨╕╨╝╨░╤П ╨┤╨╗╤П ╨Ъ╨╕╨╜╨│╨░ ╤В╨╡╨╝╨░ ╨╛╤В╤Б╤В╨╛╨╣╨╜╨╕╨║╨░ - ╨╜╨░╨┐╨╛╨╗╨╛╨▓╨╕╨╜╤Г ╤Б╤В╨╕╤Е╨╕╨╣╨╜╨╛╨╣ ╤Б╨▓╨░╨╗╨║╨╕, ╨╜╨░╨┐╨╛╨╗╨╛╨▓╨╕╨╜╤Г ╨╖╨░╨▒╤А╨╛╤И╨╡╨╜╨╜╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨╝╨╡╤Б╤В╨░, ╨│╨┤╨╡ ╨┐╤А╨╛╨┤╨╛╨╗╨╢╨░╨╡╤В ╨║╨╗╤Г╨▒╨╕╤В╤М╤Б╤П ╨║╨░╨║╨░╤П-╤В╨╛ ╨╜╨╡╨┐╤А╨╕╤П╤В╨╜╨░╤П ╨╢╨╕╨╖╨╜╤М. ╨Т ╨╛╨┤╨╕╨╜ ╨╕╨╖ ╤В╨░╨║╨╕╤Е ╨╛╤В╨┐╤А╨░╨▓╨╗╤П╨╡╤В╤Б╤П ╨┐╨╛╨┤╤А╨╛╤Б╤В╨╛╨║, ╤Б╨╛╨▓╨╡╤А╤И╨░╤П ╨┐╤А╨╕╨╜╤П╤В╤Л╨╣ ╤Г ╨╝╨╡╤Б╤В╨╜╨╛╨╣ ╨╝╨╛╨╗╨╛╨┤╨╡╨╢╨╕ ╨╛╨▒╤А╤П╨┤ ╨╕╨╜╨╕╤Ж╨╕╨░╤Ж╨╕╨╕: ╨┐╤А╨╛╨▒╤А╨░╤В╤М╤Б╤П, ╤В╤Г╨┤╨░, ╨│╨┤╨╡ ╤В╤Г╤Б╤П╤В ╤Б╤В╨░╤А╤И╨╕╨╡, ╨▓╤Л╨╜╨╡╤Б╤В╨╕ ╨▓ ╨┤╨╛╨║╨░╨╖╨░╤В╨╡╨╗╤М╤Б╤В╨▓╨╛ ╤Б╨▓╨╛╨╡╨│╨╛ ╨┐╤А╨╕╤Б╤Г╤В╤Б╤В╨▓╨╕╤П ╨║╨░╨║╤Г╤О-╨╜╨╕╨▒╤Г╨┤╤М ╨▓╨╡╤Й╤М. ╨в╨░╨╝ ╨╢╨╡ ╨╝╨░╤В╨╡╤А╨╕╨░╨╗╨╕╨╖╤Г╨╡╤В╤Б╤П ╨╝╨╛╨╜╤Б╤В╤А ╨╕╨╖ ╨┤╤А╤Г╨│╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨╕╨╖╨╝╨╡╤А╨╡╨╜╨╕╤П, ╨╖╨░╨╝╨░╤Б╨║╨╕╤А╨╛╨▓╨░╨╜╨╜╤Л╨╣ ╨┐╨╛╨┤ ╤З╤Г╨┤╨╛╨▓╨╕╤Й╨╜╨╛ ╨│╤А╤П╨╖╨╜╤Л╨╣ ╨╝╨╕╨║╤А╨╛╨░╨▓╤В╨╛╨▒╤Г╤Б. ╨Ю╨╜╨╕ ╨▓╤Б╤В╤А╨╡╤В╤П╤В╤Б╤П, ╨╜╨╛ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨╢╨┤╨╡ ╨┐╤А╨╛╨╕╨╖╨╛╨╣╨┤╨╡╤В ╨╝╨╜╨╛╨╢╨╡╤Б╤В╨▓╨╛ ╤Б╤В╤А╨░╤И╨╜╤Л╤Е ╤Б╨╛╨▒╤Л╤В╨╕╨╣. "╨У╨░╤А╨╝╨╛╨╜╨╕╤П ╨┐╤А╨╡╨╝╨╕╤Г╨╝". ╨б╤Г╨┐╤А╤Г╨╢╨╡╤Б╨║╨░╤П ╨┐╨░╤А╨░, ╨▒╨╡╨╖╨┤╨╡╤В╨╜╤Л, ╨╡╤Й╨╡ ╨╜╨╡ ╤Б╤В╨░╤А╤Л, ╨╜╨╛ ╤Г╨╢╨╡ ╨╛╨▒╨░ ╤Г╤Б╨┐╨╡╨╗╨╕ ╨╛╤Б╤В╨╛╤З╨╡╤А╤В╨╡╤В╤М ╨┤╤А╤Г╨│ ╨┤╤А╤Г╨│╤Г, ╨╕ ╤Б ╨┤╨╡╨╜╤М╨│╨░╨╝╨╕ ╨╜╨╡ ╤В╨╛, ╤З╤В╨╛╨▒╤Л ╨╛╤З╨╡╨╜╤М ╤Е╨╛╤А╨╛╤И╨╛. ╨Т╨╛╤В ╨┤╨╛╨╝, ╨╜╨╡╨┤╨░╨▓╨╜╨╛ ╨▓╤Л╤П╤Б╨╜╨╕╨╗╨╛╤Б╤М, ╨╜╨╡ ╨┐╨╛ ╨║╨░╤А╨╝╨░╨╜╤Г ╨╕╨╝, ╨┐╤А╨╕╨┤╨╡╤В╤Б╤П ╨┐╤А╨╛╨┤╨░╤В╤М, ╨┐╨╡╤А╨╡╨╡╤Е╨░╤В╤М ╨▓ ╨║╨░╨║╤Г╤О-╨╜╨╕╨▒╤Г╨┤╤М ╤В╨╡╤Б╨╜╤Г╤О ╨║╨▓╨░╤А╤В╨╕╤А╨║╤Г, ╨▓ ╨║╨╛╤В╨╛╤А╨╛╨╣ ╨▓╨╛╨▓╤Б╨╡ ╨╜╨╡╨┐╨╛╨╜╤П╤В╨╜╨╛ ╨║╨░╨║ ╨┐╤А╨╕╨┤╨╡╤В╤Б╤П ╤Г╨╢╨╕╨▓╨░╤В╤М╤Б╤П: ╨╛╨╜ ╤Б╨╛ ╤Б╨▓╨╛╨╕╨╝╨╕ ╤Б╨╕╨│╨░╤А╨╡╤В╨░╨╝╨╕ (╤А╨░╨┤╨╕ ╤Н╨║╨╛╨╜╨╛╨╝╨╕╨╕ ╨╖╨░╨║╨░╨╖╤Л╨▓╨░╨╡╤В ╤З╨╡╤А╨╡╨╖ ╨┐╤А╨╕╤П╤В╨╡╨╗╤П ╨▓ ╤Б╨╛╤Б╨╡╨┤╨╜╨╡╨╝ ╤И╤В╨░╤В╨╡, ╤В╨░╨╝ ╨┤╨╡╤И╨╡╨▓╨╗╨╡). ╨Ю╨╜╨░ ╤Б ╨┐╤А╨╕╤Б╤В╤А╨░╤Б╤В╨╕╨╡╨╝ ╨║ ╤Б╨╗╨░╨┤╨╛╤Б╤В╤П╨╝ (╨╛╤В ╨║╨╛╤В╨╛╤А╤Л╤Е ╤А╨░╤Б╨┐╨╛╨╗╨╜╨╡╨╗╨░ ╨╕ ╨┐╨╛╨┤╤Г╤А╨╜╨╡╨╗╨░). ╨Ф╨░ ╨╡╤Й╨╡ ╨С╨╕╨╖╨╜╨╕╨╖ ╤Н╤В╨╛╤В, ╨┤╨╢╨╡╨║-╤А╨░╤Б╤Б╨╡╨╗ ╤В╨╡╤А╤М╨╡╤А, ╨║╨╛╤В╨╛╤А╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨╛╨╜ ╨┐╨╛╨┤╨░╤А╨╕╨╗ ╨╡╨╣ ╨╕ ╤В╨╡╨┐╨╡╤А╤М ╨┐╤Б╨╕╨╜╨║╨░ ╨┤╨╛╤А╨╛╨╢╨╡ ╨▓╤Б╨╡╨│╨╛ ╨╡╨╣. ╨Х╨┤╤Г╤В ╨▓ ╨Т╨╛╨╗╨╗╨╝╨░╤А╤В ╨╖╨░ ╨│╨░╨╖╨╛╨╜╨╜╨╛╨╣ ╤В╤А╨░╨▓╨╛╨╣ - ╨┐╤А╨╕╨┤╨░╤В╤М ╨┐╤А╨╛╨┤╨░╨╢╨╜╤Л╨╣ ╨▓╨╕╨┤ ╨┤╨╛╨╝╤Г, ╨╕ ╨┐╤А╨╕╨▓╤Л╤З╨╜╨╛ ╤Б╨╛╨▒╨░╤З╨░╤В╤Б╤П, ╨╜╨╡ ╨╖╨╜╨░╤П, ╨║╨░╨║ ╨▓╤Б╨╡ ╨┤╨╗╤П ╨╜╨╕╤Е ╨╕╨╖╨╝╨╡╨╜╨╕╤В╤Б╤П ╤З╨╡╤А╨╡╨╖ ╨┐╨╛╨╗╤З╨░╤Б╨░. "╨С╤Н╤В╨╝╨╡╨╜ ╨╕ ╨а╨╛╨▒╨╕╨╜ ╨▓╤Б╤В╤Г╨┐╨░╤О╤В ╨▓ ╨┐╨╡╤А╨╡╨▒╤А╨░╨╜╨║╤Г" . ╨а╨░╤Б╤Б╨║╨░╨╖ ╨╛ ╨▓╤Л╤А╨╛╤Б╤И╨╡╨╝ ╨╕ ╤Г╤Б╨┐╨╡╨▓╤И╨╡╨╝ ╤Б╨╛╤Б╤В╨░╤А╨╕╤В╤М╤Б╤П ╨а╨╛╨▒╨╕╨╜╨╡, ╨║╨╛╤В╨╛╤А╤Л╨╣ ╨▓╤Б╨╡ ╨╜╨╡╤Б╨╡╤В ╨▓ ╨┤╤Г╤И╨╡ ╨╗╤О╨▒╨╛╨▓╤М ╨║ ╤Б╨▓╨╛╨╡╨╝╤Г ╤Б╨╛╨▓╨╡╤А╤И╨╡╨╜╨╜╨╛ ╤Г╨╢╨╡ ╨┤╤А╤П╤Е╨╗╨╛╨╝╤Г ╨╕ ╨▓╤Л╨╢╨╕╨▓╤И╨╡╨╝╤Г ╨╕╨╖ ╤Г╨╝╨░, ╨╜╨╛ ╨╢╨╕╨▓╨╛╨╝╤Г ╨С╤Н╤В╨╝╨╡╨╜╤Г. ╨Ш ╨╛ ╤В╨╛╨╝, ╨║╨░╨║ ╨╜╨╡╨╛╨╢╨╕╨┤╨░╨╜╨╜╨╛ ╨╛╤В╨║╤А╤Л╨▓╨░╨╡╤В╤Б╤П ╤В╨╡╨▒╨╡ ╨┐╨╛╨┤╨╛╨┐╨╗╨╡╨║╨░ ╨┐╨╛╤А╨░╨╖╨╕╨▓╤И╨╡╨│╨╛ ╤В╨╡╨▒╤П ╨▓ ╤Б╨░╨╝╨╛╨╡ ╤Б╨╡╤А╨┤╤Ж╨╡ ╨▓╨╛╤Б╤В╨╛╤А╨╢╨╡╨╜╨╜╤Л╨╝ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨║╨╗╨╛╨╜╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╡╨╝ ╤А╨╛╨┤╨╕╤В╨╡╨╗╤М╤Б╨║╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨┐╨╛╤Б╤В╤Г╨┐╨║╨░. ╨Т╤Л╤П╤Б╨╜╤П╨╡╤В╤Б╤П, ╤З╤В╨╛ ╤В╤Л ╨▓╨╛╨╛╨▒╤Й╨╡ ╨▒╤Л╨╗ ╨▓╨╛ ╨▓╤Б╨╡╨╝ ╤Н╤В╨╛╨╝ ╨┤╨╡╨╗╨╛╨╝ ╨┤╨╡╤Б╤П╤В╤Л╨╝. ╨н╤В╨╛ ╨╜╨╡╨╛╨╢╨╕╨┤╨░╨╜╨╜╨╛ ╨▒╨╛╨╗╤М╨╜╨╛, ╨╜╨╡╤Б╨╝╨╛╤В╤А╤П ╨╜╨░ ╨╛╤В╨┤╨╡╨╗╨╕╨▓╤И╨╕╨╡ ╨┤╨╡╤Б╤П╤В╨╕╨╗╨╡╤В╨╕╤П. ╨Э╨╛ ╨╗╤О╨▒╨▓╨╕ ╨╜╨╡ ╨╛╤В╨╝╨╡╨╜╤П╨╡╤В, ╨╛╨╜╨░ - ╤З╨░╤Б╤В╤М ╤В╨╡╨▒╤П. ╨Ш ╨╢╨╡╨╗╨░╨╜╨╕╤П ╨▓╤Л╨│╨╗╤П╨┤╨╡╤В╤М ╨▓ ╨╛╤В╤Ж╨╛╨▓╤Б╨║╨╕╤Е ╨│╨╗╨░╨╖╨░╤Е ╨┤╨╛╤Б╤В╨╛╨╣╨╜╤Л╨╝ ╨╡╨│╨╛ ╨┤╤А╤Г╨╢╨▒╤Л. ╨Ф╨░, ╨╛╨╜ ╨┤╨╡╨╣╤Б╤В╨▓╨╕╤В╨╡╨╗╤М╨╜╨╛ ╤В╨▓╨╛╨╣ ╨С╤Н╤В╨╝╨╡╨╜. ╨Ю╨▒╨╝╨░╤А╨░╨╜╨╜╤Л╨╣ ╤Б╤В╨░╤А╨╕╨║╨╛╨▓╤Б╨║╨╕╨╣ ╨┐╨╛╨┤╨│╤Г╨╖╨╜╨╕╨║ ╨╕ ╨▓╨╛╤Б╤Е╨╕╤Й╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╡ ╨╜╨░╤Б╤В╨╛╤П╤Й╨╕╨╝ ╨╝╤Г╨╢╨╕╨║╨╛╨╝. "╨Ф╤О╨╜╨░" "╨Я╤А╨╡╨┤╤З╤Г╨▓╤Б╤В╨▓╨╕╨╡ ╨║╨╛╨╜╤Ж╨░", "╨▓╨╛ ╨╝╨╜╨╛╨│╨╛╨╝ ╨╖╨╜╨░╨╜╨╕╨╕ ╨╝╨╜╨╛╨│╨╕╤П ╨┐╨╡╤З╨░╨╗╨╕" ╨╕ ╨║╤В╨╛ ╨▒╤А╨╡╨╡╤В ╨▒╤А╨░╨┤╨╛╨▒╤А╨╡╤П". ╨б╤В╨░╤А╤Л╨╣ ╨╛╤В╤Б╤В╨░╨▓╨╜╨╛╨╣ ╤Б╤Г╨┤╤М╤П ╨╛╨▒╨╜╨░╤А╤Г╨╢╨╕╨╗ ╤Н╤В╤Г ╨┐╨╡╤Б╤З╨░╨╜╤Г╤О ╨┤╤О╨╜╤Г, ╨│╨┤╨╡ ╨╝╨╕╤Б╤В╨╕╤З╨╡╤Б╨║╨╕╨╝ ╨╛╨▒╤А╨░╨╖╨╛╨╝ ╨┐╨╛╤П╨▓╨╗╤П╤О╤В╤Б╤П ╨╕╨╝╨╡╨╜╨░ ╨╗╤О╨┤╨╡╨╣, ╨║╨╛╤В╨╛╤А╤Л╨╝ ╨▓╤Б╨║╨╛╤А╨╡ ╤Б╤Г╨╢╨┤╨╡╨╜╨╛ ╤Г╨╝╨╡╤А╨╡╤В╤М, ╨╡╤Й╨╡ ╨╝╨░╨╗╤М╤З╨╕╤И╨║╨╛╨╣. ╨Ш ╨▓╨╛╤В, ╨┤╨╡╨╜╤М, ╨║╨╛╨│╨┤╨░ ╨▓ ╨┐╨╡╤Б╨║╨╡ ╨▓╨╛╨╖╨╜╨╕╨║╨╜╨╡╤В ╨╡╨│╨╛ ╨╕╨╝╤П, ╨┐╨╛╤Е╨╛╨╢╨╡ ╨╜╨╡ ╨╖╨░ ╨│╨╛╤А╨░╨╝╨╕. "╨У╨░╨┤╨║╨╕╨╣ ╨╝╨░╨╗╤М╤З╨╕╤И╨║╨░". ╨Ь╤Г╨╢╨╕╨║╨░ ╤Б╤Г╨┤╤П╤В ╨╖╨░ ╤Г╨▒╨╕╨╣╤Б╤В╨▓╨╛ ╤А╨╡╨▒╨╡╨╜╨║╨░. ╨Ю╨╜ ╨╖╨░╤Б╤В╤А╨╡╨╗╨╕╨╗ ╤А╤Л╨╢╨╡╨│╨╛ ╨╝╨░╨╗╤М╤З╨╕╤И╨║╤Г ╨┐╤А╨╕ ╨▒╨╛╨╗╤М╤И╨╛╨╝ ╤Б╨║╨╛╨┐╨╗╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╕ ╨╜╨░╤А╨╛╨┤╨░, ╨▓╤Л╤Б╨░╨┤╨╕╨╗ ╨▓╤Б╤О ╨╛╨▒╨╛╨╣╨╝╤Г ╨╕ ╤В╨╡╨┐╨╡╤А╤М ╨╛╨╢╨╕╨┤╨░╨╡╤В ╤Б╨╝╨╡╤А╤В╨╜╨╛╨╣ ╨║╨░╨╖╨╜╨╕. ╨а╨░╤Б╤Б╨║╨░╨╖╤Л╨▓╨░╤П ╤Б╨▓╨╛╨╡╨╝╤Г ╨░╨┤╨▓╨╛╨║╨░╤В╤Г ╨║╨░╨║ ╨┤╨╛╤И╨╡╨╗ ╨┤╨╛ ╨╢╨╕╨╖╨╜╨╕ (╨╕ ╤Б╨╝╨╡╤А╤В╨╕) ╤В╨░╨║╨╛╨╣. ╨Ш ╤З╨╕╤В╨░╤П, ╤В╤Л ╨┐╤А╨░╨║╤В╨╕╤З╨╡╤Б╨║╨╕ ╤Г╨▓╨╡╤А╨╡╨╜╨░, ╤З╤В╨╛ ╤Г ╨╜╨╡╤Б╤З╨░╤Б╤В╨╜╨╛╨│╨╛ ╤Г╨▒╨╕╨╣╤Ж╤Л ╤З╤В╨╛-╤В╨╛ ╨┐╨░╤А╨░╨╜╨╛╨╕╨┤╨░╨╗╤М╨╜╨╛╨╡ ╨╕╨╗╨╕ ╤И╨╕╨╖╨╛╤Д╤А╨╡╨╜╨╕╤З╨╡╤Б╨║╨╛╨╡. ╨в╨╛╨╗╤М╨║╨╛ ╨▓╨╛╤В, ╨┐╨╛╤З╨╡╨╝╤Г ╨╝╨░╨╗╤М╤З╨╕╨║ ╨┤╨╛ ╤Б╨╕╤Е ╨┐╨╛╤А ╨╜╨╡ ╨╛╨┐╨╛╨╖╨╜╨░╨╜?"╨б╨╝╨╡╤А╤В╤М" ╨Х╤Й╨╡ ╨╛╨┤╨╕╨╜ ╤Б╤Г╨┤ ╨╖╨░ ╤Г╨▒╨╕╨╣╤Б╤В╨▓╨╛ ╤А╨╡╨▒╨╡╨╜╨║╨░, ╨╜╨░ ╤Б╨╡╨╣ ╤А╨░╨╖ ╨╜╨░ ╨Ф╨╕╨║╨╛╨╝ ╨Ч╨░╨┐╨░╨┤╨╡. ╨Я╨╛╨│╨╕╨▒╨╗╨░, ╨░ ╨┐╨╡╤А╨╡╨┤ ╤Б╨╝╨╡╤А╤В╤М╤О ╨▒╤Л╨╗╨░ ╨╕╨╖╨╜╨░╤Б╨╕╨╗╨╛╨▓╨░╨╜╨░ ╨╕ ╨╛╨│╤А╨░╨▒╨╗╨╡╨╜╨░ ╨┤╨╡╨▓╨╛╤З╨║╨░, ╨╕ ╨╜╨╕╨║╤В╨╛ ╨▓ ╨│╨╛╤А╨╛╨┤╨║╨╡ ╨╜╨╡ ╤Б╨╛╨╝╨╜╨╡╨▓╨░╨╡╤В╤Б╤П, ╤З╤В╨╛ ╤Н╤В╨╛ ╤Б╨┤╨╡╨╗╨░╨╗ ╨╝╨╡╤Б╤В╨╜╤Л╨╣ ╨╝╨╡╤А╨╖╨░╨▓╨╡╤Ж ╨╕ ╨▒╨╡╨╖╨┤╨╡╨╗╤М╨╜╨╕╨║. ╨Ю╨┤╨╜╨░ ╨╖╨░╨║╨░╨▓╤Л╨║╨░, ╤Г╨╗╨╕╨║╨░ - ╤Г╨║╤А╨░╨┤╨╡╨╜╨╜╤Л╨╣ ╤Г ╨╢╨╡╤А╤В╨▓╤Л ╤Б╨╡╤А╨╡╨▒╤А╤П╨╜╤Л╨╣ ╨┤╨╛╨╗╨╗╨░╤А ╤В╨░╨║ ╨╕ ╨╜╨╡ ╨▒╤Л╨╗ ╨╜╨░╨╣╨┤╨╡╨╜, ╨░ ╨┤╨╗╤П ╤В╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨▓╤А╨╡╨╝╨╡╨╜╨╕ ╨┤╨╡╨╜╤М╨│╨╕ ╨╜╨╡╨╝╨░╨╗╤Л╨╡, ╨┤╨░ ╨╕ ╨╝╨╛╨╜╨╡╤В╨░ ╤Б╨░╨╝╨░ ╨┐╨╛ ╤Б╨╡╨▒╨╡ ╨╜╨╡ ╤В╨╛, ╤З╤В╨╛╨▒╤Л ╨╝╨╡╨╗╨║╨░╤П. ╨б╨┐╤А╤П╤В╨░╤В╤М ╨╡╨╡ ╨╛╨╜ ╨╜╨╡ ╨╝╨╛╨│, ╨╛╨▒╤Л╤Б╨║╨╕ ╨╜╨╡ ╨┤╨░╨╗╨╕ ╤А╨╡╨╖╤Г╨╗╤М╤В╨░╤В╨░, ╨▓╨╕╨╜╤Г ╤Б╨▓╨╛╤О ╨╛╤В╤А╨╕╤Ж╨░╨╡╤В. ╨Ш ╤И╨╡╤А╨╕╤Д ╤Б╨╛╨╝╨╜╨╡╨▓╨░╨╡╤В╤Б╤П, ╨╜╨╡ ╨║╨░╨╖╨╜╤П╤В ╨╗╨╕ ╨│╨╛╤А╨╛╨╢╨░╨╜╨╡ ╨╜╨╡╨▓╨╕╨╜╨╛╨▓╨╜╨╛╨│╨╛?"╨е╤А╨░╨╝ ╨╕╨╖ ╨║╨╛╤Б╤В╨╡╨╣". ╨Т╤Б╤П ╨╗╤О╨▒╨╛╨▓╤М ╨║ ╨б╤В╨╕╨▓╨╡╨╜╤Г ╨Ъ╨╕╨╜╨│╤Г ╨╜╨╡ ╨╖╨░╤Б╤В╨░╨▓╨╕╤В ╨╝╨╡╨╜╤П ╨┐╨╛╨╜╨╕╨╝╨░╤В╤М ╨╕ ╨╗╤О╨▒╨╕╤В╤М ╨╡╨│╨╛ ╨┐╨╛╤Н╤В╨╕╤З╨╡╤Б╨║╨╕╤Е ╤Н╨║╨╖╨╡╤А╤Б╨╕╤Б╨╛╨▓. ╨Я╨╛╤Н╨╝╨░ ╨╛ ╨┐╨╛╨╕╤Б╨║╨╡ ╤В╨░╨╕╨╜╤Б╤В╨▓╨╡╨╜╨╜╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨┤╤А╨╡╨▓╨╜╨╡╨│╨╛ ╨│╨╛╤А╨╛╨┤╨░ ╨▓ ╤В╨░╨╕╨╜╤Б╤В╨▓╨╡╨╜╨╜╤Л╤Е ╨┤╤А╨╡╨▓╨╜╨╕╤Е ╨┤╨╢╤Г╨╜╨│╨╗╤П╤Е ╨╕ ╨▓╨╛ ╤З╤В╨╛ ╨▓╤Б╤П ╤Н╤В╨░ ╤В╨░╨╕╨╜╤Б╤В╨▓╨╡╨╜╨╜╨░╤П ╨┤╤А╨╡╨▓╨╜╨╛╤Б╤В╤М ╨▓ ╨╕╤В╨╛╨│╨╡ ╨▓╤Л╨╗╨╕╨╗╨░╤Б╤М. ╨Ш╤Б╤В╨╛╤А╨╕╤П ╨╕╨╖ ╤В╨╡╤Е, ╤З╤В╨╛: ╨▒╨╛╨╣╤В╨╡╤Б╤М ╤Б╨▓╨╛╨╕╤Е ╨╢╨╡╨╗╨░╨╜╨╕╨╣, ╨╕╨╜╨╛╨│╨┤╨░ ╨╛╨╜╨╕ ╨╕╤Б╨┐╨╛╨╗╨╜╤П╤О╤В╤Б╤П. "╨Ь╨╛╤А╨░╨╗╤М╨╜╤Л╨╡ ╨┐╤А╨╕╨╜╤Ж╨╕╨┐╤Л". ╨Ю╨╜ ╤Г╤З╨╕╤В╨╡╨╗╤М ╨╜╨░ ╨┐╨╛╨╗╤Б╤В╨░╨▓╨║╨╕ ╨╕ ╨┐╨╕╤И╨╡╤В ╤Б╨▓╨╛╤О ╨┐╨╡╤А╨▓╤Г╤О ╨║╨╜╨╕╨│╤Г, ╨║╨╛╤В╨╛╤А╨░╤П, ╨▓╨╛╨╖╨╝╨╛╨╢╨╜╨╛, ╤Б╤В╨░╨╜╨╡╤В ╨▒╨╡╤Б╤В╤Б╨╡╨╗╨╗╨╡╤А╨╛╨╝ ╨╕, ╨▓╨╛╨╖╨╝╨╛╨╢╨╜╨╛, ╨┐╤А╨╕╨╜╨╡╤Б╨╡╤В ╨╕╨╝ ╨║╤Г╤З╤Г ╨┤╨╡╨╜╨╡╨│. ╨Ю╨╜╨░ ╨╝╨╡╨┤╤Б╨╡╤Б╤В╤А╨░, ╨╜╨╛ ╤А╨░╨┤╨╕ ╨╖╨░╤А╨░╨▒╨╛╤В╨║╨░ ╤А╨░╨▒╨╛╤В╨░╨╡╤В ╤Б╨╕╨┤╨╡╨╗╨║╨╛╨╣ ╤Г ╨╜╨░╨▒╨╕╤В╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨┤╨╡╨╜╤М╨│╨░╨╝╨╕, ╨║╨░╨║ ╤А╨╛╨╢╨┤╨╡╤Б╤В╨▓╨╡╨╜╤Б╨║╨╕╨╣ ╨│╤Г╤Б╤М ╤П╨▒╨╗╨╛╨║╨░╨╝╨╕, ╨┐╤А╨╛╨┐╨╛╨▓╨╡╨┤╨╜╨╕╨║╨░. ╨Ш ╨╜╨╕╤Й╨╡╤В╨░ ╨╕╤Е ╨┤╨╛╨║╨╛╨╜╨░╨╗╨░. ╨в╤Г╤В-╤В╨╛ ╨╛╤В ╨╡╨╡ ╨╜╨░╨╜╨╕╨╝╨░╤В╨╡╨╗╤П ╨╕ ╨┐╨╛╤Б╤В╤Г╨┐╨░╨╡╤В ╨╜╨╡╨┐╤А╨╕╤Б╤В╨╛╨╣╨╜╨╛╨╡ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨┤╨╗╨╛╨╢╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╡. ╨Э╨╡╤В, ╨╜╨╡ ╨║╨░╨║ ╨▓ ╨║╨╕╨╜╨╛ ╤Б ╨Ф╨╡╨╝╨╕ ╨Ь╤Г╤А. ╨н╤В╨╛ ╨┐╨╛ ╨┐╨╛╨▓╨╛╨┤╤Г ╨╝╨╛╤А╨░╨╗╤М╨╜╤Л╤Е ╨┐╤А╨╕╨╜╤Ж╨╕╨┐╨╛╨▓ ╨▓╨╛╨╛╨▒╤Й╨╡: ╨╛╨╜╨░ ╨┤╨╛╨╗╨╢╨╜╨░ ╤Б╨╛╨▓╨╡╤А╤И╨╕╤В╤М ╨╜╨╡╨║╨╕╨╣ ╨╛╤В╨▓╤А╨░╤В╨╕╤В╨╡╨╗╤М╨╜╤Л╨╣ ╨┐╨╛╤Б╤В╤Г╨┐╨╛╨║, ╨░ ╨╝╤Г╨╢ - ╨╖╨░╤Б╨╜╤П╤В╤М ╨╡╨│╨╛ ╨╜╨░ ╨▓╨╕╨┤╨╡╨╛. ╨Ч╨░ ╤Н╤В╨╛ ╨┐╤А╨╛╨┐╨╛╨▓╨╡╨┤╨╜╨╕╨║ ╨╖╨░╨┐╨╗╨░╤В╨╕╤В ╨┤╨▓╨╡╤Б╤В╨╕ ╤В╤Л╤Б╤П╤З. ╨Я╤А╨╛╤Б╤В╨░╤П ╨╕╤Б╤В╨╛╤А╨╕╤П ╤Б ╨╜╨╡╨╛╨╢╨╕╨┤╨░╨╜╨╜╤Л╨╝ ╨┐╤А╨╕╨╖╨▓╤Г╨║╨╛╨╝ "╨Ь╨░╨║╨▒╨╡╤В╨░""╨Ч╨░╨│╤А╨╛╨▒╨╜╨░╤П ╨╢╨╕╨╖╨╜╤М". ╨г╨╝╨╕╤А╨░╤О╤Й╨╕╨╣ ╨╛╤В ╤А╨░╨║╨░ ╨┐╤А╤П╨╝╨╛╨╣ ╨║╨╕╤И╨║╨╕ ╤З╨╡╨╗╨╛╨▓╨╡╨║ ╨╛╨║╨░╨╖╤Л╨▓╨░╨╡╤В╤Б╤П ╨▓ ╨╜╨╡╨║╨╛╨╡╨╝ ╨┐╤А╨╛╨╝╨╡╨╢╤Г╤В╨╛╤З╨╜╨╛╨╝ ╨╝╨╡╤Б╤В╨╡, ╤З╨╕╤Б╤В╨╕╨╗╨╕╤Й╨╡? ╨Я╤А╨╛╨▓╨╛╨┤╨╜╨╕╨║╨╛╨╝ ╨┐╨╛ ╨║╨╛╤В╨╛╤А╨╛╨╝╤Г ╤Б╨╗╤Г╨╢╨╕╤В ╨╜╨╡╨┐╤А╨╕╤П╤В╨╜╤Л╨╣ ╤В╨╕╨┐, ╨║╨╛╤В╨╛╤А╤Л╨╣ ╨┐╤А╨╕╨╖╨╜╨░╨╡╤В╤Б╤П, ╤З╤В╨╛ ╨┐╨╛ ╨╡╨│╨╛ ╨╜╨╡╨┐╤А╤П╨╝╨╛╨╣ ╨▓╨╕╨╜╨╡ ╨┐╨╛╨│╨╕╨▒╨╗╨╕ ╨╜╨╡╤Б╨║╨╛╨╗╤М╨║╨╛ ╨╢╨╡╨╜╤Й╨╕╨╜, ╤А╨░╨▒╨╛╤В╨░╨▓╤И╨╕╤Е ╨╜╨░ ╤И╨▓╨╡╨╣╨╜╨╛╨╣ ╤Д╨░╨▒╤А╨╕╨║╨╡, ╨║╨╛╤В╨╛╤А╤Г╤О ╨╛╨╜╨╕ ╤Б ╨┐╨░╤А╤В╨╜╨╡╤А╨╛╨╝ ╨┤╨╡╤А╨╢╨░╨╗╨╕. ╨Э╤Г, ╤П-╤В╨╛ ╨╜╨╡ ╤В╨░╨║╨╛╨╣, ╨┤╤Г╨╝╨░╨╡╤В ╨│╨╡╤А╨╛╨╣. ╨Ф╨╛ ╤В╨╡╤Е ╨┐╨╛╤А, ╨┐╨╛╨║╨░ ╤Б ╨▒╨╡╤Б╨┐╨╛╤Й╨░╨┤╨╜╨╛╨╣ ╤П╤Б╨╜╨╛╤Б╤В╤М╤О ╨╡╨╝╤Г ╨╜╨╡ ╨▓╤Б╨┐╨╛╨╝╨╕╨╜╨░╤О╤В╤Б╤П ╨╜╨╡╨┐╤А╨╕╨│╨╗╤П╨┤╨╜╤Л╨╡ ╨┐╨╛╤Б╤В╤Г╨┐╨║╨╕ ╨╕╨╖ ╤Б╨╛╨▒╤Б╤В╨▓╨╡╨╜╨╜╨╛╨╣ ╨╢╨╕╨╖╨╜╨╕. ╨з╤В╨╛, ╨╡╤Б╨╗╨╕ ╨┐╨╛╤П╨▓╨╕╤В╤Б╤П ╤И╨░╨╜╤Б ╨┐╤А╨╛╨╢╨╕╤В╤М ╨╡╨╡ ╨╖╨░╨╜╨╛╨▓╨╛, ╨╜╨╡ ╤Б╨╛╨▓╨╡╤А╤И╨╕╨▓ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨╢╨╜╨╕╤Е ╨╛╤И╨╕╨▒╨╛╨║?"╨г╤А". ╨У╨╡╤А╨╛╨╣ ╤З╨╕╤В╨░╨╡╤В ╨▒╤Г╨╝╨░╨╢╨╜╤Л╨╡ ╨║╨╜╨╕╨│╨╕. ╨б╨╛╨▒╤Б╤В╨▓╨╡╨╜╨╜╨╛, ╨┐╨╛╨║╤Г╨┐╨║╨░ ╤Н╨╗╨╡╨║╤В╤А╨╛╨╜╨╜╨╛╨╣ ("╨п ╤Н╨║╤Б╨┐╨╡╤А╨╕╨╝╨╡╨╜╤В╨╕╤А╤Г╤О ╤Б ╨╜╨╛╨▓╤Л╨╝╨╕ ╤В╨╡╤Е╨╜╨╛╨╗╨╛╨│╨╕╤П╨╝╨╕") - ╨╖╨░╨▓╤П╨╖╨║╨░ ╤Б╤О╨╢╨╡╤В╨░. ╨Э╤Г ╨╕ ╨╡╤Й╨╡, ╤А╨░╨╖ ╤Г╨╢ ╤Б╨╡╨│╨╛╨┤╨╜╤П ╤Г ╨╜╨░╤Б ╨░╤В╤В╤А╨░╨║╤Ж╨╕╨╛╨╜ ╨╜╨╡╤Б╨╗╤Л╤Е╨░╨╜╨╜╨╛╨╣ ╤Й╨╡╨┤╤А╨╛╤Б╤В╨╕: ╨Я╨╛ ╤Д╨░╨╜╤В╨░╤Б╤В╨╕╤З╨╡╤Б╨║╨╛╨╝╤Г ╤Б╤В╨╡╤З╨╡╨╜╨╕╤О ╨╛╨▒╤Б╤В╨╛╤П╤В╨╡╨╗╤М╤Б╤В╨▓, ╨║╨╕╨╜╨┤╨╗ ╨┤╨░╨╡╤В ╨▓╨╛╨╖╨╝╨╛╨╢╨╜╨╛╤Б╤В╤М ╨┐╤А╨╛╤З╨╡╤Б╤В╤М ╨▓╤Б╨╡, ╨╜╨░╨┐╨╕╤Б╨░╨╜╨╜╨╛╨╡ ╨▓ ╨┤╨▓╤Г╤Е ╤Б ╨┐╨╛╨╗╨╛╨▓╨╕╨╜╨╛╨╣ ╨╝╨╕╨╗╨╗╨╕╨╛╨╜╨░╤Е ╨┐╨░╤А╨░╨╗╨╗╨╡╨╗╤М╨╜╤Л╤Е ╤А╨╡╨░╨╗╤М╨╜╨╛╤Б╤В╨╡╨╣. ╨в╨╛╨╗╤М╨║╨╛ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨┤╤Б╤В╨░╨▓╤М╤В╨╡. ╨Т╨░╤И ╨╗╤О╨▒╨╕╨╝╨▓╨╣ ╨┐╨╕╤Б╨░╤В╨╡╨╗╤М (╨░ ╤Г ╨║╨░╨╢╨┤╨╛╨│╨╛ ╤З╨╕╤В╨░╤О╤Й╨╡╨│╨╛ ╤Б╨▓╨╛╨╣) ╨╕ ╨╡╨│╨╛ ╨▓╨╡╤Й╨╕, ╨║╨╛╤В╨╛╤А╤Л╤Е ╨╜╨╡ ╨╝╨╛╨╢╨╡╤В ╨▒╤Л╤В╤М, ╨╜╨╛ ╨╛╨╜╨╕ ╨╡╤Б╤В╤М. ╨Ю╤В ╨║╤А╨╕╨╝╨╕╨╜╨░╨╗╤М╨╜╨╛╨╣ ╨┤╤А╨░╨╝╤Л ╨┤╨╛ ╨╗╨╡╨│╨║╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨┐╨╛╤А╨╜╨╛ ╨▓ ╤А╨░╨╖╨╜╤Л╤Е ╤А╨╡╨░╨╗╤М╨╜╨╛╤Б╤В╤П╤Е ╤Г ╨е╤Н╨╝╨░. ╨╜╨╛ ╨▓╨╡╨╖╨┤╨╡ ╤Н╤В╨╛ ╨▒╤Г╨┤╨╡╤В "╨Ю╤А╤Г╨╢╨╕╨╡" ╨╕╨╗╨╕ "╨Ъ╨╛╨╗╨╛╨║╨╛╨╗" ╨╕╨╗╨╕ "╨б╤В╨░╤А╨╕╨║ ╨╕ ╨╝╨╛╤А╨╡". ╨Ъ╨░╨║? ╨Ш ╤Н╤В╨╛ ╤В╨╛╨╗╤М╨║╨╛ ╨╗╨╕╤В╨╡╤А╨░╤В╤Г╤А╨╛╤Ж╨╡╨╜╤В╤А╨╕╤Б╤В╤Б╨║╨░╤П ╤З╨░╤Б╤В╤М ╨╕╤Б╤В╨╛╤А╨╕╨╕, ╨║╤Г╨┤╨░ ╨▒╨╛╨╗╨╡╨╡ ╨╖╨╜╨░╤З╨╕╨╝╨╛╨╣ ╨╛╨║╨░╨╢╨╡╤В╤Б╤П ╨╕╨╜╤Д╨╛╤А╨╝╨░╤Ж╨╕╤П ╨╛ ╨│╨╕╨▒╨╡╨╗╨╕ ╨╛╨┤╨╕╨╜╨╜╨░╨┤╤Ж╨░╤В╨╕ ╤И╨║╨╛╨╗╤М╨╜╨╕╤Ж ╤Б ╨┐╤А╨╡╨┐╨╛╨┤╨░╨▓╨░╤В╨╡╨╗╨╡╨╝ ╨▓ ╤А╨╡╨╖╤Г╨╗╤М╤В╨░╤В╨╡ ╤Б╤В╨╛╨╗╨║╨╜╨╛╨▓╨╡╨╜╨╕╤П ╤Б ╨▓╨╜╨╡╨┤╨╛╤А╨╛╨╢╨╜╨╕╨║╨╛╨╝ ╨┐╨╛╨┤ ╤Г╨┐╤А╨░╨▓╨╗╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╡╨╝ ╨┐╤М╤П╨╜╨╛╨╣ ╨╢╨╡╨╜╤Й╨╕╨╜╤Л-╨▓╨╛╨┤╨╕╤В╨╡╨╗╤П. ╨Ъ╨╗╨░╤Б╤Б╨╜╨░╤П ╨┐╨╛╨▓╨╡╤Б╤В╤М, ╨░ ╤Д╨╕╨╜╨░╨╗ ╨╜╨╡╨╛╨╢╨╕╨┤╨░╨╜╨╜╨╛ ╨╛╤В╨┐╤А╨░╨▓╨╕╤В ╨║ "╨в╨╡╨╝╨╜╨╛╨╣ ╨▒╨░╤И╨╗╨╜╨╡" ╨╕ "╨б╨╡╤А╨┤╤Ж╨░╨╝ ╨▓ ╨Р╤В╨╗╨░╨╜╤В╨╕╨┤╨╡" "╨У╨╡╤А╨╝╨░╨╜ ╨Т╤Г╨║ ╨▓╤Б╨╡ ╨╡╤Й╨╡ ╨╢╨╕╨▓". ╨б╨╜╨╛╨▓╨░ ╨╜╨╡╨┐╨╛╨▒╨╡╨┤╨╕╨╝╤Л╨╣ ╨║╨╕╨╜╨│╨╛╨▓ ╨╗╨╕╤В╨╡╤А╨░╤В╤Г╤А╨╛╤Ж╨╡╨╜╤В╤А╨╕╨╖╨╝, ╨╜╨░ ╤Б╨╡╨╣ ╤А╨░╨╖ ╤Б╨┐╨╗╨░╨▓╨╗╨╡╨╜╨╜╤Л╨╣ ╤Б ╤В╨╡╨╝╨╛╨╣ "╨▒╨╡╨╗╨╛╨╣ ╨│╨╛╨╗╤Л╤В╤М╨▒╤Л" ╨Р╨╝╨╡╤А╨╕╨║╨░ ╨╜╨╡ ╨а╨╛╤Б╤Б╨╕╤П, ╨▓ ╨╜╨╡╨╣ ╨╜╨╡ ╨┐╨╗╨░╤В╤П╤В ╨╝╨░╤В╨╡╤А╨╕╨╜╤Б╨║╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨║╨░╨┐╨╕╤В╨░╨╗╨░ - ╤В╨╛-╤В╨╛ ╨▒╤Л╨╗╨╛ ╨▒╤Л ╤А╨░╨┤╨╛╤Б╤В╨╕ ╨┤╨╡╨▓╤Г╤И╨║╨░╨╝, ╨║╨░╨║ ╨С╤А╨╡╨╜╨┤╨░ ╨╕ ╨Ц╨░╤Б╨╝╨╕╨╜. ╨Р ╨┐╤А╨╡╤Б╤В╨░╤А╨╡╨╗╤Л╨╡ ╨┐╨╛╤Н╤В╤Л, ╨▒╤Л╨▓╤И╨╕╨╡ ╨║╨╛╨│╨┤╨░-╤В╨╛ ╨╗╤О╨▒╨╛╨▓╨╜╨╕╨║╨░╨╝╨╕, ╨╛╨╜╨╕ ╨╕ ╨▓ ╨╜╨░╤И╨╕╤Е ╤И╨╕╤А╨╛╤В╨░╤Е ╨╝╨╛╨│╤Г╤В ╨┤╨╛╨▒╨╕╤А╨░╤В╤М╤Б╤П ╨╜╨░ ╨┐╨╛╤Н╤В╨╕╤З╨╡╤Б╨║╨╕╨╣ ╤Д╨╡╤Б╤В╨╕╨▓╨░╨╗╤М, ╨┐╨╛╨╖╨▓╨╛╨╗╨╕╨▓ ╤Б╨╡╨▒╨╡ ╤Б ╨│╨╛╨╜╨╛╤А╨░╤А╨░ ╨║╤А╨╛╤Е╨╛╤В╨╜╤Л╨╣ ╤И╨╕╨║ - ╤Б╨║╤А╨╛╨╝╨╜╨╛╨╡ ╨┐╨╛╨┤╨╛╨▒╨╕╨╡ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨╢╨╜╨╕╤Е ╤Д╨╡╨╣╨╡╤А╨▓╨╡╤А╨║╨╛╨▓ - ╨┐╨╕╨║╨╜╨╕╨║ ╨▓ ╨┐╤А╨╕╨┤╨╛╤А╨╛╨╢╨╜╨╛╨╣ ╨╖╨╛╨╜╨╡ ╨╛╤В╨┤╤Л╤Е╨░. ╨Ш ╤Г ╤А╨╛╤Б╤Б╨╕╨╣╤Б╨║╨╛╨╣ ╤Б╨╗╨╛╨▓╨╡╤Б╨╜╨╛╤Б╤В╨╕ ╨▒╤Л╨╗ ╨Ф╨░╨╜╨╕╨╕╨╗ ╨У╤А╨░╨╜╨╕╨╜ ╤Б "╨Ь╨╛╨╕╨╝ ╨╗╨╡╨╣╤В╨╡╨╜╨░╨╜╤В╨╛╨╝". ╨Э╨╡ ╨▓ 101 ╨│╨╛╨┤, ╨║╨░╨║ ╤Г ╨У╨╡╤А╨╝╨░╨╜╨░ ╨Т╤Г╨║╨░, ╨╜╨╛ ╨▓ 97. ╨Ш ╨║ ╨╜╨╡╨╝╤Г ╨▓╨┐╨╛╨╗╨╜╨╡ ╨╝╨╛╨╢╨╜╨╛ ╨╛╤В╨╜╨╡╤Б╤В╨╕ ╤Д╤А╨░╨╖╤Г ╨Т╤Г╨║╨░: "╨Ф╤А╤П╤Е╨╗╨╡╨╡╤В ╤В╨╡╨╗╨╛, ╨╜╨╛ ╨╜╨╡ ╤Б╨╗╨╛╨▓╨░""╨Э╨╡╨╖╨┤╨╛╤А╨╛╨▓╤М╨╡". ╨Ю╨╜ ╨╗╤О╨▒╨╕╤В ╨╡╨╡ ╨▓╤Б╨╡ ╤В╨╡ ╨│╨╛╨┤╤Л, ╨║╨╛╤В╨╛╤А╤Л╨╡ ╨╛╨╜╨╕ ╨▓╨╝╨╡╤Б╤В╨╡. ╨Ш ╨╛╨║╤А╤Г╨╢╨░╨╡╤В ╤В╤А╨╛╨│╨░╤В╨╡╨╗╤М╨╜╨╛╨╣ ╨╖╨░╨▒╨╛╤В╨╛╨╣. ╨Т ╨┐╤А╨╡╨┤╨╡╨╗╨░╤Е, ╨║╨░╨║╨╕╨╡ ╤Б╨░╨╝╨░ ╨╛╨╜╨░ ╨┤╨╛╨╖╨▓╨╛╨╗╤П╨╡╤В. ╨Я╨╛╤В╨╛╨╝╤Г ╤З╤В╨╛ ╨╡╨│╨╛ ╨н╨╗╨╗╨╡╨╜ - ╨┤╨╡╨▓╤Г╤И╨║╨░ ╤Б ╤Е╨░╤А╨░╨║╤В╨╡╤А╨╛╨╝, "╨║╤А╨╡╨╝╨╡╨╜╤М" - ╨╛ ╤В╨░╨║╨╕╤Е ╨│╨╛╨▓╨╛╤А╤П╤В. ╨Х╤Б╨╗╨╕ ╤З╨╡╨│╨╛ ╨╜╨╡ ╨╖╨░╤Е╨╛╤З╨╡╤В, ╨╜╨╕╨┐╨╛╤З╨╡╨╝ ╨╜╨╡ ╨╖╨░╤Б╤В╨░╨▓╨╕╤И╤М ╨╡╨╡. ╨Т╨╛╤В ╨┐╤А╨╕╨▒╨╛╨╗╨╡╨╗╨░, ╨░ ╨║ ╨▓╤А╨░╤З╤Г ╨╜╨╡ ╨╕╨┤╨╡╤В, ╤Г╨┐╤А╤П╨╝╨░╤П. ╨Э╤Г ╨┤╨░ ╨╜╨╕╤З╨╡╨│╨╛, ╤В╨╡╨┐╨╡╤А╤М ╤Г╨╢╨╡ ╨┐╨╛╤И╨╗╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╨┐╨╛╨┐╤А╨░╨▓╨║╤Г. ╨в╨╛╨╗╤М╨║╨╛ ╨▓╨╡╤Б╤М ╤Б╨▓╨╡╤В ╨║╨░╨║ ╤Б╨│╨╛╨▓╨╛╤А╨╕╨╗╤Б╤П ╨╜╨╡ ╨┤╨░╤В╤М ╨╡╨╣ ╤Б╨┐╨╛╨║╨╛╨╣╨╜╨╛ ╨╛╤В╨┤╤Л╤Е╨░╤В╤М. ╨Ъ╨╛╨║╨╡╤А ╨Ы╨╡╨┤╨╕, ╨╗╨╡╨╜╨╕╨▓╨░╤П ╤В╨╛╨╗╤Б╤В╤Г╤И╨║╨░ (╨╜╨░ ╨┤╨╕╨╡╤В╨╡. ╨░ ╤В╨╛╨╗╨║╤Г ╨╜╨╕╨║╨░╨║╨╛╨│╨╛) ╨┐╤А╨╛╨▒╨╕╤А╨░╨╡╤В╤Б╤П ╨┐╨╛╨┤ ╨║╤А╨╛╨▓╨░╤В╤М ╤Б╨╛ ╤Б╤В╨╛╤А╨╛╨╜╤Л ╨н╨╗╨╗╨╡╨╜, ╨│╤А╤Л╨╖╨╡╤В ╤В╨░╨╝ ╤З╤В╨╛-╤В╨╛. ╨С╨┤╨╕╤В╨╡╨╗╤М╨╜╤Л╨╡ ╤Б╨╛╤Б╨╡╨┤╨╕ ╨▓╤Л╨╖╤Л╨▓╨░╤О╤В ╨┤╨╡╨╖╨╕╨╜╤Б╨╡╨║╤В╨╛╤А╨╛╨▓ - ╨╜╨╡ ╨╜╤А╨░╨▓╨╕╤В╤Б╤П ╨╖╨░╨┐╨░╤Е ╨╕╨╖ ╤Б╨╛╤Б╨╡╨┤╨╜╨╕╤Е ╨░╨┐╨░╤А╤В╨░╨╝╨╡╨╜╤В╨╛╨▓. ╨С╨╡╨╖╤Г╨╝╨╜╤Л╨╣ ╤Д╨╕╤А╨╝╨╡╨╜╨╜╤Л╨╣ ╨║╨╕╨╜╨│╨╛╨▓ ╨║╨╛╨║╤В╨╡╨╣╨╗╨╡╨╝ ╨Ь╨╛╨╗╨╛╤В╨╛╨▓╨░: ╤Г╨╢╨░╤Б, ╨╛╨╝╨╡╤А╨╖╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╡, ╨╛╤Б╤В╤А╨░╤П ╨╢╨░╨╗╨╛╤Б╤В╤М, ╨╜╨╡╨╢╨╜╨╛╤Б╤В╤М, ╨▓╨╛╤Б╤Е╨╕╤Й╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╡. "╨С╨╕╨╗╨╗╨╕ "╨С╨╗╨╛╨║╨░╨┤╨░". ╨Ю╤З╨╡╤А╨╡╨┤╨╜╨░╤П ╨▒╨╡╨╣╤Б╨▒╨╛╨╗╤М╨╜╨░╤П ╨║╨╕╨╜╨│╨╛╨▓╨░ ╨▓╨╡╤Й╤М, ╨║╤В╨╛ ╤А╨░╨╖╨▒╨╕╤А╨░╨╗╤Б╤П ╨▓ ╨┐╤А╨░╨▓╨╕╨╗╨░╤Е ╨╕╨│╤А╤Л ╨┤╨╗╤П ╤В╨╛╨│╨╛, ╤З╤В╨╛╨▒╤Л ╨┐╨╛╨╜╨╕╨╝╨░╤В╤М, ╤З╨╕╤В╨░╤П "╨Ф╨╡╨▓╨╛╤З╨║╤Г, ╨║╨╛╤В╨╛╤А╨░╤П ╨╗╤О╨▒╨╕╨╗╨░ ╨в╨╛╨╝╨░ ╨У╨╛╤А╨┤╨╛╨╜╨░", ╤В╨╛╨╝╤Г ╨▒╤Г╨┤╨╡╤В ╨╗╨╡╨│╤З╨╡, ╨┐╤А╨╛╤З╨╕╨╝ ╨╛╤Б╤В╨░╨╡╤В╤Б╤П ╤А╨░╤Б╤Б╨╗╨░╨▒╨╕╤В╤М╤Б╤П ╨╕ ╨┐╨╛╨╗╤Г╤З╨░╤В╤М ╤Г╨┤╨╛╨▓╨╛╨╗╤М╤Б╤В╨▓╨╕╨╡ ╨╛╤В ╨╕╤Б╤В╨╛╤А╨╕╨╕ ╨┤╨╡╤А╨╡╨▓╨╡╨╜╤Б╨║╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨┐╨░╤Ж╨░╨╜╨░, ╨║╨╛╤В╨╛╤А╤Л╨╣ ╤Б╤В╨░╨╜╨╛╨▓╨╕╤В╤Б╤П ╤Б╨░╨╝╤Л╨╝ ╨╖╨╜╨░╨╝╨╡╨╜╨╕╤В╤Л╨╝ ╨╕╨│╤А╨╛╨║╨╛╨╝ ╤Б╨╡╨╖╨╛╨╜╨░. ╨Ш ╨╛ ╤В╨╛╨╝, ╨║╨╡╨╝ ╨▓ ╨┤╨╡╨╣╤Б╤В╨▓╨╕╨╡╤В╨╗╤М╨╜╨╛╤Б╤В╨╕ ╨╛╨╜ ╨▒╤Л╨╗: ╨│╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╡╨╝ ╨╕╨│╤А╤Л, ╨┐╤А╨╡╤Б╤В╤Г╨┐╨╜╨╕╨║╨╛╨╝ ╨╕╨╗╨╕ ╨┤╨╡╨╝╨╛╨╜╨╛╨╝ ╨╕╨╖ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨╕╤Б╨┐╨╛╨┤╨╜╨╡╨╣. "╨Ь╨╕╤Б╤В╨╡╤А ╨б╨╕╨╝╨┐╨░╤В╤П╤И╨║╨░". ╨Ш ╤Н╤В╨░ ╤В╨╡╨╝╨░ - ╨┤╨╛╨╝╨░ ╨┐╤А╨╡╤Б╤В╨░╤А╨╡╨╗╤Л╤Е, ╨│╨┤╨╡ ╨┤╨╛╨╢╨╕╨▓╨░╤О╤В ╤Б╨▓╨╛╨╕ ╨┤╨╜╨╕, ╨▒╨╗╨╡╨┤╨╜╤Л╨╝╨╕ ╤В╨╡╨╜╤П╨╝╨╕ ╤Б╨╡╨▒╤П ╨┐╤А╨╡╨╢╨╜╨╕╤Е, ╨╜╨╡╨║╨╛╨│╨┤╨░ ╤П╤А╨║╨╕╨╡ ╨▓╨╛╤Б╤В╤А╨╡╨▒╨╛╨▓╨░╨╜╨╜╤Л╨╡ ╨╗╤О╨┤╨╕ - ╨╛╨┤╨╜╨░ ╨╕╨╖ ╤Б╨║╨▓╨╛╨╖╨╜╤Л╤Е ╨┤╨╗╤П ╨Ъ╨╕╨╜╨│╨░, ╨┤╨░╨╢╨╡ ╨▓ ╤Н╤В╨╛╨╝ ╤Б╨▒╨╛╤А╨╜╨╕╨║╨╡ ╨╡╤Б╤В╤М ╤А╨░╤Б╤Б╨║╨░╨╖ ╨╛╨▒ ╤Н╤В╨╛╨╝. "╨Ч╨╛╨╗╨╛╤В╤Л╨╡ ╨│╨╛╨┤╤Л", "╨Ч╨╡╨╗╨╡╨╜╨░╤П ╨╝╨╕╨╗╤П", "╨С╨╡╤Б╤Б╨╛╨╜╨╜╨╕╤Ж╨░", ╤В╨╡╨┐╨╡╤А╤М ╨▓╨╛╤В ╤Н╤В╨╛╤В ╤А╨░╤Б╤Б╨║╨░╨╖, ╨╕╤Б╨┐╨╛╨╗╨╜╨╡╨╜╨╜╤Л╨╣ ╤Б╨┐╨╛╨║╨╛╨╣╨╜╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨┤╨╛╤Б╤В╨╛╨╕╨╜╤Б╤В╨▓╨░ ╨╕ ╨╜╨░╨┐╨╛╨╡╨╜╨╜╤Л╨╣ ╨│╤А╤Г╤Б╤В╨╜╨╛╨╣ ╨╜╨╡╨╢╨╜╨╛╤Б╤В╤М╤О "╨Я╨╛╤Б╨╗╨╡╨┤╨╜╨╡╨│╨╛ ╨╗╨╕╤Б╤В╨░" ╨Ю. ╨У╨╡╨╜╤А╨╕. "╨в╨╛╨╝╨╝╨╕" ╤Б╨╜╨╛╨▓╨░ ╤Б╤В╨╕╤Е╨╛╤В╨▓╨╛╤А╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╡ ╨▓ ╨┐╤А╨╛╨╖╨╡. ╨У╨╕╨╝╨╜ ╤А╨╡╨▒╤П╤В╨░╨╝ ╨╕╨╖ ╨┤╨▓╨╕╨╢╨╡╨╜╨╕╤П ╤Е╨╕╨┐╨┐╨╕, ╤Г╤И╨╡╨┤╤И╨╕╨╝ ╤А╨░╨╜╤М╤И╨╡. ╤З╨╡╨╝ ╤Г╤Б╨┐╨╡╨╗╨╕ ╨┐╨╛╤Б╤В╨░╤А╨╡╤В╤М ╨╕ ╨┤╨░╨╢╨╡ ╨┐╤А╨╛╤Б╤В╨╛ ╨┐╨╛╨╖╤А╨╛╤Б╨╗╨╡╤В╤М. "╨Ь╨░╨╗╨╡╨╜╤М╨║╨╕╨╣ ╨╖╨╡╨╗╨╡╨╜╤Л╨╣ ╨▒╨╛╨╢╨╛╨║ ╨░╨│╨╛╨╜╨╕╨╕". ╨Ц╤Г╤В╨║╨░╤П (╤П ╨╕╨╝╨╡╤О ╨▓ ╨▓╨╕╨┤╤Г , ╨┐╨╛ ╨╜╨░╤Б╤В╨╛╤П╤Й╨╡╨╝╤Г ╨╢╤Г╤В╨║╨░╤П, ╨╕╤Б╤В╨╛╤А╨╕╤П ╨╛╨▒╤А╤П╨┤╨░ ╤Н╨║╨╖╨╛╤А╤Ж╨╕╨╖╨╝╨░. ╨Ю ╤В╨╛╨╝, ╤З╤В╨╛ ╨▒╨╛╨│╨░╤В╤Л╨╝ ╨▒╤Л╨▓╨░╨╡╤В ╨┐╨╛-╨╜╨░╤Б╤В╨╛╤П╤Й╨╡╨╝╤Г ╨▒╨╛╨╗╤М╨╜╨╛ ╨╕ ╤В╨╛╨│╨┤╨░ ╨╛╨╜╨╕ ╤В╨╛╨╢╨╡ ╨┐╨╗╨░╤З╤Г╤В, ╨┤╨░╨╢╨╡ ╨╡╤Б╨╗╨╕ ╨▒╨╡╨┤╨╜╤Л╨╝ ╨║╨░╨╢╨╡╤В╤Б╤П, ╤З╤В╨╛ ╨▓╤Б╨╡ ╤Н╤В╨╛ ╨┐╤А╨╕╤В╨▓╨╛╤А╤Б╤В╨▓╨╛ ╨╕╨╖╨▒╨░╨╗╨╛╨▓╨░╨╜╨╜╤Л╤Е ╨╗╨╡╨╜╤В╤П╨╡╨▓. "╨Т ╤Н╤В╨╛╨╝ ╨░╨▓╤В╨╛╨▒╤Г╤Б╨╡ ╨┤╤А╤Г╨│╨╛╨╣ ╨╝╨╕╤А". ╨з╨╡╨╗╨╛╨▓╨╡╨║ ╨╛╨┐╨░╨╖╨┤╤Л╨▓╨░╨╡╤В ╨╜╨░ ╤Б╨░╨╝╨╛╨╡ ╨▓╨░╨╢╨╜╨╛╨╡ ╨▓ ╤Б╨▓╨╛╨╡╨╣ ╨╢╨╕╨╖╨╜╨╕ ╤Б╨╛╨▒╨╡╤Б╨╡╨┤╨╛╨▓╨░╨╜╨╕╨╡, ╤В╨╛╤А╤З╨░ ╨▓ ╨┐╤А╨╛╨▒╨║╨╡, ╨╕ ╨▓╨╜╨╡╨╖╨░╨┐╨╜╨╛ ╤Б╤В╨░╨╜╨╛╨▓╨╕╤В╤Б╤П ╤Б╨▓╨╕╨┤╨╡╤В╨╡╨╗╨╡╨╝ ╤З╤Г╨┤╨╛╨▓╨╕╤Й╨┤╨╜╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨┐╤А╨╡╤Б╤В╤Г╨┐╨╗╨╡╨╜╨╕╤П ╨▓ ╤Б╨╛╤Б╨╡╨┤╨╜╨╡╨╝ ╨░╨▓╤В╨╛╨▒╤Г╤Б╨╡. ╨з╤В╨╛ ╨┤╨╡╨╗╨░╤В╤М? ╨Т╤Л╨╖╨▓╨░╤В╤М ╨┐╨╛╨╗╨╕╤Ж╨╕╤О? ╨г╨▒╨╡╨┤╨╕╤В╤М ╤Б╨╡╨▒╤П, ╤З╤В╨╛ ╨┐╤А╨╕╨╝╨╡╤А╨╡╤Й╨╕╨╗╨╛╤Б╤М, ╨▓╨╡╨┤╤М ╨╜╨░ ╤Б╨░╨╝╨╛╨╝ ╨┤╨╡╨╗╨╡ ╤В╨░╨║╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨╜╨╡ ╨▒╤Л╨▓╨░╨╡╤В?"╨Э╨╡╨║╤А╨╛╨╗╨╛╨│╨╕". ╨Т ╨║╨░╨╢╨┤╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨┐╨╛╨╗╨╛╨╢╨╡╨╜ ╤Б╨▓╨╛╨╣ ╨╛╤Б╨╛╨▒╤Л╨╣ ╤В╨░╨╗╨░╨╜╤В, ╨╜╨░╨┤╨╛ ╤В╨╛╨╗╤М╨║╨╛ ╨╛╤В╤Л╤Б╨║╨░╤В╤М ╨╡╨│╨╛ ╨╕ ╨┐╨╗╨░╨╜╨╛╨╝╨╡╤А╨╜╨╛ ╤А╨░╨╖╨▓╨╕╨▓╨░╤В╤М. ╨Р ╨╡╤Б╨╗╨╕ ╤Н╤В╨╛ ╤В╨░╨╗╨░╨╜╤В, ╨║╨╛╤В╨╛╤А╤Л╨╣ ╤Б╨╗╤Г╨╢╨╕╤В ╨╜╨╡ ╤Б╨╛╨╖╨╕╨┤╨░╨╜╨╕╤О ╨╕ ╤Б╨╛╤Е╤А╨░╨╜╨╡╨╜╨╕╤О, ╨╜╨╛ ╤А╨░╨╖╤А╤Г╤И╨╡╨╜╨╕╤О? ╨Т╤Б╨╡ ╤А╨░╨▓╨╜╨╛ ╤А╨░╨╖╨▓╨╕╨▓╨░╨╣. ╨Э╨░ ╤Б╨▓╨╡╤В╨╡ ╨╝╨╜╨╛╨│╨╛ ╤В╨░╨║╨╛╨│╨╛, ╤З╤В╨╛ ╨╜╨╡ ╨╕╨╝╨╡╨╡╤В ╨┐╤А╨░╨▓╨░ ╨╜╨░ ╨╢╨╕╨╖╨╜╤М. "╨Я╤М╤П╨╜╤Л╨╡ ╤Д╨╡╨╣╨╡╤А╨▓╨╡╤А╨║╨╕". ╨Т╤Б╨╡ ╨╗╤О╨▒╤П╤В ╤Д╨╡╨╣╨╡╤А╨▓╨╡╤А╨║╨╕, ╨╜╨╡╤В? ╨Э╨╡╤В. ╨п ╨╜╨╡ ╨╗╤О╨▒╨╗╤О, ╨║╨╛╨│╨┤╨░ ╨┐╨╛╨┤ ╨╜╨╛╨▓╤Л╨╣ ╨│╨╛╨┤ ╨│╤А╨╛╤Е╨░╨╡╤В ╤Б╨╛ ╨▓╤Б╨╡╤Е ╤Б╤В╨╛╤А╨╛╨╜ ╤В╨░╨║, ╤З╤В╨╛ ╨║╨░╨╢╨╡╤В╤Б╤П ╨╝╨╕╤А ╨▓╨╛╤В-╨▓╨╛╤В ╨▓╨╖╨╗╨╡╤В╨╕╤В ╨╜╨░ ╨▓╨╛╨╖╨┤╤Г╤Е. ╨Т ╨Р╨╝╨╡╤А╨╕╨║╨╡ ╨░╨┐╨╛╤Д╨╡╨╛╨╖ ╤В╨░╨║╨╛╨│╨╛ ╤Г╨╢╨░╤Б╨░ ╤Б╨╗╤Г╤З╨░╨╡╤В╤Б╤П ╨╜╨░ ╤З╨╡╤В╨▓╨╡╤А╤В╨╛╨╡ ╨╕╤О╨╗╤П ╨╕ ╨╛╤Б╨╗╨╛╨╢╨╜╤П╨╡╤В╤Б╤П ╤В╨╡╨╝, ╤З╤В╨╛ ╨▓ ╨╖╨░╤Б╤Г╤И╨╗╨╕╨▓╤Г╤О ╨┐╨╛╤А╤Г, ╨║╨╛╨│╨┤╨░ ╤Б╨╗╤Г╤З╨░╨╣╨╜╨░╤П ╨╕╤Б╨║╤А╨░ ╨╝╨╛╨╢╨╡╤В ╤Б╤В╨░╤В╤М ╨┐╤А╨╕╤З╨╕╨╜╨╛╨╣ ╨┐╨╛╨╢╨░╤А╨░, ╤Н╤В╨╛ ╨╜╨░ ╨┐╨╛╤А╤П╨┤╨╛╨║ ╨╛╨┐╨░╤Б╨╜╨╡╨╡. ╨Ф╤Г╨╝╨░╨╡╤В╨╡, ╤В╨░╨║╨╛╨│╨╛ ╤А╨╛╨┤╨░ ╤Б╨╛╨╛╨▒╤А╨░╨╢╨╡╨╜╨╕╤П ╨╛╤Б╤В╨░╨╜╨╛╨▓╤П╤В ╨╗╤О╨▒╨╕╤В╨╡╨╗╨╡╨╣ ╤Б╨╛╤Б╤В╤П╨╖╨░╤В╤М╤Б╤П ╨▓ ╨╖╤А╨╡╨╗╨╕╤Й╨╜╨╛╤Б╤В╨╕ ╨╕ "╨║╤А╨░╤Б╨╛╤В╨╡"?"╨Ы╨╡╤В╨╜╨╕╨╣ ╨│╤А╨╛╨╝". ╨У╤А╤Г╤Б╤В╨╜╤Л╨╣ ╨╕ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨║╤А╨░╤Б╨╜╤Л╨╣ ╨┐╨╛╤Б╤В╨░╨┐╨╛╨║╨░╨╗╨╕╨┐╤Б╨╕╤Б, ╤Б ╨║╨╛╤В╨╛╤А╤Л╨╝ ╨Ъ╨╕╨╜╨│ ╨▓ ╨║╨╛╤В╨╛╤А╤Л╨╣ ╤А╨░╨╖ ╨▓╤Л╤Б╤В╤Г╨┐╨░╨╡╤В ╨┐╤А╨╛╨▓╨╛╨╖╨▓╨╡╤Б╤В╨╜╨╕╨║╨╛╨╝ ╨┐╨░╨╜╨┤╨╡╨╝╨╕╨╕, ╨║ ╤Б╤З╨░╤Б╤В╤М╤О, ╨╜╨╡ ╤Б╨╝╨╡╤А╤В╨╡╨╗╤М╨╜╨╛╨╣ ╨┤╨╗╤П ╨▒╨╛╨╗╤М╤И╨╕╨╜╤Б╤В╨▓╨░ ╨╕╨╖ ╨╜╨░╤Б, ╨║╨░╨║ ╨▓ ╨╡╨│╨╛ ╨║╨╜╨╕╨│╨░╤Е (╨╜╨░╨┐╨╛╨╝╨╜╤О. ╤Б╨▒╨╛╤А╨╜╨╕╨║ 2015, ╨┤╨╛ ╨║╨╛╨▓╨╕╨┤╨░ ╤З╨╡╤В╤Л╤А╨╡ ╨│╨╛╨┤╨░)"╨Ы╨░╨▓╨║╤Г ╨┤╤Г╤А╨╜╤Л╤Е ╤Б╨╜╨╛╨▓" ╤П ╤Г╨╢╨╡ ╤З╨╕╤В╨░╨╗╨░ ╨╗╨╡╤В╨╛╨╝ 2016 ╨▓ ╨╛╤А╨╕╨│╨╕╨╜╨░╨╗╨╡, ╤Б ╨╜╨╡╨╕╨╖╨▒╨╡╨╢╨╜╤Л╨╝╨╕ ╨┐╤А╨╕ ╤З╤В╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╕ ╨╜╨░ ╨╜╨╡╤А╨╛╨┤╨╜╨╛╨╝ ╤П╨╖╤Л╨║╨╡ ╤Б╨╝╤Л╤Б╨╗╨╛╨▓╤Л╨╝╨╕ ╨╕ ╤Б╤В╨╕╨╗╨╕╤Б╤В╨╕╤З╨╡╤Б╨║╨╕╨╝╨╕ ╨┐╨╛╤В╨╡╤А╤П╨╝╨╕. ╨Т╨╛╨╖╨╝╨╛╨╢╨╜╨╛╤Б╤В╤М ╨┐╨╡╤А╨╡╤Б╨╗╤Г╤И╨░╤В╤М ╨╡╨╡ ╤Б╨╡╨│╨╛╨┤╨╜╤П ╨░╤Г╨┤╨╕╨╛╨║╨╜╨╕╨│╨╛╨╣ ╨▓ ╨▓╨╛╤Б╤Е╨╕╤В╨╕╤В╨╡╨╗╤М╨╜╨╛╨╝ ╨╕╤Б╨┐╨╛╨╗╨╜╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╕ ╨Ш╨│╨╛╤А╤П ╨Ъ╨╜╤П╨╖╨╡╨▓╨░ ╤Б╤В╨░╨╗╨░ ╨╜╨░╤Б╤В╨╛╤П╤Й╨╕╨╝ ╨┐╨╛╨┤╨░╤А╨║╨╛╨╝. ╨в╨░╨║╨╕ ╨┤╨░. ╨Ъ╨╕╨╜╨│ ╨│╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╣.


-- Review in language other than English--
╨в╤А╨╕ ╨╕ ╨┐╨╛╨╗╨╛╨▓╨╕╨╜╨░ ╨╛╤В ╨┐╨╡╤В, ╨╕ ╤В╨╛ ╤Б ╤Г╨│╨╛╨▓╨╛╤А╨║╨╕. ╨Э╨░╨┐╨╛╤Б╨╗╨╡╨┤╤К╨║ ╨╜╨░ ╨Я╨╗╨╡╤П╨┤╨░ ╤Б╤П╨║╨░╤И ╨╕╨╝ ╤Б╨╡ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨▓╤А╤К╤Й╨░ ╨▓ ╨╖╨░╨┐╨░╨╖╨╡╨╜╨░ ╨╝╨░╤А╨║╨░ ╨┤╨░ ╤Ж╨╡╨┐╤П╤В ╨║╨╜╨╕╨│╨╕ ╨╜╨░ ╨Ъ╨╕╨╜╨│ ╨╜╨░ ╨┤╨▓╨╡ (╨┤╨╛╤А╨╕ ╨┤╨░ ╨╡ 648 ╤Б╤В╤А ╨║╨╜╨╕╨│╨░, ╨┤╨╛╤А╨╕ ╨┤╨░ ╨╡ ╨Ъ╨╕╨╜╨│, ╨╝╨░╨╗╨║╨╛ ╨╕ ╨╜╨░╨│╨╗╨╛ ╨┤╨░ ╤В╤Г╤А╨╕╤И 36 ╨╗╨▓ ╨║╨╛╤А╨╕╤З╨╜╨░), ╨┤╨░ ╨╕╨╝ ╨┐╤А╨░╨▓╤П╤В ╨┐╨╛╤Б╤А╨╡╨┤╤Б╤В╨▓╨╡╨╜╨╕ ╨║╨╛╤А╨╕╤Ж╨╕, ╤Б╨╗╨╡╨┤ ╨┐╤К╤А╨▓╨╛╤В╨╛ ╨┐╤А╨╛╤З╨╕╤В╨░╨╜╨╡ ╤Б╤В╤А╨░╨╜╨╕╤Ж╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨┤╨░ ╤Б╨╡ ╨╛╤В╨╗╨╡╨┐╤П╤В, ╨░ ╨┐╨╛╨║╤А╨╕╤В╨╕╨╡╤В╨╛ ╨╜╨░ ╨║╨╛╤А╨╕╤Ж╨░╤В╨░ ╨┤╨░ ╤Б╨╡ ╨╜╨░╨┤╨╕╨│╨░. ╨Ч╨░ ╨╕╨╖╨┤╤К╨╜╨║╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨▓ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨▓╨╛╨┤╨░ ╨┤╨░ ╨╜╨╡ ╨│╨╛╨▓╨╛╤А╤П, ╨▓╨║╨╗╤О╤З╨╕╤В╨╡╨╗╨╜╨╛ ╨╜╨░ ╨╖╨░╨│╨╗╨░╨▓╨╕╨╡╤В╨╛. ╨Э╨╛, ╨╖╨░ ╤Б╤К╨╢╨░╨╗╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╡ ╤В╨╛╨▓╨░ ╨╡ ╨┐╨╛-╨╝╨░╨╗╨║╨╕╤П ╨┐╤А╨╛╨▒╨╗╨╡╨╝. ╨Ю╤Б╨╜╨╛╨▓╨╜╨╕╤П ╨╛╤Б╤В╨░╨▓╨░ ╨║╨░╤З╨╡╤Б╤В╨▓╨╛╤В╨╛, ╤В╨╛╨▓╨░ ╨╝╨╡╨╢╨┤╤Г ╨║╨╛╤А╨╕╤Ж╨╕╤В╨╡. ╨в╨╛╨▓╨░, ╨║╨╛╨╡╤В╨╛ ╨╡ ╨╜╨░╨┐╨╕╤Б╨░╨╗ ╤Б╨░╨╝╨╕╤П╤В ╤Б╨░╨╣ ╨Ъ╨╕╨╜╨│. ╨Р ╤В╨╛, ╨┤╨░ ╤Б╨╕ ╨┐╤А╨╕╨╖╨╜╨░╤П, ╨╜╨╡ ╧Г╬╡ ╬║╬м╧Д╬╣ ╧А╬╡╧Б╬╣╧Г╧Г╧М╧Д╬╡╧Б╬┐ ╬▒╧А╧М ╬╝╬╣╬▒ ╬╝╬н╧Б╬▒. ╬д╬┐ ╧Д╬н╬╗╬┐╧В ╬╝╬╡ ╬▓╧Б╬о╬║╬╡ ╬╜╬▒ ╬┤╬╣╬▒╧Ж╧Й╬╜╧О ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╖ ╬г╬║╬м╬┐╧Е╧Д ╧Д╬╡╬╗╬╣╬║╬м ╧Ж╬▒╬п╬╜╬╡╧Д╬▒╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╧Г╧Е╬╝╬▓╬╣╬▓╬м╬╢╬╡╧Д╬▒╬╣ ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╧А╧Б╬▒╬│╬╝╬▒╧Д╬╣╬║╧М╧Д╬╖╧Д╬▒. ╬С╬╗╬╗╬м ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬║╬▒╧Д╬╖╬│╬┐╧Б╧О. ╬д╬╡╬╗╬╡╬╣╧О╬╜╬┐╬╜╧Д╬▒╧В ╬╕╬н╬╗╧Й ╬╜╬▒ ╧А╧Й ╧М╧Д╬╣ ╬╝╬┐╧Е ╧Ж╬м╬╜╬╖╬║╬╡ ╧А╬▒╧Б╬м╬╛╬╡╬╜╬┐ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬┐ ╧Ж╬п╬╗╬┐╧В ╧Д╬╖╧В ╬┐ ╬з╬н╬╜╧Б╬╣ ╬о╧Д╬▒╬╜ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧А╬▒╬╣╬┤╬╣╬║╧М╧В ╧Д╬╖╧В ╧Ж╬п╬╗╬┐╧В ╬▒╬╗╬╗╬м ╧Г╧Д╬▒ ╬Ъ╬┐╧Д╧Г╧Н╧Ж╬╣╬▒ ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╬▒╬╜╬▒╧Ж╬н╧Б╬╡╧Д╬▒╬╣ ╬║╬▒╬╜. ╬д╬┐╬╜ ╬│╬╜╧О╧Б╬╣╧Г╬╡ ╬╝╬╡╧Д╬м ╧Д╬▒ 12 ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬│╬╣' ╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М; ╬Ж╬╗╬╗╬┐ ╬н╬╜╬▒ ╬╝╧Е╧Г╧Д╬о╧Б╬╣╬┐ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╧А╬╡╧Б╬╣╬▓╬м╬╗╬╗╬╡╬╣ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М ╧Д╬┐ ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬┐. ╬д╬╡╬╗╬╣╬║╬м ╬╝╧А╬┐╧Б╧О ╬╜╬▒ ╧А╧Й ╧М╧Д╬╣ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬▓╬м╬╢╧Й ╬н╬╜╬▒ 3,6, ╬┤╬╖╬╗╬▒╬┤╬о 0,5 ╧А╬▒╧Б╬▒╧А╬м╬╜╧Й ╬▒╧А╧М ╧Д╬▒ ╬Ъ╬┐╧Д╧Г╧Н╧Ж╬╣╬▒, ╬н╧Д╧Г╬╣ ╬│╬╣╬▒ ╬╜╬▒ ╧А╬м╧Б╬╡╬╣ 4 ╬▒╧Г╧Д╬н╧Б╬╣╬▒ ╧Г╧Д╬╖ ╬▓╬▒╬╕╬╝╬┐╬╗╬┐╬│╬п╬▒.

╬Ъ╬▒╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╖ ╬╝╬╣╬║╧Б╬о ╬▒╧Ж╬╖╬│╬о╧Д╧Б╬╣╬▒ ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬▒╧Е╬╕╧М╧Б╬╝╬╖╧Д╬┐ ,╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬▒╬│╬╜╬о ╬▒╬╜╧Д╬╣╬┤╧Б╬▒╧Г╧Д╬╣╬║╬о ╧Г╧Д╬м╧Г╬╖ ╧Г╬╡ ╧М╬╗╬┐ ╧Д╬┐ ╬║╬▒╧Д╬╡╧Г╧Д╬╖╬╝╬н╬╜╬┐ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬║╧Е╧Б╬п╧Й╧В ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬▒╬│╬м╧А╬╖ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╧Д╬╖╧В ╬╝╬╡╧Д╬▒╬│╬│╬╣╧Г╬▒╬╜ -╧Г╬▒╬╜ ╬╣╬╡╧Б╧М ╬м╧З╧Б╧Й╬╝╬┐ ╬▒╬╣╬╝╬▒- ╧Д╬▒ ╧А╧Б╧М╧Д╧Е╧А╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╧А╬╡╧Б╬╣╬▓╬м╬╗╬╗╬┐╬╜╧Д╬┐╧В ╧Д╬╖╧В, ╧Ж╧Д╬м╬╜╬╡╬╣ ╬╡╬╜╬о╬╗╬╣╬║╬╖ ╧А╬╣╬▒ ╬╜╬▒ ╬╡╧А╬╣╧Г╧Д╧Б╬н╧Ж╬╡╬╣ ╧Г╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╧А╬▒╬╗╬╣╬м ╧Д╬╖╧В ╬│╬╡╬╣╧Д╬┐╬╜╬╣╬м, ╧Г╧Д╬┐ ╧А╬▒╧Д╧Б╬╣╬║╧М ╧Д╬╖╧В ╧Г╧А╬╣╧Д╬╣, ╧Г╧Д╬▒ ╧А╬┐╬╗╧Н╧Д╬╣╬╝╬▒ ╧М╬╜╬╡╬╣╧Б╬▒ ╧Д╧Й╬╜ ╧А╬▒╬╣╬┤╬╣╬║╧О╬╜ ╧Д╬╖╧В ╧З╧Б╧М╬╜╧Й╬╜. . . ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╡╬╜╧О ╬┐╬╗╬▒ ╬╡╬╣╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬╡╬║╬╡╬п ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╧А╬╡╧Б╬╣╬╝╬н╬╜╬┐╧Е╬╜, ╧Д╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М╧З╧Б╬┐╬╜╬▒ ╬▒╧А╬┐╧Е╧Г╬╣╬м╬╢╬┐╧Е╬╜. ╬а╬┐╧Е ╬╡╬╣╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬┐ ╬▒╬┤╬╡╬╗╧Ж╧М╧В ╧Д╬╖╧В; ╧Д╬╣ ╧Г╧Е╬╝╬▓╬▒╬п╬╜╬╡╬╣ ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╧А╬▒╧Д╬н╧Б╬▒ ╧Д╬╖╧В ╧А╬┐╧Е ╧Е╧А╬╡╧Б╬▒╧Г╧А╬╣╬╢╧М╧Д╬▒╬╜ ╬╡╬╜╬м╬╜╧Д╬╣╬▒ ╧Г╬╡ ╧М╬╗╬┐╧Е╧В ╧Д╬▒ ╬▒╧А╬▒╬╛╬╣╧Й╬╝╬н╬╜╬▒ "╬║╬┐╧Д╧Г╧Н╧Ж╬╣╬▒";╬а╬┐╧Е ╬н╧З╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╧А╬▒╬╡╬╣ ╧М╬╗╬┐╬╣ ╬┐╬╣ ╧Ж╬п╬╗╬┐╬╣ ╧Д╬╖╧В;╬Я╬╣ ╬┤╬╣╬║╬┐╬п ╧Д╬╖╧В ╬м╬╜╬╕╧Б╧Й╧А╬┐╬╣;╬Ч ╬╜╬╡╬│╧Б╬▒ ╬╜╧Д╬▒╬╜╧Д╬м ╧А╬┐╧Е ╧Д╬╖ ╬╝╬╡╬│╬м╬╗╧Й╧Г╬╡ ╧Г╬▒╬╜ ╬╝╬м╬╜╬▒;╬Ю╬╡╧А╬╡╧Б╬м╧Г╧Д╬╖╬║╬╡ ╧Д╬┐ ╧А╬н╬╜╬╕╬┐╧В ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬┐ ╧З╧Б╧М╬╜╬┐╧В ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬▒╧Ж╬╣╬н╧Б╧Й╬╜╬▒╬╜ ╧Й╧В ╧Д╬╣╬╝╬о ╧Г╧Д╬┐ ╧Д╧Б╬▒╬│╬┐╧Н╬┤╬╣ ╧Д╧Й╬╜ ╬║╬┐╧Д╧Г╧Е╧Ж╬╣╧Й╬╜;╬Я╬╗╬▒ ╬н╧З╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╬▒╬╗╬╗╬м╬╛╬╡╬╣. ╬е╧А╬м╧Б╧З╬╡╬╣ ╬╝╬╣╬▒ ╧И╧Е╧З╧Б╬о ╧Г╧Д╬м╧Г╬╖ ╬▒╧Г╧Ж╬▒╬╗╬╡╬п╬▒╧В. - ╬║╬м╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╡╬┤╧Й ╬▒╧А╬┐╬│╬┐╬╖╧Д╬╡╧Н╬┐╬╝╬▒╬╣ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬│╧Й ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬▒╬╜╬▒╬╢╬╖╧Д╧О ╬╝╬╡ ╧А╬м╬╕╬┐╧В ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬Ж╧Д╧Д╬╣╬║╬┐╧Е╧В ╧Д╧Й╬╜ ╬║╬┐╧Д╧Г╧Е╧Ж╬╣╧Й╬╜, ╬╕╧Е╬╝╧О╬╜╧Й, ╧З╬м╬╜╧Й ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬╡╬╝╧А╬╣╧Г╧Д╬┐╧Г╧Н╬╜╬╖ ╬╝╬┐╧Е ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬║╬▒╧Д╬▒╬╜╬┐╧О ╬▒╧А╬┐╬╗╧Н╧Д╧Й╧В, ╧Д╬▒╧Е╧Д╬п╬╢╬┐╬╝╬▒╬╣ ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬г╬║╬▒╬┐╧Е╧Д. ╬з╬м╬╕╬╖╬║╬▒╬╜ ╧Д╬▒ ╬╣╬┤╬╡╧О╬┤╬╖ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬┐╬╣ ╬▒╬╛╬п╬╡╧В ╧А╬╡╧Б╬п ╬п╧Г╧Й╬╜ ╬┤╬╣╬║╬▒╬╣╧Й╬╝╬м╧Д╧Й╬╜ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╡╬╗╬╡╧Е╬╕╬╡╧Б╬п╬▒╧В. ╬Ъ╬▒╧Д╬▒╬║╧Б╬╖╬╝╬╜╬п╧Г╧Д╬╖╬║╬▒╬╜ ╧Д╬▒ ╬╣╬╜╬┤╬м╬╗╬╝╬▒╧Д╬▒ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╬▒ ╬╡╬╛╬╣╬┤╬▒╬╜╬╣╬║╬╡╧Е╬╝╬╡╬╜╬▒ ╧А╧Б╧М╧Г╧Й╧А╬▒ ╬▒╧А╬┐ ╧Д╬┐ ╬╕╧Б╧М╬╜╬┐ ╧Д╬┐╧Е╧В. ╬Ф╬╡╬╜ ╧Е╧А╬м╧Б╧З╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╬о╧Б╧Й╬╡╧В ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Е╧А╬н╧Б╬╝╬▒╧З╬┐╬╣ ╧Д╬╖╧В ╬╣╧Г╧М╧Д╬╖╧Д╬▒╧В. ╬Ж╬╗╬╗╬╖ ╬╝╬╣╬▒ ╧Ж╬┐╧Б╬м ╬║╬н╧Б╬┤╬╣╧Г╬╡ ╧Д╬┐ ╧Б╬▒╧Д╧Г╬╣╧Г╧Д╬╣╬║╧М ╬▒╧Д╬┐╬╝╬╣╬║╧М ╧Г╧Е╬╝╧Ж╬н╧Б╬┐╬╜. ╬Ф╬╡ ╧Г╬▒╧В ╬║╧Б╧Н╬▓╧Й ╧Г╧Е╬╜╬н╧З╬╣╧Г╬▒ ╬╜╬▒ ╬┤╬╣╬▒╬▓╬м╧Г╧Й ╬╝╬╡ ╬╝╬╡╬│╬м╬╗╬╖ ╬▒╧А╬┐╬│╬┐╬о╧Д╬╡╧Е╧Г╬╖ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╝╬╣╬▒ ╬▒╬п╧Г╬╕╬╖╧Г╬╖ ╬┤╬╣╬м╧И╬╡╧Е╧Г╬╖╧В ╧А╧Б╬┐╧В ╬┐╬╗╬▒ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬║╧Е╧Б╬п╧Й╧В ╧А╧Б╬┐╧В ╧Д╬▒ ╬╝╬╖╬╜╧Н╬╝╬▒╧Д╬▒ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╝╬┐╧Е ╧А╬н╧Б╬▒╧Г╬╡ ╬╖ ╧Г╧Е╬│╬│╧Б╬▒╧Ж╬н╬▒╧В ╧Г╧Д╬┐ ╧А╧Б╧О╧Д╬┐ ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬┐. ╬Ь╬н╧З╧Б╬╣ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬▒╬╜╬▒╧Б╧Й╧Д╬о╬╕╬╖╬║╬▒ ╬│╬╣╬▒╧Д╬╣ ╧Г╧Е╬╝╬▓╬▒╬п╬╜╬╡╬╣ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М; -- Review in language other than English--
SWEDISH REVIEW Det ├дr alltid intressant att l├дsa en den senaste boken i en serie, d├дr man tidigare bara har l├дst en bok innan och i detta fall den allra f├╢rsta boken. Och, eftersom detta ├дr bok 20 s├е har jag n├еgra b├╢cker att ta igen. Dock, var det absolut inga problem att l├дsa denna bok, utan att ha l├дste de 18 b├╢cker mellan f├╢rsta och denna. Tv├дrtom, var det synnerligen enkelt att fastna i handlingen och det tog med bara en dag att l├дsa klart den, b├еde tack vare att den var l├дttl├дst (och inte s├е tjock) samt att ber├дttelsen var intressant. Harry har nu g├еtt i pension, en n├еgot tvingad pension. Dock, s├е verkar det inte som han ska f├е tid ├╢ver att meka med motorcykeln som har st├еtt och v├дntat p├е honom i n├еgra ├еrtionden. Hans halvbror beh├╢ver hj├дlp. En klient till honom ├дr anklagad f├╢r mord och ├дven om det b├дr Harry emot att hj├дlpa en f├╢rsvarsadvokat s├е kan han inget annat ├дn att b├╢rja underska fallet. Speciellt, d├е han uppt├дcker att n├еgot inte st├еr r├дtt till. Men det finns de som inte alls ├дr roade ├╢ver att Harry l├дgger sig i fallet. . . Jag tyckte mycket bra om boken, som jag n├дmnde innan var den v├дldigt l├дttl├дst, inte alltf├╢r komplicerad ber├дttelse samt jag gillar Harry och Mickey skarpt. Jag har l├дnge haft planer p├е att forts├дtta l├дsa serien d├е jag fann f├╢rsta boken l├дsv├дrd, men jag har bara inte hunnit med det. Det var kul att l├дsa denna bok, nu k├дnns det som om jag borde ta och prioritera Connelly och kanske faktiskt ta mig tid och l├дsa de 18 b├╢cker jag missat. Tack till Norstedts f├╢r recensionexemplaret! ENGLISH REVIEW It is always interesting reading the latest book in a series when one has previously only read one book before and in this case the very first book. And, since this is book 20, have I only a few books to tackle. However, it was absolutely no problem to read this book without having read the 18 books between the first and this one. On the contrary, it was very easy to get hooked and it took just one day to finish reading it, both because the book was so easy to read (and not so thick), and that the story was interesting. Harry has now retired, a somewhat forced retirement. However, it does not seem that he will find time to tinkering with the motorcycle that has been waiting for him for a few decades. His half-brother needs help. A client of his is accused of murder and although it at first troubles Harry to help a defense lawyer is he soon caught up in the case. Especially when he discovers that something is not right. But, there are those who are not at all amused that Harry has started to investigate the murder. . . I really liked the book, as I mentioned before it was very easy to read, not an overly complicated story and I like Harry and Mickey very much. I have for a long time had plans to continue reading the series since I liked the first book enough to wanting to know more, but I just have not had time for it. It was fun to read this book, I feel like I should take and prioritize Connelly and perhaps actually take the time and read the 18 books I missed. Thanks to Norstedts for the review copy!

-- Review in language other than English--
Timmie, Juliette en Joy Parker zijn 3 zussen. Ze zijn grotendeels door hun moeder Veronique opgevoed. Hun vader, Paul, was nauwelijks aanwezig en vooral altijd met zichzelf bezig. Nadat hij komt te overlijden krijgen ze allen een deel van de erfenis. Maar deze heeft hij bijzonder verdeeld. Een ieder krijgt wat haar toekomt. Met deze erfenis kunnen alle 4 de vrouwen op hun eigen manier, verder met hun leven. Het verhaal liep totaal anders als wat ik had verwacht. Ik dacht dat het vooral om de 3 zussen zou draaien maar het bleek vooral om Veronique te gaan. Juist de verhaallijn van Veronique was er 1 die mij niet direct aansprak. Ook de keuzes die ze maakte vond ik af en toe een beetje dubieus. De 3 zussen vond ik een leuke combinatie aan persoonlijkheden. Allen hadden echt hun eigen ding wat mij erg aansprak. Ik vond het dan ook jammer dat ze soms wat naar de achtergrond werden gedreven. Voor mij was het wel een lange tijd onduidelijk waar het verhaal naar toe zou gaan. Pas later wordt dit wat duidelijker. In het verhaal wordt er veel gereisd en hierdoor waren er veel verschillende settingen, dit vond ik een erg leuk deel van het verhaal. Hoewel het verhaal absoluut niet was wat ik ervan had verwacht was het wel leuk om te lezen. Op sommige momenten was het ook echt wel een eve-opener.

Kad smo ve─З kod naprednih sustava umjetne inteligencije, moram spomenuti da ─Зe ─Нak i ─Нitateljima koji su naprednije informati─Нki potkovani biti te┼бko shvatiti o ─Нemu Lagercrantz pri─Нa u svojim duga─Нkim opisima procesa hakiranja NSA-e, a kamoli onim ─Нitateljima koji nisu ba┼б vje┼бti s kompjutorima. Krenimo sad na ono ┼бto ─Нini ovaj serijal, a to su njegovi likovi - Blomkvist i Salander - koji su, u ovom romanu, glavni razlog zbojeg mi se on nije uop─Зe svidio. Mikaela Blomkvista ovdje sre─Зemo u krizi srednjih godina, kako besciljno ┼╛ivotari razmi┼бljaju─Зi o svom ┼╛ivotu i tome kako ve─З dugo nije napisao niti jednu reporta┼╛u u rangu onih koje su ga proslavile kao jednog od najzna─Нajnijih ┼бvedskih novinara, a njegov ─Нasopis, Millennium, trenutno prolazi kroz krizno razdoblje. Kontempliraju─Зi o svom ┼╛ivotu, Blomkvist po─Нinje razmi┼бljati nije li vrijeme da napusti Millennium i krene raditi ne┼бto drugo ('. . . jer svemu jednom mora do─Зi kraj' i ostali kli┼бeji). Zvu─Нi li vam ovo uop─Зe kao Blomkvist kojeg svi mi znamo i volimo? Ni meni. Kasnije se malo oporavi od svog tog turobnog promi┼бljanja, ali moram priznati da me ba┼б zasmetala ta ─Нinjenica da razmi┼бlja o napu┼бtanju Millenniuma. Jer, Larssonov Blomkvist to nikad ne bi napravio, Millennium je cijeli njegov svijet, a s obzirom da su visoki moral i po┼бtenje jedna od glavnih obilje┼╛ja koja su ga kroz trilogiju u kojoj smo ga upoznali definirali kao lika, nije nimalo logi─Нno da bi uop─Зe pomislio napustiti novine, pogotovo sada kada se nalaze u financijskim pote┼бko─Зama. Sa Salander je jo┼б gora situacija. Nakon po─Нetnih stotinjak strana, na kojima iskazuje du┼╛no po┼бtovanje njenoj genijalnosti, Lagercrantz se u ostatku romana koncentrira isklju─Нivo na nagla┼бavanje njene ekscentri─Нnosti - toga da je ona djevojka u crnom, tetovirana i ispirsana. Njeno odskakanje izgledom Lagercrantz ima potrebu spomenuti u ba┼б svakoj situaciji u kojoj spominje Lisbeth, ┼бto se nikako ne uklapa u ono ┼бto ovaj serijal ─Нini posebnim: to da nije va┼╛no kako izgleda┼б, jer ─Нak i ljudi koji su najneobi─Нniji i najmanje se uklapaju u nekakve dru┼бtveno uvrije┼╛ene slike o tome kako bi neka osoba trebala izgledati mogu biti genijalni i osobiti. Larsson je Lisbethin izgled njoj pridodao ba┼б kako bi to naglasio, to da se ne mora┼б uklopiti da bio fantasti─Нna osoba, ali nije ga imao potrebu koristiti kao ─Нinjenicu koja ─Зe ju neprestano obilje┼╛avati kao ─Нudakinju, kao ┼бto to ─Нini Lagercrantz. Lagercrantzova Lisbeth u ovom romanu uop─Зe ne nalikuje na ljudsko bi─Зe, nego vi┼бe na nekakvu heroinu iz stripa, jednu od onih kakve obi─Нno nazivamo 'badass', i, iako Lisbeth uistinu je 'badass', ona je toliko puno vi┼бe od ove papirnate i isprane blockbusterske verzije kakvu je Lagercrantz stvorio. Kad se sve zbroji i sve mane stave na stranu, dobije se kakav-takav polu-┼бpijunski, polu-cyber triler koji, kako sam ve─З spomenula, bi bio sasvim ok sam za sebe, ali u serijal Millennium nikako se ne uklapa. Na┼╛alost, nikad ne─Зemo mo─Зi saznati kako bi sve to skupa izgledalo da je serijal nastavljen prema Larssonovim zamislima i kako bi izgledala ova ─Нetvrta knjiga da ju je on napisao. Jedina stvar koju sa sigurno┼б─Зu mo┼╛emo znati je da on ne bi dopustio svu tu komercijalizaciju svog serijala u svrhu profita. Kako je u razgovoru za 'Globus' istaknula njegova partnerica, Eva Gabrielsson: "On [Stieg] to ne bi dopustio. Ne bi dao da se sve to na taj na─Нin brendira, prodaje, iskori┼бtava. Naravno, bio bi sretan ┼бto je slavan pisac i sigurno da bi na┼бi ┼╛ivoti bili druk─Нiji, ali mislim da ne bi dopustio da se sve to razma┼бe na ovaj na─Нin. Ali, njegovo djelo sada nitko ne mo┼╛e braniti, ne postoji nitko tko bi ga za┼бtitio i mislim da i njegov slu─Нaj puno govori o industriji kulture u kojoj ┼╛ivimo. Umjetnike nitko ni┼бta ne pita. ""I to je ono ┼бto Stieg nikad ne bi dopustio, ne bi prodao svoje likove. Oni su njegova djeca. Sada mu je to oduzeto. "Rekla sam na po─Нetku da bi Lagercrantzu mo┼╛da ipak trebalo dati priliku, jer ga se ne mo┼╛e kriviti za gnjusno grabanje Larssonovog oca i brata za njegovim naslije─Сem. No, ba┼б tu me razo─Нarao. Jer, u Lagercrantzovim zahvalama na kraju romana mjesta su prona┼бli i Larssonov otac i Larssonov brat. Ali mislite li da je mjesta tamo prona┼бao i tvorac ovog serijala, zapravo jedina osoba kojoj bi trebalo zahvaliti za to ┼бto je stvorio ovu pri─Нu i ove likove o kojima sad Lagercrantz mo┼╛e nastaviti pisati? Ne. Stiegu Larssonu David Lagercrantz nije osjetio potrebu zahvaliti. I mislim da to sve govori - i o ovoj knjizi, i o njemu kao autoru ove knjige, i o tu┼╛noj sudbini Larssonovog genijalnog serijala.

╬о╧Д╬▒╬╜ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М. ╬Ъ╬▒╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╧Г╬║╬╡╧Ж╧Д╬╡╬п ╬║╬▒╬╜╬╡╬п╧В ╧А╧Й╧В 15 ╬╡╧Е╧Б╧О ╬▒╬│╧М╧Б╬▒╧Г╬▒ ╧М╬╗╬╖ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╧Д╧Б╬╣╬╗╬┐╬│╬п╬▒ ╬╡╬╜╧О ╬┤╬╡╬║╬▒╧А╬н╬╜╧Д╬╡ ╬╡╧Е╧Б╧О ╬╝╬┐╧Е ╬║╧М╧Г╧Д╬╣╧Г╬╡ ╬╝╧М╬╜╬┐ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬Ч ╧Д╧Б╬╣╬╗╬┐╬│╬п╬▒ Millenium ╧Е╧А╬о╧Б╬╛╬╡ ╬│╬╣╬▒ ╬╝╬н╬╜╬▒ ╧Г╬╖╬╝╬▒╬╜╧Д╬╣╬║╧М╧В ╧Г╧Д╬▒╬╕╬╝╧М╧В ╧Г╧Д╬┐ ╬▒╬╜╬▒╬│╬╜╧Й╧Г╧Д╬╣╬║╧М ╬╝╬┐╧Е ╧Д╬▒╬╛╬п╬┤╬╣. ╬д╬▒ ╧Д╧Б╬п╬▒ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╬м ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬▒ ╬╝╬┐╧Е ╧А╧Б╬┐╬║╬м╬╗╬╡╧Г╬▒╬╜ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬▒╬│╬м╧А╬╖ ╬│╬╣╬▒ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬▒╧Г╧Д╧Е╬╜╬┐╬╝╬╣╬║╬о ╬╗╬┐╬│╬┐╧Д╬╡╧З╬╜╬п╬▒ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬│╬╣ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М ╧Д╬┐ ╬╗╧М╬│╬┐ ╬║╬▒╧Д╬н╧З╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╧Г╬╖╬╝╬▒╬╜╧Д╬╣╬║╬о ╬╕╬н╧Г╬╖ ╧Г╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬║╬▒╧Б╬┤╬╣╬м ╬╝╬┐╧Е. ╬Ф╧Е╧Г╧Д╧Е╧З╧О╧В, ╬╝╬╡ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М ╧Д╬┐ ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬┐ ╬▒╧А╬┐╬│╬┐╬╖╧Д╬╡╧Н╧Д╬╖╬║╬▒. ╬Ш╬╡╧Й╧Б╧О ╧М╧Д╬╣ ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╬н╬╝╬┐╬╣╬▒╬╢╬╡ ╬┐╧Н╧Д╬╡ ╧Г╧Д╬┐ ╬╡╬╗╬м╧З╬╣╧Г╧Д╬┐ ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬▒ ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬Ы╬м╧Б╧Г╬┐╬╜. ╬Ъ╬▒╬╣ ╧М╧З╬╣ ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╬▓╧Б╬п╧Г╬║╧Й ╬║╬▒╬╜╬н╬╜╬▒ ╬╡╬╗╬▒╧Ж╧Б╧Е╬╜╧Д╬╣╬║╧М ╧Г╧Д╬┐ ╧Г╧Е╬│╬│╧Б╬▒╧Ж╬н╬▒, ╬│╬╣╬▒╧Д╬п ╧А╬┐╬╗╧Н ╬▒╧А╬╗╬м ╬╝╧А╬┐╧Б╬┐╧Н╧Г╬╡ ╬╜╬▒ ╬▒╧Б╬╜╬╖╬╕╬╡╬п ╬╜╬▒ ╧Д╬┐ ╬│╧Б╬м╧И╬╡╬╣. ╬С╧Б╧З╬╣╬║╬м, ╧Д╬┐ ╬╕╬н╬╝╬▒ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╡╧А╬н╬╗╬╡╬╛╬╡ ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╬о╧Д╬▒╬╜ ╬║╬▒╬╕╧М╬╗╬┐╧Е ╬╡╬╗╬║╧Е╧Г╧Д╬╣╬║╧М ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╝╬┐╧Е ╧Ж╬м╬╜╬╖╬║╬╡ ╧Г╬╡ ╧А╬┐╬╗╬╗╬м ╧Г╬╖╬╝╬╡╬п╬▒ ╬╝╬▒╬║╧Б╬╖╬│╬┐╧Б╬┐╧Н╧Г╬╡ ╬м╧Г╬║╬┐╧А╬▒. ╬С╬╗╬╗╬м ╬╡╬║╬╡╬п╬╜╬┐ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╝╬┐╧Е ╬н╬╗╬╡╬╣╧И╬╡ ╧А╬╡╧Б╬╣╧Г╧Г╧М╧Д╬╡╧Б╬┐ ╬о╧Д╬▒╬╜ ╬┐ ╧Д╧Б╧М╧А╬┐╧В ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬┐ ╬Ы╬м╧Б╧Г╬┐╬╜ ╧Г╧З╬┐╬╗╬п╬▒╬╢╬╡ ╬║╬┐╬╣╬╜╧Й╬╜╬╣╬║╬м ╧Ж╬▒╬╣╬╜╧М╬╝╬╡╬╜╬▒, ╧М╧А╧Й╧В ╬╖ ╬│╧Е╬╜╬▒╬╣╬║╬╡╬п╬▒ ╬║╬▒╬║╬┐╧А╬┐╬п╬╖╧Г╬╖ ╬о ╧Д╬┐ ╧Д╧Б╬м╧Ж╬╣╬║╬╣╬╜╬│╬║. ╬С╧Е╧Д╧М╧В ╬┐ ╧Г╧З╬┐╬╗╬╣╬▒╧Г╬╝╧М╧В ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╬о╧Д╬▒╬╜ ╬║╬▒╬╕╧М╬╗╬┐╧Е ╬╡╬╛╧М╧Ж╬╕╬▒╬╗╬╝╬┐╧В ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Г╬╡ ╬н╬║╬▒╬╜╬╡ ╬╜╬▒ ╬╜╬╣╧О╬╕╬╡╬╣╧В ╧М╧Д╬╣ ╬┐ ╧Г╧Е╬│╬│╧Б╬▒╧Ж╬н╬▒╧В ╧Г╬┐╧Е ╧И╬╣╬╕╧Н╧Б╬╣╬╢╬╡ ╬║╬м╧Д╬╣ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╕╬н╬╗╬╡╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╧Ж╧Й╬╜╬м╬╛╬╡╬╣. "╬д╬┐ ╬║╬┐╧Б╬п╧Д╧Г╬╣ ╧Г╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬╣╧Г╧Д╧М ╧Д╬╖╧В ╬▒╧Б╬м╧З╬╜╬╖╧В" ╬н╬╜╬╣╧Й╧Г╬▒ ╧М╧Д╬╣ ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╬н╧З╬╡╬╣ ╬║╬м╧Д╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╧А╬╡╬╣. ╬Й╧Д╬▒╬╜, ╬▒╧А╬╗╧О╧В, ╬╝╬╣╬▒ ╬╣╧Г╧Д╬┐╧Б╬п╬▒ ╬│╬╣╬▒ ╬╜╬▒ ╬╡╬║╬╝╬╡╧Д╬▒╬╗╬╗╬╡╧Е╧Д╬┐╧Н╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬╡╧А╬╣╧Д╧Е╧З╬п╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╧Е Millenium ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╧А╬┐╧Е╬╗╬о╧Г╬┐╧Е╬╝╬╡. ╬Х╧А╬п╧Г╬╖╧В, ╬┐╬╣ ╧З╬▒╧Б╬▒╬║╧Д╬о╧Б╬╡╧В ╬╝╬┐╧Е ╧Ж╬м╬╜╬╖╬║╬▒╬╜ ╬║╬м╧А╧Й╧В "╬╕╬▒╬╝╧А╬┐╬п" . ╬г╧Д╬▒ ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬Ы╬м╧Б╧Г╬┐╬╜ ╬╖ ╧Г╬║╬╣╬▒╬│╧Б╬м╧Ж╬╖╧Г╬╖ ╧Д╧Й╬╜ ╧З╬▒╧Б╬▒╬║╧Д╬о╧Б╧Й╬╜ ╧Д╧Й╬╜ ╧А╧Б╧Й╧Д╬▒╬│╧Й╬╜╬╣╧Г╧Д╧О╬╜ ╬│╬╣╬╜╧М╧Д╬▒╬╜ ╬╝╬н╧Г╧Й ╧Д╬╖╧В ╬┤╧Б╬м╧Г╬╖╧В, ╬╡╬╜╧О ╬╡╬┤╧О ╬│╬╣╬╜╧М╧Д╬▒╬╜ ╬╖ ╧А╬╡╧Б╬╣╬│╧Б╬▒╧Ж╬о ╧Д╬┐╧Е╧В ╬╝╬н╧Г╧Й ╧Д╧Й╬╜ ╧Е╧А╬┐╬╗╬┐╬п╧А╧Й╬╜ ╧З╬▒╧Б╬▒╬║╧Д╬о╧Б╧Й╬╜. ╬г╬╡ ╧А╬┐╬╗╬╗╬м ╧Г╬╖╬╝╬╡╬п╬▒, ╬▒╬╣╧Г╬╕╬м╬╜╬╕╬╖╬║╬▒ ╧М╧Д╬╣ ╬▒╧Г╧З╬┐╬╗╬┐╧Н╬╜╧Д╬▒╬╜ ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬┐╧Е╧В ╬м╬╗╬╗╬┐╧Е╧В ╬о╧Б╧Й╬╡╧В, ╬н╧Д╧Г╬╣ ╧О╧Г╧Д╬╡ ╬╜╬▒ ╬║╬▒╬╗╧Н╧И╬╡╬╣ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╬о ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬▒╬┤╧Е╬╜╬▒╬╝╬п╬▒. ╬д╬н╬╗╬┐╧В, ╬╖ ╬┤╧Б╬м╧Г╬╖ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬Ь╬п╬║╬▒╬╡╬╗ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╬╖╧В ╬Ы╬п╧Г╬╝╧А╬╡╧Д ╬╝╬┐╧Е ╧Ж╬м╬╜╬╖╬║╬╡ ╬╗╬п╬│╬╖. ╬г╧Д╬▒ ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬Ы╬м╧Б╧Г╬┐╬╜ ╬┐╬╣ ╬о╧Б╧Й╬╡╧В ╬╝╧М╬╜╬┐╬╣ ╧Д╬┐╧Е╧В ╬║╬▒╬╕╬┐╧Б╬п╬╢╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╧Д╧Н╧З╬╖ ╧Д╬┐╧Е╧В, ╬╡╬╜╧О ╧Г╧Д╬┐ ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬┐ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬Ы╬м╬│╬║╬╡╧Б╬║╧Б╬▒╬╜╧Д╬╢ ╬╖ ╬┤╧Б╬м╧Г╬╖ ╧Д╧Й╬╜ ╬╖╧Б╧О╧Й╬╜ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬▒╧А╧М╧Б╧Б╬┐╬╣╬▒ ╧Д╬╖╧В ╧Д╧Н╧З╬╖╧В, ╬▒╧А╬╗╧О╧В ╬н╧Д╧Е╧З╬╡ ╬╜╬▒ ╬▓╧Б╬╡╬╕╬┐╧Н╬╜ ╬╝╧А╬╗╬╡╬│╬╝╬н╬╜╬┐╬╣. ╬Ъ╬м╧А╬┐╬╣╬┐╬╣ ╬╕╬▒ ╧А╬┐╧Е╬╜ ╧М╧Д╬╣ ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╧А╧Б╬н╧А╬╡╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╧Г╧Е╬│╬║╧Б╬п╬╜╬╡╧Д╬▒╬╣ ╬┐ ╬н╬╜╬▒╧В ╧Г╧Е╬│╬│╧Б╬▒╧Ж╬н╬▒╧В ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╬м╬╗╬╗╬┐╬╜, ╬▒╬╗╬╗╬м ╬╡╬│╧О ╧А╬╣╧Г╧Д╬╡╧Н╧Й ╧А╧Й╧В ╧М╧Д╬▒╬╜ ╬▒╬╜╬▒╬╗╬▒╬╝╬▓╬м╬╜╬╡╬╣╧В ╬╜╬▒ ╬│╧Б╬м╧И╬╡╬╣╧В ╬н╬╜╬▒ ╧Д╬н╧Д╬┐╬╣╬┐ ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬┐ ╬╖ ╧Г╧Н╬│╬║╧Б╬╣╧Г╬╖ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬▒╬╜╬▒╧А╧М╧Ж╬╡╧Е╬║╧Д╬╖. ╬Ч ╬│╬╜╧О╬╝╬╖ ╬╝╬┐╧Е ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╧М╧Д╬╣ ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╬н╧А╧Б╬╡╧А╬╡ ╬╜╬▒ ╧Г╧Е╬╜╬╡╧З╬╣╧Г╧Д╬╡╬п ╧Д╬┐ Millenium. ╬С╬╜ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Е╧А╬о╧Б╧З╬▒╬╜ ╬║╬м╧А╬┐╬╣╬▒ ╬╡╧Б╧Й╧Д╬о╬╝╬▒╧Д╬▒ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬н╧А╧Б╬╡╧А╬╡ ╬╜╬▒ ╬▒╧А╬▒╬╜╧Д╬╖╬╕╬┐╧Н╬╜, ╬╡╬п╧З╬╡ ╬н╬╜╬▒ ╬╣╬║╬▒╬╜╬┐╧А╬┐╬╣╬╖╧Д╬╣╬║╧М ╧Д╬н╬╗╬┐╧В. ╬г╬╡ ╬║╬▒╬╝╬п╬▒ ╧А╬╡╧Б╬п╧А╧Д╧Й╧Г╬╖, ╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М ╧Д╬┐ ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬┐ ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╬▒╧А╬м╬╜╧Д╬╖╧Г╬╡ ╧Г╧Д╬▒ ╬╡╧Б╧Й╧Д╬о╬╝╬▒╧Д╬▒ ╬╝╬┐╧Е, ╬╝╧М╬╜╬┐ ╬┐ ╬Ы╬м╧Б╧Г╬┐╬╜ ╬╕╬▒ ╬╝╧А╬┐╧Б╬┐╧Н╧Г╬╡ ╬╜╬▒ ╧Д╬▒ ╬▒╧А╬▒╬╜╧Д╬о╧Г╬╡╬╣ ╬▒╬╗╬╗╬м ╬┤╧Е╧Г╧Д╧Е╧З╧О╧В ╬╝╬▒╧В ╬м╧Ж╬╖╧Г╬╡ ╬╜╧Й╧Б╬п╧В. ╬Ф╬╡╬╜ ╧З╧Б╬╡╬╣╬▒╬╢╧М╧Д╬▒╬╜ ╬╜╬▒ ╬│╧Б╬▒╧Ж╧Д╬╡╬п ╬м╬╗╬╗╬┐ ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬┐. ╬Ф╬╡╬╜ ╧А╧Б╬н╧А╬╡╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╬╕╧Е╧Г╬╣╬м╬╢╬┐╬╜╧Д╬▒╬╣ ╧М╬╗╬▒ ╧Г╧Д╬┐ ╬▓╧Й╬╝╧М ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╧З╧Б╬о╬╝╬▒╧Д╬┐╧В. ╬Ь╬▒╬║╬м╧Б╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╬╝╬╖╬╜ ╬│╧Б╬▒╧Ж╧Д╬╡╬п ╬╡╧А╧М╬╝╬╡╬╜╬┐. ╬С╬╜ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╬┐ ╬▓╬╗╬н╧А╧Й ╬┤╧Н╧Г╬║╬┐╬╗╬┐. .

-- Review in language other than English--
A young successful beauty with skin as black as pitch, suddenly goes to meet her former teacher, whom she herself helped to put in jail. Those opportunities that fate generously poured out to Bride collapsed for her former teacher Sofia, who was forced to vegetate for a decade and a half on a government purse. What could be the reason for such a strange act? We understand from the very beginning that perjury. And that's it, but in the novel it's like this, for the future. Well, I've got an aunt for fifteen years, so what? She then came to meet her at the prison gates with a set of cosmetics and a wad of cash. And this white fool instead of gratitude beat our black beauty in the blood - ay-ay-ay! But Bride didn't even complain about her to the police, although she could have. Soon she is completely healthy, and can again cherish childhood resentments against the fate that created her, the daughter of almost white parents, so coal-black. At their mother, who was ashamed of her black hair; at their father, who abandoned them altogether. And I am haunted by a situation in which someone's life ruined by a conspiracy does not outweigh the suffering of the heroine about the fact that her beloved left, pubic hair disappeared, earlobes overgrown, and her chest became flat. And when they reunited, everything came back - Hooray! And you don't have to worry about the unfortunate teacher - she's just white (so by definition a racist). Political correctness, brought to the point of absurdity, does not guarantee even a great writer from strange books. ╨з╨╡╤А╨╜╨░╤П ╨╜╨╡╨▓╨╡╤Б╤Вa╨п, ╤Б╨╛╨▓╨╡╤А╤И╨╡╨╜╨╜╨╛ ╨┐╨╛╤В╨╡╤А╤П╨▓ ╨▒╨╕╨╗╨░ ╨╡╨╡ ╨╕ ╨╜╨╛╨│╨░╨╝╨╕, ╨╕ ╨║╤Г╨╗╨░╨║╨░╨╝╨╕, ╨╕, ╨║╨░╨║ ╨╜╨╕ ╤Б╤В╤А╨░╨╜╨╜╨╛, ╤Н╤В╨╛ ╨┐╨╛╨┤╨░╤А╨╕╨╗╨╛ ╨╝╨╜╨╡ ╨║╤Г╨┤╨░ ╨▒╨╛╨╗╨╡╨╡ ╨╛╤Й╤Г╤В╨╕╨╝╨╛╨╡ ╤З╤Г╨▓╤Б╤В╨▓╨╛ ╤Б╨▓╨╛╨▒╨╛╨┤╤Л, ╤З╨╡╨╝ ╨┐╨╛╨╗╤Г╤З╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╡ ╨г╨Ф╨Ю. ╨Ъ╤В╨╛ ╨╜╨╡ ╨▓╤Л╨╜╨╛╤Б╨╕╤В ╤Б╨┐╨╛╨╣╨╗╨╡╤А╨╛╨▓ - ╨╜╨╡ ╤З╨╕╤В╨░╨╣╤В╨╡. ╨Э╨╡ ╤В╨╛, ╤З╤В╨╛ ╤Б╨╡╨╣╤З╨░╤Б ╨▒╤Г╨┤╨╡╤В ╨║╨░╨║╨╛╨╣-╤В╨╛ ╤Б╨╛╨▓╤Б╨╡╨╝ ╨╗╤О╤В╤Л╨╣, ╨╜╨╡ ╨╜╨░╨┤╨╛ ╨▒╤Л╤В╤М ╤Б╨╡╨╝╨╕ ╨┐╤П╨┤╨╡╨╣ ╨▓╨╛ ╨╗╨▒╤Г, ╤З╤В╨╛╨▒╤Л ╤Б╨╗╨╛╨╢╨╕╤В╤М ╨┤╨▓╨░ ╨╕ ╨┤╨▓╨░ ╨╕ ╨┐╨╛╨╜╤П╤В╤М, ╤З╤В╨╛ ╨╝╨╛╨╗╨╛╨┤╨░╤П ╤Г╤Б╨┐╨╡╤И╨╜╨░╤П ╨╢╨╡╨╜╤Й╨╕╨╜╨░ ╨╡╨┤╨╡╤В ╨▓╤Б╤В╤А╨╡╤З╨░╤В╤М ╤Б ╨┐╨╛╨┤╨░╤А╨║╨░╨╝╨╕ ╨╕ ╨┤╨╡╨╜╨╡╨╢╨╜╤Л╨╝ ╨║╨╛╨╜╨▓╨╡╤А╤В╨╛╨╝ ╨╛╤Б╨▓╨╛╨▒╨╛╨╢╨┤╨╡╨╜╨╜╤Г╤О ╨┐╨╛ ╨г╨Ф╨Ю ╤Г╨╖╨╜╨╕╤Ж╤Г ╨╜╨╡ ╨╕╨╖ ╨░╨╗╤М╤В╤А╤Г╨╕╤Б╤В╨╕╤З╨╡╤Б╨║╨╕╤Е ╨┐╨╛╨▒╤Г╨╢╨┤╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╣. ╨в╨╡╨╝ ╨▒╨╛╨╗╨╡╨╡, ╨╢╨╡╨╜╤Й╨╕╨╜╤Г, ╨┐╤А╨╛╤В╨╕╨▓ ╨║╨╛╤В╨╛╤А╨╛╨╣ ╤А╨╡╨▒╨╡╨╜╨║╨╛╨╝ ╤Б╨▓╨╕╨┤╨╡╤В╨╡╨╗╤М╤Б╤В╨▓╨╛╨▓╨░╨╗╨░ ╨▓ ╤Б╤Г╨┤╨╡ ╨┐╤П╤В╨╜╨░╨┤╤Ж╨░╤В╤М ╨╗╨╡╤В ╨╜╨░╨╖╨░╨┤. ╨Э╨░ ╤Б╤Г╨┤╨╡╨▒╨╜╨╛╨╝ ╨┐╤А╨╛╤Ж╨╡╤Б╤Б╨╡ ╤Г╤З╨╕╤В╨╡╨╗╨╡╨╣-╨┐╨╡╨┤╨╛╤Д╨╕╨╗╨╛╨▓, ╨║╨╛╤В╨╛╤А╤Л╨╣ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨╢╨┤╨╡ ╨║╤В╨╛-╤В╨╛ ╨┤╨╛╨╗╨╢╨╡╨╜ ╨▒╤Л╨╗ ╨╕╨╜╨╕╤Ж╨╕╨╕╤А╨╛╨▓╨░╤В╤М, ╤В╨░╨║? ╨в╨╛ ╨╡╤Б╤В╤М, ╨╜╨╡ ╨▒╤Л╨▓╨░╨╡╤В ╨╢╨╡. ╤З╤В╨╛╨▒╤Л ╨┤╨╛╨╜╨╛╤Б ╨╕ ╤Б╤А╨░╨╖╤Г ╤Б╤Г╨┤ ╤Б ╨▓╤Л╨╜╨╡╤Б╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╡╨╝ ╤Б╤А╨╛╨║╨░ ╨▓ ╨┤╨▓╨░╨┤╤Ж╨░╤В╤М ╨┐╤П╤В╤М ╨╗╨╡╤В? ╨б╨╜╨░╤З╨░╨╗╨░ ╤Б╨╗╨╡╨┤╤Б╤В╨▓╨╡╨╜╨╜╤Л╨╡ ╨┤╨╡╨╣╤Б╤В╨▓╨╕╤П ╤Б╨╛ ╤Б╨▒╨╛╤А╨╛╨╝ ╨┤╨╛╨║╨░╨╖╨░╤В╨╡╨╗╤М╤Б╤В╨▓, ╤Г╨╗╨╕╨║ ╨╕ ╨▓╤Б╤П╨║╨╛╨│╨╛ ╤В╨░╨║╨╛╨│╨╛, ╨┐╨╛╤В╨╛╨╝ ╨╛╨╖╨╜╨░╨║╨╛╨╝╨╗╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╡ ╨╛╨▒╨▓╨╕╨╜╤П╨╡╨╝╨╛╨│╨╛ ╤Б ╨┤╨╡╨╗╨╛╨╝, ╤Б╤Г╨┤╨╡╨▒╨╜╤Л╨╡ ╤Б╨╗╤Г╤И╨░╨╜╨╕╤П, ╤Б╨▓╨╕╨┤╨╡╤В╨╡╨╗╤М╤Б╨║╨╕╨╡ ╨┐╨╛╨║╨░╨╖╨░╨╜╨╕╤П. ╨з╤В╨╛╨▒╤Л ╨▓╨╛╤В ╤В╨░╨║ ╨▓╤Л╤И╨╗╨░ ╨┤╨╡╨▓╨╛╤З╨║╨░, ╤В╨║╨╜╤Г╨╗╨░ ╨┐╨░╨╗╤М╤З╨╕╨║╨╛╨╝: ╨▓╨╕╨┤╨╡╨╗╨░, ╨╝╨╛╨╗, ╨║╨░╨║ ╨╛╨╜╨╕ ╨┤╨╡╨╗╨░╨╗╨╕ ╤Б ╨┤╨╡╤В╤М╨╝╨╕ ╤Н╤В╨╕ ╨│╨░╨┤╨╛╤Б╤В╨╕ - ╨╕ ╨░╨│╨░! ╨в╨░╨║╨╛╨╡ ╨▓╤А╤П╨┤ ╨╗╨╕ ╨╝╨╛╨│╨╗╨╛ ╨▒╤Л╤В╤М ╨┤╨░╨╢╨╡ ╨▓ ╤Б╨▓╨╡╤А╤Е╨╛╨╖╨░╨▒╨╛╤З╨╡╨╜╨╜╨╛╨╣ ╨╖╨░╤Й╨╕╤В╨╛╨╣ ╨┤╨╡╤В╨╡╨╣ ╨╛╤В ╨┐╨╡╨┤╨╛╤Д╨╕╨╗╨╛╨▓ ╨Р╨╝╨╡╤А╨╕╨║╨╡?╨Я╨╛╤В╨╛╨╝╤Г ╤З╤В╨╛ ╨┤╨╗╤П ╨░╨╝╨╡╤А╨╕╨║╨░╨╜╤Б╨║╨╛╨╣ ╨╝╨╡╨╜╤В╨░╨╗╤М╨╜╨╛╤Б╤В╨╕ ╨┤╨╡╤В╨╛╤Ж╨╡╨╜╤В╤А╨╕╨╖╨╝ ╨╕ ╨▒╨╡╨╖╨╛╨┐╨░╤Б╨╜╨╛╤Б╤В╤М ╨┤╨╡╤В╨╡╨╣ ╨▒╨╛╨╗╤М╨╜╨░╤П ╨╕ ╤Б╨║╨▓╨╛╨╖╨╜╨░╤П ╤В╨╡╨╝╨░. ╨Э╨░╤З╨╕╨╜╨░╤П ╤Б "╨Я╤А╨╕╨║╨╗╤О╤З╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╣ ╨У╨╡╨║╨╗╤М╨▒╨╡╤А╨╕ ╨д╨╕╨╜╨╜╨░", ╨╕╨╖ ╨║╨╛╤В╨╛╤А╤Л╤Е ╨▓╤Л╤И╨╗╨░ ╨▓╤Б╤П ╨░╨╝╨╡╤А╨╕╨║╨░╨╜╤Б╨║╨░╤П ╨╗╨╕╤В╨╡╤А╨░╤В╤Г╤А╨░, ╤З╨╡╤А╨╡╨╖ ╨е╨░╤А╨┐╨╡╤А ╨Ы╨╕, ╨в╤А╤Г╨╕╨╡╨╜╨░ ╨Ъ╨░╨┐╨╛╤В╨╡, ╨б╤В╨╕╨▓╨╡╨╜╨░ ╨Ъ╨╕╨╜╨│╨░, ╨е╨░╨╜╤М╤О ╨п╨╜╨░╨│╨╕╤Е╨░╤А╤Г - ╤Б╤В╨╛╤П╨╜╨╕╨╡ ╨╜╨░ ╤А╨╢╨░╨╜╨╛╨╝ ╨┐╨╛╨╗╨╡ ╨╜╨░╨┤ ╨╛╨▒╤А╤Л╨▓╨╛╨╝ ╨╕ ╨╗╨╛╨▓╨╗╤П ╨╕╨│╤А╨░╤О╤Й╨╕╤Е ╨╜╨░ ╨╜╨╡╨╝ ╨┤╨╡╤В╨╕╤И╨╡╨║, ╨║╨╛╤В╨╛╤А╤Л╨╡ ╤Б╨╗╨╕╤И╨║╨╛╨╝ ╨▒╨╗╨╕╨╖╨║╨╛ ╨┐╨╛╨┤╨▒╨╡╨│╨░╤О╤В ╨║ ╨║╤А╨░╤О - ╨╛╤Б╨╜╨╛╨▓╨╛╨┐╨╛╨╗╨░╨│╨░╤О╤Й╨░╤П ╨╕╨┤╨╡╤П. ╨в╨░╨║ ╨▓╨╛╤В. ╨▓╨╛╨╖╨▓╤А╨░╤Й╨░╤П╤Б╤М ╨║ ╨║╨╜╨╕╨│╨╡ ╨╕ ╨╡╨╡ ╨│╨╡╤А╨╛╨╕╨╜╨╡. ╨Ь╨╛╨╗╨╛╨┤╨░╤П ╤Г╤Б╨┐╨╡╤И╨╜╨░╤П ╨║╤А╨░╤Б╨░╨▓╨╕╤Ж╨░ ╤Б ╨║╨╛╨╢╨╡╨╣ ╤З╨╡╤А╨╜╨╛╨╣ ╨║╨░╨║ ╤Б╨╝╨╛╨╗╤М, ╨▓╨╜╨╡╨╖╨░╨┐╨╜╨╛ ╨╡╨┤╨╡╤В ╨▓╤Б╤В╤А╨╡╤З╨░╤В╤М ╨╜╨░ ╤Б╨▓╨╛╨╡╨╝ ╨┐╨╕╨╢╨╛╨╜╤Б╨║╨╛╨╝ ╨░╨▓╤В╨╛ ╤В╨╡╤В╨║╤Г, ╨▒╤Л╨▓╤И╤Г╤О ╤Г╤З╨╕╤В╨╡╨╗╤М╨╜╨╕╤Ж╤Г, ╨║╨╛╤В╨╛╤А╤Г╤О ╤Б╨░╨╝╨░ ╨╢╨╡ ╨╕ ╨┐╨╛╨╝╨╛╨│╨╗╨░ ╨╖╨░╤Б╨░╨┤╨╕╤В╤М. ╨в╨╡ ╨▓╨╛╨╖╨╝╨╛╨╢╨╜╨╛╤Б╤В╨╕ ╨║╨╛╤В╨╛╤А╤Л╨╡ ╤Б╤Г╨┤╤М╨▒╨░ ╤Й╨╡╨┤╤А╨╛ ╨╛╤В╤Б╤Л╨┐╨░╨╗╨░ ╨С╤А╨░╨╣╨┤ ╤Б╤Е╨╗╨╛╨┐╨╜╤Г╨╗╨╕╤Б╤М ╨┤╨╗╤П ╨╡╨╡ ╨▒╤Л╨▓╤И╨╡╨╣ ╤Г╤З╨╕╤В╨╡╨╗╤М╨╜╨╕╤Ж╤Л ╨б╨╛╤Д╨╕╨╕, ╨▓╤Л╨╜╤Г╨╢╨┤╨╡╨╜╨╜╨╛╨╣ ╨┐╤А╨╛╨╖╤П╨▒╨░╤В╤М ╨┐╨╛╨╗╤В╨╛╤А╨░ ╨┤╨╡╤Б╤П╤В╨║╨░ ╨╗╨╡╤В ╨╜╨░ ╨║╨░╨╖╨╡╨╜╨╜╨╛╨╝ ╨║╨╛╤И╤В╨╡. ╨з╤В╨╛ ╨╝╨╛╨│╨╗╨╛ ╨▒╤Л ╨┐╨╛╤Б╨╗╤Г╨╢╨╕╤В╤М ╨┐╤А╨╕╤З╨╕╨╜╨╛╨╣ ╤В╨░╨║╨╛╨│╨╛ ╤Б╤В╤А╨░╨╜╨╜╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨┐╨╛╤Б╤В╤Г╨┐╨║╨░? ╨Ь╤Л ╤Б ╤Б╨░╨╝╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨╜╨░╤З╨░╨╗╨░ ╨┐╨╛╨╜╨╕╨╝╨░╨╡╨╝, ╤З╤В╨╛ ╨╗╨╢╨╡╤Б╨▓╨╕╨┤╨╡╤В╨╡╨╗╤М╤Б╤В╨▓╨╛. ╨Ш ╨▓╨╛╤В ╤Н╤В╨╛ ╨┤╨░╨╜╨╛ ╨▓ ╤А╨╛╨╝╨░╨╜╨╡ ╤В╨░╨║, ╨▓╨┐╤А╨╛╨▒╤А╨╛╤Б. ╨Э╤Г ╨╖╨░╨║╨╛╨╜╨╛╨┐╨░╤В╨╕╨╗╨░ ╤В╨╡╤В╨║╤Г ╨╜╨░ ╨┐╤П╤В╨╜╨░╨┤╤Ж╨░╤В╤М ╨╗╨╡╤В, ╨╜╤Г ╨╕ ╤З╤В╨╛? ╨Ю╨╜╨░ ╨╢╨╡ ╨┐╨╛╤В╨╛╨╝ ╨┐╤А╨╕╨╡╤Е╨░╨╗╨░ ╨▓╤Б╤В╤А╨╡╤З╨░╤В╤М ╨╡╨╡ ╨║ ╨▓╨╛╤А╨╛╤В╨░╨╝ ╤В╤О╤А╤М╨╝╤Л ╤Б ╨╜╨░╨▒╨╛╤А╨╛╨╝ ╨║╨╛╤Б╨╝╨╡╤В╨╕╨║╨╕ ╨╕ ╨┐╨░╤З╨║╨╛╨╣ ╨╜╨░╨╗╨╕╤З╨╜╤Л╤Е. ╨Р ╤Н╤В╨░ ╨▒╨╡╨╗╨░╤П ╨┤╤Г╤А╨╕╤Й╨░ ╨▓╨╝╨╡╤Б╤В╨╛ ╨▒╨╗╨░╨│╨╛╨┤╨░╤А╨╜╨╛╤Б╤В╨╕ ╨╕╨╖╨▒╨╕╨╗╨░ ╨╜╨░╤И╤Г ╤З╨╡╤А╨╜╤Г╤О ╨║╤А╨░╤Б╨░╨▓╨╕╤Ж╤Г ╨▓ ╨║╤А╨╛╨▓╤М - ╨░╨╣-╨░╨╣-╨░╨╣! ╨Э╨╛ ╨С╤А╨░╨╣╨┤ ╨┤╨░╨╢╨╡ ╨╜╨╡ ╤Б╤В╨░╨╗╨░ ╨╢╨░╨╗╨╛╨▓╨░╤В╤М╤Б╤П ╨╜╨░ ╨╜╨╡╨╡ ╨▓ ╨┐╨╛╨╗╨╕╤Ж╨╕╤О, ╤Е╨╛╤В╤П ╨╝╨╛╨│╨╗╨░ ╨▒╤Л. ╨Т╤Б╨║╨╛╤А╨╡ ╨╛╨╜╨░ ╤Б╨╛╨▓╤Б╨╡╨╝ ╨╖╨┤╨╛╤А╨╛╨▓╨░, ╨╕ ╨╝╨╛╨╢╨╡╤В ╤Б╨╜╨╛╨▓╨░ ╨╗╨╡╨╗╨╡╤П╤В╤М ╨┤╨╡╤В╤Б╨║╨╕╨╡ ╨╛╨▒╨╕╨┤╤Л ╨╜╨░ ╤Б╤Г╨┤╤М╨▒╤Г, ╤Б╨╛╤В╨▓╨╛╤А╨╕╨▓╤И╤Г╤О ╨╡╨╡, ╨┤╨╛╤З╤М ╨┐╤А╨░╨║╤В╨╕╤З╨╡╤Б╨║╨╕ ╨▒╨╡╨╗╤Л╤Е ╤А╨╛╨┤╨╕╤В╨╡╨╗╨╡╨╣, ╤В╨░╨║╨╛╨╣ ╤Г╨│╨╛╨╗╤М╨╜╨╛-╤З╨╡╤А╨╜╨╛╨╣. ╨Э╨░ ╨╝╨░╤В╤М, ╨║╨╛╤В╨╛╤А╨░╤П ╤Б╤В╤Л╨┤╨╕╨╗╨░╤Б╤М ╤Б╨▓╨╛╨╡╨╣ ╤З╨╡╤А╨╜╤Г╤И╨║╨╕; ╨╜╨░ ╨╛╤В╤Ж╨░, ╨║╨╛╤В╨╛╤А╤Л╨╣ ╨▓╨╛╨▓╤Б╨╡ ╨▒╤А╨╛╤Б╨╕╨╗ ╨╕╤Е. ╨Р ╨║╨╛╨│╨┤╨░ ╨С╤А╨░╨╣╨┤ ╨▓ ╨┐╨░╤А╨╛╨║╤Б╨╕╨╖╨╝╨╡ ╨╛╤В╨║╤А╨╛╨▓╨╡╨╜╨╜╨╛╤Б╤В╨╕ ╤А╨░╤Б╤Б╨║╨░╨╢╨╡╤В ╨╛╨▒ ╨░╤В╤В╤А╨░╨║╤Ж╨╕╨╛╨╜╨╡ ╨╜╨╡╤Б╨╗╤Л╤Е╨░╨╜╨╜╨╛╨╣ ╨┤╨╛╨▒╤А╨╛╤В╤Л ╨╗╤О╨▒╨╕╨╝╨╛╨╝╤Г ╨С╤Г╨║╨╡╤А╤Г (╨┐╨╛╨╖╨░╨▒╤Л╨▓ ╨┤╨╛╨▒╨░╨▓╨╕╤В╤М, ╤З╤В╨╛ ╨▒╨╡╨┤╨╜╤Г╤О ╨╢╨╡╨╜╤Й╨╕╨╜╤Г ╨╛╨╜╨░ ╨╛╨║╨╗╨╡╨▓╨╡╤В╨░╨╗╨░, ╤З╤В╨╛╨▒╤Л ╨┤╨╛╨▒╨╕╤В╤М╤Б╤П ╨▓╨╜╨╕╨╝╨░╨╜╨╕╤П ╨╝╨░╤В╨╡╤А╨╕, ╨╕ ╨┐╨╛╤В╨╛╨╝╤Г ╤З╤В╨╛ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨╢╨┤╨╡ ╨▒╤Л╨╗╨░ ╤Б╨▓╨╕╨┤╨╡╤В╨╡╨╗╤М╨╜╨╕╤Ж╨╡╨╣ ╨╕╨╖╨╜╨░╤Б╨╕╨╗╨╛╨▓╨░╨╜╨╕╤П ╨┐╨╛╨┤╤А╨╛╤Б╤В╨║╨░ ╨╕╤Е ╨║╨▓╨░╤А╤В╨╕╤А╨╜╤Л╨╝ ╤Е╨╛╨╖╤П╨╕╨╜╨╛╨╝, ╨╜╨╛ ╤В╨╛╨│╨┤╨░ ╨╜╨╡ ╤Б╨╝╨╛╨│╨╗╨░ ╨╜╨╕╤З╨╡╨│╨╛ ╤А╨░╤Б╤Б╨║╨░╨╖╨░╤В╤М, ╨┐╨╛╤В╨╛╨╝╤Г ╤З╤В╨╛ ╨╝╨░╤В╤М ╨╖╨░╨┐╤А╨╡╤В╨╕╨╗╨░ ╨╡╨╣ ╨╕╨╖ ╤Б╤В╤А╨░╤Е╨░ ╤З╤В╨╛ ╨╛╨╜╨╕ ╨╜╨╡ ╤Б╨╝╨╛╨│╤Г╤В ╨╜╨░╨╣╤В╨╕ ╤В╨░╨║╨╛╨╡ ╨╢╨╡ ╨┤╨╡╤И╨╡╨▓╨╛╨╡ ╨╢╨╕╨╗╤М╨╡) ╨в╨░╨║ ╨▓╨╛╤В, ╨║╨╛╨│╨┤╨░ ╨╛╨╜╨░ ╤А╨░╤Б╤Б╨║╨░╨╢╨╡╤В ╤Б╨▓╨╛╨╡╨╝╤Г ╤З╨╡╤А╨╜╨╛╨╝╤Г ╨┐╨╛╨╗╤Г╨▒╨╛╨│╤Г ╨С╤Г╨║╨╡╤А╤Г, ╤В╨╛╤В ╨┐╤А╨╛╤Б╤В╨╛ ╨▒╤А╨╛╤Б╨╕╤В ╨╡╨╡, ╨┐╨╛╤В╨╛╨╝╤Г ╤З╤В╨╛ ╨╜╨╡╨╗╤М╨╖╤П ╨▒╤Л╤В╤М ╨┤╨╛╨▒╤А╤Л╨╝ ╤Б ╤В╨░╨║╨╕╨╝╨╕. ╨Т╨╛╨╛╨▒╤Й╨╡, ╨║╨╛╨╗╨╕╤З╨╡╤Б╤В╨▓╨╛ ╨┐╨╡╨┤╨╛╤Д╨╕╨╗╨╛╨▓ ╨╕ ╨┤╨╡╤В╨╡╨╣, ╤Б╤В╨░╨▓╤И╨╕╤Е ╨╢╨╡╤А╤В╨▓╨░╨╝╨╕ ╨╜╨░╤Б╨╕╨╗╨╕╤П ╨▓ ╤А╨╛╨╝╨░╨╜╨╡ ╨╖╨░╤И╨║╨░╨╗╨╕╨▓╨░╨╡╤В: ╤Г ╨С╤Г╨║╨╡╤А╨░ ╨╛╤В ╤А╤Г╨║ ╤В╨░╨║╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨╝╨╡╤А╨╖╨░╨▓╤Ж╨░ ╨┐╨╛╨│╨╕╨▒ ╨▒╤А╨░╤В (╨╕ ╨╡╤Й╨╡ ╨┤╨╡╤Б╤П╤В╤М ╨┤╨╡╤В╨╡╨╣); ╨╝╨░╨╗╨╡╨╜╤М╨║╨░╤П ╨Ы╤Г╨╗╤Г ╨Ь╤Н╨╣ ╨▓╨╕╨┤╨╕╤В ╨╕╨╖╨╜╨░╤Б╨╕╨╗╨╛╨▓╨░╨╜╨╕╨╡ ╤А╨╡╨▒╨╡╨╜╨║╨░ (╤З╤В╨╛, ╨┐╤А╤П╨╝╨╛ ╨╜╨░ ╤Г╨╗╨╕╤Ж╨╡?); ╨┤╨╡╨▓╨╛╤З╨║╤Г ╨а╨╡╨╣╨╜, ╨║╨╛╤В╨╛╤А╨░╤П ╤Б╨▒╨╡╨╢╨░╨╗╨░ ╨╕╨╖ ╨┤╨╛╨╝╨░ ╨╕ ╨▒╤Л╨╗╨░ ╤Г╨┤╨╛╤З╨╡╤А╨╡╨╜╨░ ╨┐╨░╤А╨╛╨╣ ╨┤╨╛╨▒╤А╤Л╤Е ╤Е╨╕╨┐╨┐╨╕, ╨┐╤А╨╛╨┤╨░╨▓╨░╨╗╨░ ╤А╨╛╨┤╨╜╨░╤П ╨╝╨░╤В╤М. ╨а╨╡╨░╨╗╤М╨╜╨╛, ╨║╨░╨╢╨╡╤В╤Б╤П, ╨┐╨╗╤О╨╜╤М - ╨┐╨╛╨┐╨░╨┤╨╡╤И╤М ╨▓ ╨╕╨╖╨▓╤А╨░╤Й╨╡╨╜╤Ж╨░. ╨Т╨░╨╝ ╨╜╨╡ ╨║╨░╨╢╨╡╤В╤Б╤П, ╤З╤В╨╛ ╤Н╤В╨╛ ╤З╨╡╤А╨╡╤Б╤З╤Г╤А? ╨Ь╨╜╨╡ - ╨┤╨░. ╨Ш ╨╝╨╜╨╡ ╨╜╨╡ ╨┤╨░╨╡╤В ╨┐╨╛╨║╨╛╤П ╤Б╨╕╤В╤Г╨░╤Ж╨╕╤П, ╨▓ ╨║╨╛╤В╨╛╤А╨╛╨╣ ╤З╤М╤П-╤В╨╛ ╨╖╨░╨│╤Г╨▒╨╗╨╡╨╜╨╜╨░╤П ╨╛╨│╨╛╨▓╨╛╤А╨╛╨╝ ╨╢╨╕╨╖╨╜╤М ╨╜╨╡ ╨┐╨╡╤А╨╡╨▓╨╡╤И╨╕╨▓╨░╨╡╤В ╤Б╤В╤А╨░╨┤╨░╨╜╨╕╨╣ ╨│╨╡╤А╨╛╨╕╨╜╨╕ ╨┐╨╛ ╨┐╨╛╨▓╨╛╨┤╤Г ╤В╨╛╨│╨╛, ╤З╤В╨╛ ╨╗╤О╨▒╨╕╨╝╤Л╨╣ ╨▒╤А╨╛╤Б╨╕╨╗, ╨▓╨╛╨╗╨╛╤Б╤Л ╨╜╨░ ╨╗╨╛╨▒╨║╨╡ ╨╕╤Б╤З╨╡╨╖╨╗╨╕, ╨╝╨╛╤З╨║╨╕ ╤Г╤И╨╡╨╣ ╨╖╨░╤А╨╛╤Б╨╗╨╕, ╨░ ╨│╤А╤Г╨┤╤М ╤Б╨┤╨╡╨╗╨░╨╗╨░╤Б╤М ╨┐╨╗╨╛╤Б╨║╨╛╨╣. ╨Р ╨║╨╛╨│╨┤╨░ ╨╛╨╜╨╕ ╨▓╨╛╤Б╤Б╨╛╨╡╨┤╨╕╨╜╨╕╨╗╨╕╤Б╤М , ╨▓╤Б╨╡ ╨▓╨╡╤А╨╜╤Г╨╗╨╛╤Б╤М - ╨г╤А╨░! ╨Ш ╨╝╨╛╨╢╨╜╨╛ ╨╜╨╡ ╨┐╨░╤А╨╕╤В╤М╤Б╤П ╨┐╨╛ ╨┐╨╛╨▓╨╛╨┤╤Г ╨╜╨╡╤Б╤З╨░╤Б╤В╨╜╨╛╨╣ ╤Г╤З╨╕╨╗╨║╨╕ - ╨╛╨╜╨░ ╨╢╨╡ ╨▓╤Б╨╡╨│╨╛ ╨╗╨╕╤И╤М ╨▒╨╡╨╗╨░╤П (╨╖╨╜╨░╤З╨╕╤В ╨┐╨╛ ╨╛╨┐╤А╨╡╨┤╨╡╨╗╨╡╨╜╨╕╤О ╤А╨░╤Б╨╕╤Б╤В╨║╨░). ╨Я╨╛╨╗╨╕╤В╨║╨╛╤А╤А╨╡╨║╤В╨╜╨╛╤Б╤В╤М, ╨┤╨╛╨▓╨╡╨┤╨╡╨╜╨╜╨░╤П ╨┤╨╛ ╨░╨▒╤Б╤Г╤А╨┤╨░ ╨┤╨░╨╢╨╡ ╨▓╨╡╨╗╨╕╨║╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨┐╨╕╤Б╨░╤В╨╡╨╗╤П ╨╜╨╡ ╨│╨░╤А╨░╨╜╤В╨╕╤А╤Г╨╡╤В ╨╛╤В ╤Б╤В╤А╨░╨╜╨╜╤Л╤Е ╨║╨╜╨╕╨│.

Una historia narrada desde varios puntos de vista pero siendo el principal el de Bride, una mujer afroamericana cuya madre blanca la rechaz├│ durante toda su infancia. Ahora, ella es una mujer hermosa y exitosa pero que arrastrar├б todos los problemas de su pasado y tratar├б de resolverlos junto a diversos personajes que incluyen no s├│lo el tema del racismo sino tambi├йn el abuso sexual a menores, el machismo, los enga├▒os, las mentiras, etc. Muy interesante y corto de leer, definitivamente vale mucho la pena!

╬С╬╜ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬н╧З╧Й ╬▒╧Б╬║╬╡╧Д╬м ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╧Г╧Е╬│╬│╧Б╬▒╧Ж╬н╬▒ ╧Г╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬╣╬┐╬╕╬о╬║╬╖ ╬╝╬┐╧Е ╬╡╬┤╧О ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬║╬▒╬╣╧Б╧М, ╬н╧Д╧Е╧З╬╡ ╬╖ ╧А╧Б╧О╧Д╬╖ ╬╝╬┐╧Е ╬╡╧А╬▒╧Ж╬о ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬┐ ╬н╧Б╬│╬┐ ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬╜╬▒ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╬┐ "╬Я ╬╛╬н╬╜╬┐╧В", ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬║╧Е╬║╬╗╬┐╧Ж╧М╧Б╬╖╧Г╬╡ ╧Г╧Д╬▒ ╬╡╬╗╬╗╬╖╬╜╬╣╬║╬м ╧А╧Б╬╣╬╜ ╬╗╬п╬│╬╡╧В ╬╝╬н╧Б╬╡╧В. ╬Я ╬з╬м╧Б╬╗╬▒╬╜ ╬Ъ╧М╬╝╧А╬╡╬╜ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬▒╧А╧М ╧Д╬▒ ╬╝╬╡╬│╬м╬╗╬▒ ╬┐╬╜╧М╬╝╬▒╧Д╬▒ ╧Д╬╖╧В ╬▒╧Г╧Д╧Е╬╜╬┐╬╝╬╣╬║╬о╧В ╬╗╬┐╬│╬┐╧Д╬╡╧З╬╜╬п╬▒╧В ╧Г╧Д╬╣╧В ╬Ч╬╜╧Й╬╝╬н╬╜╬╡╧В ╬а╬┐╬╗╬╣╧Д╬╡╬п╬╡╧В, ╬н╧З╬╡╬╣ ╧Г╧Д╬┐ ╬╡╬╜╬╡╧Б╬│╬╖╧Д╬╣╬║╧М ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╧А╬┐╬╗╬╗╬м ╬╝╧Е╬╕╬╣╧Г╧Д╬┐╧Б╬о╬╝╬▒╧Д╬▒, ╬╡╬╜╧О ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬╗╬п╬│╬▒ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧Д╬▒ ╬▓╧Б╬▒╬▓╬╡╬п╬▒ ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬н╧З╬╡╬╣ ╬║╬╡╧Б╬┤╬п╧Г╬╡╬╣. ╬У╬╡╬╜╬╣╬║╬м ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬н╬╜╬▒ ╧Г╬п╬│╬┐╧Е╧Б╬┐ ╧М╬╜╬┐╬╝╬▒ ╧Г╧Д╬┐ ╬╡╬п╬┤╬┐╧В. ╬Ф╬╣╬▒╬▓╬м╬╢╬┐╬╜╧Д╬▒╧В ╧Д╬┐ ╬▓╬╣╬▓╬╗╬п╬┐ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╧М, ╬╝╧А╬┐╧Б╧О ╬╜╬▒ ╬╡╧А╬╣╬▓╬╡╬▓╬▒╬╣╧О╧Г╧Й ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╧А╬┐╬╣╧М╧Д╬╖╧Д╬м ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╧Г╬▒╬╜ ╧Г╧Е╬│╬│╧Б╬▒╧Ж╬н╬▒ ╬╕╧Б╬п╬╗╬╡╧Б, ╬╝╬╣╬▒╧В ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬┤╬╣╬м╬▓╬▒╧Г╬▒ ╬н╬╜╬▒ ╧А╬┐╬╗╧Н ╬╡╬╜╬┤╬╣╬▒╧Ж╬н╧Б╬┐╬╜, ╬║╬▒╬╗╬┐╬│╧Б╬▒╬╝╬╝╬н╬╜╬┐ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬▒╬│╧Й╬╜╬╣╧О╬┤╬╡╧В ╬╝╧Е╬╕╬╣╧Г╧Д╧М╧Б╬╖╬╝╬▒. ╬Я ╬Ж╬╜╧Д╬▒╬╝ ╬а╧Б╬м╬╣╧В ╬╢╬╡╬╣ ╧Д╬┐ ╬С╬╝╬╡╧Б╬╣╬║╬м╬╜╬╣╬║╬┐ ╬М╬╜╬╡╬╣╧Б╬┐, ╧М╬╜╧Д╬▒╧В ╧А╬▒╬╜╧Д╧Б╬╡╬╝╬н╬╜╬┐╧В ╬╝╬╡ ╬╝╬╣╬▒ ╧М╬╝╬┐╧Б╧Ж╬╖ ╬│╧Е╬╜╬▒╬п╬║╬▒, ╬н╧З╬┐╬╜╧Д╬▒╧В ╬┤╧Е╬┐ ╬║╬▒╬╗╬м ╧А╬▒╬╣╬┤╬╣╬м, ╬╢╧О╬╜╧Д╬▒╧В ╧Г'╬н╬╜╬▒ ╬м╬╜╬╡╧Д╬┐ ╧Г╧А╬п╧Д╬╣ ╧Г╧Д╬▒ ╧А╧Б╬┐╬м╧Г╧Д╬╣╬▒ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬н╧З╬┐╬╜╧Д╬▒╧В ╬╝╬╣╬▒ ╧Г╬п╬│╬┐╧Е╧Б╬╖ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬║╬▒╬╗╬┐╧А╬╗╬╖╧Б╧Й╬╝╬н╬╜╬╖ ╬┤╬┐╧Е╬╗╬╡╬╣╬м. ╬М╬╝╧Й╧В, ╬╝╬╣╬▒ ╬╝╬н╧Б╬▒, ╬н╬╜╬▒╧В ╬╛╬н╬╜╬┐╧В ╬╕╬▒ ╬н╧Б╬╕╬╡╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╧Д╬▒ ╬▒╬╜╬▒╧Д╧Б╬н╧И╬╡╬╣ ╧М╬╗╬▒ ╬▒╧Е╧Д╬м, ╬▒╧А╬┐╬║╬▒╬╗╧Н╧А╧Д╬┐╬╜╧Д╬▒╧В ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬н╬╜╬▒ ╬╝╧Е╧Г╧Д╬╣╬║╧М ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬▒╧Ж╬┐╧Б╬м ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬│╧Е╬╜╬▒╬п╬║╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╧Е. ╬Я ╬Ж╬╜╧Д╬▒╬╝ ╬╕╬▒ ╧З╬м╧Г╬╡╬╣ ╧Д╬┐ ╬н╬┤╬▒╧Ж╬┐╧В ╬║╬м╧Д╧Й ╬▒╧А╧М ╧Д╬▒ ╧А╧М╬┤╬╣╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╧Е, ╬╕'╬▒╧Б╧З╬п╧Г╬╡╬╣ ╬╜╬▒ ╧А╬╣╧Г╧Д╬╡╧Н╬╡╬╣ ╧М╧Д╬╣ ╬╖ ╬┐╬╜╬╡╬╣╧Б╬╣╬║╬о ╧Д╬┐╧Е ╬╢╧Й╬о ╬о╧Д╬▒╬╜ ╬╝╬╣╬▒ ╬▒╧А╬╗╬о ╧И╬╡╧Е╬┤╬▒╬п╧Г╬╕╬╖╧Г╬╖. ╬М╬╝╧Й╧В ╬┤╬╡╬╜ ╬╕╬▒ ╬╝╧А╬┐╧Б╬┐╧Н╧Г╬╡ ╬╜╬▒ ╬┤╬╣╬▒╬╜╬┐╬╖╬╕╬╡╬п ╧М╧Д╬╣ ╬╝╧А╬╗╬н╧З╧Д╬╖╬║╬╡ ╧Г╬╡ ╬╝╬╣╬▒ ╧А╬╣╬┐ ╧А╬╡╧Б╬п╧А╬╗╬┐╬║╬╖ ╬╣╧Г╧Д╬┐╧Б╬п╬▒, ╧А╬┐╧Е ╬╕╬▒ ╧Д╬┐╬╜ ╧Ж╬н╧Б╬╡╬╣ ╬▒╬╜╧Д╬╣╬╝╬н╧Д╧Й╧А╬┐ ╬╝╬╡ ╬╡╧А╬╣╬║╬п╬╜╬┤╧Е╬╜╬┐╧Е╧В ╬▒╬╜╬╕╧Б╧О╧А╬┐╧Е╧В ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧А╬┐╬╗╬╗╬м ╬м╬╗╬╗╬▒ ╬╝╧Е╧Г╧Д╬╣╬║╬м. . . ╬Ч ╬╣╧Г╧Д╬┐╧Б╬п╬▒ ╧Г╧Е╬╜╬┤╧Е╬м╬╢╬╡╬╣ ╧Г╬╡ ╧А╬┐╬╗╧Н ╬╣╬║╬▒╬╜╬┐╧А╬┐╬╣╬╖╧Д╬╣╬║╧М ╬▓╬▒╬╕╬╝╧М ╧Д╬┐ ╬║╬┐╬╣╬╜╧Й╬╜╬╣╬║╧М ╬┤╧Б╬м╬╝╬▒ ╬╝╬╡ ╧Д╬┐ ╬▒╧Г╧Д╧Е╬╜╬┐╬╝╬╣╬║╧М ╬╕╧Б╬п╬╗╬╡╧Б, ╧А╧Б╬┐╧Г╧Ж╬н╧Б╬┐╬╜╧Д╬▒╧В ╬▒╧Б╬║╬╡╧Д╧М ╬╝╧Е╧Г╧Д╬о╧Б╬╣╬┐, ╬╝╧А╧М╬╗╬╣╬║╬┐ ╧Г╬▒╧Г╧А╬н╬╜╧В, ╬╗╬п╬│╬╖ ╬┤╧Б╬м╧Г╬╖ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╧А╬┐╬╗╬╗╬о ╬▒╬│╧Й╬╜╬п╬▒ ╧А╧Б╬┐╧В ╧Д╬┐ ╧Д╬н╬╗╬┐╧В, ╧Д╬┐ ╬┐╧А╬┐╬п╬┐ ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╬╣╬┤╬╣╬▒╬п╧Д╬╡╧Б╬▒ ╬┤╧Е╬╜╬▒╧Д╧М ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬▒╬╜╬▒╧Д╧Б╬╡╧А╧Д╬╣╬║╧М. ╬М╧Г╬┐╬╜ ╬▒╧Ж╬┐╧Б╬м ╧Д╬╖╬╜ ╬│╧Б╬▒╧Ж╬о, ╬╡╬п╬╜╬▒╬╣ ╧А╬┐╬╗╧Н ╬║╬▒╬╗╬о, ╬╡╧Е╬║╬┐╬╗╬┐╬┤╬╣╬м╬▓╬▒╧Г╧Д╬╖ ╬║╬▒╬╣ ╬╛╬╡╬║╬┐╧Н╧Б╬▒╧Г╧Д╬╖, ╬╝╬╡ Tack till Bookmarks f├╢rlag f├╢r recensionsexemplaret! ENGLISH REVIEW Harlan Coben has once again done it! I have a feeling I could start any review with that when it comes to Coben's books. But, then again Harlan Coben is one of my favorite writers and there is a very good reason for it and that is his ability to over and over write great books. The Stranger is no exception, it starts tremendously good with a stranger telling Adam Price a secret that Adam's wife has and Adam do not want to believe the stranger's words, but slowly it is poisoning it his mind and finally he must confront her and that becomes the start of an exciting and intriguing thriller. Now I will not in any way reveal the plot of this book, the Stranger is a book that should be read with no prior knowledge of what was going to happen. But I want to point out that the book is extremely interesting and Harlan Coben's ability to create interesting characters are as usual on top. I almost finished the book the same day I got it, but unfortunately, I had to work the day after so I had to wait to finish it to the day after. The only thing with the book that I felt was missing was a more wow ending. Not that the end was somehow bad, but I felt it lacked that little extra. The Stranger can join the rest of Harlan Coben's group of amazing thrillers. Personally, I think that if you have to choose a thriller writer to read is so Coben choice number 1! Iremos conhec├к-los, compreend├к-los, am├б-los! Abby, Red, Amanda, Jeannie, Denny, Stem s├гo humanos como n├│s. Personagens complexas e multifacetadas com muito para dar e explorar. E ├й quase certo que iremos, dalguma forma, rever-nos nalguns deles! O Carrinho de Linha Azul ├й uma est├│ria sobre N├│s os Humanos. Conhec├к-los ├й conhecermo-nos! Uma leitura imprescind├нvel ├аqueles que pretendem dar mais uns passos no trilho do auto-conhecimento! ! ! ЁЯСН

-- Review in language other than English--
Een van de belangrijkste aspecten van de roman is de kracht van de personages. In de Mijn Strijd cyclus van Karl Ove Knausgard krijg je misschien wel het meest uitgediepte romanpersonage voorgeschoteld dat je ooit gaat tegenkomen in de literatuur: Karl Ove Knausgard zelf. Eigenlijk staat deze hele serie als het ware in dienst van de belevingswereld van dat personage. Knausgard lijkt er zelfs een deel van zijn proza voor te hebben opgeofferd, goed schrijven kan hij heus wel, maar in deze boeken laat hij dat na om zijn eigen verhaal zo eerlijk mogelijk te vertellen. De eerste drie boeken had ik al met plezier gelezen, en dit boek past zonder meer in dat rijtje. We krijgen hier twee versies te zien van het personage Karl Ove. Enerzijds de stoere, spijbelende scholier die zich eigenlijk alleen druk maakt om muziek en meisjes, en zicht het liefst elke avond klemzuipt. Maar ook de de achttienjarige die met een diploma op zak naar een gehucht in Noord Noorwegen trekt om les te geven. Naast muziek en meisjes is schrijven nu het belangrijkste in zijn leven, maar voor sociale contacten is hij vooral overgeleverd aan de gratie van de dorpelingen. De Engelse subtitel van dit boek is 'Dancing in the Dark' en dat dekt de lading van het boek precies. Zoals Knausgard het zelf beschrijft: "Maar deze duisternis was anders. Deze duisternis verstikte alles. . . Ik had het gevoel alsof ik geen enkele weerklank vond. Hoezeer ik me ook inzette, er kwam niets voor terug. Alles verdween, alles loste op in dat grote donker waarin we leefden. " Hij kent veel periodes van onzekerheid en treurnis, en zijn enige manier om daarmee om te gaan is zich te bezatten en in een roes van alcohol dan maar een leuke tijd te hebben, met alcohol op is namelijk alles leuk. Wanneer je leest dat hij als zestienjarige vijf flessen wijn drinkt op een avond en zijn broer daarvan schrikt, ga je je afvragen of Karl Ove niet het alcoholisme van zijn vader ge├лrfd heeft. De drang om schrijver te worden lijkt naast de alcohol het enige waar hij zich aan vastklampt. "Ze hadden me verraden, ik was down, ja, alles zag zwart van binnen, maar ik zat in mijn eentje te drinken, ik was een schrijver. Dat konden zij niet zeggen. Zij waren niets. "In alle boeken vormt de vader van Knausgard in zekere zin het zwaartepunt. In boek 1 spreekt dit voor zich, in boek 2 wil hij een betere vader zijn dan zijn eigen vader, in boek 3 voel je de constante spanning van de kleine Karl Ove die bang is gestraft te worden en in dit boek zie je het trieste verval richting alcoholisme. Er zitten veel enorm pijnlijke scenes in met Karl Over en zijn vader. De meest pijnlijke was dat zijn vader op de avond van zijn eigen bruiloft onder invloed en huilend zijn ouders opbelt, zich afvragend waarom ze niet op zijn minst een bloemetje hadden gestuurd. Verder volgen we Karl Ove in zijn zoektocht om eindelijk een keer met een meisje naar bed te gaan. "Zelfs als het onderdeel uitmaakte van een satanistisch inwijdingsritueel met geitenbloed en hoeden op". Gaandeweg krijg je haast medelijden met hem, maar het zijn ook de grappigste passages uit het boek. Hij wordt een soort antiheld die je gaat aanmoedigen, maar door allerlei onvoorziene omstandigheden steeds maar weer zijn doel niet weet te bereiken. Op een gegeven moment in dit boek bekritiseert Knausgard Milan Kundera dat die teveel voor zijn personages spreekt, en dat hij daarmee laat doorschemeren dat zijn personages niet bestaan. Je kan van alles vinden van deze boeken, maar de personages, Karl Ove zelf voorop, zijn mensen van vlees en bloed. Of ze naar waarheid worden geportretteerd doet er niet toe, want het is geschreven vanuit de belevingswereld van slechts een iemand, en die is altijd subjectief. Het universele van al zijn ervaringen, of dat nou over alchohol, school, familierelaties of geluk gaat, maakt dat deze boeken mij zo aanspreken. Waarom juist Knausgard zo interessant is om te volgen kan ik niet uitleggen, maar ik denk dat het ermee te maken heeft dat er nooit eerder een romancyclus zo ontwapenend als deze verschenen is.

Dancing with a bonerDopo aver lasciato, alla fine del terzo volume, un Karl Ove tredicenne che dall'isola di Trom├╕y si trasferiva con la famiglia a Kristiansand, lo ritroviamo qui alle soglie dell'et├а adulta. Diciotto anni e con il gymnas, il liceo, ormai alle spalle, Karl Ove brama la vera vita che gli si spalanca davanti in un caleidoscopio di seducenti possibilit├а. Senza la bench├й minima voglia di continuare gli studi, Karl Ove fa domanda per ricoprire un ruolo annuale di insegnante in un paesino sperduto nella Norvegia settentrionale, il cui nome fittizio ├и H├еfjord, assimilabile con ogni probabilit├а ad un borgo di pescatori della Sardegna, se questa si trovasse al nord del circolo polare. L'ambientazione e gli eventi qui narrati andranno poi a costituire la principale fonte di ispirazione per il primo romanzo di Knausg├еrd, Ute av verden, con il quale vinse nel 1998 il prestigioso premio della critica norvegese. Non riesco ancora a capire come sia possibile che ad un diciottenne, fresco di liceo e senza alcuna formazione o esperienza nel campo, venga permesso di insegnare a degli studenti che in alcuni casi sono quasi dei coetanei, ma va be', quelli so' scandinavi, sono di vedute aperte o forse capita solo nei paeselli in Culonia dove nessuno vuole andare e il tasso di suicidi supera di gran lunga quello delle nascite. Poi c'├и questa abitudine, tipicamente scandinava a quanto pare*, per cui gli studenti vanno a trovare i propri insegnanti a casa, semplicemente perch├й si annoiano o perch├й vogliono curiosare. Se ai tempi della scuola i miei compagni mi avessero proposto di andare a trovare, che so, la professoressa di matematica, forse sarei scoppiato a piangere e mi sarei provocato volontariamente un salasso mortale con la punta del compasso. In realt├а questa fantomatica H├еfjord sembra un piccolo paradiso: il mare, i fiordi, l'aurora boreale, le atmosfere ovattate, la neve! Il motivo principale, infatti, per cui Karl Ove si propone per questo incarico ├и proprio l'isolamento, che si ├и imposto forzatamente allo scopo di trovare il tempo per scrivere. Il suo obiettivo ├и quello di ritornare al sud, alla fine di quell'anno, con un romanzo o dei racconti in valigia. Le parti pi├╣ interessanti del romanzo sono state per me esattamente quelle in cui descrive l'impegno creativo e gli sforzi con cui esplora e sperimenta alla ricerca di una propria voce. Oh shit, this was no good either! All the fires in the darkness, the tall mountain and the immense plain, it had been so fantastic! On paper it was nothing. I moved to the sofa and started writing my diary instead. 'Have to work on transferring the moods from inside to outside,' I wrote 'But how? Easier to describe people's actions, but that's not enough, I don't think. On the other hand, Hemingway did it. 'Dopo aver descritto la prima settimana di lavoro, l'impatto con gli studenti, i colleghi e la gente del posto, la gran parte del libro si concentra sugli anni del gymnas, il cui leitmotiv ├и l'alcol, fiumi e fiumi di alcol, un consumo sporadico di droghe e l'ossessione per le ragazze**. Il Karl Ove adolescente scopre ben presto che l'alcol ├и il modo perfetto per confrontarsi con la vita sociale, per rilassarsi e sentirsi abbastanza coraggiosi da provarci con qualche ragazza, ma non si accontenta dell'occasionale cocktail che ti rende un po' brillo ed euforico. . . no, qui si parla di almeno tre bottiglie di vino a sera, o una bottiglia intera di vodka. Ma che fegato avranno mai 'sti scandinavi? Da far concorrenza ai russi e agli scozzesi messi insieme. Una roba che se avessi seguito i ritmi di Knausg├еrd, mi sarei presentato all'esame di maturit├а con il volto itterico e la cirrosi epatica. . . a me che brucia lo stomaco con un po' di peperonata! Non fu mai tanto vero che talis pater, talis filius, e infatti questi sono gli anni in cui ha inizio il lento e inesorabile processo di decadimento dello stesso padre di Karl Ove che, dopo essersi risposato e trasferito al nord, scivola sempre di pi├╣ nella spirale dell'alcolismo. Parte degli eventi che riguardano il padre sono ricostruiti tramite i diari che quest'ultimo aveva preso l'abitudine di compilare, osservazioni lapidarie e appunti apparentemente banali, dai quali Knausg├еrd ricava un'immagine nuova del proprio padre, ormai quasi totalmente spogliato di quell'aria di rigidit├а e autorevolezza che aveva permeato tutta la sua infanzia. Ormai dovrei essermi abituato alla schiettezza di Knausg├еrd, ma a volte continua a lasciarmi davvero sorpreso. Il libro descrive minuziosamente i tentativi (mancati) di arrivare, come direbbero in un film americano, in quarta base - di fare sesso, insomma. La perdita della verginit├а, la El Dorado di ogni adolescente. Sicuramente esister├а qualche statistica pi├╣ precisa, ma oserei ipotizzare che la quasi totalit├а degli adolescenti mente spudoratamente in fatto di sesso. E' una legge di sopravvivenza. In Dancing in the dark, invece, Karl Ove si mette completamente a nudo - che giochi di parole, eh! - rivelando, tra un'erezione al momento meno opportuno e un'eiaculazione precoce, tutte le imbarazzanti cilecche della sua adolescenza. Chapeau! Ci vuol un bel coraggio. Ottimo volume, forse il pi├╣ ironico e divertente finora. ______* Anche ne L'isola dell'infanzia Karl Ove va a trovare la propria insegnante insieme all'amico Geir, se non ricordo male. **Ho scoperto che Knausg├еrd ├и vittima della mia stessa malattia - l'innamoramento facile. E' un problema molto sottovalutato! Non ├и per niente semplice innamorarsi e avere il cuore spezzato tre e quattro volte al giorno. ______Nel caso ve lo foste persi, vi consiglio l'articolo di Knausg├еrd uscito proprio qualche giorno fa sull'Internazionale - si chiama Viaggio al centro del cervello ed ├и il resoconto dell'esperienza fatta dallo scrittore in Albania, dove ha assistito ad alcune operazioni al cervello effettuate dal chirurgo Herny Marsh su pazienti coscienti. Da brividi! L'articolo era gi├а uscito sul New York Times lo scorso dicembre. E' un bel po' lunghetto, ma ne vale veramente la pena.

Spettacolo. Confermo il mio amore per quest'uomo. Dopo un terzo capitolo che non mi aveva del tutto fatto impazzire qui si torna a livelli altissimi. Meglio del secondo, per me, e quasi alla pari del primo. Il libro inizia con un Karl Ove diciottenne alle prese con il suo primo lavoro: fare l'insegnante a H├еfjord, un villaggio di pescatori sperduto e piccolissimo dalle parti di Troms├╕, al Circolo Polare. Nel resoconto di questo anno scolastico si inserisce, al centro, un flashback bello corposo che racconta gli ultimi anni del liceo. In generale pi├╣ azione e meno riflessioni rispetto ai volumi precedenti. Meno disamine filosofiche, sociologiche, psicologiche. Leitmotiv:1. cercare a tutti i costi una ragazza da portarsi a letto;2. ubriacarsi, di continuo, fino a dimenticare tutto;3. la musica;4. il tempo da dedicare alla scrittura;5. il rapporto sempre al limite con il padre;6. il paesaggio nordico, il buio, la luce, le stagioni. Ci si vede in autunno, spero, per il quinto. [78/100]тАЬQuando ero arrivato, il cielo era alto e pieno di luce, il mare possente e il paesaggio aperto in modo che il paesino, cos├м dove si trovava con le sue case che sembravano buttate l├м alla rinfusa, pareva non essere pi├╣ in grado di trattenere qualcosa in s├й, pareva aver perso ogni suo diritto di esistere. La sensazione era che tutto fluisse, niente si fermasse. Poi giunsero la neve e il buio. Il cielo si abbass├▓, simile a una specie di coperchio che premeva sopra i tetti delle abitazioni. Il mare scomparve, il suo nero si fuse con quello del cielo, non era pi├╣ visibile nessun orizzonte. Sparirono persino le montagne e con ci├▓ la sensazione di trovarsi al centro di un paesaggio grande e aperto. Rimasero soltanto le case, che erano illuminate notte e giorno, costantemente circondate dalle tenebre, e adesso il fulcro era rappresentato da esse e dalle luci intorno a cui gravitava ogni cosa. тАЭ

Deel 4 in de "Mijn Strijd" serie gaat over de tienerjaren en het egocentrische jongensgedrag is pijnlijk herkenbaar al moet ik zeggen dat de drankzucht voor mij niet herkenbaar is en zijn problemen op het gebied van de omgang met het vrouwelijk geslacht ook niet. Het blijft een mooie, intense serie waar ik met volle teugen van geniet, maar dan wel met mate want ik lees slechts 1 per jaar en heb zelfs al tweemaal een jaar overgeslagen. -- Review in language other than English--
Depois de ter lido A Regra de Quatro em 2012 era com grande expectativa que aguardava um novo livro do autor Ian Caldwell. O Quinto Evangelho demorou dez anos a ser escrito. Felizmente, como n├гo tinha lido o seu primeiro livro aquando da sua sa├нda, n├гo precisei de esperar tanto tempo para ler a segunda obra. Tal como no seu anterior livro, Caldwell junta o thriller e o romance hist├│rico, transformando a leitura de O Quinto Evangelho muito atractiva e fascinante. Atrav├йs da morte do curador de arte Ugo Nogara, o autor conta a hist├│ria de "rivalidade" entre dois irm├гos que se encontram em p├│los opostos na Igreja: um pertence ├а igreja Cat├│lica outro ├а Ortodoxa, levando, por isso, estilos de vida completamente diferentes no interior do Vaticano. O que torna este livro ainda mais interessante de ler e de descobrir. Opini├гo completa em: http://marcadordelivros. blogspot. pt/2. . .

In den G├дrten von Castel Gandolfo wird ein toter Priester entdeckt. Er wurde erschossen. Bei der Leiche kniet Priester Simon, der bald darauf des Mordes verd├дchtigt wird. Sein Bruder Alex, ebenfalls Priester, kann das nicht glauben. Der ermordete Priester war Kurator einer Ausstellung, die die Kirchengeschichte ver├дndern soll. Wollte jemand die Ausstellung verhindern? Alex beschlie├Яt, seinem Bruder zu helfen und den wahren T├дter zu finden. Mein Leseeindruck:Laut Danksagung des Autors wurde an diesem Buch zehn Jahre lang gearbeitet. Das kann ich sehr gut nachvollziehen, denn die Geschichte rund um Alex und Simon ist sehr komplex und sehr durchdacht. Das Buch ist unglaublich informativ. Ich habe vieles ├╝ber das Leben in Vatikanstadt gelesen, das mir vorher unbekannt war. Mir hat die Handlung sehr gut gefallen. Das Buch ist spannend und auch lehrreich, und die Figuren wirken authentisch. Besonders gut hat mir gefallen, dass Alex nicht nur als Priester dargestellt wurde sondern auch als liebevoller Vater seines kleinen Sohnes. Ich hatte viel Lesefreude mit diesem Buch und kann es allen empfehlen, die spannende und durchdachte Geschichten m├╢gen und sich nicht vom kirchlichen Hintergrund abschrecken lassen.

Are you still there, Axl?Still here, princess. Tengo muchas dudas sobre c├│mo puntuar este libro. Ahora le doy cuatro estrellas, pero quiz├б dentro de un tiempo sean tres, no lo s├й. La historia es hermosa y a la vez triste, llena de met├бforas, criaturas mitol├│gicas, magia, amor, esperanza y memorias perdidas; todo eso en el contexto hist├│rico de la guerra entre los sajones y los brit├бnicos (de la que recomiendo informarse apenas un poco antes de empezar esta novela). El lado negativo del libro radica en los personajes, que est├бn mal desarrollados. Asimismo, es muy pesado y, en muchas partes, aburrido. Hubo momentos en que se me cerraban los ojos del cansancio de leer una y otra vez lo mismo, o los problemas de los protagonistas, que, al ser planos, no me interesaban. Es por eso que tengo bastantes dudas sobre la nota. La narraci├│n es compleja, y no por la prosa, es preciosa, sino porque Ishiguro salta de la primera persona (que encima no es estable: cambian los puntos de vista) a la tercera. Y para complicar m├бs las cosas, el autor cuenta, como si el lector estuviese al tanto de ellos, hechos aislados que todav├нa no tuvieron lugar en la historia (eso hizo que me preguntara si mi nivel de ingl├йs hab├нa disminuido considerablemente o si me estaba volviendo idiota). Pero en fin. Con respecto a la trama tengo que decir que es alucinante. . . y, al igual que la estructura narrativa, dif├нcil. No obstante, aunque sea un poco confusa, me maravill├│ con la mitolog├нa, los secretos detr├бs del olvido, la enorme cantidad de alegor├нas, la prueba de amor de la pareja protagonista y la originalidad. Tengo que mencionar que no esperaba encontrarme con tantos plot-twists. Algunos me sorprendieron mucho. Si no fuese tan pesado, este libro podr├нa ser uno de mis favoritos. ╤В╨╡╨║╤Б╤В╨░ ╨╕ ╨╡╨┤╨╕╨╜ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨┤╨│╨╛╨▓╨╛╤А, ╨║╨╛╨╣╤В╨╛ ╤Б╨╝╨╡╨╗╨╛ ╨╝╨╛╨│╨░ ╨┤╨░ ╨╜╨░╤А╨╡╨║╨░ ╨╡╨┤╨╕╨╜ ╨╛╤В ╨╜╨░╨╣-╨╕╨╜╤В╨╡╤А╨╡╤Б╨╜╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨┤╨│╨╛╨▓╨╛╤А╨╕, ╤З╨╡╤В╨╡╨╜╨╕ ╨╜╤П╨║╨╛╨│╨░ ╨╛╤В ╨╝╨╡╨╜. ╨б╨░╨╝╨╕╤П╤В ╨У╨╡╨╣╨╝╤К╨╜ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨┤╤Г╨┐╤А╨╡╨╢╨┤╨░╨▓╨░, ╤З╨╡ ╨▓ ╨║╨╜╨╕╨│╨░╤В╨░ ╨╝╤Г ╨▓╤Б╨╕╤З╨║╨╛ ╨╡ ╨▒╤К╤А╨║╨╛╤З ╨╛╤В ╨╢╨░╨╜╤А╨╛╨▓╨╡ ╨╕ ╤Б╤К╨╛╤В╨▓╨╡╤В╨╜╨╛ ╨╜╨╡ ╤В╤А╤П╨▒╨▓╨░ ╨╝╨╜╨╛╨│╨╛ ╨┤╨░ ╨╝╤Г ╨┐╤А╨╕╨┤╨╕╤А╤П╨╝╨╡ ╨╖╨░ ╤В╨╛╨▓╨░. ╨Т╤К╨╛╤А╤К╨╢╨╡╨╜ ╤Б ╤В╨╛╨▓╨░ ╨┐╤А╨╡╨┤╤Г╨┐╤А╨╡╨╢╨┤╨╡╨╜╨╕╨╡, ╨░╨╖ ╤Б╨╡ ╨▓╨┐╤Г╤Б╨╜╨░╤Е ╨╜╨░╨┐╤А╨╡╨┤ ╨╕. . . ╨╖╨░╤В╨▓╨╛╤А╨╕╤Е ╨┐╨╛╤Б╨╗╨╡╨┤╨╜╨░╤В╨░ ╤Б╤В╤А╨░╨╜╨╕╤Ж╨░ ╤Б ╤З╤Г╨▓╤Б╤В╨▓╨╛╤В╨╛, ╤З╨╡ ╤Б╤К╨╝ ╨┐╤К╤В╨╡╤И╨╡╤Б╤В╨▓╨░╨╗ ╤Б ╨│╨╛╨┤╨╕╨╜╨╕, ╨╜╨╛ ╨╜╤П╨║╨░╨║ ╨▒╨╡╨╖ ╨┤╨░ ╤Б╨╡ ╤Г╨╝╨╛╤А╤П╨▓╨░╨╝. ╨Ч╨░ ╤В╨░╨╖╨╕ ╨║╨╜╨╕╨│╨░ ╤Б ╨┐╤К╨╗╨╜╨░ ╤Б╨╕╨╗╨░ ╨▓╨░╨╢╨╕ ╤Б╨╗╨╡╨┤╨╜╨╛╤В╨╛: ╤З╨╡╤В╨╡╨╜╨╡╤В╨╛ ╨╡ ╨╕╤Б╤В╨╕╨╜╤Б╨║╨╛ ╤Г╨┤╨╛╨▓╨╛╨╗╤Б╤В╨▓╨╕╨╡. ╨б╨╡╨│╨░, ╤Б╨╗╨╡╨┤ ╨║╨░╤В╨╛ ╤Б╨╡ тАЮ╨╜╨░╨╢╨░╨▒╤Г╤А╨║╨░╤ЕтАЬ, ╨╡ ╨▓╤А╨╡╨╝╨╡ ╨┤╨░ ╨┐╤А╨╛╨┤╤К╨╗╨╢╨░ ╨╜╨░╤В╨░╤В╤К╨║. тАЮ╨Ш╨╝╨░ ╨╜╨╡╤Й╨░, ╨║╨╛╨╕╤В╨╛ ╨╜╨╕ ╤А╨░╨╖╤Б╤В╤А╨╛╨╣╨▓╨░╤В. ╨Т ╤Б╨╗╤Г╤З╨░╤П ╨╛╨▒╨░╤З╨╡ ╨╜╨╡ ╨│╨╛╨▓╨╛╤А╨╕╨╝ ╤В╨╛╤З╨╜╨╛ ╨╖╨░ ╤В╨╛╨▓╨░. ╨Ь╨╕╤Б╨╗╤П ╤Б╨╕ ╨┐╨╛-╤Б╨║╨╛╤А╨╛ ╨╖╨░ ╨╛╨╜╨╡╨╖╨╕ ╨╛╨▒╤А╨░╨╖╨╕, ╨┤╤Г╨╝╨╕ ╨╕ ╨╕╨┤╨╡╨╕, ╨║╨╛╨╕╤В╨╛ ╨┐╤А╨╛╨┐╨░╨┤╨░╤В ╨┐╨╛╨┤ ╨╜╨░╤Б ╨║╨░╤В╨╛ ╨║╨░╨┐╨░╨║ ╨▓ ╨┐╨╛╨┤╨░ ╨╕ ╨╜╨╕ ╨╕╨╖╤Е╨▓╤К╤А╨╗╤П╤В ╨╛╤В ╨╜╨░╤И╨╕╤П ╨▒╨╡╨╖╨╛╨┐╨░╤Б╨╡╨╜, ╤А╨░╨╖╤Г╨╝╨╡╨╜ ╤Б╨▓╤П╤В ╨▓ ╨┤╤А╤Г╨│╨╛ ╨╝╤П╤Б╤В╨╛, ╨┤╨░╨╗╨╡╤З ╨┐╨╛-╤В╤К╨╝╨╜╨╛ ╨╕ ╨╜╨╡╨│╨╛╤Б╤В╨╛╨┐╤А╨╕╨╡╨╝╨╜╨╛. ╨б╤К╤А╤Ж╨░╤В╨░ ╨┐╤А╨╡╤Б╨║╨░╤З╨░╤В ╨╡╨┤╨╕╨╜ ╤Г╨┤╨░╤А ╨▓ ╨│╤К╤А╨┤╨╕╤В╨╡ ╨╜╨╕ ╨╕ ╤Б╨╡ ╨▒╨╛╤А╨╕╨╝ ╨┤╨░ ╤Б╨╕ ╨┐╨╛╨╡╨╝╨╡╨╝ ╨┤╤К╤Е. ╨Ъ╤А╤К╨▓╤В╨░ ╤Б╨╡
